40001001	Jesu Khrist, Abraham Tapa, David Tapa khanggui lehkhabu:
40001002	Abraham in Isak ahing a, Isak in Jakob ahing a, Jakob in Juda leh a sanggamte ahing hi.
40001003	Juda in Tamar toh Perez leh Zara ahing a, Perez in Hezrom ahing a, Hezrom in Aram ahing hi.
40001004	Huleh Aram in Aminadab ahing a, Aminadab in Nasson ahing a, Nasson in Salmon ahing hi.
40001005	Salmon in Rahab toh Boaz ahing a, Boaz in Ruth toh Obed ahing a, Obed in Jesse ahing hi.
40001006	Huleh Jesse in kumpipa David ahing a, kumpipa David in Uriah ji anahi toh Solomon ahing hi.
40001007	Solomon in Rehoboam ahing a, Rehoboam in Abia ahing a, Abia in Asa ahing hi.
40001008	Asa in Jehosaphat ahing a, Jehosaphat in Joram ahing a, Joram in Uziah ahing hi.
40001009	Uziah in Jotham ahing a, Jotham in Ahaz ahing a, Ahaz in Hezekiah ahing hi.
40001010	Hezekiah in Manasseh ahing a, Manasseh in Amon ahing a, Amon in Josia ahing hi.
40001011	Babylon gam a puimanga aum laiun Josia in Jekonia leh a sanggamte ahing hi.
40001012	Babylon gam a puimang ahih nungun Jekonia in Sheltiel ahing a, Sheltiel in Zerubbabel ahing hi.
40001013	Zerubbabel in Abiud ahing a, Abiud in Eliakim ahing a, Eliakim in Azor ahing hi.
40001014	Azor in Zadok ahing a, Zadok in Akim ahing a, Akim in Eliud ahing hi.
40001015	Eliud in Eleazar ahing a, Eleazar in Mathan ahing a, Mathan in Jakob ahing hi.
40001016	Huleh Jakob in Mari pasal Joseph ahing a, hu Mari apatin Khrist kichi Jesu chu ahung piangta hi.
40001017	Huchiin Abraham apat David chiang khang zousiah chu khang sawmleli ahi. Huleh David apat Babylon gam a puimang ahih chiang uh khang sawmleli, huleh Babylon gam a puimang ahih vapat Khrist chiang khang sawmleli ahi.
40001018	Jesu Khrist pian daan chu hi chi ahi: a nu Mari chu Joseph toh akikhaam nung un, aumkhawm maun, Hagau Siangthou apat gaai chih akihedohta hi.
40001019	Hizongleh a pasal Joseph chu midihtat ahi a, zapi heet-a um diing uut louin aguuha khuul atumta hi.
40001020	Hizongleh amah in hi thute angaihtuah laiin, a mang in Lalpa angel a kawmah ahung kilaah a, “David tapa Joseph, Mari na ji diinga laah lau sin. Ajiahchu a nau paai hi Hagau Siangthou apat ahi.
40001021	Tapa ahung nei diinga huleh a min Jesu na sa diing hi. Ajiahchu Amah in a mite a sualnate vapat ahundam diing hi,” achi hi.
40001022	Hi silte zousiah chu Lalpa’n zawlnei kam a hichibanga anasoite ataangtun theihna diingin ahi,
40001023	“Ngai un, nungaah siangthou agaai diing a, Tapa anei diing a, huleh a min Immanuel achi diing uh,” huchu, “I kawmah Pathian aum,” chihna ahi.
40001024	Huin Joseph chu ihmu athou a, Lalpa angel in thu apiaah banga bawlin, a ji chu akiteenpihta a,
40001025	hizongleh Mari in a Tapa masapeen ahung neihkhiah masiah aluppih sih a, huleh amah in a min Jesu asata hi.
40002001	Huchiin kumpipa Herod lal laia Judia gam a Bethlehem khua a Jesu ahung pianin, ngai un, suahlam apat mipil aahsi lama siamte Jerusalem ah ahung va,
40002002	“Judate Kumpipa hung piang chu khoiah aum ei? Ajiahchu suahlam ah Amah aahsi ka mu va, Amah be diinga hung ka hi uh,” achi uhi.
40002003	Kumpipa Herod in huchu ajaah tahin alungdong a, Jerusalem a mi zousiah zong amah toh alungdong uhi.
40002004	Siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute zousiah akou khawm a, Khrist pianna diing khoitah ahiai chih adong hi.
40002005	Huleh amah un a kawmah, “Judia gam a Bethlehem khua ah, ajiahchu zawlnei in hichibangin anagial hi,
40002006	‘Nang, Juda gam a Bethlehem, Juda gamoptute lahah na neupeen hial sih hi. Ajiahchu ka mi Israel veengtu diing nang apatin Optu liantah ahungdoh diing hi,’” achi uhi.
40002007	Huin Herod in mipil aahsi lam a siamte aguuh kouh a, aahsi kilat hun adongchianta hi.
40002008	Huleh amahuh chu Bethlehem ah asawl a, “Chiah unla, naungeh thu chu chiantahin vakankhia un. Na muh tahchiangun keima’n zong ka hung biahve theihna diingin thu hung hilh kiit un,” achi hi.
40002009	Huleh amah un kumpipa thu ajaah zohun akipankheta va, ngai un, suahlam a amuh uh aahsi chu naungeeh umna tung jawn atun a, akhawl masiah a ma vah apai jeel hi.
40002010	Amah un aahsi chu amuh tahun nasatahin akipaah uhi.
40002011	Huleh inn sungah aluut va, a nu Mari toh um naungeeh chu amu va, abohkhup va, abeta uhi. Huin a goubawmte uh hongin a kawmah silpiaah sana leh begaw leh murrah apia uhi.
40002012	Huleh Herod kawma kilehkiit lou diinga a mang va hilha aum jiahun lampi tuam juiin a kho lamvah achiahta uhi.
40002013	Huleh amahuh achiah nungun, en un, Lalpa angel chu Joseph kawmah a mang in akilaah a, “Thou inla, naungeeh leh a nu pui inla Aigupta gam ah taai in. Huleh ka hung hilh kiit masiah hutah ah um zing in. Ajiahchu Herod in naungeeh chu suhlup diinga hawl pah diing ahi,” achi hi.
40002014	Joseph chu athou a, naungeeh leh a nu chu apui a, ajaan ajaanin Aigupta lamah achiahta uhi.
40002015	Lalpa’n zawlnei kam a, “Aigupta gam apat ka Tapa ka koudohta,” chia asoi ahung taangtun theihna diingin Herod asih masiah hutah ah aum zing uhi.
40002016	Huin Herod in aahsi lam a siamte’n aheem uh chih aheet tahin nasatahin alungthahta hi. Huchiin mi asawl a, aahsi lam a siamte kawma a hun thu adohchian bangtahin Bethlehem leh a kiimveel zousiah a pasal naupang kum nih leh a nuailam zousiah athatta hi.
40002017	Zawlnei Jeremia in hichibanga anasoi chu ahung taangtungta hi,
40002018	“Rama khua ah thawm akija, numei misi ngaia kap leh maauna nasatah bang, Rachel in a tate akah a, aum nawn louh jiahun koima hamuan diing auut sih hi,” achih chu.
40002019	Herod asih phetin, ngai in, Lalpa angel khat Joseph kawmah a mang in Aigupta gam ah akilaah a,
40002020	“Thou inla, naungeeh leh a nu chu pui inla Israel gam ah chiah in, ajiahchu naungeeh thah tumte asita uhi,” achi hi.
40002021	Huin amah chu athou a, naungeeh leh a nu chu apui a, Israel gam ah ahungta hi.
40002022	Arkelaos chu Judia gam a a pa Herod mun ah alal hi chih ajaah tahin hu lamah achiah ngamta sih hi. A mang a hilha aum jiahin Galili gam lamah akilehheita hi.
40002023	Huleh zawlneite’n, “Amah chu Nazareth mi achi diing uh,” chia asoi uh ataangtun theihna diingin Nazareth kichi khua khat ah ahung tung va, ateengta uhi.
40003001	Hu hun laiin Baptistu Johan chu Judia gamdaai ah taangkouin ahung a,
40003002	“Kisiih un, ajiahchu vaan lalgam anaita hi,” chia soiin.
40003003	Ajiahchu amah ahi zawlnei Isai in, “Gamdaai a mi kikou aw in, ‘LALPA lamlian sial unla, a lampite hihtang un,’ achi hi,” chia anasoipa chu.
40003004	Hu Johan in chu sangawngsau mul puan asilh a, a kawng savun kawnggaah in agaah a, huleh a an chu khaukhup leh gam khuaizu ahi.
40003005	Huleh Jerusalem leh Judia gam pumpi leh Jordan kiimveel a umte zousiah a kawmah achiah va,
40003006	huleh a sualte uh kiphuangin Jordan ah Johan in abaptis hi.
40003007	Ama’n Pharisaite leh Sadukaite tampi a kawma baptisma tang diinga hung amuh tahin, a kawmvah, “Guul suante aw! Lungthahna hung tung pah diing taaisan diingin kuan ahung thuhilh ei?
40003008	Hujiahin kisiihna toh kituaah gah suang un.
40003009	‘Abraham ka pu uh ahi,’ chiin kingaihtuah sih un. Ajiahchu Pathian in hi suangte haw Abraham tate in adingsah thei hi, chih ka hung hilh ahi.
40003010	Tuin zong singbul chin ah heita koih ahita hi. Hujiahin singkung gah hoih suang lou photmah chu phuuh ahi a, mei ah paihluutin aum hi.
40003011	Ke’n chu kisiihna diingin tui in ka hung baptis ngeei hi. Hizongleh ka nunga hung paipa chu kei saangin aloupijaw a, a keengtophah tawi taah zong ka hi sih hi. Ama’n chu Hagau Siangthou leh mei in nanguh ahung baptis diing hi.
40003012	A khut in a pasiseep atawi a, a phual chu ajaap siang tinten diing hi. Huleh a buhte chu a pang ah akoih khawm diing hi. Hizongleh a sii chu mei mittheilou in ahaaltum diing,” achi hi.
40003013	Huin Jesu chu baptisma tang diingin Galili gam apatin Jordan ah Johan kawmah ahung hi.
40003014	Hizongleh Johan in, “Kei na hung baptis kiphamoh jaw hi ing a, nang kei kawma hung na hi maw?” chiin Amah anakhaam hi.
40003015	Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Tuin chu huchih diing lemsa haam in. Ajiahchu huchibang a dihtatna zousiah bawl bukim chu ei diinga poimoh ahi,” achi hi. Huin lem asata hi.
40003016	Jesu chu baptisma atan zohin tui apatin apawtdoh pah hi. Huleh ngai un, vaan Amah lamah ahung kihong a, Pathian Hagau chu vakhu banga hung kumsuhin a tunga hung tu chu amu hi.
40003017	Huleh ngai un, vaan apatin aw khat ahung ging a, “Hichu ka Tapa deihtah ahi a, a tungah ka kipaah mahmah hi,” achi hi.
40004001	Hu nungin Jesu chu diabol heema um diingin gamdaai ah Hagau in apuita hi.
40004002	Huleh suun sawmli leh jaan sawmli an ngawla aum nungin a gil ahung kialta hi.
40004003	Huin heemtu chu a kawmah ahung a, “Pathian Tapa na hih leh, hi suangte tanghou suaah diingin thu pia in,” achi hi.
40004004	Hizongleh Ama’n adawng a, “‘Mihing tanghou chauhin ahing sih diing a, hizongleh Pathian kam apat thu pawt chin in ahing jaw diing uh,’ chih gelh ahi,” achi hi.
40004005	Huchiin diabol in Amah chu khopi siangthou ah apuitou a, Pathian biahinn tung sangpeen ah akoih hi.
40004006	Huleh a kawmah, “Pathian Tapa na hih leh, kekhesuh in, ajiahchu, ‘Ama’n na tungtaang thu ah a angelte thu ape diing,’ huleh ‘A khut un ahung na dom diing uh, huchilou inchu na keeng suang ah na tat kha diing,’ chia gelh ahi,” achi hi.
40004007	Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “‘LALPA na Pathian na je-et louh diing ahi,’ chih gelh ahi jeel hi,” achi hi.
40004008	Huleh diabol in Amah chu taang sangpi khat tungah apui kiit a, khovel lalgam zousiah leh a loupina uh aensah hi.
40004009	Huleh diabol in a kawmah, “Khupbohin hung be lehchin hite zousiah ka hung pe diing hi,” achi hi.
40004010	Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Hitah apatin chiah mang in, Setan! ‘LALPA na Pathian chu na biah diing a, Amah nna chauh natoh diing ahi,’ chih gelh ahi,” achi hi.
40004011	Huzohin diabol in Amah anuseta a, huleh en un, angelte ahung va a nna atohsahta uhi.
40004012	Huchiin Johan suangkul ah akhum uh chih Jesu’n ajaah tahin, Galili gam ah achiahta hi.
40004013	Huleh Nazareth khua nusiain, Zebulon leh Naphtali gamkaih sunga um diil geia Kapernaum khua ah chiahin avateengta hi,
40004014	huchia zawlnei Isai in hichibanga anasoite ahung taangtun theihna diingin.
40004015	“Jentelte Galili, Jordan gaal a Diil lampi a um Zebulon gam leh Naphtali gam a:
40004016	mial a tou mite’n vaah loupitah amu uh, huleh sihna gam leh liim a toute tungah vaah ahung suaahta hi,” achih chu.
40004017	Hu hun apatin Jesu’n, “Kisiih un, ajiahchu vaan lalgam anaita hi,” chiin thusoi apanta hi.
40004018	Huleh Jesu’n Galili Diil geia avaah laiin, unau nih Simon kichi Peter leh a sanggampa Andru diil a leensep-a um amu hi, ajiahchu amahuh ngamanmi ahi uhi.
40004019	Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hung jui un, mihing mantuin ka hung siam diing,” achi hi.
40004020	Huleh amah un a leente uh nusiain Amah ajui pah uhi.
40004021	Huleh Amah chu hu apat chiah jeelin, unau dang nih, Zebedi tapate Jakob leh a sanggampa Johan chu a pa uh Zebedi toh kuang sunga a leente uh phoha um amu a, amahuh akou hi.
40004022	Huleh amah un a pa uh leh a kuang uh nusiain Amah ajui pahta uhi.
40004023	Huleh Jesu chu Galili gam pumpi ah avaah lehleh a, sinagogte bang ah thu ahilh a, lalgam tanchinpha soiin mite laha natna chinteng leh damlouhna chinteng asudam jeel hi.
40004024	Huleh Syria gam pumpi ah a min athangta hi. Huleh amah un natna chituamtuam a damlou zousiah leh dawi matte, sibup veite leh jengte a kawmah ahung pui va, Ama’n anasudam jeel hi.
40004025	Huleh Amah chu Galili, Dekapoli, Jerusalem, Judia leh Jordan gaal lam apat hung mipi nasatahin ajui uhi.
40005001	Huin mipite amuhin Amah chu taang ah akal a, huleh atou zohin a nungjuite a kawmah ahung uhi.
40005002	Huleh Ama’n a kam akaah a, amahuh thu ahilh a:
40005003	“Hagau a gentheite ahampha uhi, vaan lalgam amahuh a ahih jiahin.
40005004	Lungngaite ahampha uhi, hamuana um diing ahih jiahun.
40005005	Thunuaigolhte ahampha uhi, leigou luah diing ahih jiahun.
40005006	Dihtatna lam a gilkiala dangtaahte ahampha uhi, taisaha um diing ahih jiahun.
40005007	Khotuah theite ahampha uhi, khotuahna tang diing ahih jiahun.
40005008	Lungsim siangthoute ahampha uhi, Pathian mu diing ahih jiahun.
40005009	Lemna siamtute ahampha uhi, Pathian tate chiha um diing ahih jiahun.
40005010	Dihtatna jiaha suhduhdaha umte ahampha uhi, vaan lalgam amahuh a diing ahih jiahin.
40005011	“Mi’n keimah jiaha ahung housiat va, ahung suhduhdah va, juau a gilou chinteng a ahung heeh hun chiangun na hampha uhi.
40005012	Kipaah unla, nasatahin nuam un, vaan ah na kipaahman diing uh atam ngaala, ajiahchu na ma va zawlnei umte zong hitobangin anasuduhdahta uhi.
40005013	“Lei chi na hi uh, hizongleh chi chu data hileh, bangin akisual kiitta diai? Huchia’n a panna aumta sih diing a, paihdoh a, mite totchil diing ahi giapta hi.
40005014	“Nanguh khovel mite vaah na hi uh, taang tunga khopi um chu akiphual thei sih hi.
40005015	Huleh mi’n thaumei dein loh akhuhkhum ngei sih va, a tunna ah akoih jaw uhi. Huchiin inn sunga mi um zousiah asalhvaah hi.
40005016	Hutobangin na vaah uh mi mitmuhin vaah heh, huchiin amah un na natoh hoihte uh amu thei diing va, na Pa uh vaan a um chu apaahtawi diing uhi.
40005017	“Daan thu aha, Zawlneite Lehkhabute aha suse diinga hung ka hi chiin hung ngaihtuah sih un. Suse diinga hung ka hi sih a, sutaangtung diinga hung ka hijaw hi.
40005018	Chihtahzetin na kawmvah ka soi ahi, vaan leh lei aman masiah daan thu a sutvom neucha aha thaivom neuchakhat zong amang sih diing hi, a bawna ataangtun kim masiahin.
40005019	Hujiahin koipouh hi thupiaah neupeente laha khat mei zong susia a, hutobanga bawl diinga mite hilh chu vaan lalgam ah mi neupeen ahi diing hi. Hizongleh koipouh in jui a, hutobanga bawl diinga mite hilhtu chu vaan lalgam ah milian chih ahi diing hi.
40005020	Ka hung hilh ahi, na dihtatna un daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite dihtatna akhuup louh inchu, vaan lalgam ah na luut top sih diing uhi.
40005021	“Malai mite kawma, ‘Tual na thah louh diing ahi, huleh koipouh tualthat in chu vaihawmna atuaah diing hi,’ kichi daan na jata uhi.
40005022	Hizongleh ke’n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, koipouh ajiah beia a unau tunga lungthah chu vaihawmsahin aum diing hi. Huleh koipouh a unau kawma‚ ‘Raka!’ chitu in chu vaihawmtute vaihawmna atuaah diing hi. Huleh koipouh, ‘Mingol!’ chitu chu gawtmun meidiil a luut theihna lauhhuai ah aum diing hi.
40005023	Hujiahin maitaam bul a silpiaah diing tawia na hung laitaha na unau in na tungah lungkimlouhna anei chih na heetdoh leh,
40005024	na silpiaah diing chu hu maitaam ma ah nusia inla chiah in. Huleh na unau toh kilem masaphot inla, huzoh chiangin hung inla, na silpiaah diing chu laan in.
40005025	Na langpa toh lampi a na chiah laiin kilem zoh in, huchilou inchu na langpa’n vaihawmtu ahung mansah diing a, huleh vaihawmtu’n thuneitulian kawmah ahung pekhe diing a, thuneitulian in suangkul ah ahung khum kha diing hi.
40005026	Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, paisa san khat tan a na piaah kim masiah hu apatin na pawtdoh het sih diing hi.
40005027	“Malai mite kawma, ‘Aang na kawm louh diing ahi,’ chia anakisoi daan na jata uhi.
40005028	Hizongleh ke’n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi. Koipouh numei enlahtaha entu in a lungsim in amahnu toh aang akawm zouta ahi.
40005029	Huleh na mit jiatlam in ahung puuhsah leh kheidoh inla paai mei in. Ajiahchu na tahsa pumpi gawtmun a paih ahih saangin na tahsa peeng khat manthaai chu nang diingin ahoihjaw hi.
40005030	Huleh na khut jiatlam in ahung kipuuhsah leh saattan inla paai mei in. Ajiahchu na tahsa pumpi gawtmun a paih ahih saangin na tahsa peeng khat manthaai chu nang diingin ahoihjaw hi.
40005031	“‘Mi koipouh in a ji akhuul leh khuulna lehkha pia heh,’ daan in anachi hi.
40005032	Hizongleh ke’n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, koipouh in mi toh lupkhawm jiah hiloua a ji akhuul leh, amahnu chu a-aangkawmsah a, huleh koipouh hu khuulsanu kiteenpih chu aangkawm ahi.
40005033	“Huchiangleh malai mite kawma, ‘Dihloutahin kihaahsial sih un. Amahvaang na kihaahsialnate Lalpa kawmah taangtun jaw in,’ chia anakisoi daan na jata uhi.
40005034	Hizongleh ke’n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, kihaahsial mawngmawng sih un, vaan louin kihaahsial sih un, ajiahchu Pathian laltouphah ahi.
40005035	Huleh lei louin kihaahsial sih un, ajiahchu hichu a keeng ngahna ahi. Huleh Jerusalem louin kihaahsial sih un, ajiahchu hichu Kumpipa loupitah khopi ahi.
40005036	Na lutang louin kihaahsial sin, ajiahchu samjang khat zong na kaang sahin na vomsah thei sih hi.
40005037	Hizongleh ‘Hi’ na chih uh chu ‘Hi’ hi heh, huleh ‘Hilou’ na chih uh chu ‘Hilou’ hi heh. Ajiahchu hi vaal chu giloupa apat hung pawt ahi.
40005038	“‘Mit luanga mit, ha luanga ha,’ chia anakisoi daan na jata uhi.
40005039	Hizongleh ke’n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, migilou chu kikhinpih sih un, koipouh in na ngeiphe jiatlam abeh leh, a lehlam zong doh jaw in.
40005040	Huleh mi koipouh in vaihawmna mun a ahung pui a na puannaah laah atup leh, na puannaah tual zong lasah ngaal in.
40005041	Mi koipouh meel khat chiah diinga hung phuut photmah kawmah amah toh meel nih chiah khawm un.
40005042	Na kawma hung ngeentu chu pia inla, huleh ahung thunglaah uut chu kiheimangsan sin.
40005043	“‘Na innveengte lungsiat inla, na meelmate hua in,’ chia anakisoi daan chu na jata uhi.
40005044	Hizongleh ke’n chu na kawmvah ka soi ahi, na meelmate uh lungsiat unla, haamsia hung lohte vangpiaah unla, ahung mudahte diingin sil hoih bawlsah un. Huleh ahung bawlsete leh ahung suduhdahte diingin haamteisah un.
40005045	Huchiin na Pa uh vaan a um tate na hi thei diing uhi. Ajiahchu Ama’n migiloute leh mihoihte tungah ni asuaahsah a, huleh midihtatte leh midihtatloute tungah zong guah ajusah hi.
40005046	Ajiahchu nanguh hung lungsiatte chauh na lungsiat uh leh, kipaahman bang ahiai na muh diing uh? Siahdongte’n zong huchibanga bawlve hilou ahi viaimah?
40005047	Huleh na unaute uh chauh chibai na buuh uh leh, midang saanga bang ahiai na bawl tam tuan uh? Siahdongte’n zong huchibanga bawlve hilou ahi viaimah?
40005048	Hujiahin vaan a um na Pa uh ahoih bukim mahbangin nanguh zong hoih bukim un.
40006001	“Mi na panpihna va na sil hoih bawlte uh mi muh diinga a ma va bawl lou diingin pilvaang un. Huchilou inchu na Pa uh vaan a um kawmah muh diing kipaahman na nei sih diing uhi.
40006002	Hujiahin mi gentheite kawma sil na piaah chiangun milepchiahte’n mi phat aloh theihna diingva sinagogte bang leh kholai kotzingte bang a ahih veu bangun, na ma vah peengkuul muut sih un. Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, amah un a kipaahman uh amuzouta uhi.
40006003	Hujiahin nang chu mi kawma sil na piaah chiangin, na khut jiatlam hih chu na khut veilam hesah sin.
40006004	Huchiin na silpiaah chu aguuha pia na hi diing a, huleh na Pa aguuha hung mupa in phuanglaahtahin ahung dit diing hi.
40006005	“Huleh na haamtei chiangun milepchiahte bangin na hih diing uh ahi sih. Ajiahchu amah un mi’n amuh theihna diingin sinagogte leh kotzing ningkawite bang a dingin ahaamtei uut sese uhi. Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, amah un a kipaahman uh amuta uhi.
40006006	Hizongleh nang chu na haamtei chiangin na pindan sungah luut inla, na kot khaah inla, aguuha um na Pa kawmah haamtei in. Huchiin na Pa aguuha hung mupa in phuanglaahtahin ahung dit diing hi.
40006007	Hizongleh na haamtei chiangun Jentelte bangin umjebeiin na soisa uh soi nonnon sih un, ajiahchu amah un chu ahaam tam jiahva jaaha um diingin akingaihtuah uhi.
40006008	“Hujiahin amahuh bang sih un, ajiahchu na Pa un a kawma na nget maun bang silte ahiai na mamoh uh ahe hi.
40006009	Hujiahin nanguh chu hichibangin haamtei un: ka Pa uh vaan a um, na min kizahtaat heh.
40006010	“Na lalgam hung tung heh. Na deihjawng vaan a akibawl bangin lei ah zong kibawl heh.
40006011	“Ka niteng neehkhop uh ni chinin hung pia in.
40006012	“Ka leibate uh ka ngaihdam bang un, ka batte uh hung ngaidam in.
40006013	“Heemna ah hung puiluut sinla, huleh giloupa apat hung hunkhe jaw in. Ajiahchu lalgamte, silbawltheihnate, loupinate, kumtuanga nang a ahih jiahin, Amen, chiin.
40006014	“Mi a tatsualnate uh na ngaihdam uh leh, na Pa uh vaan a um in zong nanguh ahung ngaihdam diing hi.
40006015	Hizongleh mi na ngaihdam louh uh leh vaan a um na Pa un zong na tatsualnate uh ahung ngaihdam sih diing hi.
40006016	“Huleh an na ngawl chiangun milepchiahte bangin ngui meel po sih un. Amah un chu an ngawla akilat theihna diingun a maaisuah uh atuamsah veu uhi. Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, amah un a kipaahman uh amuta uhi.
40006017	Hizongleh nang chu an na ngawl chiangin na lu sathau nuh inla, na maai phiat in.
40006018	Huchia na Pa aguuha um mitmuh ah loungaal mihing mitmuh a an ngawl na bat louhna diingin; huleh na Pa aguuha hung mupa in phuanglaah tahin ahung dit diing hi.
40006019	“Leikha leh tuieeh in aneehsiatna ah leh gutate’n akalhsiat va, aguuh theihna uh lei ah gou kikhol sih unla,
40006020	hizongleh leikha leh tuieeh in aneehsiat louhna leh gutate’n akalhsiat va, aguuh louhna uh vaan ah gou kikhol jaw un.
40006021	Ajiahchu na gou uh umna phot ah na lungsim uh zong aum diing hi.
40006022	“Sapum vaahna thaumei chu mit ahi. Hujiahin na mit ahoih chiangin na sapum avaah veh diing hi.
40006023	Hizongleh na mit ahoih louh inchu, na sapum avehin amial diing hi. Hujiahin na sunga vaah chu mial hitaleh, hu mial chu nasa namei in chia!
40006024	“Mi koima in pu nih nna atong kop thei sih hi, ajiahchu khat huain khat alungsiat diing hi, ahihlouhleh khat gumin khat amusit diing hi. Pathian nna leh sum nna na tong khawm thei sih diing uhi.
40006025	“Hujiahin na kawmvah ka hung hilh ahi, bang ahiai ka neeh diing, bang ahiai ka dawn diing, chiin na hinna diingun lunghimoh sih un; bang ahiai ka silh a, ka teen diing, chiin na tahsa uh diingin lunghimoh saam sih un. Neeh diing saangin hinna aluuljaw sih in, huleh silh leh teen saangin tahsa aluuljaw sih eimah?
40006026	Tungleeng vate en un, buh atuh sih va, aat zong aat sih va, buhinn ah zong asung luut sih uhi. Ahihvaangin na Pa uh vaan a um in amahuh avaah hi. Nanguh chu amahuh saanga nasataha luuljaw hilou na hi viaimah?
40006027	Nanguh lahah koi in ahiai lunghihmoh jiaha a dung tong khat a behlap thei?
40006028	“Huleh silhleteen thu a bang diinga lunghimoh na hi viai? Gam a lili paahte khandaan ngaihtuah un, tong lah atonggim sih va, pat zong akheeh sih uhi.
40006029	Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, Solomon ngeei zong a loupina zousiah a akizepin hi lili paahte khat tuhin zong jepmawi ahi zou sih hi.
40006030	Huchia gam a hampa tunia hing a, jiing a meikhuuh a paihluut diing bawn Pathian in ahuchijep leh, Aw nanguh ginna haatloute, Ama’n nanguh hu saangin ahung jeemjaw tham sih diaimah?
40006031	“Hujiahin, ‘Bang ahiai i neeh diing?’ ahihlouhleh ‘Bang ahiai i dawn diing?’ ahihlouhleh ‘Bang ahiai i silh diing?’ chiin lunghimoh sih un.
40006032	Ajiahchu Jentelte’n hi silte zousiah lawptahin ahawl va, hi silte zousiah na mamoh uh chih na Pa uh vaan a um in ahe hi.
40006033	Hizongleh nang un chu Pathian lalgam leh a dihtatna hawl masa un, huleh hi silte zousiah piaahbeh na hi diing uhi.
40006034	Hujiahin jiing a diingin lunghimoh sih un. Ajiahchu jiingin amah a diing ahung kingaihtuah tawm diing hi. Ni khat a buaina chu a ni a diingin ahuntawh ahi.
40007001	“Demsiata na um louhna diingun mi demse sih un.
40007002	Ajiahchu na demsiat bangmah un demsiatin na um diing va, huleh na tehna bangmah un ahung tehsah kiit diing uhi.
40007003	Bang diinga na mit a singtum ngaihtuah lou a, na unau mit a niinthem um muthei na hiai?
40007004	Ahihlouhleh ngai in, nang mit ngeei ah singtum aum a bangchiin ahiai na unau kawma, ‘Na mit a niinthem hung lakhesah in,’ na chih theih diing?
40007005	Nang milepchiah, na mit apat singtum chu lakhe masa in. Huchiin na unau mit a niinthem laahdoh diing chu chiangtahin na mu thei diing hi.
40007006	“Uite kawmah silsiangthou pe sih unla, voh ma ah zong na tuikep suang uh paai sih un. Huchilou inchu amah un hute chu a keeng un achilse diing va, huleh hung kiheiin nanguh ahung philjaah kha diing uhi.
40007007	“Ngeen un, piaahin na um diing uh; hawl un, na mu diing uh; kiu un, honsahin na um diing uhi.
40007008	Ajiahchu angeen taphot in atang va, ahawl taphot in amu va, huleh a kiu taphot chu honsahin aum diing hi.
40007009	Huleh na lahvah koi in ahiai a tapa in tanghou ngeen henla hileh, suang pe diing?
40007010	Ahihlouhleh nga ngeen henla hileh, guul pe diing?
40007011	Huchi ahihleh, nanguh migilou in bawn na tate uh sil hoih piaahnataang na heet uh leh, na Pa uh vaan a um in a kawma ngeente sil hoih naahpiaah tham lou diing ahiai mah!
40007012	“Hujiahin sil zousiah mi’n na tungva abawl diing na deih photmah uh, nang un zong hutobangin a tungvah bawl un, ajiahchu huchu Daan thu leh Zawlneite Lehkhabute thuhilh ahi.
40007013	“Kot geeng ah luut un, ajiahchu manthaaina lam a paina chu a kot agol a, a lampi zong alian hi. Huleh hutah a luutte chu tam zong atam uhi.
40007014	Ajiahchu hinna a chiahna kot chu ageeng a, a lampi zong ahahsa a, huleh a mute zong atawm uhi.
40007015	“Zawlnei tahlou, na lahva belaam vun silha hung, hizongleh a sunglam va ngei hangsantah hingaalte lahah pilvaang un.
40007016	Amahuh chu a gah un na he diing uhi. Mi’n lingnoh lahah grep gah alou ngei viai mah, ahihlouhleh lingkung ah zong theipi alou ngei viaimah?
40007017	Huchibangmahin singkung hoih photmah in gah hoih asuang jeel a, hizongleh singkung sia photmah in gah hoih lou asuang veu hi.
40007018	Singkung hoih in gah hoihlou asuang thei sih a, singkung sia in zong gah hoih asuang thei boh sih hi.
40007019	Gah hoih lou suang singkung photmah chu aphuuh va, mei ah apaai uhi.
40007020	Hujiahin amahuh chu a gah un na he diing uhi.
40007021	“‘Lalpa, Lalpa,’ hung chi zousiah nazong vaan lalgam ah aluut sih diing uhi. Hizongleh ka Pa vaan a um deihjawng bawlte chu aluut diing uhi.
40007022	Hu ni chiangleh mi tampi’n, ‘Lalpa, Lalpa, na min in thu ka soilawh uh hilou ahiaimah? Na min in dawite ka nohdoh un, na min in silmah bawltheihna ka nei uh hilou ahiaimah?’ achi diing uhi.
40007023	Huchiangin ke’n a kawmvah, ‘Nanguh bangchihmahin ka hung he ngei sih hi. Nanguh daan poisaloua gamta haw, ka kawm apatin chiah mang un!’ ka chi diing hi.
40007024	“Hujiahin koipouh hi ka thusoite ja a, jui chu mipil suangpi tunga inn bawl toh ka tehkhin diing hi.
40007025	Guah ahung ju a, tui ahung lian a, huih ahung nung a, hu inn chu haattahin ahung muut hi. Himahleh suangpi tunga leptouh ahih jiahin apuuh sih.
40007026	“Huleh mi koipouh hi ka thusoite ja a, juilou photmah chu sehneel tunga inn bawl mingol toh ka tehkhin diing hi.
40007027	Guah ahung ju a, tui ahung lian a, huih ahung nung a, hu inn chu haattahin ahung muut a, apuuhta hi. Huleh hu inn apuuhdaan chu anasa ngeel hi,” achi hi.
40007028	Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu’n hite asoi zohin mipite’n a thuhilh chu limdang asa mahmah uhi.

40008001	Huleh taang apat ahung pai suhin mipi nasatahin Amah ajui uhi.
40008002	Huleh en in, mi phaah khat a kawmah ahung a, a ma a bohkhupin chibai abuuh a, “Lalpa, na uut inchu, na hung susiangthou thei hi,” achi hi.

40008009	Ajiahchu kei zong thuneihna nuaia um ka hi a, ka nuaiah sepaihte aum uhi. Huleh khat kawmah, ‘Chiah in,’ ka chih leh achiah a, adang kawmah, ‘Hung in,’ ka chih leh ahung hi; huleh ka suaahpa kawmah, ‘Hi bawl in,’ ka chih leh abawl jeel hi,” achi hi.
40008010	Jesu’n hi thu ajaah tahin limdang asa a, huleh Amah juite kawmah, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Israelte lahah zong hichilawma ginna haat ka mu kha sih hi.

40008030	Huleh a umna vapat gamla sim ah voh hon tampi ataa uhi.

40009001	Huin Amah chu kuang sunga luutin agaalkaai a, Amah ngeei khopi ah aluutta hi.

40009011	Huleh Pharisaite’n huchu amuh tahun a nungjuite kawmah, “Bang diinga na houtupa un siahdongte leh misualte toh an ne khawm ahiai?” achi uhi.

40009016	Mi koimah in puan lui puan thah them in aphoh ngei sih uhi. Ajiahchu a phohna thah in puan lui chu akaikeeh diing a, huleh ahung keehjaw seem diing hi.
40009017	Mi koimah in uain thah savun thawl lui ah athun ngei sih uhi. Huchilou inchu savun thawlte chu apawhkeeh diing a, uain akibo diing a, savun thawlte zong asegawp diing hi. Hujiahin uain thah chu savun thawl thah ah athun jaw va, huchiin anihun abit tuaah hi,” achi hi.
40009018	Hi silte Ama’n a kawmva asoi laiin, ngai in, vaihawmtu khat ahung a, a ma a bohkhupin chibai ahung buuh a, “Ka tanu tutahin asi hi, hizongleh hung inla a tungah na khut nga lehchin ahing mei diing,” achi hi.

40010001	Huleh Ama’n a nungjui sawmlenihte akouh zohin, a kawmvah hagau niinte nohdoh theihna leh damlouhna chinteng leh natna chinteng suhdam theihna thuneihna apia hi.
40010002	Huleh apostol sawmlenihte min chu hite ahi: amasapeenin Peter kichipa Simon leh a sanggampa Andru, Zebedi tapa Jakob leh a sanggampa Johan,
40010003	Philip leh Bartholomai, Thomas leh siahdongtu Mathai, Alphai tapa Jakob leh Lebbai, a min dang chu Thaddai.
40010004	Kanaan mi Simon leh Amah mansahtu Juda Iskariot.
40010005	Hi sawmlenihte chu Jesu’n hi thu piain asawldoh a, “Jentelte lahah chiah sih unla, Samariate khopi khatmah ah zong luut hial sih un.
40010006	Hizongleh Israel innkuan belaam mangte kawmah chiah jaw un.
40010007	Na chiah kawm-un, ‘Vaan lalgam anaita hi,’ chiin taangkoupih un.
40010008	Damloute sudam unla, phaahte susiang unla, misite kaithou unla, dawite nohdoh un. Athawnin na mu va, athawnin pia un.
40010009	Na dangka-ip sung vah, sana, dangka ahihlouhleh sumeng bangma guang sih un.
40010010	Na zinna va diingin sakhau aha, puannaah nih aha, keengtophah aha, chiang aha keng sih un, ajiahchu natongtu chu a neeh diing mu taah ahi.
40010011	Huleh khopi sung hiin khota sung hitaleh, na luutna phot vah na tunna taah diing uh mi kandoh unla, na chiahkhiah masiah uh hutah ah umzing un.
40010012	Huchia inn sung khat a na luut chiangun chibai buuh un.
40010013	Hu inn chu na tunna taah uh ahihleh, na hamuanna uh chu a tungah um heh. Himahleh hu inn sung in ataah louh leh, na hamuanna uh chu na kawmvah hung kihkiit hen.
40010014	Koipouh nanguh hung kipaahpih lou a, na thute uh ngaikhe lou chu hu inn aha, hu khopi aha apat na pawt chiangun, na keengtaw va leivui thingkhia un.
40010015	Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, vaihawm ni chiangin hu khopi thuaah diing saangin Sodom leh Gomorrah thuaah diing chu adaan aum jaw diing hi.
40010016	Ngai in, ngei hon laha belaam bangin ka hung sawl ahi. Hujiahin guul bangin pil unla, vakhu banga poikhoihlouin um un.
40010017	“Hizongleh mite lahah kiveeng un, ajiahchu amah un vaihawmte kawmah ahung pedoh diing va huleh sinagogte bang ah ahung vosah diing uhi.
40010018	Huleh keimah jiahin gamoptute leh kumpipate ma ah, amahuh leh Jentelte ma ah heetpihtu diingin ahung pui diing uhi.
40010019	Hizongleh ahung piaahkhiah chiangun bangchi soi diing ahihlouhleh bang soi diing ka hiai, chiin lunghimoh sih un. Ajiahchu na soi diing uh hu huntahin hilh na hi diing uhi.
40010020	Ajiahchu a soitu chu nanguh na hi sih diing va, na Pa uh Hagau in nanguh ah asoi jaw diing hi.
40010021	Sanggampa in sanggampa, huleh pa in a ta thah diingin apedoh diing a, huleh tate’n zong a nulepate uh adou diing va, athatsah diing uhi.
40010022	Huleh ka min jiahin mi zousiah huat na hi diing uhi. Hizongleh atawp donga thuaah mualsuaah chu hutdamin aum diing uhi.
40010023	Hizongleh khopi khat a ahung suhduhdah chiangun, adang ah taailuut un. Ajiahchu chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Mihing Tapa hung main Israel khopite na tuan suaah sih diing uhi.
40010024	Nungjui chu a houtupa tungah aum ngei sih a, suaah zong a pu tungah aum ngei sih hi.
40010025	Nungjui chu a houtupa banga ahung um a, huleh suaah chu a pu banga ahung um ahuntawh ahi. Amah un inn neitupa bawn Beelzebul achih uh leh, a innkote chu bangchituhin ahiai achihtaah diing uh!
40010026	“Hujiahin amahuh haw lau sih un. Ajiahchu kilang lou diinga kiphual bangma aum sih a, huleh heetlouh diinga iim zong bangmah aum sih hi.
40010027	Mial a nanguh ka hung hilh chu vaah ah soi unla, huleh na bil kawmva na jaah uh chu inntungvuumte ah taangkoupih un.
40010028	Huleh tahsa that thei a himahleh hagau that theilou haw chu lau sih un. Hizongleh hagau leh tahsa a nih a gawtmun a sumang theitu Amah chu lau jaw un.
40010029	Kawlgiit nih paisa khat in akijuaah veu hilou maw? Ahihvaangin a lahva khatmah zong na Pa uh phalna louin ake sih diing hi.
40010030	Hizongleh na lutung va samjangte nasan sim veh ahi.
40010031	Hujiahin lau sih un, kawlgiit tampi saangin na luuljaw uh ahi.
40010032	Hujiahin koipouh mite ma a kei hung gum photmah chu, ke’n zong vaan a um ka Pa ma ah amah ka gum diing hi.
40010033	Hizongleh koipouh mite ma a hung kiheetmohbawl chu, ke’n zong vaan a um ka Pa ma ah ka kiheetmohbawl diing hi.
40010034	“Leitung a lemna leengsah diinga hung hungsa sih un. Lemna leengsah diinga hung ka hi sih a, naamsau leengsah diinga hung ka hijaw hi.
40010035	Ajiahchu ‘tapa in a pa, tanu in a nu, huleh mou in a innpinu dousah diinga’ hung ka hijaw hi;
40010036	huleh ‘mi a meelma chu amah innkote ngeei ahi diing hi.’
40010037	Koipouh a nu aha, a pa aha keimah saanga lungsiat jaw chu ka mi hitaah ahi sih hi. A tapa aha, a tanu aha keimah saanga lungsiat jaw chu ka mi hitaah ahi sih hi.
40010038	Koipouh a kros pua a, hung jui lou chu ka mi hitaah ahi sih hi.
40010039	Koipouh a hinna mu in ataan diing a, huleh koipouh keimah jiaha a hinna taan in amu diing hi.
40010040	“Koipouh nanguh hung kipaahpih chu kei hung kipaahpih ahi a, huleh koipouh keimah hung kipaahpih chu kei hung sawlpa kipaahpih ahi.
40010041	Koipouh zawlnei chu zawlnei ahih jiaha kipaahpih in zawlnei kipaahman amu diing hi. Huleh midihtat chu midihtat ahih jiaha kipaahpih in midihtat kipaahman amu diing hi.
40010042	Huleh chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh nungjuitu khat min a hi mi neute laha khat tuisih nou khat mei chauh zong petu in chu a kipaahman muh diing chu ataan hial sih diing hi,” achi hi.
40011001	Huleh Jesu’n a nungjui sawmlenihte kawma thu ahilh zohin, a khopite va thuhilh diing leh thusoi diingin achiahdohta hi.
40011002	Huin Johan in suangkul sung apat Khrist natohte anajaah tahin, amah nungjuite nih asawl a,
40011003	a kawmah, “Ahung diingpa na hiai mah, ahihlouhleh midang ngaah nalai diing ka hi viaimah?” avachisah hi.
40011004	Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Chiah unla, na jaah uh leh na muh uh Johan vahilh un:
40011005	mittawte mit ahung vaahta a, keengbaite apaitheita va, phaahte ahung siangta va, bilngongte’n khua ajatheita va, misite kaihthohin aumta va, huleh migentheite kawmah tanchinpha soiin aumta hi.
40011006	Huleh koipouh keimah a kipalpuuh lou chu ahampha hi,” achi hi.
40011007	Huleh amahuh achiah tahun, Jesu’n mipi kawmah Johan tungtaang thu asoi panta a, “Bang en diinga gamdaai a chiahdoh na hi viai? Sialluang huih muut liing maw?
40011008	Ahihlouhleh bang en diinga chiahdoh na hi viai? Puan neem silh mi khat maw? Tahzetin, puan neem silhte chu kumpipate inn ah ahi aum uh.
40011009	Ahihlouhleh bangpeen en diinga chiahdoh na hi viai? Zawlnei en diingin maw? Ahi, ka hung hilh ahi, zawlnei saanga loupijaw ahi.
40011010	Ajiahchu, ‘Ngai in, ka thangkou na ma ah ka sawl a, ama’n na ma ah na lampi asial diing hi,’ chia a tungthu kigial chu amah ahi.
40011011	Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, numei sunga piang lahah Baptistu Johan saanga loupijaw apiang nai sih hi. Ahihvaangin vaan lalgam a mi neupeen chu amah saangin aloupijaw hi.
40011012	Huleh Baptistu Johan apat tutanin vaan lalgam in hiamngamna athuaah a, hiamngamte’n thagum in ala uhi.
40011013	Ajiahchu Zawlneite Lehkhabute zousiah leh Daan thu in Johan hung um tanphain anasoilawhta hi.
40011014	Hi silte nang un na pom nuam uh leh, Johan ngeei chu ahung diing Elijah chu ahi.
40011015	Koipouh jaahna diinga bil nei in ja heh.
40011016	“Hizongleh hi khang hi bang toh ka tehkaah diai? Hichu naupang dawlmun a toua a lawmte kou a,
40011017	‘Theile hung muutsah ung a, lah laam lou uh chin a; huleh kahla sa ung a, lah kapin na hung maau pih sih uh,’ chite bang ahi uh.
40011018	Ajiahchu Johan ahung a, nein adawn sih a; huleh amah un, ‘Dawi nei ahi,’ achi uhi.
40011019	Mihing Tapa ahung a, anein adawn a, amah un, ‘En un, an haipa leh uain haipa, siahdongte leh misualte lawmpa!’ achi uh. Huleh pilna chu adih ahi chih a natohte’n siam atan hi,” chiin.
40011020	Huin akisiih louh jiahun, a silmahbawl tamna peen khopite chu ataaita hi.
40011021	“Korazin, na tung agih hi! Bethsaida, na tung agih hi! Ajiahchu nanguh a silmah kibawlte Tura leh Sidon khua a kibawl hileh, sawtin saiip puan silha vut khuhin akisiih zouta diing uhi.
40011022	Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, vaihawm ni chiangin nanguh thuaah diing saangin Tura leh Sidon thuaah diing adaan aum jaw diing hi.
40011023	Huleh nang Kapernaum, vaan tan a tawisanga um chu, Misi Khua tan a paihkhiahin na um diing hi, ajiahchu nangmah a silmah kibawlte Sodom a kibawl hileh, tuni tanin aum nalai diing hi.
40011024	Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, vaihawm ni chiangin nang thuaah diing saangin Sodom thuaah diing chu adaan aum jaw diing,” achi hi.
40011025	Huchihlaiin Jesu’n asoi a, “Pa Aw, lei leh vaan Lalpa, nangma’n mipil leh misiamte kawmah hi thute na iim a, naupangte kawma na phuan jiahin ka hung paahtawi hi.
40011026	Ahi, a, huchibang chu na kipaahna mahmah ahi.
40011027	Ka Pa’n sil zousiah ka kawmah ahung pekheta hi; huleh Pa chauh louin koima’n Tapa chu ahe sih uhi. Tapa chauh louin koima’n Pa ahe sih a, huleh Tapa’n a kawma aphuan nuamnate loungaal chu koima’n ahe sih hi.
40011028	Nanguh tonggim leh puaahgih pote zousiah ka kawmah hung un, keima’n khawldamna ka hung pe diing hi.
40011029	Ka ngawngkol pua unla, ka kawmah jil un, ajiahchu jaineemtah leh lungtang a kingaingiamtah ka hi a, huchiin na hagau diingun khawldamna na mu diing uhi.
40011030	Ajiahchu ka ngawngkol anuam a, ka puaah zong ajaang hi,” achi hi.
40012001	Huchihlaiin Jesu chu Sabbath ni in buhlei lai tawnin achiah hi. Huleh a nungjuite a gil uh akial a, buhvuite asihtan va ane panta uhi.
40012002	Hizongleh Pharisaite’n hichu amuhun a kawmah, “En in, na nungjuite’n Sabbath ni in daan in aphallouh abawl uh,” achi uhi.
40012003	Hizongleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “David in agilkial laia a kawma umte toh asilbawl uh,
40012004	huchia Pathian inn a aluut a, amah leh a kawma umte’n daan in aphallouh siampute chauh neeh theih tanghou siah aneeh uh thu sim kha lou na hi viaimah?
40012005	Ahihlouhleh Sabbath ni a Pathian biahinn a siampute’n Sabbath ni asuhbuaahun zong siamlouh atang sih uh chih Daanbu ah na sim sih uh maw?
40012006	Hizongleh hi mun ah Pathian biahinn saanga loupijaw khat aum hi chih ka hung hilh ahi.
40012007	Ahihvaangin nang un, ‘Kithoihna deih louin zahngaihna ka deih,’ chih umjia heta hileh uh chin, mohna neilou chu siamlouhtangsah lou diing hi uh chin a.
40012008	Ajiahchu Mihing Tapa chu Sabbath ni Lalpa ahi,” achi hi.
40012009	Huleh Amah chu hutah apatin achiah a, sinagog ah aluut hi.
40012010	Huleh en in, hutah ah mi khut jeng khat aum a, huchia amah un aheeh theihna diingun, “Sabbath ni a suhdam asiang ei?” chiin Amah adong uhi.
40012011	Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Na lahva kuan ahiai belaam khat nei henla, huleh Sabbath ni in kokhuuh ah keta leh, huchu vatu lou diing leh kaidoh lou diing um?
40012012	Huchi ahihchiangin belaam saanga mihing chu bangchitaha luuljaw atai mah? Hujiahin Sabbath ni a sil hoih bawl asiang hi,” achi hi.
40012013	Huin hupa kawmah, “Na khut zandoh in,” achi hi. Huchiin azandoh a, a langkhat bangin ahung damta hi.
40012014	Huzohin Pharisaite apawt va, Amah suhlup theihna diing ngaihtuahin akihouta uhi.
40012015	Hizongleh Jesu’n hichu aheetin hu apatin apaidohta hi. Huleh mipi nasatahin Amah ajui va, huleh Ama’n anasudam veh hi.
40012016	Huleh Amah koi ahiai chih phuangdoh lou diingin amahuh athuhilh hi.
40012017	Huchu zawlnei Isai in hichibanga anasoite ahung taangtun theihna diingin ahi:
40012018	“En in, ka suaah ka teel, ka deihtah chu! Amah ah ka lungkim mahmah hi! Ka Hagau a tungah ka koih diing a, Ama’n Jentelte kawmah vaihawmna dih thu asoi diing hi.
40012019	Ama’n chu anial sih diing a, kikou zong akikou sih diing hi. Huleh mi koimah in kholai dung ah a aw aja sih diing uh.
40012020	Ama’n gualzou diinga vaihawmna dih ahung tut masiah sialluang gawpsa asutan sih diing a, pat meikhu zong asumit sih diing hi.
40012021	Huleh Amah min ah Jentelte’n kinepna anei diing uh,” achih chu.
40012022	Huin dawipaai, mittaw leh haamtheilou khat Jesu kawmah ahung pui va, Ama’n anasudam a, huchiin haamtheilou chu hung haamtheiin khua ahung muta hi.
40012023	Huleh mipi zousiah in thumah asa va, “Hi Pa hi David Tapa ahi diai maw?” achi uhi.
40012024	Hizongleh Pharisaite’n hi thu ajaah tahun, “Hi Pa’n dawimangpa Beelzebul jiah loungaalin dawite anohdoh sih diing,” achi uhi.
40012025	Hizongleh Jesu’n angaihtuah uh ahe a, a kawmvah, “Lalgam kilangkhena amah leh amah kidou photmah chu amangthaai hi. Huleh khopi aha inn sung aha kilangkhen zong ading thei sih diing hi.
40012026	Huleh Setan in Setan mah nohdohta leh, amah leh amah kidoua kikhen ahita hi; ahihleh bangchiin a lalgam adingta diai?
40012027	Huleh keima’n Beelzebul jaala dawite nohdoh ka hih leh, na tapate un koi jaala anohdoh uh ahiai? Hujiahin amahuh chu nanguh hung vaihawmsah diingte ahi uhi.
40012028	Hizongleh ke’n Pathian Hagau vaanga dawite nohdoh ka hih leh, Pathian lalgam chu na tungvah hung tung ahita hi.
40012029	Mi koimah in mihaatpa akaantom masat louhngaal leh, bangchiin mi haatpa inn a luutin a neihlelamte alaahsah thei diai? A kaantom nung chiangin a neihlelamte alaahsah mei diing hi.
40012030	Koipouh ka lama pang lou chu ahung dou ahi, huleh koipouh ahung laahkhawmpih lou in asudalh ahi.
40012031	Hujiahin ka hung hilh ahi, mi a sualna zousiah uh leh Pathian asoisiatna zousiah uh ngaihdam ahi diing uhi. Hizongleh Hagau soisia chu ngaihdamin aum sih diing hi.
40012032	Huleh koipouh Mihing Tapa kalha thusoi chu ngaihdam ahi diing a, hizongleh koipouh Hagau Siangthou kalha soisia chu hi hun ah zong, huleh hun hung um kiit diing ah zong ngaihdamin aum sih diing hi.
40012033	“Singkung enkol hoih leh uh chin, a gah zong ahoih diing, ahihlouhleh singkung bawlse leh uh chin, a gah ase diing hi; ajiahchu singkung chu a gah apat heet ahi.
40012034	Guul suante haw! Na giitlouh pum-un bangchiin thu hoih na soi thei diviai? Ajiahchu lungtang dolh vaal chu kam in asoi veu hi.
40012035	Mi hoih in lungtang goubawm hoih apatin sil hoihte ahung suahkhia hi. Huleh migilou in a lungtang goubawm hoihlou apatin sil hoihlou ahung suahkhe veu hi.
40012036	Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, mite’n thulimlou asoi photmah uh vaihawm ni chiangin ajiah asoi diing uhi.
40012037	Ajiahchu na thusoi in siamtansahin na um diing a, na thusoi mah in siamlouh tansahin na um diing,” achi hi.
40012038	Huin Pharisaite leh daanjilsahtute hunkhop in adawng va, “Houtupa, nangmah apatin chiamchihna ka mu nuam uh,” achi uhi.
40012039	Hizongleh Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Khang gilou leh aangkawm haatte’n chiamchihna ahawl uhi. Hizongleh zawlnei Jonah chiamchihna loungaal chiamchihna dang piaah ahi sih diing uhi.
40012040	Ajiahchu Jonah suun thum leh jaan thum ngapi gil sunga aum bangin, Mihing Tapa zong suun thum leh jaan thum leigil sungah aum diing hi.
40012041	Ninevi khua a mite chu vaihawm ni chiangin hi khang a mite toh ahung thou diing va amahuh siamlouh atangsah diing uhi, ajiahchu Jonah thusoi jiahin amahuh akisiih uhi. Huleh en un, Jonah saanga loupijaw hitah ah aum hi.
40012042	Huleh simlam kumpinu chu vaihawm ni chiangin hi khang a mite toh ahung thou diing a, hi khang a mite chu siamlouh atangsah diing hi, ajiahchu Solomon pilna ngaikhe diingin kawlmong apat ahung hi. Huleh en un, Solomon saanga loupijaw hitah ah aum hi.
40012043	“Huleh hagau niin chu mi khat sung apat apawtdohin tui um louhna mun chin ah khawlna diing hawlin avaah lehleh a, amu zou sih hi.
40012044	Huin ama’n, ‘Ka pawtdohna inn mah ah ka kihkiit mei diing,’ achi hi. Huchia ahung tahin huchu a-awng a, phiatsiang leh zephoihin amu hi.
40012045	Huin avachiah a, amah saanga gilou jaw dawi dang sagih ahung pui a, a sungah aluut va, ateengta uhi. Huin hupa umdaan nunung chu amasa saangin asejaw seemta hi. Hi khang giloute zong hutobangin aum diing uh,” achi hi.
40012046	Huchia Ama’n mipite kawma thu asoi laiin, ngai in, a nu leh a sanggamte chu Amah houpih nuamin inn pua ah ading uhi.
40012047	Huin mi khat in a kawmah, “En in, na nu leh na sanggamte nang hung houpih nuamin inn pua ah ading uh,” achi hi.
40012048	Hizongleh Ama’n adawng a, Amah hilhpa kawmah, “Ka nu koi hi a huleh ka sanggamte zong koi hi ahiai?” achi hi.
40012049	Huin a nungjuite lamah a khut ajaah a, “En un, ka nu leh ka sanggamte!
40012050	Ajiahchu koipouh vaan a um ka Pa deihjawng bawl taphot chu ka sanggampa leh ka sanggamnu leh ka nu ahi uh,” achi hi.
40013001	Hu ni mahin inn apatin Jesu achiahdoh a diil geiah atou hi.
40013002	Huleh a kawma mipi nasatah ahung kikhop jiahin Amah chu kuang khat a luutin atou a, mipi zousiah chu luuipiau ah ading uhi.
40013003	Huin Ama’n a kawmvah tehkhinthu in thu tampi asoi a: “Ngai un, haichithehtu khat haichi thehin akuan hi.
40013004	Huleh atheh laiin akhen lam geiah atu va, vate hungin atom beita uhi.
40013005	Huleh khenkhat suangsilei munte ah atu a, lei asah louh jiahin ahung pou pah uhi.
40013006	Hizongleh ni ahung satin nisa in akaang a, zung aneih louh jiahin agawgawpta uhi.
40013007	Huleh khenkhat louling lahah atu va, ling chu ahung khanglian a, adeepmangta hi.
40013008	Hizongleh adang chu lei hoih ah atu va, khenkhat aleh za bangin, khenkhat aleh sawmguup bangin, huleh khenkhat aleh sawmthum bangin ahung gahta uhi.
40013009	Koipouh jaahna diinga bil nei in ja heh,” achi hi.
40013010	Huin nungjuite ahung va, a kawmah, “Bang diinga a kawmva tehkhinthu a na soi ahiai?” achi uhi.
40013011	Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Ajiahchu vaan lalgam thukiphualte chu nanguh heet diinga phal ahi a, hizongleh amahuh heet chu phal ahi sih hi.
40013012	Ajiahchu koipouh anei chu piaah beh ahi diing a, ahau seem diing hi; hizongleh koipouh anei lou chu aneihsun zong laahsah ahi diing hi.
40013013	Hujiahin a kawmvah tehkhinthu in ka soi ahi; ajiahchu amah un mu napiin amu sih va, huleh ja napiin aja sih va, he zong ahesiam ngei sih uhi.
40013014	Huleh zawlnei Isai in anasoilawh chu a tungvah ahung taangtungta ahi: ‘Jaah chu na ja ngeei diing va hizongleh na hesiam sih diing uh, huleh muh chu na mu ngeei diing va hizongleh na theisiam sih diing uh.
40013015	Ajiahchu hi mite lungtang amo gawpta a, a bil uh angong gawpta a, huleh a mit uh asiingta uhi; huchilou inchu a mit un amu kha diing va, a bil un aja kha diing va, a lungtang un ahung hesiam kha diing va, ahung kiheikiit kha diing va, ke’n amahuh ka na sudam kha diing hi,’ chi a, anachih chu.
40013016	Hizongleh nanguh mit chu amuh jiahin ahampha a, huleh na bil uh zong ajaah jiahin ahampha hi.
40013017	Ajiahchu chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, zawlnei tampi leh midihtat tampi’n zong na sil muhte uh muh auut va, ahihvaangin amu sih uh, huleh na jaahte uh zong aja nuam va, hizongleh aja sih uhi.
40013018	“Hujiahin haichithehtu tehkhinthu hilhchianna chu ngai un:
40013019	koipouh in lalgam thu ajaah a aheetsiam louh leh, migiloupa ahung a, a lungtang a kithehsa chu alaahsah veu hi. Hichu lam geia tupa chu ahi.
40013020	Huleh suangsilei laha tupa chu, thu chu ja a, kipaahtaha pom pah ngaalpa ahi.
40013021	Ahihvaangin amah a zung aneih louh jiahin, tomkhat chauh aum hi. Huleh thu jiaha gimthuaahna bang, suhduhdahna bang ahung um chiangin apuuh pah veu hi.
40013022	Huleh louling laha tupa in thu chu aja a, ahihvaangin hi khovel awlmohna leh hauhsatna heemna in thu chu adeepmangta a, huchiin amah chu gah nei louin ahung umta hi.
40013023	Hizongleh lei hoih tunga tupa in chu thu chu aja a, ahesiam pah hi: huchu gah zong agah a, khenkhat aleh za bang, khenkhat aleh sawmguup bang, khenkhat aleh sawmthum bangin apung hi,” achi hi.
40013024	Tehkhinthu dang Ama’n a kawmvah asoi kiit a: “Vaan lalgam chu lou a chi hoih theh mi khat toh tehkhin ahi.
40013025	Huleh mite a-ihmut kaal un a meelmapa chu ahung a, buh lahah buhlem atheh a, achiahmangta hi.
40013026	Hizongleh buh chu ahung pou a, ahung vuui a, buhlemte zong ahung kilangta hi.
40013027	Huchiin lou neitu suaahte chu ahung va, a kawmah, ‘Pu, na lou a chi hoih theh hilou na hiaimah? Buhlemte khoi apat hung um ahiai?’ achi uhi.
40013028	Ama’n a kawmvah, ‘Meelmapa khat in anabawl ahi,’ achi hi. A suaahte’n a kawmah, ‘Ahihleh vachiahin hute chu valakhawm leh ung na uut ei?’ achi uhi.
40013029	Hizongleh ama’n, ‘Uut lou e, ajiahchu huchi hileh buhlemte na laahkhawmna lam vah buhte zong na botkhawm kha diing uhi.
40013030	Buh laah dongin poukhawm uh heh, huleh buh laahhun tahchiangin buh aatte kawmah, “Buhlemte lakhawm masa unla, haal diingin alom lomin gaah un, hizongleh buh chu ka buhpang sungah koih luut un,” ka chi diing,’” achi hi.
40013031	Tehkhinthu dang Ama’n a kawmvah asoi kiit a: “Vaan lalgam chu ankam tang khat mi’n alaah a, a lou a atheh bang ahi.
40013032	Huchu haichi laha neu peenpeen ahi; hizongleh ahung khanlet chiangin, hampa lahah alianpeen a, singkung ahung suaah a, huchiin tungleeng vate ahung va, a baate giahna in anei uhi,” achi hi.
40013033	Tehkhinthu dang a kawmvah asoi kiit a: “Vaan lalgam chu numei in tol alaah a, taangbuang tehna thum lahah, a bawna athoh veh masiaha aphuum bang ahi,” achi hi.
40013034	Hi silte zousiah chu Jesu’n tehkhinthu in mipite kawmah asoi hi; huleh tehkhinthu louin a kawmvah bangmah asoi sih hi,
40013035	huchia zawlnei in, “Tehkhinthu in ka kam ka kaah diing a, khovel pianchiil apat sil kilangloute chu ka soi diing hi,” chia asoi chu ahung taangtun theihna diingin.
40013036	Huin Jesu’n mipite asawlmang a, inn sungah aluut a, huchiin nungjuite a kawmah ahung va, “Lou a buhlem tehkhinthu chu hung hilhchian in,” achi uhi.
40013037	Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah: “Hu chi hoih thehtu chu Mihing Tapa ahi.
40013038	Lou chu khovel ahi, chi hoihte chu lalgam tate ahi va, huleh buhlemte chu giloupa tate ahi uhi.
40013039	Meelma buhchi thehtu chu diabol ahi a, buh laahhun chu hun tawpna diing ahi a, huleh a aattute chu angelte ahi uhi.
40013040	Huchia buhlemte chu lakhawma mei a akihaal bangin, hi hun tawp hun chiangin aum diing hi.
40013041	Mihing Tapa’n a angelte asawlkhe diing a, kipalpuuhna umsah tengteng leh daan poisaloua gamtate zousiah chu a lalgam apatin akhawmdoh diing uhi.
40013042	Huleh haaltuina mei ah apaai diing va, hutah ah chu kah leh hagawi aum diing hi.
40013043	Huzohchiangin midihtatte chu a Pa uh lalgam ah ni bangin ataang diing uhi. Koipouh jaahna diinga bil nei in ja heh.
40013044	“Huleh vaan lalgam chu lou laia gou kiguuh phuum tobang ahi. Huchu mi khat in amudoh a aphual a, huin kipaah jiahin achiah a, a neih zousiah ajuaah a, hu lou alei bang ahi.
40013045	Huleh vaan lalgam chu sumkawlvei mi tuikepsuang hoihtah hawl tobang ahi kiit hi.
40013046	Ama’n chu tuikepsuang man tamtah khat amu a, achiah a aneih zousiah ajuaah a aleita hi.
40013047	Huleh vaan lalgam chu leen tuipi a sep a, nga chinteng huuikhawm tobang ahi.
40013048	Huchu adim chiangin luuipiau ah akaidoh va, touin a hoihte chu bawmte ah akhum va, hizongleh ahoihloute chu apaai uhi.
40013049	Hun tawp chiangin hutobangin aum diing hi. Angelte chu ahung diing va, migiloute chu midihtatte lah apat akhenkhe diing uhi.
40013050	Huleh amahuh chu haaltuina mei ah apaai diing uhi. Hutah ah chu kah leh hagawiin aum diing uh,” achi hi.
40013051	Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Hi silte zousiah na hesiam viai?” achi hi. Amah un a kawmah, “Hi, Lalpa,” achi uhi.
40013052	Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hujiahin daanjilsahtu, vaan lalgam tungtaang thu hilha um photmah chu inn neitu, a goubawm apat a sil lui leh sil thah pholhkhetu bang ahi,” achi hi.
40013053	Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu’n hi tehkhinthute asoi zohin hu apatin achiahdohta hi.
40013054	Huin Jesu chu Amah khua ngeei ah ahung a, sinagog ah amahuh thu ahilh hi. Huchiin amah un thumah asa mahmah va, “Hi Pa’n hi pilna leh silmah bawltheihna khoia amuh ahiai?
40013055	Hi Pa hi sing bawlpa tapa hilou ahiaimah? A nu Mari kichi khu hilou ahiaimah? Huleh a sanggamte chu Jakob, Joseph, Simon leh Juda hilou ahi viaimah?
40013056	Huleh a sanggamnute zong i kawmva um veh hilou uh maw? Hu ahihleh Hipa’n khoi apat hite zousiah amuh ahiai?” achi uh.
40013057	Huchiin Amah tungah alunghita sih uhi. Hizongleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Zawlnei amah gam sung leh amah innsung chihlouh ah zahbawl louhin aum ngei sih hi,” achi hi.
40013058	Huleh agintaat louh jiahun Ama’n hutah ah silmah tampi abawl sih hi.
40014001	Hu hun laiin gambung vaihawmtu Herod in Jesu tanchin ajaahin,
40014002	a suaahte kawmah, “Hichu Baptistu Johan ahi. Amah chu misi lah apat kaihthoha um a, hujiaha hi silmah bawltheihnate’n amah a nna tong ahita ve,” achi hi.
40014003	Ajiahchu Herod in a sanggampa Philip ji Herodia jiahin, Johan chu mansahin anakaan a, suangkul ah anakhumta hi.
40014004	Ajiahchu Johan in a kawmah, “Amahnu na kiteenpih daan in aphal sih,” achi hi.
40014005	Huleh Herod in amah chu thah uut mahleh, mipite alau hi, ajiahchu amah un Johan chu zawlnei chiin agingta uhi.
40014006	Hizongleh Herod pian ni ahung tunin, Herodia tanu chu a ma vah alaam a, Herod chu akipaahsahta hi.
40014007	Hujiahin amahnu chu anget photmah pe diinga kihaahsialin thu achiamta hi.
40014008	Huleh amahnu’n chu a nu thuhilh bangin, “Baptistu Johan lutang kuang khat in hitah ah hung pia in,” achi hi.

40014010	Huchiin mi asawl a, suangkul sunga Johan ngawng atansahta hi.
40014011	Huleh a lutang chu kuang khat in ahung dom a, naupangnu chu apia va, huleh ama’n a nu kawmah ahung tawita hi.
40014012	Huin Johan nungjuite ahung va, a luang chu lain avui va, huleh chiahin Jesu avahilhta uhi.
40014013	Jesu’n hu thu ajaah tahin, hu apatin kuang a kitawlin munsip ah achiah tuamta hi. Huleh mipite’n ajaah tahun, khopite apat a keeng va chiahin ajuita uhi.
40014014	Huleh Jesu kuang a ahung paikhiah in, mipi nasatah amuhin alainat mahmah a, huin a damloute uh asuhdamsah hi.
40014015	Huleh nitaahlam ahung hihin a nungjuite a kawmah ahung va, “Hi munsip ahi a, huleh nitaahlam anaihtaah jiahin khuate a chiah a, neeh diing avalei theihna diingun mipite sawlkheta in,” achi uhi.
40014016	Hizongleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Amahuh achiah mang uh angai sih hi. Nang un neeh diing pia un,” achi hi.
40014017	Huin amah un a kawmah, “Hitah ah tanghou ngaa leh nga nih chauh i nei uhi,” achi uhi.
40014018	Ama’n, “Hitah ah ka kawmah hung tawi un,” achi hi.
40014019	Huin Ama’n mipite chu hampa tunga tou diingin thu apia hi. Huin tanghou beu ngaa leh nga nih chu ala a, vaan lam enin, avangpiaah a, abalkeeh a, tanghoute chu a nungjuite apia a, huleh nungjuite’n mipite kawmah apia uhi.
40014020	Huchiin a bawnun ane va, avah chiatta uhi. Huleh a neehvaal uh a neng bawm sawmlenih nungjuite’n aluaahdim uhi.
40014021	Huleh a nete chu numei leh naupang simlouhin piching saang ngaa veel ahi uhi.
40014022	Huleh Jesu’n mipite asawlkhiah kaal a, anachiah a diil gaal lehlam anakaai masa diingin a nungjuite kuang ah kintahin atuangsah hi.
40014023	Huleh mipite chu asawlkhiah zohin, haamtei diingin taang ah atuamin achiah tou hi. Huleh nitaahlam ahung hihin hutah ah atangin aumta hi.
40014024	Hizongleh kuang chu diil lailung ah aum a, huih in alehmuut jiahin tuikinawh in aseep lehleh hi.
40014025	Huleh jaanveen lina laiin, Jesu’n chu tuipi tunga paiin a kawmlam uh juanin achiah hi.
40014026	Huleh nungjuite’n Amah chu diil tunga apai amuhun, “Siha ahi!” chiin abuaita va, lauin akikouta uhi.
40014027	Hizongleh Jesu’n amahuh ahung houpih pah a, “Hamuangtahin um un! Keimah ka hi; lau sih un,” achi hi.
40014028	Huin Peter in adawng a, “Lalpa, nang na hih leh, tui tunga na kawma hungna diing thu hung pia in,” achi hi.
40014029	Huin Jesu’n, “Hung in,” achi hi. Huin Peter chu kuang apatin akum a, Jesu kawma chiah diingin tui tungah keeng in apaita hi.
40014030	Hizongleh huih nung chu amuh tahin alau a, tum diingin akisa a, “Lalpa, hung hunkhia in,” chiin akikouta hi.
40014031	Huin Jesu’n a khut ladohin azam pah a, a kawmah, “Nang ginna haatloupa, bang diinga ginglel na hiai?” achi hi.
40014032	Huleh amahuh kuang sunga atuan tahun huih chu asipta hi.
40014033	Huin kuang a umte hungin, “Pathian Tapa tahzet na hi,” chiin Amah abia uhi.
40014034	Huleh gaal lehlam akaai tahun, Genesaret gam ahung tungta uhi.
40014035	Huleh hu mun a mite’n Amah thu aheet tahun, hu kiim a gam chin ah mi asawl va, damlou zousiah a kawmah ahung pui uhi.
40014036	Huleh a puanmong beeh khoih theih angeen va, huchiin akhoih photmah adam jeel uhi.
40015001	Huin Jerusalem a um daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite Jesu kawmah ahung va,
40015002	“Bang diinga na nungjuite upate tawndaan kalha taleeh veu ahi viai? Ajiahchu an aneeh chiangun a khut uh asil ngei sih uhi,” achi uhi.
40015003	Hizongleh Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Nang un zong bang diinga na pulepate tawndaan jiaha Pathian thupiaah a taleeh na hi viai?
40015004	Ajiahchu Pathian in, ‘Na nu leh na pa zahtaat in,’ huleh, ‘Koipouh a nu aha, a pa aha haamsiat chu suhlupin um heh,’ achi hi.
40015005	Hizongleh nang un chu, ‘Koipouh a nu aha, a pa aha kawma, “Kei apat panpihna silpiaah na muh diing photmah chu Pathian kawma piaah ahita,” chi photmah in,
40015006	a nu ahihlouhleh a pa azah diing ahi sih,’ na chi uhi. Huchibangin na pulepate uh tawndaan jiahin Pathian thupiaah bangmalou na suaahsahta uhi.
40015007	Nanguh milepchiahte aw! Isai in na tungtaang thu uh anasoilawh dih ngeel hi:
40015008	‘Hu mite’n a kam un ahung naih va, a muuh un ahung zahbawl uhi. Hizongleh a lungtang uh kei apat agamla hi.
40015009	Mihing thupiaah chu Pathian thuhilhna banga ahilh jiahun ahung be thawn uhi,’ anachih chu,” achi hi.

40015011	kam sunga luutin mi asubuaah sih a, hizongleh kam apat pawt, hu ngeei in mi asubuaah ahi,” achi hi.

40015014	Hite haw ngaihsah sih un; amahuh chu mittaw lamkaite ahi uhi. Mittaw in mittaw mah apui inchu, kokhuuh ah akekhawm diing uh,” achi hi.
40015015	Huin Peter in adawng a, a kawmah, “Hi tehkhinthu ka kawmvah hung hilh chian in,” achi hi.
40015016	Huin Jesu’n, “Tutan a nanguh zong heetsiamna beia um na hi uh maw?
40015017	Kam a luut photmah gil sung ah aluut a, huleh daileenna ah paihkhiahin aum, chih na theisiam nai sih uh maw?

40015020	Hite chu ahi mihing subuaah, hizongleh khut sillouha an neehin mi asubuaah sih,” achi hi.

40015024	Ama’n adawng a, “Israel nam belaam mangte kawm chauh loungaal ah sawl ka hi sih hi,” achi hi.
40015025	Huin amahnu ahung a, “Lalpa, hung panpih in,” chiin abia hi.

40016001	Huin Pharisaite leh Sadukaite ahung va, Amah je-etna diingin vaan akipan chiamchihna amahuh ensah diingin angeen uhi.

40016004	Khang gilou leh aangkawm haatte’n chiamchihna ahawl uhi. Hizongleh zawlnei Jonah chiamchihna loungaal chiamchihna dang piaah ahi sih diing uhi,” achi hi. Huleh Ama’n amahuh anusia a, achiahta hi.

40016010	Ahihlouhleh mi saang li vaahna tanghou beu sagih leh a neng vaal paalbawm bangzah na luaah uh, chih hezing lou na hi viaimah?

40016012	Huin amah un tanghou tolsoh lahah kiveeng un, chi hilouin Pharisaite leh Sadukaite thuhilhna lah a pilvaang diingin ahijaw, chih ahung theita uhi.

40016015	Ama’n chu a kawmvah, “Ahihleh nang un kei koi ka hi na hung chi viai?” achi hi.

40016018	Huleh ke’n zong na kawmah nang Peter na hi, chih ka hung hilh hi. Huleh hi suangpi tungah ka kouhtuam ka lemdoh diing a, huchu Misi Khua kulh kotkhaahte’n bangmah alohbut sih diing hi.
40016019	Huleh na kawmah vaan lalgam chabite ka hung pe diing a, lei a na kaan photmah chu vaan ah kaan ahi diing a, huleh lei a na phel photmah chu vaan ah phel ahi diing,” achi hi.

40016022	Huin Peter in Amah puituamin ataaihilh a, “Lalpa, na tungah hung tung dah hen! Na tungah atung hial sih diing,” achi hi.

40016024	Huin Jesu’n a nungjuite kawmah, “Mi koipouh in ahung juih nuam inchu, amah leh amah kiheetmohbawlin a kros puain hung jui heh.
40016025	Ajiahchu koipouh a hinna huumbit tumin ataan diing a, hizongleh koipouh keimah jiaha a hinna taan in amu diing hi.
40016026	Mi’n khovel apumin nei henla, a hinna taanta leh, amah diingin bang aphatuam diai? Ahihlouhleh mi’n a hinna luangin bang ahiai apiaah diing?
40016027	Ajiahchu Mihing Tapa chu a Pa loupina a kithuamin a angelte toh hung pah diing ahita a, huchiangin mi chin a natoh bangjeelin athuh chiat diing hi.
40016028	Chihtahzetin na kawmvah ka soi ahi, hia dingte khenkhat chu Mihing Tapa a lalgam a hung amuh masiah uh sihna chiam lou diing aum uhi,” achi hi.
40017001	Huin ni guup nungin Jesu’n Peter, Jakob leh a sanggampa Johan atonpih a, a tuamin taang sang tung khat ah apuitou hi.
40017002	Huleh ama vah a meel ahung limdangta hi. A maai ni bangin ahung taangta a, a puansilhte chu vaah bangin ahung vaam hi.
40017003	Huleh en in, Mosi leh Elijah a kawmva hung kilaahin Amah toh akihou uhi.
40017004	Huin Peter in Jesu ahoupih a, a kawmah, “Lalpa, eiuh diingin hitaha um ahoih hi. Na uut leh hitah ah puanbuuh thum i bawl diing a, nang a diingin khat, Mosi a diingin khat, huleh Elijah a diingin khat,” achi hi.
40017005	Asoi laitahin, en in, meilum vaahtah in amahuh ahung khuhta hi. Huleh en in, hu meilum lah apatin aw khat in, “Hichu ka Tapa deihtah ahi, Amah ah ka kipaah mahmah hi. Amah thu ngai un,” achi hi.
40017006	Huleh nungjuite’n huchu ajaah un, bohkhupin apuuh va, alau mahmah uhi.
40017007	Huin Jesu ahung a, amahuh akhoih a, “Thou unla, lau sih un,” achi hi.
40017008	Huleh adaahdoh uh leh Jesu chauh lou chu koima dang amu sih uhi.
40017009	Huleh taang apat ahung kumsuh tahun, Jesu’n amahuh thu apia a, “Mihing Tapa misi lah apat athohkiit masangsiah hi na sil muh uh koima hilh sih un,” achi hi.
40017010	Huin a nungjuite’n a kawmah, “Ahihleh bang diinga daanjilsahtute’n, Elijah hung masa teeiteei diing ahi, chi ahi viai?” chiin adong uhi.
40017011	Huleh Jesu’n adawng a, “Elijah chu ahung masa ngeei diing a, sil bangkim abawl thah diing hi.
40017012	Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, Elijah chu ahung zouta a, amah ahe sih va, a tungah auut uut un ahih zouta uhi. Huchibangmahin Mihing Tapa in zong a lahvah athuaah pahta diing,” achi hi.
40017013	Huin a nungjuite’n Baptistu Johan thu a kawmva soi ahi chih ahung heta uhi.
40017014	Huleh mipi lah ahung tun un, koiaha mi khat Amah kawmah ahung a, a ma a khuupdinin,
40017015	“Lalpa, ka tapa khotuah in, amah hi sibup vei ahi a, agim mahmah hi. Mei lahah apuuh a tui ah ake veu hi.
40017016	Huleh na nungjuite kawmah ka hung pui a, hizongleh asudam thei sih uhi,” achi hi.
40017017	Jesu’n adawng a, “Ginna neilou leh khang paisual aw, bangtan ahiai ka hung umpih diing? Bangtan ahiai ka hung thuaahtheih diing? Amah chu hitah ah ka kawmah hung pui un,” achi hi.
40017018	Huin Jesu’n dawi chu ataai a, a sung akipatin dawi apawtta hi; huleh naupang chu hu hun ngeeiin adamta hi.
40017019	Huin nungjuite chu aguuhin Jesu kawmah ahung va, “Bang diinga kei un nohdoh theilou ka hi viai?” achi uhi.
40017020	Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Na ginlouh jiahun ahi. Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, ankam tang khat bang ginna na neih uh leh, hi taang kawmah, ‘Hi apatin hu lamah kituan in,’ na chi diing va, akituan mei diing hi. Nanguh diingin sil bawltheihlouh mawngmawng aum sih diing hi.
40017021	Bang hitaleh hichibang jaw haamteina leh an ngawlna loungaalin apawtdoh sih hi,” achi hi.
40017022	Huleh Galili gam a aum laiun Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Mihing Tapa hi mite khut ah matsahin aum pah diing hi;
40017023	huleh Amah chu athat diing va, a ni thum ni’n kaihthohin aum diing,” achi hi. Huin amahuh alungkham mahmahta uhi.
40017024	Huleh Kapernaum ahung tunun, biahinn siah dongte Peter kawmah ahung va, “Na Houtupa un biahinn siah pe lou ahi maw?” achi uhi.
40017025	Peter in, “Pia e,” achi hi. Huleh amah chu inn sunga avaluut leh Jesu’n a kawmah, “Simon, bang na chi ngaih ei? Lei a lalte’n sumlam siah hiin siah hitaleh koite lahah ahiai alaah jeel uh, a tate uh lahah ahiai, ahihlouhleh gamdang mi lahah?” chiin anadong hi.
40017026	Peter in a kawmah, “Gamdang mi lahah,” achi hi. Jesu’n a kawmah, “Huchi ahihleh tate a-awl uhi.
40017027	Hizongleh nang diil ah vachiah inla, ngakuai vakhai inla, huleh nga na khaidoh masatpeen la inla, a kam keeh lechin shekel khat na mu diing hi. Huchu la inla, kei leh nang a diingin a kawmvah pia in, huchilou inchu amahuh i kipalpuuhsah kha diing,” achi hi.
40018001	Hulaitahin nungjuite Jesu kawmah ahung va, “Vaan lalgam ah koi alianpeen diai?” achi uhi.
40018002	Huin Jesu’n naupangneu khat a kawmah akou a, amah chu a lahvah adingsah a,
40018003	“Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, na kihen va naupang neute bang na hung hihlouh uh leh, vaan lalgam ah na luut het sih diing uhi.
40018004	Hujiahin koipouh hi naupangneu banga kingaingiam mi chu vaan lalgam ah alianpeen ahi diing hi.
40018005	Huleh mi koipouh hitobang naupang neu khat keimah min a saang chu kei hung saang ahi.
40018006	Hizongleh koipouh keimah hung gingta mineute laha khat zong puuhsah chu a ngawng ah suangsumheeh lianpi ohsahin tuikhanglian thuuhtah ah kheluut leh uh, amah diingin ahoihjaw diing hi.
40018007	“Kipuuhna bawltute jiahin khovel tung agih hi, puuhnate chu hung um diing mawng ahi a, hizongleh puuhna umsahtu tung agih hi!
40018008	Huleh na khut aha, na keeng aha in ahung suhpuuh leh saattan inla paaimang in. Khut nih aha, keeng nih aha neia kumtuang mei a paiha um saangin, piangsuala ahihlouhleh keengbaia hinna a luut chu nang a diingin ahoihjaw hi.
40018009	Huleh na mit in ahung suhpuuh leh kheikhia inla paimang in. Mit nih neia gawtmun mei a paiha na um saangin, mit khat neia hinna a luut nang a diingin ahoihjaw hi.
40018010	Hi naupangte laha khat zong simmoh lou diingin pilvaang un, ajiahchu a angelte un vaan a um ka Pa meel aen zing uhi, chih ka hung hilh ahi.
40018011	“Ajiahchu beimangte hundam diingin Mihing Tapa ahung hi.
40018012	Bang na chi ngaih viai? Mi khat in belaam za nei henla, alahvah khat vaahmangta leh, sawmkuah leh kuahte chu nusiain, taangte a chiahin avaahmang peen vahawl lou diing ahiaimah?
40018013	Huleh vamu kiitta henla hileh, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, sawmkuah leh kuah vaahmang loute saangin hu belaam peen tungah akipaah jaw diing hi.
40018014	Huchibangmahin hi naupangte laha khat zong amanthaai diing chu na Pa uh vaan a um deihlam ahi sih hi.
40018015	“Huleh na unau na tunga atatleeh leh, chiah inla nang leh amah chauh heetin a khelhna chu vahilh in. Ama’n na thu angaih leh, na unau na zou ahi diing hi.
40018016	Hizongleh angaihkhiah louh inchu ‘heetpihtu nih ahihlouhleh thum kam a thu akichetna diingin’ mi khat aha nih aha tonpih in.
40018017	Huleh amahuh angaihkhiah nuam louha ahihleh, kouhtuamte kawmah tut in. Kouhtuamte thu zong angaihkhiah saam louh inchu, amah chu nang a diingin Jentel leh siahdong mi bang hi heh.
40018018	Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, leitung a na kaan photmah uh chu vaan ah kaan ahi diing a, huleh leitung a na phel photmah uh chu vaan ah phel ahi diing hi.
40018019	“Na kawmvah ka soi kiit hi, leitung a na lahva mi nih a silnget pouh va akithutuaah uh leh, ka Pa vaan a um bawlsahin aum diing uhi.
40018020	Ajiahchu mi nih aha thum aha ka min a akikhopna phot vah a lahvah ka um jeel ahi,” achi hi.
40018021	Huin Peter chu Jesu kawmah ahung a, “Lalpa, ka unau in ka tunga akhelh leh, bang jaatvei ahiai ka ngaihdam diing? Sagihvei tanin ahi diai?” achi hi.
40018022	Jesu’n a kawmah, “Sagihvei chiang ka hung chi sih hi. Sawmsagih mun sagihvei tanchiang ka hung chi jaw ahi.
40018023	“Ajiahchu vaan lalgam chu kumpi koiaha a suaahte kawma sum hisaap suhfel tum toh tehkhin ahi.
40018024	Ahung suhfel pat a ahihleh, mi khat talent siing khat ba a kawmah ahung pui uhi.
40018025	Hizongleh ama’n piaah diing aneih louh jiahin a pu in a suaahte kawmah amah leh a ji leh a tate toh aneih zousiah toh juaaha dit diing thu apia hi.
40018026	Hujiahin suaahpa in chu khupbohin abia a, ‘Pu, ka tungah thuaah thei tadih inla, a bawnin ka hung dit diing,’ achi hi.
40018027	Huin hu suaahpa pu in amah chu alainat mahmah a, ahahkhia a, a bat angaidamta hi.
40018028	Hizongleh hu suaahpa chu apawt a, a suaah hihpihte laha khat amah dinari za khat ba chu avamu a, amah chu aman a, ‘Na bat hung pia in!’ chiin a lawl ameeh hi.
40018029	Huchiin asuaah hihpihpa chu a keeng bul ah apuuh a, ‘Ka tungah thuaahthei tadih in, ka hung dit veh diing,’ chiin angeen hi.
40018030	Ahihvaangin amah aut sih a, a bat aditzoh masangsiah suangkul ah avakhumta hi.
40018031	A suaah hihpihte’n a silbawl chu amuh tahun, apona mahmah va, huleh ahung va sil umtan zousiah a pu uh ahung hilhta uhi.
40018032	Huphetin a pu in a suaahpa chu akou a, a kawmah, ‘Aw suaah giloupa, na hung nget nguutnguut jiaha na bat zousiah hung ngaidam ing a,
40018033	ke’n ka hung hehpih banga nang zong na suaah hihpih na hehpih saam diing hilou maw?’ achi hi.
40018034	Huin a pu chu alungthahta a, abat zousiah aditzoh masiah migawttu kawmah apeta hi.
40018035	Nanguh koipouh in na lungtang tah va na unaute a tatleehna uh na ngaihdam louh uh leh, vaan a um ka Pa in zong huchibangin na tungvah abawl ve diing hi,” achi hi.
40019001	Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu’n hi thute asoi zohin Galili gam apatin apawt a, Jordan gaal Judia gam lamah ahungta hi.
40019002	Huleh mipi nasatahin ajui va, huleh Ama’n hutah ah amahuh anasudam hi.
40019003	Pharisaite zong a kawmah ahung va, Amah je-etin a kawmah, “Bangjiah pouhin mi’n a ji akhuul daan in aphalsah ei?” achi uhi.
40019004	Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Achiil apatin Pathian in ‘numei leh pasal in asiam a,’
40019005	huleh ‘Hi jiahin pasal in a nu leh a pa anuse diinga huleh a ji ah abehta diing a, huleh anihun sapum khat ahung hita diing uh,’ chih na sim kha sih uh maw?
40019006	Huchiin amahuh chu nih ahi nawnta sih va, sapum khat ahita uhi. Hujiahin Pathian in agawmsa chu mihing in khen sih heh,” achi hi.
40019007	Amah un a kawmah, “Ahihleh bang diinga Mosi in kikhuulna lehkha piaaha khuul diing ahi, chia thu apiaah ahiai?” achi uhi.
40019008	Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Na lungtang uh khauh jiaha na jite uh khuul Mosi in ahung phalsah ahi. Hizongleh achiil apatin huchibang ahi sih hi.
40019009	Hizongleh ke’n ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh aangkawmna jiah hilou a, ji khuul a, adang nei chu aangkawm ahi a, huleh khuulsa numei nei photmah zong aangkawm ahi,” achi hi.
40019010	A nungjuite’n a kawmah, “Pasal a ji toh kaal thu huchi ahihleh, kiteen ahoih lou ahi,” achi uhi.
40019011	Hizongleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hi thu kisoi mi zousiah in apom thei sih uh, a kawmva piaahte loungaalin.
40019012	Ajiahchu michilgeh khenkhat a nu uh suul apat huchibanga piang mawng aum va; huleh michilgeh khenkhat mihing gehthuh zong aum a, huleh michilgeh, vaan lalgam jiaha michilgeha kisiamtawmte zong aum hi. Koipouh apomthei in pom uh heh,” achi hi.
40019013	Hulaiin a tungva a khut nga a ahaamteisah diingin Amah kawmah naupang neute ahung pui va, hizongleh nungjuite’n anataai uhi.
40019014	Hizongleh Jesu’n, “Naupang neute chu ka kawma ahung diing uh phalsah unla, khap sih un; ajiahchu vaan lalgam chu huchibang mite a diing ahi,” achi hi.
40019015	Huleh a tungva a khut angah zohin, hu apatin achiahta hi.
40019016	Huleh en in, mi khat ahung a, a kawmah, “Houtupa hoih, kumtuang hinna ka neih theihna diingin bang silpha ahiai ka bawl diing?” achi hi.
40019017	Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Bang diinga mi hoih hung chi na hiai? Pathian chihlouh mi hoih dang aum sih hi. Bangteng hitaleh hinna a na luut nuam leh, thupiaahte jawm in,” achi hi.
40019018	Ama’n a kawmah, “Akhoi haw e?” achi hi. Jesu’n adawng a, “‘Tual na thah louh diing ahi,’ ‘Aang na kawm louh diing ahi,’ ‘Na guuh louh diing ahi,’ ‘Heetpihtu dihlou in pang sin,’
40019019	‘Na nu leh na pa zahtaat in,’ huleh ‘Nangmah na kilungsiat banga na veengte zong na lungsiat diing ahi,’” achi hi.
40019020	Tangvaalpa’n chu a kawmah, “Hihaw zousiah chu ka khangdawn lai apat ka juih ahita hi. Bang ka sam nalai ei?” achi hi.
40019021	Jesu’n a kawmah, “Hoihbukim keei ning na chih leh, chiah inla na neih zousiah juaah inla, migentheite kawmah pia in, huchiin vaan ah gou na nei diing hi. Huleh hung inla, hung jui in,” achi hi.
40019022	Hizongleh tangvaalpa in chu hu thu ajaah tahin lungkhamtahin achiah mangta hi, neihlelam tampi nei ahih jiahin.
40019023	Huin Jesu’n a nungjuite kawmah, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mi hausa diingin vaan lalgam luut ahahsa hi.
40019024	Huleh ka hung hilh kiit ahi, mi hausa Pathian lalgam a aluut saangin sangawngsau phin bilvang a aluut paisuaah abaihlam jaw hi,” achi hi.
40019025	A nungjuite’n hu ajaah tahun limdang asa mahmah va, “Huchi ahihleh koi hutdamin aum zou diai?” achi uhi.
40019026	Himahleh Jesu’n amahuh aen a, a kawmvah, “Hichu mihing diingin bawl gual ahi sih a, hizongleh Pathian diingin chu bangkim ahithei veh hi,” achi hi.
40019027	Huin Peter in adawng a, a kawmah, “En in, kei un bangkim nusiain nang ka hung juita va, bang ka mu diing viai leh?” achi hi.
40019028	Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, khovel thah ah Mihing Tapa a loupina laltouphah a atou chiangin nanguh kei hung juite chu Israel phung sawmlenihte vaihawmin laltouphah sawmlenih ah na tou diing uhi.
40019029	Huleh mi chin ka min jiaha innte aha, sanggam pasalte aha, sanggam numeite aha, pa aha, nu aha, ji aha, tate aha, gamte aha nusia in chu aleh za amu diing va, huleh kumtuang hinna atang diing uhi.
40019030	Hizongleh mi tampi amasapeente chu anunungpeen diing va, huleh anunungpeente chu amasapeen diing uhi.
40020001	“Ajiahchu vaan lalgam chu lou neitu a grephuan a natong diinga mi chial diinga jiingkaal a pawt bang ahi.
40020002	Huleh ama’n natongtute toh ni khat a dinari khat loh diinga akilem tahun, a grephuan ah asawlta hi.
40020003	Amah chu daah thumna veelin apawtdoh a, midang dawlmun a ding meimeite amu a,
40020004	huleh a kawmvah, ‘Nanguh zong grephuan ah vakuan un, akilawm hun ka hung pe diing,’ achi hi. Huin amahuh chu achiahta uhi.
40020005	Huleh daah guupna leh daah kuahna veel diingin, avapawt kiit a, huchibangmahin abawl kiit hi.
40020006	Huleh daah sawmlekhat veelin avapawt kiit a, a kawmvah, ‘Bang diinga ding meimei na hi viai?’ achi hi.
40020007	Amah un a kawmah, ‘Koimah in ahung goih louh jiahin,’ achi uhi. Ama’n a kawmvah, ‘Nanguh zong grephuan ah va kuan un, akilawm bangjeel na mu diing uh,’ achi hi.
40020008	Huin nitaahlam ahung hihin, grephuan neitu’n a enkoltu kawmah, ‘Natongtute kou inla anunungpeen apatin a masapeen tanin aloh uh pia in,’ achi hi.
40020009	Huin daah sawmlekhat veela agoihte ahung uh leh dinari khat chiat amuta uhi.
40020010	Huin amasate ahung tahun muh tamdeuh akineem uhi. Hizongleh amah un zong dinari khat chiat mah amuta uhi.
40020011	Huleh hichu akilaah zohun lou neitu tungah aphunta va,
40020012	‘Hi anunungte’n daah khat sung chauh atong va, keiuh nisa hahlai thuaaha tonggimte toh akibangin na bawlta mei a,’ achi uhi.
40020013	Hizongleh ama’n chu alahva khat adawng a, ‘Lawm, na tungah bangmah ka sukhial sih hi. Dinari khat loh diinga kihoutuaah hilou i maw?
40020014	Nang a chu kilaah inla chiahta in, hi anunungpeente kawmah zong nang ka hung piaah jaatmah ka pe uut hi.
40020015	Ka neihsa ka uut uut-a ka bawl theih hilou amaw? Huleh ka hoih jiahin na thangsia ahi maw?’ achi hi.
40020016	Hutobangin anunung chu amasa diing a, amasa chu anunung diing hi. Ajiahchu tampi kouh ahi a, hizongleh tawmchakhat teel ahi,” achi hi.
40020017	Huleh Jesu Jerusalem a achiah touh laiin nungjui sawmlenihte lampi ah apuituam a, a kawmvah,
40020018	“Ngai un, Jerusalem juanin i chiah tou uh ahi, huleh Mihing Tapa chu siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute khut ah matsahin aum diing a, huleh amah un si diingin siamlouh atangsah diing uhi.
40020019	Huleh Amah chu chiamnuih bawlna diing leh jeep diing leh kros a khetbeh diingin Jentelte khut ah apedoh diing uhi. Huleh a ni thum ni in athou kiit diing hi,” achi hi.
40020020	Huin Zebedi tate nu chu a tapate toh hungin Jesu maai a khupbohin bang sil aha angeen hi.
40020021	Huin Ama’n a kawmah, “Bang ahiai na deih?” achi hi. Amahnu in a kawmah, “Na lalgam ah hi ka tapa tegeel khat na jiatlam ah, khat na veilam ah atou theihna diing uh thu pia in,” achi hi.
40020022	Hizongleh Jesu’n adawng a, “Na nget uh na he sih uhi. Nang un ka nou dawn diing na dawn thei viai, huleh ka baptisma tan diing na tang thei diing viai?” achi hi. Amah un a kawmah, “Hihthei e,” achi uhi.
40020023	Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Ka dawn diing nou chu na dawn ngeei diing va, ka baptisma tan diing zong na tang ngeei diing uhi, hizongleh ka jiatlam leh ka veilam a tousah diing thu chu keimah piaah diing ahi sih a, himahleh ka Pa’n abawlsahte kawmah piaah ahi diing,” achi hi.
40020024	Huleh sawmte’n huchu ajaah tahun, unau nihte tungah alungthah mahmahta uhi.
40020025	Hizongleh Jesu’n amahuh chu a kawmah akou a, “Jentel vaihawmte chu a tungvah kilalsahtahin aum va, huleh milian milalte’n a tungvah thu aneih khum uh chih na he uhi.
40020026	Hizongleh nanguh lahah chu huchi ahi sih diing, koipouh na lahva let uut chu na suaah un aum diing ahi.
40020027	Huleh na lahva amasapeen a pan uut chu na suaah un apang diing hi.
40020028	Mihing Tapa hiilhial zong natohsaha um diingin ahung sih a, hizongleh natong diing leh mi tampi tatna diinga a hinna pe diingin ahung jaw ahi,” achi hi.
40020029	Huleh Jeriko apat apawt un, mipi nasatahin Amah ajui uhi.
40020030	Huleh en in, mittaw nih lam geia toute’n Jesu lampi ah achiah hi chih ajaah tahun, “Aw Lalpa, David Tapa, hung khotuah in,” chiin akikou uhi.
40020031	Huleh mipite’n adaihna diingun ataai va, hizongleh amahuh chu, “Aw Lalpa, David Tapa, hung khotuah in,” chiin akikou seemseem uhi.
40020032	Huin Jesu akhawl a, amahuh akou a, “Na tungvah bang bawlleng na uut viai?” achi hi.
40020033	Amah un a kawmah, “Lalpa, mitvaah ka uut uh,” achi uhi.
40020034	Huin Jesu’n alainat mahmah a, a mit uh akhoih a, huchiin amuthei pah ngaal va, huin Amah ajuita uhi.
40021001	Huleh Jerusalem ahung tun kuan uh, Olive Taang a Bethphage khua atun tahun, Jesu’n nungjuite nih asawl a,
40021002	a kawmvah, “Na majawn va khua ah vachiah unla, huleh sabiltung kikhit a kawma a talgual khat toh na vamu pah diing va; hute chu suut unla, ka kawmah hung kai un.
40021003	Huleh mi koiaha in na kawmva soi aneih leh, ‘Lalpa’n amahuh amamoh hi,’ na chi diing va, huchiin ama’n ahung sawl pah diing hi,” achi hi.
40021004	Hite zousiah chu zawlnei kam tungtawna anakisoi ataangtun theihna diingin ahi:
40021005	“Zion tanu chu hilh inla, ‘En in, na Kumpipa chu kingaingiamtahin sabiltung tungah, sabiltung talgual tungah tuangin na kawmah ahung hi,’” achih chu.
40021006	Huin nungjuite chu achiah va, Jesu’n thu apiaah bangin abawl uhi.

40021009	Huchiin mipi a ma a chiahte leh a nunga juite’n kikouin: “David Tapa kawmah, Hosanna! ‘LALPA min a hung paipa chu ahampha hi!’ Tungnungpeen ah Hosanna!” achi uhi.
40021010	Huleh Jerusalem sung aluut tahin, “Hi Pa koi ahiai?” chiin a khopi pumpi aliing hial uhi.

40021020	Huleh nungjuite’n huchu amuh tahun, “Bangchidaan ahiai theipi kung avul pah mei?” chiin thumah asa mahmah uhi.

40021022	Huleh bangkim gingta a haamtei a na nget phot uh na mu diing uhi,” achi hi.

40021024	Hizongleh Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Ke’n zong thu khat ka hung dong diing a, hukhu na hung hilh uh leh, ke’n zong koi thu in ahiai hi sil ka bawl ka hung hilh ve diing hi.
40021025	Johan baptisma hi khoi apatin ahiai? Vaan apatin ahiai, ahihlouhleh mihing apat?” achi hi. Huleh amahuh akingaihtuah va, “‘Vaan apatin,’ chilei lah, ‘Huchi ahihleh bang diinga amah gingta lou?’ achi diing hi.
40021026	Hizongleh, ‘Mihing apatin,’ chilei lah mipite i lau ngaala, mi zousiah in Johan chu zawlnei hia aseh jiahun,” achi uhi.

40021028	“Hizongleh nang un bang na chi ngaih viai? Mi koiaha in tapa nih anei a, huleh akhatna kawmah ahung a, ‘Tapa, tuni in ka grephuan ah nna vatong in,’ achi hi.

40021031	Amahuh geel koi jaw in a pa uh deihlam abawl viai leh?” achi hi. Amah un a kawmah, “Amasajaw in,” achi uhi. Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, siahdongte leh nohchijuaahte’n Pathian lalgam ahung luut khelh diing uhi.
40021032	Ajiahchu Johan chu dihtatna lam thu ah na kawmvah ahung a, amah na gingta sih uhi; hizongleh siahdongte leh nohchijuaahte’n amah agingta uhi. Huleh nang un hu na muh tahun, amah na gintaatna diingun na kisiih nuam tuan sih uhi.

40021034	Huleh a gah loh hun diing kuanin a suaahte chu a gah la diingin loubawl mite kawmah asawl hi.
40021035	Huleh a loubawl mite’n a suaahte chu aman va, khat avua va, khat athat va, khat suang in asep uhi.
