40021037	Atawp ah, ‘Ka tapa azahtaat kha diing uh,’ chiin a tapa chu asawl hi.
40021038	Hizongleh a loubawl mite’n a tapa chu amuh tahun, ‘Hi pa gouluahtu diing ahi, hung un, i that diing va, a gouluah diing chu i kitan diing uh,’ achi uhi.
40021039	Huin amah chu aman va, grephuan pua ah apaaidoh va, athatta uhi.
40021040	Hujiahin grephuan neitupa ahung tahchiangin hu lou bawltute chu bang alohta diai?” achi hi.

40021042	Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Pathian Lehkhathu ah: ‘Innlamtute suang deihlouh ngeei chu aning a suang poimohpeen ahung hita hi. Hichu LALPA bawl ahi a, huleh i mitmuh vah athumah ahi,’ chih thu na sim kha ngei sih uh maw?
40021043	Hujiahin ka hung hilh ahi, Pathian lalgam chu na kawm vapat laahsah ahi diing a gah suang diing nam dang kawmah piaah ahi diing hi.

40022001	Huleh Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah tehkhinthu in asoi kiit a:

40023001	Huin Jesu’n mipite leh a nungjuite kawmah thu asoi a,

40023004	Ajiahchu vangih puaah hah tahtah asiam va, mi liangkou ah akoih va, hizongleh amah un lah a khutzung khat un zong akhoihtaang nuam sih uhi.
40023005	Hizongleh amah un abawl zousiah uh chu mi muh diinga bawl ahi uhi. A silbuh uh leh a puanmong khipte uh asulian va, a puan mongte uh atualsah uhi.

40023014	Nanguh daanjilsahtute, Pharisaite leh lepchiahte haw, na tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu meithaite inn haw na negam va, kibawltawmin sawt pipi na haamtei uhi. Hujiahin siamlouhtanna lianseem na mu diing uhi.
40023015	Nanguh daanjilsahtute, Pharisaite leh lepchiahte haw, na tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu mi khat Juda sahkhua a kiheisah diingin tuikhanglian leh gam ah na chiah kiimveel va, huleh huchia na siam zoh chiangun amah chu nanguh saanga alehniha gawtmun ta hiin na siam veu uhi.

41001044	Huleh Jesu’n a kawmah, “En in, koima kawmah bangma soi het sin; hizongleh chiah inla, siampu kawmah vakimusah inla, na sian thu amah uh heetsahna diinga Mosi in thu apiaah silte valaan in,” achi hi.
41001045	Hizongleh amah chu achiahdoh a, hu thu nasatahin ataangkoupih a aphuangdalh panta hi, huchiin Jesu chu langtangtahin khopi sung ah aluut theita sih hi. Hizongleh khopolam gamdaai munte ah aum jawta a; huleh mun chin apatin a kawmah mite ahung uhi.
41002001	Huleh ni bangzah aha nungin Kapernaum ah aluut kiit a, huleh inn ah aum chih thu ahung thangta hi.
41002002	Huin kotkhaah kiim tanpha a, umna diing umlou khopin mi tampi ahung kikhawm pah uhi. Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah thu asoi hi.
41002003	Huin mijeng khat mi li in hung jawngin a kawmah ahung pui uhi.
41002004	Mipi jiaha a kawm nai a ahung theih louh tahun a umna inn tung ahawhkhia uhi. Huchia asuhvang zohun, mijeng chu a jawnna lupna toh akhaikhesuh uhi.
41002005	Jesu’n a ginna uh amuhin mijeng kawmah, “Tapa, na sualnate ngaihdam ahita,” achi hi.

41002007	“Hi Pa’n bang diinga Pathian soisia a hichibang thu asoi ahiai? Pathian chauh loungaal koi ahiai sualnate ngaidam thei?” chiin.
41002008	Huleh Jesu’n a lungtang un huchibangin angaihtuah uh chih a lungsim in anahe pah a, a kawmvah, “Bang diinga hi thute na lungtang va ngaihtuah na hi viai?
41002009	Mijeng kawma, ‘Na sualnate ngaihdam ahita,’ chih leh, ‘Thou inla, na lupna la inla, keeng in chiahta in,’ chih khoi abaihlam jaw ei?
41002010	Hizongleh Mihing Tapa’n leitung ah sualnate ngaihdam theihna diing thuneihna anei chih na heetna diingun,” achi hi. Huin Ama’n mijeng kawmah,
41002011	“Thou inla, na lupna la inla, na inn lamah chiahta in ka hung chi ahi,” achi hi.
41002012	Huleh amah chu athou pah a, a lupna lain a bawnva mitmuh ah achiahdohta hi. Huchiin a bawnun limdang asa va, “Huchibang mawngmawng i mu ngei sih,” chiin Pathian apaahtawi uhi.
41002013	Huin Amah chu diil geiah achiahdoh kiit a; huleh mipi zousiah a kawmah ahung va, amahuh thu anahilh hi.
41002014	Huleh Amah apai laiin Alphai tapa Levi, siahdonna mun a toulai amu a, a kawm ah, “Hung jui in,” achi hi. Huin Levi athou a, Amah ajuita hi.
41002015	Huin Jesu chu Levi inn ah an ne diingin dohkaan ah atou a, siahdongtu tampi leh misualte chu Jesu leh a nungjuite toh an ne diingin atou khawm uhi; ajiahchu tampi ahi va, huleh Jesu nung ajui uhi.
41002016	Huleh daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite’n siahdongtute leh misualte toh Jesu an nekhawmlai amuh tahun, a nungjuite kawmah, “Bang diinga Ama’n siahdongtute leh misualte toh nea dawn khawm ahiai?” achi uhi.
41002017	Jesu’n huchu ajaah tahin a kawmvah, “Mi chidamte’n daktor amamoh sih va, hizongleh damloute’n amamoh uhi. Midihtatte kou diinga hung ka hi sih a, hizongleh misualte kisiihsah diinga koua hung ka hijaw hi,” achi hi.
41002018	Huleh Johan nungjuite leh Pharisaite’n an angawl uhi. Huin a kawma hungin hi thu asoi va, “Johan nungjuite leh Pharisaite nungjuite’n an angawl va, hizongleh bang diinga na nungjuite’n angawl louh uh ahiai?” chiin.
41002019	Huchiin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Moupa moupuite kawma aum laisiah moupuite’n an angawl thei ngei viaimah? Moupa a kawmva aum laisiah an angawl thei sih diing uhi.
41002020	Hizongleh moupa a lah vapat a puimang hun ahung tung diing a, hu ni chiangin angawl diing uhi.
41002021	“Mi koimah in puan lui puan thah them in aphoh ngei sih uhi. Phohta leh uh, a phohna puan thah in a puan lui chu akaikeeh diing a, huleh ahung keehjaw seem diing hi.
41002022	Huleh mi koimah in uain thah chu savun thawl lui ah athun ngei sih uh; thunta leh uh, uain thah in savun thawl lui chu aphukeeh diing a, uain akibo diing a, savun thawl chu asegawp diing hi. Hizongleh uain thah chu savun thawl thah a thun jawh diing ahi,” achi hi.
41002023	Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Sabbath ni in buhlei lai tawnin achiah va; a nungjuite’n achiah kawm-un buhvuite asihtan panta uhi.
41002024	Huin Pharisaite’n a kawmah, “En in, bangjiaha amah un Sabbath ni a daan in aphallouh bawl ahi viaimah?” achi uhi.

41002026	bangchidaana Abiathar siampu lalpeen ahihlai a Pathian inn a luut a, siampute chauh in aneeh siang tanghou siah avaneeh a, a kawma umte kawma zong apiaah ahiai chih na sim kha ngei sih viaimah?” achi hi.
41002027	Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Sabbath chu mihing a diinga bawl ahi a, mihing chu Sabbath a diinga bawl ahi sih hi.

41003001	Huleh Amah chu sinagog ah aluut kiit a, hutah ah mi khut jeng khat ana-um hi.

41003003	Huin Ama’n khut jengpa kawmah, “A lahvah dingdoh in,” achi hi.

41003005	Huchiin a lungtang uh khauh jiaha lungsim na leh lungthah pumin amahuh aenveel a, hu mipa kawmah, “Na khut zandoh in,” achi hi. Hupa’n a khut azandoh a, a khut chu alang khat lam tobangin adamta hi.

41003015	damloute asuhdam va dawite anohdoh theihna diingva thuneihna aneih theihna diingun aguatta hi.
41003016	Simon kawmah min dang apia a, huchu Peter ahi;
41003017	Zebedi tapa Jakob leh Jakob sanggampa Johan kawmah min dang apia a, amahuh chu Bonerge asa a, huchu, “Vaanpi ging tate,” chihna ahi a;

41003020	Huleh an nasan ne thei lou khopin mipi nasatah ahung kikhawm kiit uhi.

41003023	Huchiin Ama’n amahuh akou a, a kawmvah tehkhinthu in asoi a: “Bangchiin Setan in Setan anohdoh thei diai?
41003024	Lalgam khat kilangkhenin kidou leh, hu lalgam chu ading thei sih diing hi.
41003025	Innkuan khat kilangkhenin kidou leh, hu innkuan zong ading thei sih diing hi.
41003026	Setan zong amah leh amah kidoua akilangkhen leh, ading zou sih diing a, amangthaai jaw diing hi.

41004001	Huleh Ama’n diil pangah thu ahilh pan kiitta a, huleh mipi nasatah a kawma ahung kikhop jiahun diil tunga kuang ah akal a, atouta a, mipi zousiah chu diil pangah aum uhi.

41004003	“Ngaikhia un! En un, haichithehtu khat haichi thehin akuan hi.
41004004	Huleh hichi ahung hi a, atheh laiin, khenkhat lam geiah atu a, huleh hute chu tungleeng vate ahung va ane zouta uhi.

41005032	Huleh Ama’n hu sil bawlnu chu muh tumin aen kiimveel hi.

41005034	Huin Ama’n amahnu kawmah, “Tanu, na ginna in ahung damsahta hi. Hamuangtahin chiah inla, na natna apatin damta in,” achi hi.
41005035	Ama’n huchia asoi laiin, sinagog a vaihawmtupa inn apatin mi ahung a, “Na tanu asita hi. Bang diinga Houtupa subuai nalai na hiai?” ahung chi hi.

41005038	Huin sinagog a vaihawmtu inn avatung a, anabuai vengvung leh kapa anamaau jeenjuunte avamu hi.

41005040	Huin amah un Amah chu anuihsan uhi. Hizongleh amahuh chu a bawnun apawtsah a, naupangnu nu leh pa leh a tonpihte apui a, naupangnu lupna ah aluut uhi.
41005041	Huin Ama’n naupangnu chu a khut in atu a, a kawmah, “Talitha kumi,” achi a, huchu “Naupangnu, thou in, ka hung chi ahi,” chihna ahi.

41006001	Huin hu apat apawtin Amah khua ngeei ah ahung a, huleh a nungjuite’n Amah ajui uhi.
41006002	Sabbath ni ahung hihin, sinagog ah thu ahilh panta hi. Huleh athuhilh ja mi tampite’n limdang asa va, “Hi Pa’n hi thute khoi apat amuh ahiai? A kawma pilna kipia bang pilna hi ahiai, a khut a hichitaha silmahte abawltaah mei!
41006003	Amah chu Mari tapa, Jakob, Josse, Juda leh Simon sanggampa, sing bawlpa khu hilou maw? A sanggam numeite hitah ah i kawma um hilou ahi uh maw?” achi uhi. Huchiin Amah tungah alunghita sih uhi.
41006004	Hizongleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Zawlnei amah gam sung leh amah tanaute lah leh amah inn sungah chihlouh zahbawl louhin aum ngei sih hi,” achi hi.

41006009	hizongleh keengtophah chu but unla, huleh puannaah nih silh sih un, chiin thu apia hi.

41006012	Huchiin akuandoh va mite chu akisiih theihna diingun thu ataangkoupih uhi.

41006015	Midangte’n, “Elijah ahi,” achi uhi. Huleh khenkhatte’n, “Zawlnei ahi, ahihlouhleh zawlneite laha khat ahi,” achi uhi.

41006020	ajiahchu Herod in Johan chu midihtat leh misiangthou ahi chih aheet jiahin alau a, ahuumbit jeel hi. Ama’n a thu ajaah tahin alungdong a, hizongleh kipaahtahin angaikhe jeel hi.

41006034	Huleh Jesu’n kuang apat ahung pawtdohin mipi nasatah amu a, achingtu bei belaam bang ahih jiahun alainat mahmah hi. Huchiin thu tampi ahilh panta hi.

41006042	Huchiin a bawnun ane va, avah chiatta uhi.

41006050	ajiahchu a bawnun Amah amu va, amangbangta uhi. Hizongleh Ama’n amahuh ahoupih pah a, “Hamuangtahin um un! Keimah ka hi; lau sih un,” achi hi.
41006051	Huin kuang ah a kawmvah atuangdoh a, huih chu atawpta hi. Huin amah un soi theihlouh khopin limdang asa uhi.

41007001	Huin Jerusalem apat hung pai Pharisaite leh daanjilsahtute khenkhat a kawmah ahung uhi.

41007005	Huin Pharisaite leh daanjilsahtute’n, “Bang diinga na nungjuite upate tawndaan banga umlou a, khut silloua an ne ahi viai?” chiin Amah adong uhi.

41007024	Huin Amah athou a hu apatin Tura leh Sidon gam sungah achiah hi. Huleh inn khat ah koima heet diing uutlouin aluut a, hizongleh akiphual zou tuan sih hi.

41008020	“Huleh mi saang li laha sagih ka balkeeh laiin a neng vaal paalbawm bangzah atai na luaahdim uh?” achi hi. Amah un, “Sagih,” achi uhi.

41008031	Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah Mihing Tapa in sil tampi athuaah diing bang, upate leh siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute nuala aum diing bang, thaha aum diing bang, huleh ni thum ni a athohkiit diing haw bang ahilh panta hi.
41008032	Ama’n hu thute chu phuanglaahtahin asoi hi. Huin Peter in Amah apuituam a ataaihilhta hi.
41008033	Hizongleh Amah chu kihei veelin a nungjuite aen a, Peter chu ataai a, “Setan, ka nung ah pai in! Ajiahchu nangma’n Pathian silte ngaikhawh louin, hizongleh mihing silte na ngaikhawh jaw hi,” achi hi.
41008034	Huleh Ama’n mipite leh a nungjuite akou a, a kawmvah, “Mi koipouh in ahung juih nuam inchu, amah leh amah kiheetmohbawlin a kros puain hung jui heh.
41008035	Ajiahchu mi koipouh a hinna huumbit tumin ataan diing a, hizongleh mi koipouh keimah leh tanchinpha jiaha a hinna taan in ahuumbit diing hi.
41008036	Ajiahchu mi’n khovel a pumin nei henla, a hinna taanta leh, amah diingin bang aphatuam diai?
41008037	Ahihlouhleh mi’n a hinna luangin bang ape diai?
41008038	Hujiahin mi koipouh hi aangkawm haat leh gilou khang a mite laha keimah leh ka thu zumpih chu Mihing Tapa in zong angel siangthoute toh a Pa loupina a ahung chiangin, amah chu azumpih ve diing hi,” achi hi.
41009001	Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin na kawmvah ka soi ahi, hia dingte khenkhat chu Pathian lalgam silbawltheihna toh hung tung amuh masiah uh sihna chiam lou diing aum uhi,” achi hi.
41009002	Huin ni guup nungin Jesu’n Peter, Jakob leh Johan apui a, huleh atuamin taang sang tung khat ah amahuh chu apui tou a; a ma vah a meel ahung limdangta hi.
41009003	Huchiin a puansilh chu ahung taang a, vuuh bangin angou a, leitung a puansawptu koima’n huchibangin asawp ngou thei sih diing hi.
41009004	Huleh Elijah leh Mosi a kawmah ahung kilang va, Jesu toh akihou khawm uhi.
41009005	Huchiin Peter in Jesu adawng a, a kawmah, “Rabbi, eiuh diingin hitah a um ahoih hi; huleh puanbuuh thum i bawl diing va; nang a diingin khat, Mosi a diingin khat, huleh Elijah a diingin khat,” achi hi.
41009006	Ajiahchu alau mahmah jiahun asoi diing peen zong Peter in ahe sih hi.
41009007	Huleh meilum lom khat in amahuh ahung khuh a; meilum lah apatin aw ahung ging a, “Hichu ka Tapa deihtah ahi; a thu ngai un!” chiin.
41009008	Kintaha a kiimveel uh aet pah uh leh Jesu chihlouh a kawmvah midang koima amu nawnta sih uhi.
41009009	Huin taang apat ahung kumsuh laiun, Mihing Tapa misi lah apat athohkiit masiah a sil muhte uh koima hilh lou diingin Ama’n thu apia hi.
41009010	Huchiin hi thu chu a lungsim vah avom zing va, misi lah apat a thohkiit chih peen bang chihna hi diing adiai chiin akidongtuah uhi.
41009011	Huleh amah un, “Bang diinga daanjilsahtute’n Elijah ahung masa ngeeingeei diing ahi chi ahi viai?” chiin Amah adong uhi.
41009012	Huin Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Elijah chu hung masa a, sil zousiah abawl hoih diing mawng ahi. Ahihleh Mihing Tapa in sil tampi athuaah diing a, huleh nualin aum ngeei diing ahi, chia a tanchin bangchi daana kigial adiai?
41009013	Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, hu Elijah chu ahung zouta a, huleh a tanchin kigelh bang ngeeiin a tungah auut uut uh abawl zouta uhi,” achi hi.
41009014	Huleh Amah a nungjuite kawm ahung tunin, akiim va mipi nasatah um amu a, huleh daanjilsahtute toh amahuh anakinial uhi.
41009015	Mipi zousiah in Amah amuh tahun limdang asa mahmah va, a kawmva taaiin chibai avabuuh uhi.
41009016	Huin Ama’n daanjilsahtute kawmah, “Amahuh toh bangjiaha kinial na hi viai?” chiin adong hi.
41009017	Huin mipi laha khat in adawng a, a kawmah, “Houtupa, ka tapa dawipaai jiahin na kawmah ka hung pui hi.
41009018	Huleh amatna mun phot ah tual ah aheeh puuh jeel a; huchiin a chilphuan buain, a ha bang agawi a, akhauh veu hi. Huchiin na nungjuite kawmah hung nohdohsah un ka chi a, hizongleh abawl thei sih uh,” achi hi.
41009019	Huin Ama’n amah adawng a, “Ginna neilou khang a mite haw, na kawmva bangtan ahiai ka um diing? Bangtan ahiai ka hung thuaahtheih diing? Amah chu ka kawmah hung pui un,” achi hi.
41009020	Huchiin naupang chu a kawmah ahung pui uhi. Huleh ama’n Jesu chu amuh tahin dawi in naupang chu nasatahin asoisa pah a, huchiin tual ah apuuh a, a chilphuan bo zengzungin akitaal lehleh hi.
41009021	Huchiin Ama’n a pa kawmah, “Hichibang ahung hihna bangtan ahita ei?” chiin adong hi. Huin ama’n, “A naupan lai apatin ahita.
41009022	Huleh amah that diingin mei lah leh tui lahah asawn luut veu hi. Hizongleh nang in bang aha na bawl theih leh hung lainat inla, hung panpih in,” achi hi.
41009023	Jesu’n a kawmah, “Na gintaat phot leh, a gingtate diingin sil zousiah ahithei hi,” achi hi.
41009024	Huin naupangpa pa chu akikou pah a; huleh mit-hi luang pumin, “Lalpa, ka gingta a; ka ginlahna hung panpih in,” achi hi.
41009025	Huin Jesu’n mipi hung taaikhawm amuh tahin hagau niin chu ataai a, “Nang haamtheihlouhna leh bilngonna hagau, thu ka hung pia hi, a sung apat hung pawt inla, a sungah luut kiit nawn sin,” achi hi.
41009026	Huin dawi chu akikou a, nasatahin asoisa a, huzohin ahung pawtta hi. Huleh naupang chu mi tampite’n, “Asi ahita,” achih diing khop un ahung umta hi.
41009027	Hizongleh Jesu’n amah chu a khut a tuin aphong a, ahung thouta hi.
41009028	Huleh inn sunga ahung luutin a nungjuite’n, “Bang diinga kei un nohdoh theilou ka hi viai?” chiin aguuh dot uhi.
41009029	Huchiin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hitobangte chu haamteina leh an ngawlna loungaalin apawt thei sih hi,” achi hi.
41009030	Huin hu apatin achiahdoh va Galili gam atawn peh va, koima heet diing auut sih hi.
41009031	Ajiahchu a nungjuite thu ahilh a, a kawmvah, “Mihing Tapa chu mite khut ah akipedoh diing a, athat diing uhi. Huleh athah nung uh ni thum ni in athoukiit diing,” achi hi.
41009032	Hizongleh amah un a thusoi chu ahesiam sih va, dot diing lah alau uhi.
41009033	Huin Amah chu Karpernaum ahung tung hi. Huleh inn sunga aum laiin a kawmvah, “Lampi a hu na kikupna uh bang ahiai?” chiin adong hi.
41009034	Hizongleh amahuh chu asipkeei uhi, ajiahchu lampi ah koi ahiai lianpeen diing, chiin ahung kikum zouta uhi.
41009035	Huin Amah chu atou a, sawmlenihte akou a, a kawmvah, “Mi koipouh amasapeen hih uut chu, anunungpeen leh mi zousiah natohsahtu ahih phot ngeeingeei diing ahi,” achi hi.
41009036	Huin Ama’n naupangneu khat akai a, a lailung vah adingsah hi. Huleh Ama’n apom zohin a kawmvah,
41009037	“Mi koipouh ka min a hitobang naupangneu khat saang chu kei hung saang ahi. Huleh koipouh kei hung saang chu, kei hung saang hilouin ahung sawlpa saang ahijaw hi,” achi hi.
41009038	Huin Johan in, “Houtupa, kei uh hung jui lou mi khat na min a dawite nohdoh ka mu va, huleh keiuh ahung juih louh jiahin ka khapta uhi,” achi hi.
41009039	Hizongleh Jesu’n, “Khap sih un, ajiahchu ka min a silmah bawl ngaala, kei hung soise thei mi aum sih hi.
41009040	Ajiahchu eiuh hung dou lou photmah chu eiuh lama pang ahi.
41009041	Ajiahchu mi koipouh Khrist a na hih jiahva, ka min a tuisih nou khat dawn diinga hung petu in chu, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, a kipaahman muh diing ataan hial sih diing hi.
41009042	“Huleh koipouh kei hung gingta hi naupangneute laha khat zong supuuh chu, a ngawng ah suang sumheeh gihtah kiohsah henla, tuikhanglian sungah kipaai luut leh amah diingin ahoihjaw diing hi.
41009043	Huleh na khut in ahung suhpuuh leh, saattan in. Khut nih neia gawtmun mei mit theilou a na chiah saangin, khut kimlou a hinna a luut nang a diingin ahoihjaw hi,
41009044	‘A than uh asih louhna leh meikuang amit louhna ah.’
41009045	Huleh na keeng in ahung suhpuuh leh, saattan in. Keeng nih neia gawtmun mei mit theilou a paiha na um saangin, keengbaia hinna a luut nang a diingin ahoihjaw hi,
41009046	‘A than uh asih louhna leh meikuang amit louhna ah.’
41009047	Huleh na mit in ahung suhpuuh leh, khei khia in. Mit langnih neia gawtmun meikuang a paiha na um saangin mit lang khat neia Pathian lalgam a luut nang a diingin ahoihjaw hi,
41009048	‘A than uh asih louhna leh meikuang amit louhna ah.’
41009049	“Ajiahchu mi chin meikuang a soh-al in aum diing a, kithoihna chinteng chi a soh-alin aum diing hi.
41009050	Chi chu ahoih a, hizongleh chi chu data hileh, bangchiin na alsah kiitta diviai? Nanguh ngeei ah chi kineih unla, huleh khat leh khat kilemin um un,” achi hi.
41010001	Huin Jesu’n hu mun anusia a, Judia gam kualsung Jordan gaal lampeh ahung tungta hi. Huleh mipite a kawmah ahung kikhawm kiit va, huchiin ahih ngeimah bangin amahuh thu ahilh kiit hi.
41010002	Pharisaite a kawmah ahung va, Amah je-etna diingin, “Mi’n a ji akhuul hi daan in aphal ei?” chiin adong uhi.
41010003	Huleh Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Mosi’n nanguh bang thu ahung pia ei?” achi hi.
41010004	Amah un, “Mosi’n kikhuulna lehkha giala kikhuul aphal hi,” achi uhi.
41010005	Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Na lungtang uh khauh jiahin ahi ama’n hi thupiaah nanguh diinga ahung na gelhsah.
41010006	Hizongleh leilung kisiam chiil apatin Pathian in ‘amahuh numei leh pasal in asiam hi.’
41010007	‘Hi jiahin pasal in a nu leh a pa anuse diinga huleh a ji ah abehta diing a,
41010008	huleh anihun sapum khat ahung hita diing uh;’ huchiin nih hi nawn louin, hizongleh sapum khat ahung hi jawta diing uhi.
41010009	Hujiahin Pathian in agawmsa chu mihing in khen sih heh,” achi hi.
41010010	Huleh inn sung ah a nungjuite’n hu thu mah Amah adong kiit uhi.
41010011	Huchiin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Mi koipouh in a ji akhuul a ji dang aneih leh, aangkawm ahi.
41010012	Huleh numei in a pasal akhuul a pasal dang aneih leh, aangkawm ahi,” achi hi.
41010013	Huin akhoih theihna diingin naupang neute a kawmah ahung pui va, himahleh a nungjuite’n ahung puite anataai uhi.
41010014	Hizongleh Jesu’n hu amuhin, alungkim sih mahmah a, a kawmvah, “Naupangneute ka kawmah ahung diing uh phalsah unla, khap sih un; ajiahchu Pathian lalgam chu huchibang mite a diing ahi.
41010015	Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mi koipouh naupang neu banga Pathian lalgam saang lou chu, a sungah aluut het sih diing,” achi hi.
41010016	Huin Ama’n amahuh apom a, a tungvah a khut akoih a, avangpiaahta hi.
41010017	Huin lampi a chiah diinga apawt laiin, mi khat ahung taai a, ama a khuupdin in a kawmah, “Houtupa hoih, kumtuang hinna ka tan theihna diingin bang ahiai ka bawl diing?” chiin adong hi.
41010018	Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Bang diinga hoih hung chi na hiai? Pathian chauh loungaal koima ahoih aum sih hi.
41010019	Thupiaahte na he vele: ‘Aangkawm sin,’ ‘Tualthat sin,’ ‘Gu sin,’ ‘Heetpihtu dihlouin pang sin,’ ‘Mi heem sin,’ Na nu leh na pa zahtaat in,’ chihte,” achi hi.
41010020	Huin ama’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Houtupa, hihaw zousiah chu ka khangdawn lai apat ka juih ahita,” achi hi.
41010021	Huin Jesu’n amah aen a, alungsiat a, a kawmah, “Sil khat na sam nalai hi: Chiah inla, na neih photmah juaah inla migentheite kawmah pia in, huchiin vaan ah gou na nei diing; huleh hung inla, kros puain hung jui in,” achi hi.
41010022	Hizongleh neihlelam tampi nei mi ahih jiahin amahpa chu hu thu ah a maai ahung mualta a, huleh lungkhamtahin achiah mangta hi.

41010024	Huleh a nungjuite’n chu a thusoite thumah asa mahmah uhi. Hizongleh Jesu’n adawng kiit a, a kawmvah, “Tate haw, hauhsatna muangte diingin Pathian lalgam a luut hahsa hina mei e!
41010025	Mi hausa Pathian lalgam a aluut saangin, sangawngsau phin bilvang a aluut paisuaah abaihlam jaw hi,” achi hi.
41010026	Huin amah un soitheih louh khopin thumah asa va, “Huchi ahihleh, koi hutdamin aum zou diai?” akichi tuah uhi.

41010028	Huin Peter in a kawmah, “En in, kei un bangkim nusiain nang ka hung jui uh,” chiin asoi panta hi.
41010029	Huchiin Jesu’n adawng a, “Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mi koipouh keimah leh tanchinpha jiaha inn aha, sanggam pasalte aha, sanggam numeite aha, nu aha, pa aha, ji aha, tate aha, huleh gam aha nusia chu,
41010030	tu damsung hun ngeeia innte leh sanggam pasalte leh sanggam numeite leh nute leh tate leh gamte haw leh suhduhdahnate toh, aleh za a mu lou diing aum sih uh, huleh khovel hung tung diing ah kumtuang hinna toh.
41010031	Hizongleh mi tampi amasapeente chu anunungpeen diing va, huleh anunungpeente amasapeen diing uhi,” achi hi.
41010032	Huin amahuh chu Jerusalem a chiahtouin lampi ah aum va, huleh Jesu chu ama vah apai a, amah un limdang asa mahmah uhi. Huleh ajuih pum-un alau uhi. Huin Ama’n sawmlenihte apui kiit a, a tunga sil hung tung pah diingte ahilh panta hi:
41010033	“Ngai un, Jerusalem a chiahtou diing i hi va, Mihing Tapa chu siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute kawmah apekhe diing va, huleh Amah chu si diingin siamlouh atangsah diingva Jentelte khut ah apekhe diing va;
41010034	huleh amah un chiamnuih bawlna in azang diing va, ajeep diing va, chil asiatkhum diing va, athat diing uhi. Huleh a ni thum ni in athou kiit diing,” achi hi.
41010035	Huin Zebedi tapate Jakob leh Johan ahung va a kawmah, “Houtupa, na kawma ka deih phot uh hung bawlsah lehchin ka chi uhi,” achi uhi.

41010038	Hizongleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Bang ahiai na nget uh na he sih uhi. Ka nou dawn diing na dawn thei diviai? Huleh ka baptisma tan diing zong na tang thei diviai?” achi hi.

41010040	hizongleh ka jiatlam leh ka veilam a tou diing chu kei piaah diing ahi sih a, a diingva kiguatsate kawmah piaah ahijaw diing hi,” achi hi.

41011003	Huleh mi koiaha in na kawmva, ‘Bang diinga na suut uh ahiai?’ ahung chih leh, ‘Lalpa’n amamoh ahi, hitah mun ah ahung thahkiit pah diing,’ chi un,” achi hi.

41011010	Lalpa min a hung tung diing i pu David lalgam chu ahampha hi! Tungnungpeen ah Hosanna!” chiin akikou uhi.
41011011	Huin Jesu chu Jerusalem a Pathian biahinn ah aluut hi. Huchiin sil zousiah aen kiimveel a, nitaahlam ahihtaah jiahin, sawmlenihte toh Bethani ah achiahta hi.
41011012	Huleh ajiingin Bethani apat ahung un, a gil akialta hi.

41011016	Huleh Pathian biahinn tawn a juaahsil puaah aphal sih hi.
41011017	Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “‘Ka inn chu nam chin diinga haamteina inn akichi diing,’ chia kigial hilou ahiaimah? Hizongleh nang un ‘suammangte umna kua in’ na siamta uh,” chiin ahilh hi.

41012001	Huin Ama’n a kawmvah tehkhinthu in thu asoi panta a: “Mi koiaha in grephuan abawl a, huleh daai in auum kiimveel a, greptui suuhna kokhuuh alaai a, a veenna diing buuh sang alam hi. Huleh lou bawlte kawmah hohloh diingin apia a, khual gamlapi ah achiahta hi.

41012010	Hi Pathian Lehkhathu ah sim kha ngeilou na hi viaimah: ‘Inn lamtute suang deihlouh ngeei chu aning a suang poimohpeen ahung hita hi.

41012015	Pe diing ka hi viai, ahihlouhleh pe lou diing ka hi viai?” achi uhi. Hizongleh Ama’n alepchiah daan uh ahe a, a kawmvah, “Bang diinga hung je-et na hi viai? dinari khat hung tawi un, ka en diing,” achi hi.

41012020	Huleh unau pasal sagih. aumta uhi. A upapeen in ji anei a, huleh chi haah nei louin asita hi.

41012023	Hujiahin, thohkiitna ni a ahung thohkiit chiangun a lahva koipeen ji ahita diai? Ajiahchu asagih un akiteenpih kha chiat uhi,” chiin adong uhi.

41012031	Huleh anihna chu hi ahi: ‘Nangmah na kilungsiat banga na innveengte zong na lungsiat diing ahi.’ Hite saanga lianjaw thupiaah dang mawngmawng aum sih hi,” achi hi.
41012032	Huchiin daanjilsahtupa’n a kawmah, “Ahi, Houtupa, na soi dih hi. Thutah na soi hi, ajiahchu Pathian khat chauh aum a, Amah chihlouh adang aum sih hi.
41012033	Huleh Amah chu lungtang zousiah a, heetsiamna zousiah a, hinna zousiah leh haatna zousiah a lungsiat diing ahi. Huleh eimah i kilungsiat banga i innveengte lungsiat chu haaltum sillat leh kithoihna zousiah saangin ahoihjaw hi,” achi hi.

41012035	Huin Jesu’n Pathian biahinn a thu ahilh laiin, amahuh adawng a, “Daanjilsahtute’n Khrist chu David Tapa ahi, bangchidaana achih uh ahiai?
41012036	Ajiahchu David ngeei in Hagau Siangthou in: ‘LALPA’N ka Lalpa kawmah, “Na meelmate na keeng ngahna a ka bawl masiah ka jiatlam ah tou in,” achi hi.’
41012037	Hujiahin David ngeei in Amah chu ‘Lalpa’ chiin akou hi; huchi ahihleh bangchidaana a Tapa hi ahiai?” achi hi. Huleh mi tamtahin kipaahtahin a thu angaikhia uhi.
41012038	Huin Ama’n a thuhilhna ah a kawmvah, “Daanjilsahtute lahah kiveeng un, amahuh chu puantual silha vaah lehleh dawlmunte a mite’n chibai abuuh uh bang auut va,
41012039	sinagog a touna poimohpeen leh gualvaahna a mun hoihpeen bang angaina va,
41012040	meithaite inn haw anegam va, huleh bawltawmin sawt pipi ahaamtei uhi. Amah un chu siamlouhtanna lian seem amu diing uhi,” achi hi.

41012044	ajiahchu amahuh zousiah in aneih vaal uh akhia va, hizongleh hi meithainu in chu aneih zousiah, akitunhingna diing teng akhiah veh ahi,” achi hi.
41013001	Huin Jesu Pathian biahinn apat apawt dohin a nungjuite laha khat in a kawmah, “Houtupa, endua, asuangte bang tobanga limdang a, a innte haw bangchitaha loupi ahita eimah!” achi hi.

41014037	Huin ahung a, amahuh chu ihmuin ahung mu a, huchiin Peter kawmah, “Simon ihmu na hi maw? Daahkaal khat zong kiging a umzou lou na hi maw?
41014038	Heemna a na luut louhna diingun kiging zing unla haamtei un. Hagau in chu apeih a, hizongleh tahsa chu achau hi,” achi hi.
41014039	Huleh achiah mang kiit a, ahaamtei a, asoi ngeimah avachi hi.

41014042	Thou un, i chiah diing uh; en un, kei hung mansahtu chu ahungta hi,” achi hi.

41014058	“‘Hi khut a bawl Pathian biahinn ka suse diing a, ni thum sungin khut a bawl louh adang khat ka lam diing,’ Ama’n achih ka ja uh,” achi uhi.

41014061	Hizongleh Amah chu asip bihbeh a, bangma in adawng sih hi. Siampu lalpeen in, “Nang Hampha Tapa, Khrist chu na hi maw?” chiin adong kiit hi.

41014064	Pathian asoisiat daan na jata uhi; bangchi na sa viai?” achi hi. Huin a bawnun Amah chu si taahin siamlouh atangsahta uhi.

41015001	Jiingkaal matahin siampu lalte chu upate leh daanjilsahtute leh vaihawmtute zousiah toh akihou khawm pah va, Jesu chu kaanin apui va, Pilat kawmah apedohta uhi.

42004019	LALPA lungdam kum thu bang soi diingin ahung sawl hi,” chih chu.

42004025	Hizongleh thutah ka hung hilh ahi, Elijah damlaiin kum thum leh ha guup vaan akikhaah a, gam pumpi a kial nasatah atun laiin Israel gam ah meithai tampi aum uhi;
42004026	ahiinlah Sidon gam a Sarepta khua a meithainu khat kawmah chihlouh a lahva koima kawmah Elijah sawl ahi sih hi.
42004027	Huleh zawlnei Elisha damlai in Israel gam ah phaah tampi aum uhi, hizongleh Syria mi Naaman chihlouh koimah suhsiangin aum sih uhi,” achi hi.
42004028	Huleh sinagog a um zousiah in hi thute ajaah tahun athangtawm mahmahta uhi.
42004029	Huin adingdoh va, Amah chu khua apatin adelhdoh va, a kho kawldawn va sawnkhiah diingin apui uhi.
42004030	Hizongleh Amah chu a lahvah kigelhmangin achiahta hi.
42004031	Huleh Amah chu Galili a khopi khat, Kapernaum ah ahung suh a, Sabbath nite in amahuh thu ahilh hi.
42004032	Huleh thuneitaha thu asoi jiahin a thuhilh chu limdang asa mahmah uhi.
42004033	Huleh sinagog ah dawi niin hagau nei mi khat aum a, huleh aw ngaihtahin akikou a,
42004034	“Ka tangun hung umsah in! Nazareth Jesu, nang leh kei un bang kizopna ahiai i neih? Keiuh sumang diinga hung na hi maw? Nang kua na hiai chih ka hung he hi, Pathian Misiangthou na hi,” achi hi.
42004035	Hizongleh Jesu’n ataai a, “Sip inla, a sung apatin hung pawt in,” achi hi. Huin dawi in amah chu a laai va asuhpuuh zohin a sung apatin ahung pawt a, amah asuna sih hi.
42004036	Huleh a bawnun limdang asa mahmah va, “Hikhu bang thu ahita ei! Ajiahchu thuneitah leh silbawltheitahin dawi niinte thu apia a, apawt mei uh,” chiin akihou uhi.
42004037	Huin hu kiim gam mun chin ah a tanchin athangta hi.
42004038	Huin Jesu’n sinagog apawtsan zohin Simon inn ah aluut a, hutah ah Simeon sungnu chu nasatahin anakhosih hi. Huchiin amahnu diingin anangetsah uhi.
42004039	Huin Jesu chu amahnu geiah ading a, khosih chu ataai a, huchiin khosih in anuse pahta hi. Huchiin ahung thou pah a, a nna uh atohsahta hi.
42004040	Huleh nitum kuan ahung hihin natna tuamtuam a anadamlou zousiah a kawmah ahung pui va; huin Ama’n atung chiat vah khut anga a, asudamta hi.
42004041	Huleh dawite zong, “Nang Khrist Pathian Tapa na hi!” chia kikouin mi tampite sung apatin ahung pawtdoh va, Ama’n amahuh ataai a, Khrist ahi chih aheet jiahun dawite haam diing Jesu’n aphal sih hi.
42004042	Huleh khua ahung vaahin apawt a, munsip ah achiah hi. Huin mipite’n Amah ahawl va, a kawmah ahung va, amahuh nuse lou diingin ahou uhi.
42004043	Hizongleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Pathian lalgam tanchinpha thu chu kho dang ah zong ka soi diing ahi; hu diing maha sawl ka hi him ahi,” achi hi.
42004044	Huleh Ama’n Galili gam a sinagogte ah thu asoi jeel hi.
42005001	Ni khat chu Pathian thu angaih theihna diingun mipite’n Jesu anoh va, Genesaret Diil geiah ading hi.
42005002	Diil geiah kuang nih um amu a, hizongleh ngamantute chu a kuang uh nusia a, a leente uh sawpin aum uhi.
42005003	Huleh Amah chu kuangte laha khat Simon a peen ah atuangdoh a, a kawmah piau gei apat themkhat tolh deuh diingin angeen hi. Huleh atou a, mipite chu kuang tung apatin thu ahilhta hi.
42005004	Ama’n thu asoi zohin Simon kawmah, “Lithuuh lam naih inla, nga man diingin na leente sep in,” achi hi.
42005005	Huleh Simon in adawng a, a kawmah, “Houtupa, jaan khovaahin gimtahin ka pang va, bangmah ka man sih uh; hizongleh na thu in leen chu ka sep diing hi,” achi hi.
42005006	Hichu abawl zohin, nga tampi akhuh kha va, a leen chu keeh diingin akisa hi.
42005007	Huleh kuang danga tou, a lawite uh hunga amahuh panpih diingin akhutjaap va, huin amahuh ahung va, kuang tegeel chu asudim uhi. Huchiin tum diingin akisa hialta hi.
42005008	Simon Peter in hikhu amuhin Jesu keengbul ah apuuh a, “Lalpa, hung chiahsan in, ajiahchu kei misual ka hi,” achi hi.
42005009	A nga matdoh uh amah leh a lawmte’n limdang asah mahmah jiahun ahi;
42005010	huleh Simon kithuahpihte Zebedi tate Jakob leh Johan in zong limdang asa mahmah uhi. Huin Jesu’n Simon kawmah, “Lau sin, tu apatin mihing na manta diing,” achi hi.
42005011	Huleh a kuangte luuipang a ahung tawldoh zohun, bangkim anusia va Amah ajuita uhi.
42005012	Huin Jesu khopi khat a aum laiin, en in, mi khat a pumtanga phaah aum a, ama’n Jesu amuhin leisiin abohkhup a, “Lalpa na uut inchu, na hung susiang thei hi,” chiin angeen hi.
42005013	Huin Ama’n a khut a zamin, amah chu akhoih a, “Ka uut hi, siangta in,” achi hi. Huin a phaah in thakhatin anuse pah hi.
42005014	Huleh Ama’n koimah hilh lou diingin thu apia a, “Hizongleh vachiah inla, siampu kawmah vakilah inla, huleh na sian thu mite heetsahna diingin Mosi thupiaah bangin na sianna diingin sil valaan in,” achi hi.
42005015	Hizongleh a tanchin chu athang nasa seem a, huleh mipi nasatah a thu ngaikhe diing leh a natna uh kisudamsah diingin ahung uhi.
42005016	Huleh Amah chu gamdaai ah achiah tuam a, ahaamteita hi.
42005017	Huleh ni khat chu thu ahilh laiin hichi ahung hi a, Galili leh Judia kho chinteng leh Jerusalem apat hung Pharisaite khenkhat leh daanjilsahtute khenkhat a kawmah atou va, amahuh suhdamna diingin Lalpa silbawltheihna chu Amah ah aum hi.
42005018	En in, mite’n jeng khat lupna in ahung jawng va, huleh ajawn luut theihna diingun leh a ma a akoih theihna diing angaihtuah uhi.
42005019	Mipi jiaha jawn luutna diing lampi amuh louh tahun inn tungah akaltou va, huleh inntung hawhkhiain a laitah ah Jesu ma ah a lupna toh akhaikhesuh uhi.
42005020	Huin Ama’n a ginna uh amuhin, a kawmah, “Lawm, na sualnate ngaihdam ahita,” achi hi.
42005021	Huin daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite’n, “Hi Pathian soisia koi ahiai? Pathian chauh loungaal koi in ahiai sual ngaidam thei?” chiin angaihtuah uhi.
42005022	Hizongleh Jesu’n angaihtuah uh aheetin adawng a, a kawmvah, “Bang diinga na lungsim va hitobang ngaihtuah na hi viai?
42005023	‘Na sualnate ngaihdam ahita,’ chih leh, ‘Thou inla, keeng in chiahta in,’ chih khoi abaihlam jaw ei?
42005024	Hizongleh Mihing Tapa in leitung ah sualnate ngaihdam theihna thuneihna anei hi chih na heetna diingun, hichu ka bawl ahi,” achi a, mijengpa kawmah, “Thou inla, na lupna la inla, na inn ah chiahta in, ka hung chi ahi,” achi hi.
42005025	Huleh a ma vah athoukhe pah a, a lupna ala a, Pathian paahtawi kawmin a inn lamah achiahta hi.
42005026	Huin a bawnun limdang asa mahmah va, Pathian apaahtawi va, huleh “Tuni’n sil limdangtah mei i mu uhi,” chiin alau mahmah uhi.
42005027	Huzouin Amah chu apawtkhia a, siahdonna mun a tou, a min Levi kichi siahdongtu khat amu hi. Huleh a kawmah, “Hung jui in,” achi hi.
42005028	Huin Levi in bangkim anusia a, athou a, Amah ajuita hi.
42005029	Huleh Levi in a inn ah Jesu diingin ankuang loupitah alui a, hutah ah chu siahdongtu tampi leh midang tampite’n ankuang auumpih uhi.
42005030	Hizongleh daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite chu a nungjuite tungah aphun va, “Bang diinga siahdongtute leh misualte toh ne a dawn khawm na hi viai?” achi uhi.
42005031	Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Michidamte’n daktor amamoh sih va, hizongleh damloute’n amamoh uhi.
42005032	Midihtatte kou diinga hung ka hi sih a, misualte kisiihsah diinga koua hung ka hijaw hi,” achi hi.
42005033	Huin amah un Jesu kawmah, “Johan nungjuite’n an angawl va huleh ahaamtei veu uh, huleh Pharisaite nungjuite’n zong huchibangmahin abawl uhi; hizongleh nang nungjuite’n bang diinga ne a dawn ahi viai?” achi uhi.
42005034	Huleh Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Moupa moupuite kawma aum laisiah moupuite an na ngawlsah thei viaimah?
42005035	Hizongleh moupa a lah vapat laahmang hun ahung tung diing a, hu ni chiangin angawl diing uhi,” achi hi.
42005036	Huin Ama’n a kawmvah tehkhinthu khat zong asoi a: “Koima’n puan thah apat athem kaikhiain puan lui aphoh ngei sih, phohta henla hileh puan thah akaihkeeh angai diing a, a thah them peen chu a lui toh akituaah sih diing hi.
42005037	Huleh koima’n uain thah chu savun thawl lui ah athun ngei sih. Thunta henla hileh, uain thah in savun thawl lui chu apawhkeehsah diing a, akibo diing a, huleh a thawlte zong asegawp diing hi.
42005038	Hizongleh uain thah chu savun thawl thah a thun diing ahi, huchiin anih un abit diing hi.
42005039	Mi koima’n zong uain lui adawn zoh nungin athah aduh pah ngei sih, ‘Alui mah tui jaw,’ achi veu uhi,” achi hi.
42006001	Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Sabbath ni masapeen zoha anihnapeen ni in Jesu chu buhlei lai ah apaisuaah hi. A nungjuite’n buhvui asihtan va, a khut va nuaiin ane uhi.
42006002	Pharisai khenkhatte’n a kawmah, “Bangjiaha Sabbath ni a bawl phallouh na bawl uh ahiai?” achi uhi.
42006003	Huleh Jesu’n adawng a, “David in agilkial laia a kawma umte toh asilbawl sim kha lou na hi viaimah?
42006004	Pathian inn ah aluut a, Pathian kawma alat zousa uh tanghou chu ane hi. Daan in siampute loungaal in neeh phallouh achih chu ama’n ane a, huleh a kawma umte zong apia hi,” achi hi.
42006005	Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Mihing Tapa chu Sabbath ni Lalpa zong ahi,” achi hi.
42006006	Sabbath ni dang khat in Jesu chu sinagog ah aluut a, thu ahilh hi. Hutah ah mi khut jeng khat ana-um hi.
42006007	Daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite’n aheehna diing amuh theihna diingun, Sabbath ni a asuhdam leh asuhdam louh aensim uhi.
42006008	Hizongleh Ama’n angaihtuah uh ahe a, khut jengpa kawmah, “Thou inla dingdoh in,” achi hi. Huin amah chu athou a adingdohta hi.
42006009	Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Sil khat ka hung dong diing hi, Sabbath ni a sil hoih bawl asiang ei, ahihlouhleh sil hoihlou bawl? Hinna hutkhiah asiang ei, ahihlouhleh suhlup?” achi hi.
42006010	A kiim a umte zousiah aenveel a, hupa kawmah, “Na khut zandoh in,” achi hi. Ama’n huchiin abawl a, a khut chu alang khat lam bangin adamta hi.
42006011	Himahleh amahuh chu alungthah mahmah va, Jesu tunga bang bawl diing ahiai chiin khat leh khat akihouta uhi.
42006012	Ni khat chu Jesu taang ah haamtei diingin achiah a, Pathian kawmah jaan khovaahin ahaamtei hi.
42006013	Huin khua ahung vaah phetin a nungjuite akou a, a lah vapat sawmlenih ateel a, a min uh zong apostolte ahisah hi:
42006014	Simon, Ama’n Peter zong achih leh a sanggampa Andru, Jakob leh Johan, Philip leh Bartholomai,
42006015	Mathai leh Thomas, Alphai tapa Jakob, huleh Simon Zelot achih uh,
42006016	huleh Jakob tapa Juda, huleh amansahtu Juda Iskariot zong ahi uhi.
42006017	Huleh Jesu chu amahuh toh akitonsuh a, mun jaang ah ading a, huleh a nungjui tampite toh, hutah a thungai diing leh a damlouhnate uh suhdama um diing uutin Judia gam zousiah leh Jerusalem apat leh tuipi geia Tura leh Sidon lam apat a kawmah mipi nasatah ahung paikhawm uhi.
42006018	Huleh hagau niinte’n asuhgentheihte zong ahung va, Ama’n asudam veh hi.
42006019	Amah apat silbawltheihna apawt jiaha amahuh zousiah asuhdam jiahin mipite zousiah in Amah khoih auut uhi.
42006020	Huin a nungjuite aen a, hichiin achi hi: “Nanguh migentheite na hampha uhi, ajiahchu Pathian lalgam nanguh a ahi.
42006021	Nanguh tua gilkialte na hampha uhi, ajiahchu taisaha um diing na hi uhi. Nanguh tua kapte na hampha uhi, ajiahchu nui diing na hi uhi.
42006022	Mihing Tapa jiaha mite’n ahung muhdah va, ahung delhdoh va, ahung housiat va, huleh na min uh chu migilou banga anual chiangun na hampha uhi.
42006023	Hu ni in kipaah unla, nuamin kidiang un, ajiahchu ngai un, vaan a na kipaahman uh aloupi hi. Ajiahchu huchibangmahin a pulepate un zawlneite anabawl uhi.
42006024	Hizongleh nanguh mihausate na tunguh agih hi, ajiahchu nang un nopsahna a bawnin na kimuh zouta uhi.
42006025	Nanguh tua gilvahte na tunguh agih hi, ajiahchu kial diing na hi uhi. Nanguh tua nuite na tunguh agih hi, ajiahchu maaua kap diing na hi uhi.
42006026	Mi zousiah in ahung phat chiangun na tunguh agih hi, ajiahchu huchibangmahin a pulepate un zawlnei tahloute anaphat uhi.
42006027	“Hizongleh nanguh ka thu ngaikhete kawmah ka hung hilh ahi: Na meelmate uh lungsiat unla, ahung mudahte hoih bawl un.
42006028	Haansia hung lohte vangpiaah unla, ahung simmoh bawlte diingin haamteisah un.
42006029	Na ngeiphe hung behsahtu kawmah a langkhat lam zong doh in. Huleh na puannaah tual uh hung laahsahtu kawmah na puannaah nuai uh alaah zong nial sih un.
42006030	Na kawmva hung ngeen photmah kawmah pia unla, huleh na thuampua uh hung laahsahtu kawmah ngeen kiit nawn sih un.
42006031	Huleh mi’n na tungva abawl diinga na deih bang ngeeiun, nang un zong amahuh tungah bawl un.
42006032	Ajiahchu nanguh hung lungsiatte chauh na lungsiat uh leh, bang paahtaat na loh diviai? Misualte’n zong amahuh lungsiatte alungsiat uhi.
42006033	Huleh na tungva hoihte tung chauha na hoih uh leh, bang paahtaat na loh diviai? Ajiahchu misualte’n zong huchibangmahin abawl uhi.
42006034	Huleh muh kiit na kinepnate uh kawm chauha na thunglaahsah uh leh, bang paahtaat na loh diviai? Ajiahchu misualte’n zong azah mah muh kiit diingin misualte kawmah athunglaahsah uhi.
42006035	Hizongleh nang un chu na meelmate uh lungsiat unla, hoihbawl unla huleh bangmah muhkiit kineem louin thunglaahsah un. Huchileh na kipaahman uh aloupi diinga Tungnungpeen tate na hi diing uhi. Ajiahchu kipaahnataang heloute leh migiloute tungah Amah aching hi.
42006036	Hujiahin na Pa uh mizahngaithei ahih bangin, nanguh zong zahngaithei un.
42006037	“Mi demse sih un, huchiin demsiatin na um sih diing uhi. Mohpaih sih un, huchiin mohpaihin na um sih diing uhi. Ngaidam un, huchiin ngaihdamin na um diing uhi.
42006038	Pia un, huchiin piaahin na um diing uh; hoihtaha tehin, sawndetin, lohhalin pia un, huchiin adimleetin na aangsung vah piaahin na um diing uhi. Ajiahchu na tehna bangbangun mite’n ahung tehsah kiit diing uhi,” achi hi.
42006039	Huleh hi tehkhinthu zong a kawmvah asoi hi: “Mittaw in mittaw mah apui thei diai? Puita henla hileh, anih va kokhuuh a kekhawmta lou diing ahi viaimah?
42006040	Nungjui chu a houtupa tungah aum ngei sih hi, hizongleh mi chin hoihtaha jilsaha um chu a houtupa bang ahung hi diing hi.
42006041	Bang diinga na mit a singtum ngaihtuah lou a, na unau mit a niinthem um muthei na hiai?
42006042	Nangmah mit a singtum mulou pi a na unaupa kawma, ‘Unaupa, na mit a niinthem um hung lakhesah in,’ bangchidaana chithei na hiai? Nang milepchiah, na mit a singtum um chu lakhe masa in. Huchiangin na unaupa mit a niinthem laahkhiah diing chu chiangtahin na mu thei diing hi.
42006043	“Ajiahchu singkung hoih a gah ase ngei sih a, huleh singkung sia in zong gah hoih asuang thei boh sih hi.
42006044	Ajiahchu singkung chin a gah a heet ahi, ajiahchu mi’n lingkung ah theipi alou ngei sih va, huleh lingnoh lahah zong grep alou ngei sih uhi.
42006045	Mihoih in a lungtang goubawm hoih apatin sil hoih ahung suahkhia hi. Huleh migilou in a lungtang goubawm sia apatin sil hoihlou ahung suahkhe veu hi. Ajiahchu lungtang a dimleet chu a kam in asoi ahi.
42006046	“Huleh nang un bang diinga ka soite bawl lou a, ‘Lalpa, Lalpa,’ hung chi na hi viai?
42006047	Koipouh ka kawma hung a, ka thusoite ja a, huleh jui chu bangtobang mi ahi viai chih ka hung ensah diing hi.
42006048	Amah chu inn bawlmi, lei thuuhtaha tou a, suangpi tunga innbul lem toh kibang ahi. Huleh tui ahung leetin tui khauh in hu inn chu ahung khoh a, suangpi tunga bawl ahih jiahin asuliing but sih hi.
42006049	Hizongleh ja ngaal a, juilou chu innbul kiptah lemlou a, leitung mei a innbawlmi bang ahi; huchu tui khauh in ahung khoh a apuuh pah hi. Huleh hu inn asiatdaan chu anasa ngeel hi,” achi hi.
42007001	Huleh Jesu’n hi thute zousiah mipite kawma asoi zohin, Kapernaum ah aluut hi.
42007002	Huin sepaih zahoutu koiaha khat suaah deihtah chu damlouin asi dehdeh hi.
42007003	Huin ama’n Jesu tanchin ajaah tahin a kawmah ahung a, a suaahpa hung sudam diinga ngeen diingin Juda upate Amah kawmah asawl hi.
42007004	Jesu kawm avatun tahun naahtahin angetsah va, amah chu hi sil na bawlsah taah ahi,
42007005	“Ajiahchu ama’n ka nam uh angaina a, ka sinagog uh zong ahung bawlsah hi,” achi uhi.
42007006	Huin Jesu chu amahuh toh ahungta a, inn apat gamlalou ahung geiin, hu sepaih zahoutu’n a kawmah a lawite asawl a, “Lalpa kisugim nuam dah mei in, ajiahchu ka innsung na hung luut diing chu keimah in ka chin sih hi.
42007007	Hujiahin kei zong na kawma hung taahin ka kingai sih hi. Hizongleh a thu in soi lehchin ka suaahpa chu adam mei diing hi.
42007008	Ajiahchu kei zong mi thuneihna nuaia um ka hi a, ka nuaiah sepaihte aum va, khat kawma, ‘Chiah in,’ ka chih leh achiah a, huleh adang kawma, ‘Hung in,’ ka chih leh ahung a, huleh ka suaahpa kawma, ‘Hi bawl in,’ ka chih leh abawl jeel hi,” chiin.
42007009	Jesu’n hi thute ajaah tahin, amahpa chu limdang asa mahmah a, huleh akinunghei a, mipi Amah juite kawmah, “Na kawmvah ka soi ahi, Israelte lah ngeei ah zong hichilawma ginna haat ka mu kha sih,” achi hi.
42007010	Huin a mi sawlte chu inn lamah achiah kiit va, suaah damloupa chu damin amuta uhi.
42007011	Huleh ajiingni in Jesu chu Nain kichi khopi khat ah achiah a, a nungjuite tamtah leh mipi tampite’n Amah ajui uhi.
42007012	Huleh Amah chu khopi kotkhaah kawm ahung tunin, en in, misi khat ahung jawngdoh va, a nu tapa neihsun ahi. Amahnu chu meithai ahi a, huleh hu khua a mipi tampi a kawmah aum uhi.
42007013	Lalpa’n amahnu amuh tahin ahehpih mahmah a, huchiin a kawmah, “Kap sin,” achi hi.
42007014	Huin ahung a, a haan kuang chu akhoih a, a jawngtute chu adingta uhi. Huin Ama’n, “Tangvaal thou in, ka hung chi ahi,” achi hi.
42007015	Misi chu ahung toudoh a, ahung haamta hi. Huin Ama’n amah chu a nu kawmah apeta hi.
42007016	Huin mi zousiah ahung lauta va, Pathian apaahtawi va, “I lahvah zawlnei loupitah ahung suaahta,” huleh “Pathian in a mite ahung vehta ahi,” chiin.
42007017	Huleh hi tungtaang thu chu Judia gam pumpi leh a kiimveel gam zousiah ah athangsuaahta hi.
42007018	Huin Johan nungjuite’n hi thu zousiah Johan ahilh uhi.
42007019	Huin Johan in a nungjuite laha mi nih akou a, Jesu kawmah asawl a, “Ahung diingpa na hiaimah? Ahihlouhleh midang ngaah nalai diing ka hi viaimah?” chiin.
42007020	Hute chu a kawm ahung tunun, “Baptistu Johan in, ‘Ahung diingpa na hiaimah? Ahihlouhleh midang ngaah nalai diing ka hi viaimah?’ chia na kawma ahung sawl ka hi uh,” achi uhi.
42007021	Hulai ngeeiin Ama’n mi tampi, damloute, hiiveite, dawimatte asudam a, huleh mittaw tampite mit asuhvaahsah hi.
42007022	Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Chiah unla, na sil muh uh leh na jaahte uh Johan vahilh un: mittawte mit avaahta a, keengbaite apai theita va, mi phaahte asiangta va, bilngongte’n khua ajata va, misite kaihthohin aumta va, huleh migentheite kawmah tanchinpha soiin aumta hi.
42007023	Huleh koipouh keimah a kipalpuuh lou chu ahampha hi,” achi hi.
42007024	Huleh Johan mi sawlte apai nungun Ama’n mipite kawmah Johan tungtaang thu asoi panta a, “Bang en diinga gamdaai a chiahdoh na hi viai? Sialluang huih muut liing maw?
42007025	Ahihlouhleh bang en diinga chiahdoh na hi viai? Puan neem silh mi khat maw? Ngai un, puan loupi silh leh minuamsate chu kumpi inn ah ahi aum uh.
42007026	Ahihlouhleh bangpeen en diinga chiahdoh na hi viai? Zawlnei maw? Ahi, ka hung chi ahi, zawlnei saanga loupijaw ahi.
42007027	‘En in, ka thangkou na ma ah ka sawl a, ama’n na ma ah na lampi asial diing,’ chia a tungthu kigial chu amah ahi.
42007028	“Numei sung apat piang lahah Baptistu Johan saanga loupijaw, zawlnei aum sih hi. Hizongleh Pathian lalgam a mineupeen zong amah saangin aloupijaw hi, chih ka hung hilh ahi,” achi hi.
42007029	Huleh mipi zousiah leh siahdongte’n hi thu ajaah tahun Pathian siam atan uhi, ajiahchu Johan khut a baptisma tang ahi uhi.
42007030	Hizongleh Pharisaite leh daansiamte’n Johan baptisma apom louh jiahun Pathian in amahuh diinga alemguatsah chu anualta uhi.
42007031	Huin Lalpa’n, “Hi khang a mite bang toh ka tehkhin diai? Huleh bang tobang ahi viai?
42007032	Amahuh chu dawlmun a tou naupang, khat leh khat kikou tuah a, ‘Theile hung muutsah ung a, lah laam lou uh chin a; huleh kahla sa ung a, lah kapin na hung maau pih sih uh,’ kichite bang ahi uhi.
42007033	Ajiahchu Baptistu Johan chu ahung in an ane sih a, uain zong adawn sih a; huleh nang un amah chu ‘Dawi nei ahi,’ na chi uhi.
42007034	Mihing Tapa ahung a, nein adawn a, nang un, ‘En un, an haipa leh uain haipa, siahdongtute leh misualte lawmpa!’ na chi jeel uhi.
42007035	Hizongleh pilna chu a tate zousiah in siam atan uhi,” achi hi.
42007036	Pharisaite laha khat in Amah toh an neehkhawm auut hi. Huin Amah chu Pharisaipa inn ah aluut a, ankuang ah atouta hi.
42007037	En in, hu khopi a um numei sual khat in Jesu Pharisaipa inn ah an nein atou chih aheetin alabaster buuh in thau gimtuui ahung tawi hi.
42007038	A nung ah a keeng bul ah kap kawmin ading a, Jesu keengphaangte chu a mittui in asukawt a, a sam in asiaah hi. A keengpeeh atawp a, thau gimtuui anuh hi.
42007039	Huleh Amah chialtu Pharisaipa in hikhu amuh tahin a lungsim in, “Hi Pa, zawlnei ahihleh hi akhoihnu koi ahi a, huleh bangchibang mi ahiai chih he leh kilawm a, amah lah misual ahi ngaala,” achi hi.
42007040	Huchiin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Simon, na kawmah soinuam khat ka nei hi,” achi hi. Huin ama’n, “Houtupa, soi in,” achi hi.
42007041	“Huleh sum thunglaahsahtu koiaha khat in leibatu nih anei a, khat in dinari za ngaa aba a, huleh khat in sawmngaa aba hi.
42007042	Aditna diing aneih louh tahun anihun angaihdam tuaahta hi. Hujiahin hung hilh in, a lahva koijaw in amah alungsiat naah jaw diai?” achi hi.
42007043	Simon in adawng a, “Angaihdam tamjawpa hi diingin ka gingta hi,” achi hi. Huin Ama’n a kawmah, “Na chi dih hi,” achi hi.
42007044	Huzohin Ama’n numeinu lam anga a, Simon kawmah, “Hi numeinu na mu ei? Na inn sungah ka hung luut a, nang ka keeng silna diing tui na hung pe sih a, hizongleh amahnu’n a mittui in ka keengpeeh asil a, a sam in asiaah hi.
42007045	Nang chu tawp zong na hung tawp sih a, hizongleh hi numeinu’n chu ka hung luut apatin ka keengpeehte tawp akhawl nai sih hi.
42007046	Nang in ka lu sathau na hung nuh sih a, hizongleh hi numei in chu ka keengpeehte thau gimtuui ahung nuh hi.
42007047	Hujiahin ka hung hilh ahi, a lungsiat naah mahmah jiahin a sualna tampi chu ngaihdam ahita hi. Hizongleh tawm ngaihdamnate’n alungsiat tawm uhi,” achi hi.
42007048	Huin Ama’n numeinu kawmah, “Na sualte ngaihdam ahita,” achi hi.
42007049	Amah toh ankuang a toukhawmte’n a lungsim un, “Sualnate ngeei zong ngaidam, Hi Pa hi koi ahiai?” achi uhi.
42007050	Huin Ama’n numeinu kawmah, “Na ginna in ahung hundamta hi, hamuangtahin chiahta in,” achi hi.
42008001	Hute zohin Jesu’n thusoi kawm leh Pathian lalgam tanchinpha soi kawmin khopi leh khotate atuansuaah hi. Huleh sawmlenihte chu a kawmah aum uhi.
42008002	Huleh numei hunkhop dawipaai damkiit leh natnate apat damkiit a kawmah aum va, Mari Magdalini achih uh, a sung apat dawi sagih pawtdohna nu toh.
42008003	Huleh Herod innsung enkoltu Chuza ji Joanna toh, Susanna toh huleh midang tampite toh ahi va, hute’n chu a silneihsa un Amah nna atohsah jeel uhi.
42008004	Huleh mipi nasatah ahung paikhawm va, huleh khopi chin a mi Amah kawma ahung tahun tehkhinthu in asoi hi:
42008005	“Haichithehtu khat chu haichi thehin akuan a, huleh atheh laiin khenkhat lampi geiah atu a, huchu akituanchil a, tungleeng vate’n atom beita hi.
42008006	Khenkhat suang tung ah atu a, a lei anom louh jiahin, ahung pou patpat in agawgawp pahta hi.
42008007	Khenkhat chu louling lahah atu a, ling toh ahung pou khawm a, ling in adeepmangta hi.
42008008	Huleh khenkhat chu lei hoih ah atu a, ahung pou a, aleh za in agahta hi,” achi hi. Huleh hi thute asoi zohin akikou a, “Koipouh jaahna diinga bil nei in ja heh,” achi hi.
42008009	Huleh a nungjuite’n, “Hi tehkhinthu hi bangchihna ahiai?” chiin Amah adong uhi.
42008010	Huin Jesu’n, “Pathian lalgam thukiphualte chu nanguh diinga heet phal ahi a, hizongleh midang kawmah chu tehkhinthu a soi ahi; huchibanga ‘Amuh va atheihsiam louhna diingun, huleh ajaah va aheetsiam louhna diingun,’ achi hi.
42008011	“Hu tehkhinthu hilhchetna chu hih ahi: Haichi chu Pathian thu ahi.
42008012	Lampi geia tute chu thu jatute ahi va; huin diabol chu ahung a, agintaat va hutdama aum louhna diingun, thu chu a lungtang vapat alamang hi.
42008013	Suang tunga tute chu hichibangte ahi uh, ajaah tahun thu chu kipaahtahin apom uhi. Huleh hite’n chu zung anei sih va, tomkhat sung agingta va, heemna atuaah chiangun apuuh veu uhi.
42008014	Huleh louling laha tute chu hichibangte ahi uh: thu ajaah nungun achiah va, khosah diing daan ngaihtuahnate, hauhsatnate leh damsung nopsahnate’n adeepmangta a, agah piching ngei sih uhi.
42008015	Hizongleh lei hoih a tute chu hichibangte ahi uhi: lungtang siangthou leh hoih in thu chu aja va, apom va, huleh kuhkaltahin gah asuang uhi.
42008016	“Mi koimah in thaumei adet chiangin kuang akhuhkhum ngei sih, ahihlouhleh lupna nuaiah zong akoih ngei sih hi. Hizongleh aluut photmah in amuh theihna diingin atunna ah akoih jaw hi.
42008017	Ajiahchu kiphuang lou diinga seel bangmah aum sih a, huleh heet louh diing leh kilang lou diinga phual zong bangmah aum sih hi.
42008018	Hujiahin bangchiin ahiai na jaah uh pilvaang un. Ajiahchu koipouh anei chu piaahbeh ahi diing a; huleh koipouh aneilou chu neia akingaih nasan zong laahsah ahi diing,” achi hi.
42008019	Hulaiin a nu leh a sanggamte chu Amah mu diingin ahung va, huleh mipi jiahin a kawm atung thei sih va,
42008020	“Na nu leh na sanggamte nang hung mu nuamin inn pua ah ading uh,” chiin koiaha in ahilh hi.
42008021	Huin Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Ka nu leh ka sanggamte chu Pathian thu ngaikhia a juite ahi uh,” achi hi.
42008022	Ni khat chu a nungjuite toh kuang ah atuang a, Ama’n a kawmvah, “Diil gaal lehlam ah i kaai diing uh,” achi hi. Huin akitawlta uhi.
42008023	Hizongleh akitawl laiun Amah chu aihmuta a, huleh hu diil tungah huihpi ahung nungsuh a, a kuang vah tui ahung luutta a, lauhhuai ah aumta uhi.
42008024	A nungjuite a kawma hungin aphawng va, “Houtupa, Houtupa, beimang diing ka hita uh,” achi uhi. Huin Amah chu ahung thou a, huih leh tui kinawh chu ataai a, huin akhawlta va, ahung daaita hi.
42008025	Huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Na ginna uh khoia um ahiai?” achi hi. Amah un chu lauin limdang asa mahmah va, “Hi Pa hi bangtobang mi hi ahiai? Ajiahchu huih leh tui nasan thu apia a, amang mei uh!” akichi uhi.
42008026	Galili gaal jawna um Gadara mite gam ah akitawl luut uhi.
42008027	Huleh gam a akaaidoh tahun hun sawtpi dawi anapaai koiaha khat in khopi apat Amah anakituaahpih hi. Ama’n chu puan asilh sih a, huleh inn mawngmawng ah zong aum sih a, haan munte lahah aum veu hi.
42008028	Ama’n Jesu amuh tahin akikou a, a ma ah apuuh a, aw ngaihtahin, “Jesu, Pathian Tungnungpeen Tapa, kei leh nang in bang kizopna i nei ei? Hung sugim lou diingin ka hung ngeen ahi,” achi hi.
42008029	Ajiahchu Ama’n hagau niin chu hi pa sung apat pawt diingin thu anapeta hi. Tampivei dawi niin in amah chu amankhata a, khainiang leh kol buhsahin aum hi. Huleh ama’n a kikaannate chu aphutan a, gamdaai ah dawi puimangin aum veu hi.
42008030	Huleh Jesu’n a kawmah, “Na min bang ahiai?” chiin adong hi. A sunga dawi tampi aluut jiahin, ama’n “Legion,” achi hi.
42008031	Huleh dawite’n kokhuuh thuuh a chiah diinga thu pelou diingin Amah angeen uhi.
42008032	Hu mun ah taang ah voh hon tampi ataa va, amah un hute sunga aluut uh phalsah diingin angeen uhi. Huleh Ama’n aphalsah hi.
42008033	Huin dawite chu hu mipa sung apat pawtin voh hon sungah aluut uhi. Voh hon chu diil lamah munkeen ah ataaisuh hut-hut va, tui ah akelumta uhi.
42008034	Huin voh chingtute’n sil umdaan amuh tahun ataai va, hi thu khopi leh khoneute ah avasoi uhi.
42008035	Huin bang thu ahita ei chih en diingin ahung pawt va, huleh Jesu kawm ahung tun tahun dawi in anuutsiatpa chu puan silh a, lungsim ngeina pua a hoihtaha Jesu keengbul a tou amu va, huleh alauta uhi.
42008036	Huleh amute’n dawimatpa suhdama ahung umdaante amahuh anahilh uhi.
42008037	Huin Gadara gam kiimveel a mi zousiah in alau mahmah jiahun Amah chu a kawm vapat chiahmang diingin angeen uhi. Huin Amah chu kuang sungah aluut a, amahuh anuseta hi.
42008038	Huleh a sung apat dawite hung pawtnapa in chu Amah kawma aum theihna diingin angeenta hi. Hizongleh Jesu’n amah chu asawlkhia a,
42008039	“Na inn ah chiah kiit inla, Pathian in nang diinga bangchituha sil loupi hung bawlsah ahita eimah, chih vaphuang in,” achi hi. Huin amah chu achiahta a, Jesu’n sil loupitah amah diinga abawlsah chu khopi pumpi ah ataangkoupihta hi.
42008040	Huleh Jesu chu ahung kinunglehkiit in mipite’n Amah nasatahin anakipaahpih uhi, ajiahchu a bawnva Amah anangaah zing ahi uhi.
42008041	Huleh en in, pasal khat a min Jaira kichi sinagog a vaihawmtu ahung a, huleh Jesu keengbul ah akhupboh a, a inn a chiah diingin angeen hi.
42008042	Ajiahchu ama’n tanu khat chauh kum sawmlenih veel diing anei a, amah chu laitatin alum hi. Hizongleh hichia Jesu achiah tahin mipite’n atuam hut-hut uhi.
42008043	Huleh numei khat kum sawmlenih sipawt, aneih zousiah daktorte kawma zang beita a, hizongleh koima’n asuhdam zohlouh uh aum hi.
42008044	Huin Jesu nung ah ahung pai a, a puan mong akhoih a, huin thakhatin a sipawt chu akangta hi.
42008045	Huin Jesu’n, “Koi ahiai ahung khoih?” achi hi. Mi zousiah in kei ka hi sih achih chiat phetun, Peter leh a lawite’n, “Houtupa, mihonpi in hung tuam a, hung neh huthut a, ‘Koi ahiai ahung khoih?’ na chih” achi uhi.
42008046	Jesu’n, “Koiaha khat in ahung khoih hi, ajiahchu silbawltheihna kei apatin apawt hi chih ka he hi,” achi hi.
42008047	Huin numeinu’n akiphual theihlouh amuh tahin kiliing pumin ahung a, a ma ah apuuh a, mipi zousiah maai ah a kawmah akhoih nasan leh ahung dam pah daan aphuangta hi.
42008048	Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Tanu, kipaahtahin um in, na ginna in ahung damsahta hi, hamuangtahin chiahta in,” achi hi.
42008049	Ama’n huchia asoi laiin, sinagog vaihawmtupa inn apatin mi khat ahung a, “Na tanu asita hi. Houtupa suhbuai nawn dah mei in,” achi hi.
42008050	Hizongleh Jesu’n hi thu ajaah tahin adawng a, a kawmah, “Lau sin, gingta mei in, huchiin amahnu chu adamdoh kiit diing,” achi hi.
42008051	Huleh inn sunga aluut tahin Peter, Jakob, Johan leh naupangnu nulepa chihlouh koimah luut aphal sih hi.
42008052	A bawnun amahnu kahin anamaau jeenjuun va, hizongleh Ama’n, “Kap sih un, amahnu asi sih hi, a-ihmu ahijaw,” achi hi.
42008053	Huin amah un amahnu asita chih aheet jiahun Amah chu anuihsan uhi.
42008054	Huleh Ama’n a bawnun asawldoh veh a, amahnu chu a khut in atu a, “Naupangnu, thou in” chiin akou hi.
42008055	Huin a hagau ahung kiit a, athoudoh pai a, huin amahnu chu neeh diing pe diingin thu apia hi.
42008056	A nulepa’n limdang asa mahmah va, hizongleh hu sil kibawl chu koimah hilh lou diingin Ama’n amahuh akhapta hi.
42009001	Huzohin Jesu’n a nungjui sawmlenihte akoukhawm a, dawi zousiah tunga silbawltheihna leh thuneihna, huleh natnate suhdam theihna apia hi.
42009002	Huleh amahuh chu Pathian lalgam thu soi diing leh damloute sudam diingin asawldohta hi.
42009003	Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Na zinna diingun chiang aha, sakhau aha, tanghou aha, sum aha bangmah keng sih un; huleh puannaah thuah nih nei sih un.
42009004	Na luutna inn vah tungden unla, huleh hu apatin kipankhia un.
42009005	Mi ahung kipaahpih lou photmah chu hu khopi apat na pawt chiangun amahuh heetsahna diingin na keengtaw va leivui thingkhia un,” achi hi.
42009006	Huin achiahta va, tanchinpha soi kawm leh mun chin a mite sudamin akhua akhua ah achiahta uhi.
42009007	Hu hun laiin gambung vaihawmtu Herod in Jesu silbawl zousiah anaja a, alungjiingta hi, ajiahchu khenkhat in Johan chu misi lah apat kaihthoha um ahita achi uhi.
42009008	Khenkhat in, Elijah ahung kilaah ahita achi uhi. Huleh midangte’n malai zawlneite khat hung thou kiit ahita achi uhi.
42009009	Herod in, “Johan lah a ngawng tanta ing a, hizongleh hichilawma a thu ka jaah hi koi ahita ei?” achi hi. Huchiin Amah chu muh auutta hi.
42009010	Huleh apostolte’n ahung kiit tahun asilbawl zousiah uh Amah ahilh uhi. Huin Jesu’n amahuh apui a, Bethsaida kichi kho geia munsip khat ah achiah tuampih hi.
42009011	Mipite’n huchu aheet tahun Amah ajuita va, huleh Ama’n amahuh anakipaahpih a, a kawmvah Pathian lalgam thu ahilh a, suhdam ngaite asudam hi.
42009012	Huin nitum kuan ahung hihin sawmlenihte chu ahung va, a kawmah, “I kiimveel a khopi leh khoneute a chiah a, giahna leh neeh diing hawl diingin mipite sawlkhia in; ajiahchu hia munsip khat a um i hi uhi,” achi uhi.
42009013	Hizongleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Nang un neeh diing pia un,” achi hi. Amah un, “Mipi hijaat zoujaai neeh diing i valeisah louh leh, tanghou ngaa leh nga nih chauh loungaal bangmah i nei sih uh,” achi uhi.
42009014	Ajiahchu amahuh mi saang ngaa veel ahi uhi. Huin Ama’n a nungjuite kawmah, “Sawmngaa jeelin ahon hon in tousah un,” achi hi.
42009015	Huleh amah un huchiin abawl va, a bawnun atousahta uhi.
42009016	Huin Amah in hu tanghou ngaa leh nga nih chu ala a, vaan lam entouin avangpiaah a, abalkeeh a, a nungjuite kawmah mipite ma a lui diingin apia hi.
42009017	Huleh ane va, avah chiat uhi. Huleh aneehvaal uh aneng bawm lian sawmlenih aluaah dim uhi.
42009018	Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Jesu angena ahaamtei laiin a nungjuite’n Amah avazop va, huin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Mipite’n kei hi koi ahi ahung chi viai?” chiin adong hi.
42009019	Amah un adawng va, “Baptistu Johan ahi, ahung chi uh, hizongleh khenkhat in, Elijah ahi, ahung chi uh; huleh adangte’n, zawlnei malai-ate laha khat hung thou kiit ahi, ahung chi uh,” achi uhi.
42009020	Ama’n a kawmvah, “Ahihleh nang un kei koi ka hi na hung chi viai?” achi a, Peter in adawng a, “Pathian apat Khrist chu na hi,” achi hi.
42009021	Huin Ama’n hu thu chu koimah hilh lou diingin amahuh thu apia a;
42009022	“Mihing Tapa’n chu sil tampi athuaah ngeei diing hi; upate leh siampu lalte leh daanjilsahtute’n anual diing va, athat diing va, huleh ni thum ni in kaihthohin aum diing hi,” chiin.
42009023	Huleh Ama’n a bawnva kawmah, “Mi koipouh in ahung juih nuam inchu, amah leh amah kiheetmohbawlin ni chin in a kros puain hung jui heh.
42009024	Ajiahchu koipouh a hinna huumbit tumin ataan diing a, hizongleh keimah jiaha a hinna taan in ahuumbit diing hi.
42009025	Ajiahchu mi’n khovel apumin nei henla, amah kisusiain ahihlouhleh kisumang leh, amah diingin bang aphatuam diai?
42009026	Hujiahin mi koipouh keimah leh ka thute zumpih chu Mihing Tapa’n a loupina toh, a Pa loupina toh, huleh angel siangthoute loupina toh ahung chiangin amah chu azumpih diing hi.
42009027	Hizongleh thutah ka hung hilh ahi, hia dingte khenkhat Pathian lalgam amuh masiah uh sihna chiam lou diing aum uh,” achi hi.
42009028	Huleh hite asoi nung ni giat diing bangin Ama’n Peter leh Johan leh Jakob apui a, taang ah haamtei diingin achiah uhi.
42009029	Ahaamtei laiin a meel umdaan ahung limdangta a, a puansilhte chu avaam a, ate selsel hi.
42009030	Huleh ngai in, mi nih Amah toh akihou va, hute chu Mosi leh Elijah ahi uhi.
42009031	Amahuh chu loupina in ahung kilaah va, hi khovel Ama’n apaisan diing thu asoi va, huchu Ama’n Jerusalem ah asubukim diing hi.
42009032	Hizongleh Peter leh a kawma umte chu a ihmut uh asuaah mahmah a, huleh ahung halh tahun, Jesu loupina leh a kawma ding mi nihte amuta uhi.
42009033	A kawm akipat apaikhiah laiun, bang ahiai asoi zong helouin, Peter in Jesu kawmah, “Houtupa, eiuh diingin hitaha um ahoih hi, puanbuuh thum i lam diing va, nang a diing khat, Mosi a diing khat, huleh Elijah a diing khat,” achi hi.
42009034	Huchia asoi laiin meilum ahung kaai a, amahuh ahung khuh a, huleh meilum laha aluut phetun alauta uhi.
42009035	Huleh meilum lah apatin aw ahung ging a, “Hichu ka Tapa deihtah ahi; a thu ngai un,” chiin.
42009036	Huleh aw adaih tahin Jesu chauh muhin aumta hi. Huin asip vengveng va, hulaiin a sil muhte uh koimah ahilh sih uhi.
42009037	Huleh ajiingni a taang apat ahung suh tahun mipi nasatahin Amah analamtuaah uhi.
42009038	Huleh en in, mipi lah apat mi khat hung kikouin, “Houtupa, ka hung ngeen ahi, ka tapa en in, ka tapa neihsun ahi ngaala.
42009039	Ngai in, hagau khat in aman a, thakhat khatin akikoudoh a, huleh chilphuan bo khopin abawlgim veu hi. Naahpiihtaha susidupin anuse veu hi.
42009040	Na nungjuite kawmah delhdoh diingin ka ngeen a, adelhdoh thei sih uhi,” achi hi.
42009041	Huin Jesu’n adawng a, “Ginna neilou leh khang paisual aw, bangtan ahiai ka hung umpih a, huleh ka hung thuaahtheih diing? Na tapa hitah ah hung pui in,” achi hi.
42009042	Huleh amah chu ahung pai laiin dawi in anasupuuh a asibup hi. Huin Jesu’n hagau niin chu ataai a, naupang chu asudam a, a pa kawmah apeta hi.
42009043	Huleh a bawnun Pathian silbawltheihna loupina chu limdang asa mahmah uhi.
42009044	“Hi thu kisoite na bil sungvah luut heh, ajiahchu Mihing Tapa chu mite khut a matsaha um pah diing ahi,” achi hi.
42009045	Hizongleh amah un hi a thusoi chu ahe sih uh, aheet siam louh diingva iim ahih jiahin; huleh a thusoi tungtaang Amah dot diing lah alau uhi.
42009046	Huin a lahva koi ahiai lianpeen diing chia kinialna ahung neita uhi.
42009047	Hizongleh Jesu’n a lungtang va angaihtuah uh ahe a, naupangneu khat akai a, a kawmah adingsah a,
42009048	a kawmvah, “Mi koipouh ka min a hi naupang saang chu kei hung saang ahi; huleh kei hung saang chu ahung sawlpa saang ahi. Ajiahchu na bawnva laha neupeen chu alianpeen diing,” achi hi.
42009049	Huin Johan in adawng a, “Houtupa, mi khat na min a dawite nohdoh ka mu va, ka hung juihna va atel louh jiahin ka khapta uh,” achi hi.
42009050	Hizongleh Jesu’n a kawmah, “Amah chu khap sih un, ajiahchu ei hung doulou photmah chu ei lama pang ahi,” achi hi.
42009051	Huin hichi ahung hi a, puitouha aum diing hun atunin Ama’n Jerusalem a chiah diing atum tintenta hi.
42009052	Huleh a ma ah mi asawl masa a, huchiin amahuh chu anachiahin Amah diinga guatsa diama anakoih diingin Samariate khua khat ah aluut uhi.
42009053	Huleh amah un Jerusalem lama chiah ahih jiahin anakipaahpih sih uhi.
42009054	A nungjuite Jakob leh Johan in hi aheet tahun, “Lalpa, Elijah bawl bangin amahuh kaangmang diingin vaan apatin mei koukhe lei hoih na sa diai?” achi uhi.
42009055	Hizongleh Amah chu akihei a, amahuh ataai a, “Bangchibang hagau po mi na hih uh kihelou na hi uh.
42009056	Ajiahchu Mihing Tapa chu mihingte hinna suse diinga hung hilouin hundam diinga hung ahijaw hi,” achi hi. Huin kho dang ah achiahta uhi.
42009057	Huleh lampi a achiah laiun mi khat in a kawmah, “Lalpa, na chiahna phot ah ka hung jui diing,” achi hi.
42009058	Huleh Jesu’n a kawmah, “Si-aalte’n kua anei va, tungleeng vate’n buuh anei uh; hizongleh Mihing Tapa’n a lu ngahna diing mun anei sih,” achi hi.
42009059	Huleh Ama’n midang khat kawmah, “Hung jui in,” achi hi. Hizongleh ama’n, “Lalpa, vachiah a, ka pa vavui hung phalsah masa phot in,” achi hi.
42009060	Jesu’n, “Misite’n a misi uh kivui uh heh; hizongleh nang chu chiah inla Pathian lalgam thu mun chin ah vasoi in,” achi hi.
42009061	Huleh midang khat in zong, “Lalpa, ka hung jui diing; hizongleh ka inn a mite kampha in hung vahasah masa phot in,” achi hi.

42010001	Hi silte nungin Lalpa’n midang sawmsagih zong aguat a, Amah ngeei hungna diing khopi chin leh mun chin ah a ma ah nih nih in asawl hi.
42010002	Hujiahin Ama’n a kawmvah, “Buh laah diing atam mahmah a, hizongleh a natongtute atawm uhi; hujiahin buh la diinga natongtute hung sawldoh diingin buh neitu Lalpa kawmah ngeen un.
42010003	Chiah unla, ngai un, ngei hon laha belaamnoute bangin ka hung sawl hi.
42010004	Dangka-ip aha, sakhau aha, keengtophah aha keng sih unla, huleh lampi ah koimah chibai buuh sih un.
42010005	“Inn na luutna phot vah amasapeenin, ‘Hi inn ah hamuanna tung heh,’ chi un.
42010006	Hu a hamuanna taah aum leh, na hamuanna uh chu a tungah aum diing a, aum louh leh, na kawmvah ahung kihkiit diing hi.
42010007	Hu inn ah um zing unla, ahung piaah phot uh nein dawn un, ajiahchu natongtu chu loh mutaah ahi. Inn khat apat inn khat ah tuan lehleh sih un.
42010008	“Khopi na luut na phot va ahung na kipaahpih uh leh, na ma va alui photmah uh ne un.

42010011	‘Na kho leivui ngeei uh ka keengtaw va baang nasan nanguh kalhna in ka thingkhia uhi. Ahihvaangin Pathian lalgam na kawm naih uh ahung tungta, chih he un,’ chi un.
42010012	Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, hu Ni chianga hu khopi thuaah diing saangin Sodom khopi thuaah diing chu adaan aum jaw diing hi.

42010014	Hizongleh vaihawm ni chiangin nanguh thuaah saangin Tura leh Sidon thuaah diing chu adaan aum jaw diing hi.
42010015	Huleh nang Kapernaum vaan tana paahtawia um diinga kisa, Misi Khua ah paihkhiahin na um diing hi.
42010016	Koipouh na thusoi uh ngai chu kei thu ngai ahi uh; koipouh nanguh hung nual chu kei hung nual ahi uh; huleh kei hung nual chu ahung sawlpa nual ahi uh,” achi hi.
42010017	Huleh sawmsagihte chu kipaahtahin ahung tung kiit va, “Lalpa, na min jaalin dawite nasan ka thu un aum uhi,” achi uhi.
42010018	Ama’n a kawmvah, “Setan vaan apat a kawlphe banga hung kia ka mu hi.
42010019	Ngai un, guulte leh mom-aaite totdeen theihna leh meelma silbawltheihna zousiah tungah thuneihna ka hung pia hi, huleh bangmah in ahung suna het sih diing hi.
42010020	Hizongleh dawite na thuthu va aum jiahun kipaah sih unla, hizongleh vaan a na min uh gelh ahih jiahin kipaah jaw un,” achi hi.
42010021	Hu hun laitahin Jesu chu Hagau in akipaah a, “Aw Pa, vaan leh lei Lalpa, nangma’n mipil leh misiamte kawmah hi thute na iim a, naungeehte kawma na phuan jiahin ka hung paahtawi hi. Ahi Pa, huchibang chu na kipaahna mahmah ahi.
42010022	Ka Pa’n sil zousiah ka kawmah ahung pekheta hi. Tapa koi ahiai chih Pa loungaal koima’n ahe sih, huleh Pa koi ahiai chih Tapa leh a kawmva Tapa’n aphuan nuamnate loungaal koima’n ahe sih,” achi hi.
42010023	Huin Ama’n a nungjuite lam anga a, aguuhin, “Na sil muhte uh muhna mitte ahampha hi;
42010024	ajiahchu ka hung hilh ahi, zawlnei tampi leh kumpi tampite’n na sil muhte uh muh anauut va, hizongleh amu sih uh; huleh na jaahte uh zong jaah anauut va, hizongleh aja sih uhi,” achi hi.
42010025	Huchiin en in, daansiam mi khat adingdoh a, Amah jeetna in, “Houtupa, kumtuang hinna ka neih theihna diingin bang ahiai ka bawl diing?” achi hi.

42010027	Ama’n adawng a, “ ‘LALPA na Pathian chu na lungtang zousiah a, na hagau zousiah a, na haatna zousiah a, huleh na lungsim zousiah a na lungsiat diing ahi,’ huleh ‘nangmah na kilungsiat banga na innveengte zong na lungsiat diing ahi,’ chiin,” achi hi.

42010031	Huin siampu khat hu lampi ah achiah suh a, amah amuh tahin lampi gei langkhat ah apeelta hi.

42010033	Hizongleh Samariami khat khualzin lai chu hupa umna mun ahung tung a, amah amuh tahin alungsiat mahmah hi.

42010036	Tuin hi mi thumte lahah a koipeen chu gutate tuaahpa innveeng hi diingin na ngaihtuah ei?” achi hi.

42011001	Huleh hichi ahung hi a, mun khat a Jesu ahaamtei laiin, ahaamtei zohin a nungjuite khat in a kawmah, “Lalpa, Johan in a nungjuite ahilh bangin haamtei daan hung hilh in,” achi hi.
42011002	Ama’n a kawmvah, “Na haamtei chiangun, ‘Ka Pa uh vaan a um, na min kizahtaat heh. Na lalgam hung tung heh. Na deihjawng vaan a akibawl bangin lei ah zong kibawl heh.
42011003	Ka ni teng neehkhop uh ni chinin hung pia in.
42011004	Ka leibate uh ka ngaihdam bangun, ka sualnate uh hung ngaidam in. Heemna ah hung puiluut sinla, huleh giloupa apat hung hunkhe jaw in,’ chi un,” achi hi.

42011006	ajiahchu ka lawmpa khualzin ka kawmah ahung a, a ma ah lui diing bangma ka nei sih hi,’ vachi a;
42011007	huphet-a a lawmpa’n inn sung apat a, ‘Hung subuai sin, kot khaah ahita a, ka tate zong ka kawmah lupna ah alumta uhi. Hung thouin ka hung pe thei sih,’ chia anadawng, lawm khat nei kua ahiai?
42011008	Ka hung hilh ahi, a lawm ahih jiaha vathoua vape diing hi sih mahzongleh, anget teeiteei jiahin thouin adeih zahzah avape diing hi.
42011009	“Ka hung hilh ahi, ngeen un, piaahin na um diing uh; hawl un, na mu diing uh; kiu un, honsahin na um diing uhi.
42011010	Ajiahchu angeen taphot in atang va, ahawl taphot in amu va, huleh akiu taphot chu honsahin aum diing hi.
42011011	“Na lahva pa koiaha a tapa in tanghou ngeen leh, kuan ahiai suang pe diing? Ahihlouhleh nga ngeen leh, nga luangin guul ape diaimah?
42011012	Ahihlouhleh aahtui ngeen leh mom-aai ape diaimah?

42011014	Huleh Ama’n dawi haam theilou khat anohdoh a, huleh hichi ahung hi a, dawi apawt phetin haam theiloupa chu ahung haamta hi; huchiin mipite’n limdang asa mahmah uhi.
42011015	Hizongleh a lahva khenkhat in, “Dawimangpa Beelzebul jaala dawite anohdoh ahi,” achi uhi.
42011016	Adangte’n Amah je-etna in vaan apatin chiamchihna angeen uhi.
42011017	Hizongleh Amah in, angaihtuah uh aheetin a kawmvah, “Lalgam kilangkhena amah leh amah kidou photmah, amangthaai veu a, huleh innsung khat zong kilangkhena akidou leh, apuuh veu hi.
42011018	Setan zong amah leh amah akikhen leh, bangchiin a lalgam ading thei diai? Beelzebul vaihawmna jaala dawite nohdoh ahi na hung chi ngaalva.
42011019	Huleh ke’n Beelzebul jaala dawite nohdoh ka hih leh, na tapate un koi jaala anohdoh uh ahiai? Hujiahin amahuh chu nanguh hung vaihawmsah diingte ahi uhi.
42011020	Hizongleh ke’n Pathian khut zung vaanga dawite ka nohdoh ahihleh, Pathian lalgam na tungvah ahung tung tahzet ahi.

42011023	Koipouh ka lama pang lou chu ahung dou ahi a, huleh koipouh ahung laahkhawmpih lou in chu asudalh ahi.
42011024	“Hagau niin chu mi khat sung apat apawtkhiahin tui um louhna mun chin ah khawlna diing hawlin avaah lehleh a; huin amuh louh phetin, ‘Ka pawtna inn mah ah ka chiah kiit mei diing,’ achi hi.
42011025	Huleh hutah ahung tunin phiat sianga zep hoiha um amu hi.

42011029	Huleh mipi ahung kikhop khawm laiun Ama’n a kawmvah thu asoi a, “Hi khang chu khang giloutah ahi uhi. Chiamchihna ahawl va, hizongleh zawlnei Jonah chiamchihna loungaal chiamchihna dang piaah ahi sih diing uhi.
42011030	Ajiahchu Jonah Ninevi kho mite diinga chiamchihna ahih bangin Mihing Tapa zong hi khang a diingin chiamchihna ahi diing hi.
42011031	Simlam kumpinu chu vaihawm ni chiangin hi khang a mite toh ahung thou diing a, siamlouh atangsah diing hi, ajiahchu Solomon pilna ngaikhe diingin kawlmong apat ahung hi. En un, Solomon saanga loupijaw hitah ah aum hi.
42011032	Ninevi kho mite chu vaihawm ni chiangin hi khang a mite toh athou diing va, siamlouh atangsah diing uh, ajiahchu Jonah thusoi jiahin amahuh akisiih uhi. En un, Jonah saanga loupijaw hitah ah aum hi.
42011033	“Mi koima’n thaumei avaah chiangin mun kiphual ahihlouhleh loh nuaiah akoih ngei sih uh; ahung luutte’n avaah amuh theihna diingun, thaumei tunna ah akoih jaw uhi.
42011034	Sapum vaahna thaumei chu mit ahi. Hujiahin na mit ahoih chiangin na sapum zong a bawnin avaah suaah hi. Hizongleh na mit ahoih louh chiangin na sapum zong amial veh hi.

42011036	Hujiahin na tahsa pumpi avaah a, a mialna mun aum louh leh, thaumei vaahtahin ahung taanvaah bangin avaah suaah veh diing hi,” achi hi.

42011040	Nanguh mingol haw, apolam siamtu’n a sung lam zong siamlou ahiaimah?

42011050	Khovel siam chiil apat a kisuah zawlnei zousiah sisan phuba chu hi khang tungah phuut theih ahi diing hi.
42011051	Abel sisan kisuah apat maitaam leh Pathian biahinn kikaal a kithat Zakaria sisan tanin. Chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, hi phuba chu hi khang tungah akila diing hi.
42011052	“Nanguh daansiamte, na tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu nang un heetna chabi lamangin nanguh lah na luut sih va, mi aluut diingte lah na khaam veu uhi,” achi hi.
42011053	Huleh Ama’n hi thute asoi laiin daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite’n Amah chu thu tampi soisah tumin hahphinin aphin panta uhi.

42012001	Huchih laiin mipi simseenglouh, khat leh khat kituanchil khop hiala ahung kikhop laiun, Jesu’n amasapeenin a nungjuite ahoupih a, a kawmvah, “Pharisaite tol lahah kiveeng un, huchu lepchiahna ahi.
42012002	Kilang lou diinga kiphual bangmah aum sih a, huleh heetlouh diinga iim zong bangmah aum sih hi.
42012003	Hujiahin mial a na soi photmah uh vaah ah jaahin aum diing a, huleh innsung tawng a bilbul a na soi uh chu inntungvuumte ah taangkoupihin aum diing hi.
42012004	“Huleh nanguh ka lawmte aw, ka hung hilh ahi, tahsa that theia huzohchianga bangmah dang bawltheih nei nawnloute lau sih un.
42012005	Hizongleh koi ahiai na lau diing uh, ka hung hilh lawh diing hi: Athah nunga zong gawtmun a paihtheihna thuneitupa Amah chu lau un; ahi, ka hung hilh ahi, Amah chu lau un.
42012006	Kawlgiit ngaa paisa nih in ajuaah veu sih viaimah? Ahiinlah a lahva khatmah zong Pathian ma ah mangngilhin aum sih hi.
42012007	Ahi, na lutung va samjangte nasan sim veh ahi. Hujiahin lau sih un, kawlgiit tampi saangin na luuljaw uhi.
42012008	“Ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh mite ma a kei hung gum photmah chu Mihing Tapa in zong Pathian angelte ma ah amah agum diing hi.
42012009	Hizongleh mite ma a kei hung kiheetmohbawl chu Pathian angelte ma ah kiheetmohbawlin aum diing hi.
42012010	Koipouh Mihing Tapa kalha thusoi chu ngaihdam ahi diing a, hizongleh koipouh Hagau Siangthou kalha soisia chu ngaihdamin aum sih diing hi.
42012011	“Huleh nanguh sinagogte ah leh thukhentute leh thuneitute ma a ahung pui tahchiangun bangchia bang thu in ka dawng diai, ahihlouhleh bang ka soi diai chiin lunghimoh sih un.
42012012	Ajiahchu Hagau Siangthou in ahuntahin na soi diing uh ahung hilh diing hi,” achi hi.

42015020	Huin athou a, a pa kawmah ahungta hi. Huleh gamlapi a aum laiin a pa’n anamu a, alainat mahmah a, ataai a, angawng kawi a, atawpta hi.
42015021	Huin a tapa’n a kawmah, ‘Pa aw, vaan leh nangmah mitmuhin sil ka bawl sualta hi. Na tapa chihtaah zong ka hi nawn sih,’ achi hi.
42015022	“Hizongleh a pa’n chu a suaahte kawmah, ‘Puan hoihpeen hung ladoh unla, silhsah un, a khut ah zungbuh butsah unla, a keeng ah keengtophah butsah un.
42015023	Huleh bawngnou vaahthau hung la unla that un. Huchiin i ne diing va, kipaahtahin i um diing uhi;
42015024	ajiahchu hi ka tapa chu asi a, ahung hing kiitta hi; amang a, akimu kiitta hi,’ achi hi. Huchiin kipaahtahin alawm uhi.
42015025	“Hizongleh a tapa upajaw chu lou ah aum a, inn ahung tun kuanin sil tumging leh laamthawm ajata hi.
42015026	Huin a suaahte khat akou a, hite bang ahita ei chiin adong hi.

42016001	Huleh Ama’n a nungjuite kawmah hi thu zong asoi a, “Mihausa koiaha in neihlelam enkoltu khat anei hi. Amahpa’n a neihlelam amawh thaangzat sah chiin a kawmah aheeh uhi.
42016002	Huin amah chu akou a, a kawmah, ‘Na tungthu ka jaah hi bangchi ahiai? Na neihlelam kol hisaap hung pia in, ajiahchu neihlelam enkoltu a pang nawn lou diing na hi,’ achi hi.
42016003	“Huin neihlelam koltupa’n a lungsim in, ‘Bangchi diing ka hita diai? Ka pu in lah ka mohpuaahna hung tawpsah diing ahita hi. Lei lah tou zou lou ing a, khutdoh diing lah ka zum hi.
