43001003	Sil zousiah Amah tungtawna siam ahi a, silsiam himhim Amah siam louh bangmah aum sih hi.
43001004	Amah ah hinna aum a, hu hinna chu mihingte vaahna ahi.
43001005	Vaah chu mial ah ahung vaah a, mial in huchu ahe sih hi.
43001006	Pathian apat a sawl mi khat aum a, a min chu Johan ahi.
43001007	Mi zousiah in amah jaala agintaat theihna diingun hu Vaah heetpih diingin amah chu heetpihtuin ahung hi.
43001008	Amah chu hu Vaah ahi sih a, hizongleh hu Vaah heetpihtu diinga sawl ahijaw hi.
43001009	Huchu Vaah dihtah, khovel a hung mi zousiah hihvaahtu ahi.
43001010	Amah chu khovel ah aum a, khovel Amah siam ahi, hizongleh khovel in Amah ahe sih hi.
43001011	Amah chu a mite kawmah ahung a, Amah chu a mite’n anapom sih uhi.
43001012	Hizongleh Amah anapom photmahte chu a kawmvah Pathian tate hihtheihna diing thuneihna apia hi, Amah min gingtate chu:
43001013	hute chu sisan a piang ahi sih va, tahsa deihdaan a piang zong ahi sih va, mihing deihdaan a piang zong ahi het sih uh, hizongleh Pathian deihdaan a piang ahijaw uhi.
43001014	Huleh Thu chu tahsa ahung hi a, i lahah aum hi. Pa ta khat neihsun loupi bangin, a loupi jia i mu uhi, Amah chu hehpihna leh thutah a dim ahi.
43001015	Johan in Amah thu heetpihin, a kikou a, “Amah ahi, ‘Ka nunga hung paipa chu ka ma a um mawng ahih jiahin kei saangin adeihhuaijaw hi,’ chia a thu ka soipa chu,” achi hi.
43001016	Amah bukimna apat hehpihna tunga hehpihna i tang chiat uhi.
43001017	Ajiahchu daan chu Mosi zanga piaah ahi a, hizongleh hehpihna leh thutah chu Jesu Khrist jiahin ahung um hi.
43001018	Koima’n bangchihmahin Pathian amu ngei sih; Tapa tang neihsun, Pa aang sunga umpa in Amah chu ahilhchianta hi.
43001019	Huleh hichu Judate’n Jerusalem apat siampu leh Levi mite, “Koi na hiai?” chia dong diinga asawl laiva Johan theihchetna ahi.
43001020	Huleh amah chu ki-iim louin akiphuang a, “Khrist chu ka hi sih” chiin akiphuang hi.
43001021	Huin amah un, “Ahihleh koi na hiai? Elijah na maw?” chiin adong uhi. Ama’n, “Ka hi sih” achi hi. “Hu Zawlneipa na hiaimah?” achi va, ama’n “Hilou” chiin adawng hi.
43001022	Huin amah un a kawmah, “Ahung sawlte ka dawn theihna diingun hung hilh in. Koi na hiai? Nang leh nang koi kichi na hiai?” achi uhi.
43001023	Ama’n, “Kei chu Zawlnei Isai in asoi banga, ‘“LALPA lampi sial tang un,” chia gamdaai a kikou aw chu,’ chia asoipa chu ka hi” achi hi.
43001024	A mi sawlte uh chu Pharisaite laha mi ahi uhi.
43001025	Huleh amah adong va, a kawmah, “Khrist lah hilou, Elijah lah hilou, hu Zawlnei lah hilou na hih leh, bang diinga na baptis ahiai?” achi uhi.
43001026	Johan in amahuh adawng a, “Ke’n chu tui ah ka baptis a, hizongleh na heetlouh uh khat na lahvah ading hi.
43001027	Amah ahi ka nunga hung paipa, kei saanga deihhuai jawpa chu ahi a, a keengtophah khau suut taah zong ka hih sih hi,” achi hi.
43001028	Hu silte chu Jordan gaala Bethani a, Johan in abaptisna mun a siltung ahi.
43001029	Ajiingni’n Johan in Jesu a kawm lama hung amu a, “En un, Pathian Belaamnou khovel sualna pomangpa chu!
43001030	Hichu ahi, ‘Ka nung ah Mi khat ahung pai a, ka ma a um mawng ahih jiahin kei saangin alianjaw hi,’ chia ka na Soipa chu.
43001031	Ke’n Amah ka na he sih hi. Hizongleh Israelte kawma akisuhlat theihna diingin tui a baptis in ka hung ahi,” achi hi.
43001032	Huleh Johan in a thu aheetpih a, “Hagau vakhu banga vaan apat hung kumsuh a, a tunga tuangden ka mu hi.
43001033	Ke’n Amah ka na he sih a, hizongleh tui a baptis diinga hung sawlpa Amah mah in ka kawmah, ‘Koi tungah zong Hagau hung kumsuh a, a tunga tuangden na muh peenpeen, Amah chu Hagau Siangthou a baptis diingpa chu ahi,’ ahung chi hi.
43001034	Huchu ka mu a, Hi Pa chu Pathian Tapa ahi chih ka heetpih hi,” achi hi.
43001035	A jiing kiit in Johan chu a nungjuite nih toh ading a,
43001036	huleh Jesu lampai lai amu a, “En un, Pathian Belaamnou!” achi hi.
43001037	Hu nungjui nihte’n a thusoi aja va, Jesu ajuita uhi.
43001038	Huin Jesu akihei a, ahung juih uh amuh in a kawmvah, “Bang ahiai na hawl uh?” achi hi. Amah un a kawmah, “Rabbi”, (huchu Houtupa chihna ahi) “khoiah ahiai na teen?” achi uhi.
43001039	Ama’n a kawmvah, “Hung unla en un,” achi hi. Huin amahuh chu ahung va, a teenna aen va, huleh a kawmah hu ni aum uhi, daah sawmna ahih jiahin.
43001040	Johan thusoi ja, Jesu jui tegeel laha khat chu Simon Peter sanggampa Andru ahi.
43001041	Ama’n amasapeenin amah ngeei sanggampa Simon amudoh a, a kawmah, “Messiah” (huchu Khrist chihna ahi) “kichipa chu ka muta uh,” achi hi.
43001042	Huleh Andru in Simon chu Jesu kawmah ahung pui a, Jesu’n amah aen a, “Nang chu Jonah Tapa Simon na hi a, Kepha ahung kichita diing hi,” achi hi (huchu Suang, chia let ahi).
43001043	Huleh ajiingni’n Jesu’n Galili gam ah chiah atum a, Philip amu a, a kawmah, “Hung jui in,” achi hi.
43001044	Philip chu Andru leh Peter teenna khopi Bethsaida a teeng ahi.
43001045	Philip in Nathanael amu a, a kawmah, “Mosi in Daan Lehkhabu a a tungtaang anagelh leh Zawlneite Lehkhabute in anagelh uh Nazareth Jesu, Joseph tapa chu ka muta uh,” achi hi.
43001046	Huin Nathanael in a kawmah, “Nazareth apatin sil hoih apiang thei eimah?” achi hi. Philip in a kawmah, “Hung en in,” achi hi.
43001047	Jesu’n Nathanael a kawm lam juana hung amu a, a kawmah, “En un, heembawlna neilou Israel mitah chu,” achi hi.
43001048	Huin Nathanael in a kawmah, “Bang na hung chi heet ahiai?” achi hi. Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Philip in nang ahung kouh main, theipi kung nuaia na um laiin ka hung mu hi,” achi hi.
43001049	Nathanael in adawng a, a kawmah, “Rabbi, Pathian Tapa na hi, Israelte Kumpipa na hi,” achi hi.
43001050	Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “‘Theipi kung nuaiah ka hung mu,’ na kawma ka chih jiaha gingta na hi maw? Hi silte saanga loupijaw na hung mu diing hi,” achi hi.
43001051	Huleh Jesu’n a kawmah, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, tu apatin vaan kihonga Pathian angelte Mihing Tapa tunga kal leh kum na muta diing uhi,” achi hi.
43002001	Huleh ni thum ni’n Galili gam a Kana ah kiteenna khat aum a, hutah ah chu Jesu nu aum hi.
43002002	Huleh Jesu leh a nungjuite zong kiteenna ah chial ahi uhi.
43002003	Huleh uain ahung kitaahsap tahun Jesu nu in a kawmah, “Uain anei nawn sih uh,” achi hi.
43002004	Jesu’n a kawmah, “Numei, nang hung heetsah diing bang aum ei? Ka hun atung nai sih hi,” achi hi.
43002005	A nu’n suaahte kawmah, “Ama’n na kawmva asoi photmah bawl un,” achi hi.
43002006	Huleh Judate tawndaan dungjuia kisuhsiangthouna suangtuibeel guup, litar sawmsagih leh guup apat za leh sawmleli dawl akitung hi.
43002007	Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Tuibeelte ah tui sungdim un,” achi hi. Huin beelngawng tan chiatin asung dim uhi.
43002008	Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Tuin thaal unla, gualvaah vaihawmtu kawmah tawi un,” achi hi. Huchiin amah un atawi uhi.
43002009	Gualvaah vaihawmtu’n uain hung suaah chu achepin khoi apat hung um ahih ahe sih a (ahihvaangin suaah tui thaalte’n chu ahe va), gualvaah vaihawmtu in moupa chu akou a,
43002010	a kawmah, “Mi chin in achiil in uain hoih asungkhia va, huleh tamdeuh ahung dawn nung chiangun ahoihloujaw atungkhia uhi. Nang in chu tutanphain uain hoih na koih nalai hi,” achi hi.
43002011	Hi chiamchihna kipatna chu Jesu’n Galili gam a Kana a abawl ahi a, Amah loupi daan asulang hi. Huleh a nungjuite’n Amah agingta uhi.
43002012	Huzohin Amah chu Kapernaum ah achiahsuh a, Amah toh, a nu toh, a sanggamte toh, huleh a nungjuite toh hutah ah ni bangzah aha khat ataam uhi.
43002013	Huleh Judate Chiahkaan Kuut ahung naita a, Jesu chu Jerusalem ah achiah tou hi.
43002014	Huleh Pathian biahinn a bawngtal leh belaam leh vakhu juaahte leh sumhengtute tou chu amu hi.
43002015	Huin jeepna khauhual abawl zohin Pathian biahinn apatin belaamte leh bawngtalte anohdoh veh a; huleh sumhengtute dangka asunbuaahsah a, a dohkaan uh asawnpuuhsah hi.
43002016	Huleh Ama’n vakhu juaahte kawmah, “Hi silte hitah apatin lamang un! Ka Pa inn sumdawnna inn in bawl sih un!” achi hi.
43002017	Huin a nungjuite’n, “Na inn a diinga ka phatuamngaihna in ahung ne zouta,” chih gelh chu ahung hedoh uhi.
43002018	Hujiahin Judate’n adawng va a kawmah, “Hi silte bawl theihna diingin thuneihna na nei hi chih etsahna diingin chiamchihna bang ahiai na hung muhsah theih?” achi uhi.
43002019	Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Hi Pathian biahinn chu susia un, ni thum sungin ka tung ding kiit diing,” achi hi.
43002020	Hujiahin Judate’n, “Kum sawmli leh guup hi Pathian biahinn bawlna in aluut a, nang in ni thum sungin na tung ding kiit diing maw?” achi uhi.
43002021	Ahihvaangin Ama’n hu biahinn chu a tahsa asoina ahi.
43002022	Hujiahin misi lah apat Amah athoh kiit nungin, a nungjuite’n a kawmvah hi thute asoita ngeei ahi chih ahung hedohta va; huin Pathian Lehkhathu leh Jesu thusoi agingtata uhi.
43002023	Hizongleh Chiahkaan Kuut Jerusalem a aum laiin chiamchihna abawlte amuh tahun, mi tampite’n a min agingta uhi.
43002024	Hizongleh Jesu chu a kawmvah akituluut nuam sih hi, ajiahchu Ama’n mi zousiah ahe a;
43002025	huleh Ama’n mihing sunga um aheet jiahin mihing thu koimah hilhchet akiphamoh sih hi.
43003001	Pharisaite laha mi, a min Nikodem kichi, Judate vaihawmtu khat aum hi.
43003002	Amah chu jaan in Jesu kawmah ahung a, a kawmah, “Rabbi, Pathian apat a thuhilhtu diinga hung na hi chih ka he uhi; ajiahchu Pathian a kawma aum louh leh, na chiamchihna silmah bawlte koima’n abawl thei sih diing,” achi hi.
43003003	Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mi koipouh in apian thah louh leh, Pathian lalgam amu sih diing hi,” achi hi.
43003004	Nikodem in a kawmah, “Mi ateeh nungin bangchiin apiang thei diai? A nu sunga luutkiitin apiang thei diing maw?” achi hi.
43003005	Jesu’n adawng a, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mi koipouh tui leh Hagau apat apian louh leh, Pathian lalgam ah aluut sih diing hi.
43003006	Tahsa a piang phot chu tahsa ahi a, Hagau a piang photmah chu hagau ahi.
43003007	‘Na pian thah ngeeingeei diing ahi,’ chia na kawma ka soi limdangsa sin.
43003008	Huih a uutna pouh ah anung a, a gin na ja a, hizongleh khoi apat a hung a, khoilama chiah diing chih na he sih hi. Koipouh Hagau a piang phot chu huchibang ahi,” achi hi.
43003009	Nikodem in adawng a, a kawmah, “Hi silte bangchiin ahi thei diai?” achi hi.
43003010	Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Israelte houtu na hi a, hi silte na he sih maw?
43003011	Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, kei un chu ka heet uh ka soi va, ka muh uh ka hesah uhi, hizongleh nang un ka thu heetsah uh na pom sih uhi.
43003012	Leitung silte ka hung hilh bawn gingta lou na hih uh leh, vaan lam silte hung hilh leng bangchiin na gingta diviai?
43003013	Vaan apat hung kumsuh Mihing Tapa vaan a um chihlouh kuamah vaan ah akal ngei nai sih hi.
43003014	Mosi in gamdaai a guul akhaikaang mahbangin Mihing Tapa zong khaikaangin aum ngeei diing hi.
43003015	Koipouh Amah gingta in abeimang louha kumtuang hinna aneih jawhna diingin.
43003016	Ajiahchu Pathian in khovel alungsiat mahmah a, huchiin a Tapa tangkhat neihsun apia, koipouh Amah gingta in abeimang louh a, hizongleh kumtuang hinna aneih jawhna diingin.
43003017	Ajiahchu khovel siamlouhtangsah diingin Pathian in a Tapa khovel ah asawl sih, hizongleh khovel Amah jaala hutdam ahih theihna diingin asawl jaw hi.
43003018	Amah gingta chu siamlouh tansahin aum sih; hizongleh agingta lou chu siamlouhtansah zoh ahita, Pathian Tapa tangkhat neihsun min agintaat louh jiahin.
43003019	Hichu siamlouhtanna ahi: vaah khovel ah ahung a, hizongleh a silbawlte uh agiitlouh jiahin mite’n vaah saangin mial alungsiat jaw uhi.
43003020	Ajiahchu koipouh sil gilou bawl in vaah ahaw veu va, huleh vaah ah zong ahung sih uh, huchilou inchu asil bawlte uh alang kha diing hi.
43003021	Hizongleh a silbawlte uh Pathian a bawl ahi chih alat theihna diingin, koipouh sildih bawl chu vaah ah ahung uhi,” achi hi.
43003022	Hi silte nungin Jesu chu a nungjuite toh Judia gam ah ahung va, hutah ah amahuh toh aum zing a, abaptis hi.
43003023	Huleh Johan in zong tui atam jiahin Salim kawm Ainon ah abaptis hi. Huleh mipite ahung va, baptisma atang uhi.
43003024	Ajiahchu hulaiin Johan chu suangkul ah khum ahi nai sih hi.
43003025	Huin Johan nungjuite leh Judate kikaal ah kisuhsiangthouna thu ah kinialna ahung umta hi.
43003026	Amahuh chu Johan kawmah ahung va, a kawmah, “Rabbi, Jordan gaal a na umpih, a tanchin na heetpihpa’n, ngai in, Ama’n baptisma abawl a, mi zousiah Amah kawmah ahung uh,” achi uhi.
43003027	Johan in adawng a, “Vaan apat a piaah ahih louh leh, mihing in bangmah anei thei sih hi.
43003028	‘Kei Khrist chu ka hi sih a,’ hizongleh ‘Amah ma a sawl ka hi jaw,’ ka chih khu nanguh mah in na hung heetpih uhi.
43003029	Mounu neipa chu moupa ahi a, hizongleh moupa lawmpa, a kawma ding a, a thu ngaikhia chu moupa aw jiahin nasatahin anuam hi. Huchiin hi ka nuamna chu abukimta hi.
43003030	Amah chu alian deuhdeuh diing a, kei chu ka kiamsuh diing hi.
43003031	Tunglam apat a hung chu sil bangkim tunga um ahi a; lei a piang chu leimi ahi a, huleh lei thu asoi veu hi. Vaan apat a hung chu sil bangkim tunga um ahi.
43003032	Huleh amuh leh ajaah chu Ama’n ahesah hi, huleh koimah in a thuheetsah apom sih uh.
43003033	Koipouh a thuheetsah pom in Pathian chu adih hi chiin anamdet hi.
43003034	Ajiahchu Pathian sawl in Pathian thu asoi veu hi, ajiahchu Pathian in Hagau chu teh detdetin ape sih hi.
43003035	Pa in Tapa alungsiat a, huleh a khut ah sil zousiah apeta hi.
43003036	Koipouh Tapa gingta in kumtuang hinna aneita. Koipouh Tapa nual in hinna amu sih diing a, hizongleh Pathian lungthahna a tungah aum zing hi,” achi hi.
43004001	Hujiahin Johan saangin Jesu’n nungjui asiam in abaptis tamjaw chih Pharisaite’n aja uh chih Lalpa’n aheet tahin,
43004002	(Ahihvaangin Jesu hial in chu abaptis sih a, a nungjuite’n abaptis jaw uhi,)
43004003	Judia gam anusia a, Galili gam ah achiah kiitta hi.
43004004	Huchiin Samaria gam tawna pai chu Amah diingin akuul hi.
43004005	Huin Amah chu Samaria khopi khat, Sykar achih uh, Jakob in a tapa Joseph kawma a mun piaah kawm ahung tungta hi.
43004006	Hutah ah Jakob tuitohdoh aum a, Jesu chu a khualzin gim jiahin tuitohdoh geiah atou a, huchu daah guupna veel diing ahi hi.
43004007	Huin Samaria numei khat tuitawi diingin ahung a, Jesu’n a kawmah, “Tui dawn diing hung pia in,” achi hi.
43004008	A nungjuite lah neeh diing leiin khopi ah achiahta ngaalva.
43004009	Samaria numeinu’n a kawmah, “Bangchidaana nang Judami in kei Samaria numei kawma tui dawn diing na hung nget ahiai?” achi hi. Ajiahchu Judate’n Samaria mite toh kizopna bangmah anei sih uhi.
43004010	Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Pathian silthawnpiaah leh na kawma, ‘Tui dawn diing hung pia in,’ chipa koi ahiai chih he lehchin jaw, nang in a kawma ngeen diing chin a, Ama’n nang tui hing hung pe diing hi a,” achi hi.
43004011	Numeinu’n a kawmah, “Pu, athaaldohna diing bangma na nei sih a, tuitohdoh lah athuuh ngaala. Khoi apatin ahiai tui hing na laah diing?
43004012	Ka pu uh Jakob in hi tuitohdoh ahung pia a, amah ngeei in zong adawn a, a tate leh a gangualte’n zong adawn va, amah saanga lianjaw na hiaimah?” achi hi.
43004013	Jesu’n amahnu adawng a, “Koipouh hi tuitohdoh dawn chu adangtaah kiit diing a;
43004014	hizongleh ke’n a kawma ka piaah diing tui dawn photmah chu bangchihtanin adangtaah sih diing uhi. A kawmva ka piaah diing tui chu tuinaah ahung hi diing a, kumtuang hinna phain akikhohdoh diing hi,” achi hi.
43004015	Numeinu’n a kawmah, “Pu, ka dang ataah louhna diing leh tuitawi diinga hitaha ka hung nawn louhna diingin, hi tui hung pia in,” achi hi.
43004016	Jesu’n amahnu kawmah, “Pai inla, na pasal va kou inla, hitah ah hung kiit in,” achi hi.
43004017	Huin amahnu’n adawng a, “Pasal ka nei sih,” achi hi. Jesu’n a kawmah, “‘Pasal ka nei sih,’ na chih chu na chi dih mahmah hi.
43004018	Ajiahchu pasal ngaa na neita a, tua na neih zong na pasal ahi sih, hi thu na soi dih hi,” achi hi.
43004019	Numeinu’n a kawmah, “Pu, zawlnei na hi chih ka hung he thei hi.
43004020	Ka pulepate un hi taang ah Pathian abe veu va, hizongleh nang un chu mite’n Pathian a biahna mun diing chu Jerusalem ahi na chi uh,” achi hi.
43004021	Jesu’n a kawmah, “Numei, hung gingta in, hi taang leh Jerusalem khel lou a Pa na biah hun uh hung tung diing ahita.
43004022	Nang un na heetlouh uh na bia uh; kei un chu ka biah uh ka he uh, ajiahchu hutdamna Judate a hung kipan ahi.
43004023	Hizongleh Pa chu abe tahtahte’n hagau leh thutah a abiah diing hun chu hung tung diing ahita, tuin zong atung zing ahi; ajiahchu huchibanga Pathian bemite Pa’n ahawl ahi.
43004024	Pathian chu Hagau ahi a, huleh abe mite’n hagau leh thutah a abiah diing uh ahi,” achi hi.
43004025	Numeinu’n a kawmah, “Messiah” (Khrist kichi) “ahung diing chih ka he hi. Amah ahung chiangin sil bangkim ahung hilh veh diing hi,” achi hi.
43004026	Jesu’n a kawmah, “Kei, na kawma thusoi chu Amah ka hi,” achi hi.
43004027	Huleh hulaitahin a nungjuite ahung tung va, numeinu akihoupih chu limdang asa mahmah uhi. Hizongleh koima’n, “Bang hawl na hiai?” ahihlouhleh, “Amahnu bang diinga na kihoupih ahiai?” achi sih uhi.
43004028	Huin numeinu’n a tuibeel ataaisan a, khopi ah achiah a mite kawmah,
43004029	“Ka sil bawl zousiah hung hilh thei Mi khat aum a, hung unla, hung en dihvua, Khrist hilou diing ahiaimah?” achi hi.
43004030	Huin amahuh chu khopi apat apawtdoh va, a kawmah ahungta uhi.
43004031	Huchihlaiin a nungjuite’n “Rabbi, an ne in,” achi uhi.
43004032	Hizongleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Nanguh heetlouh neeh diing an ka nei,” achi hi.
43004033	Hujiahin a nungjuite akihou va, “Koiaha in aneeh diing ahung tawisah diing adiai?” achi uhi.
43004034	Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Ka an chu ahung sawlpa deihjawng bawl leh a nna tohzoh ahi.
43004035	Nang un, ‘Ha li zoh chiangin buh laahhun ahung tung diing,’ na chi sih viaimah? Ngai un, ka hung hilh ahi, daah unla loute en un, laahhun in amin vehta hi.
43004036	Koipouh ala in loh amu a, atuhpa leh alapa akipaah khawm theihna diingun, kumtuang hinna tan a um diing gah akikhol veu hi.
43004037	Huchiin ‘Khat in atuh a, adang in ala’ chih thu hitah ah adih ngeel hi.
43004038	Na tohgim louh uh la diingin ka hung sawl hi, midangte’n anatong va, nang un atoh uh na phattuampih uh ahi,” achi hi.
43004039	Huleh, “Ama’n ka bawl zousiah hung hilh,” chih heetpih numeinu jiahin hu khopi a Samariami tampi’n Jesu agingta uhi.
43004040	Huchiin Samariate chu Jesu kawm ahung tun tahun a kawmva um diingin angeen va, huleh Amah chu hutah ah ni nih anituang hi.
43004041	Huleh Amah thusoi jiahin midang tampi’n agintaat behlap uhi.
43004042	Huleh numeinu kawmah, “Tuin nang soi jiaha gingta ka hi sih uh; ajiahchu keiuh ngeei in a thu ka jaah va, huleh Hi Pa chu khovel Hundampa Khrist ahi chih ka heet uh ahi,” achi uhi.
43004043	Huleh ni nih nungin hu apat in apawt a, Galili gam ah achiahta hi.
43004044	Ajiahchu Jesu ngeei in zawlnei a gam ah paahtawiin aum ngei sih chih ahesahta hi.
43004045	Huin Galili gam ahung tunin, Jerusalem a kuut manna a asilbawlte zousiah amuh jiahun Galili mite’n Amah anakipaahpih uhi; ajiahchu amahuh zong hu kuut ah avachiah uhi.
43004046	Hujiahin Jesu chu tui uain asuaahsahna Galili gam a Kana khua ahung tung kiit hi. Huleh hutah ah miloupi khat a tapa Kapernaum khua a china aum hi.
43004047	Jesu Judia gam apat hung pawtin Galili gam ah ahung chih ajaah tahin, a kawmah achiah a, hung suh a, a tapa sudam diingin Amah angeen hi, ajiahchu amahpa si dehdeh a china ahi.
43004048	Jesu’n a kawmah, “Chiamchihna leh sil loupite na muh louh uh leh, na gingta sih diing uhi,” achi hi.
43004049	Miloupipa’n a kawmah, “Pu, ka tapa sih main hung suh in,” achi hi.
43004050	Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Chiahta in, na tapa adamta hi,” achi hi. Huleh hu mipa’n Jesu’n a kawma a thusoi chu agingta a, achiahta hi.
43004051	Huleh apai suh laiin a suaahte’n anakituaahpih va, “Na tapa adamta,” chiin anahilh uhi.
43004052	Huin ama’n ahung dam pat lai hun a kawmvah adong a, amah un a kawmah, “Jaan ni, daah sagih hun in a khosih in anuseta hi,” achi uhi.
43004053	Huchiin a pa in huchu Jesu’n a kawma, “Na tapa adamta,” achih hun laitah ahi chih aheta hi. Huleh amah leh a innkuanpih teng in agingta uhi.
43004054	Huchu Jesu’n Judia gam apat ahung pawt a, Galili gam a ahung laia chiamchihna silmah abawl nihveina ahi.
43005001	Hi nungin Judate kuut khat aum a, Jesu chu Jerusalem ah achiah tou hi.
43005002	Huleh Jerusalem ah Belaam Kotkhaah kawmah diil khat, Hebrai haam a Bethesda kichi inn liim ngaa nei aum hi.
43005003	Hutah ah damloute, mittawte, keengbaite leh jengte atam a tam aum va, tui kiloh angaah uhi.
43005004	Ajiahchu hun chihkhat chiangin angel khat hu diil ah achiah suh a, tui avatohliing veu hi. Koipouh tui kitohliing nung a luut masapeen peen chu bangchibang natna nei hizongleh suhdamin aum veu hi.
43005005	Huleh hutah ah kum sawmthum leh giat damlou mi khat aum hi.
43005006	Jesu’n amah lum amuh a, huleh hutobanga hun sawtpi um ahita chih aheet tahin Ama’n a kawmah, “Suhdam na uut ei?” achi hi.
43005007	Damloupa’n, “Pu, tui akitohliing chiangin diil a hung koih diing mi ka nei sih a, ka chiah chiangin midang in ahung makhelh veu hi,” achi hi.
43005008	Jesu’n a kawmah, “Thou inla, na lupna la inla, keeng in paita in,” achi hi.
43005009	Huleh thakhatin amah chu ahung damta a, a lupna ala a, apaita hi. Huleh hu ni chu Sabbath ni ahi.
43005010	Hujiahin Judate’n suhdama umpa kawmah, “Sabbath ni ahi a, na lupna na puaah daan hilou ahi,” achi uhi.
43005011	Ama’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Ahung sudampa’n ka kawmah, ‘Na lupna la inla, pai in,’ ahung chi hi,” achi hi.
43005012	Huchiin amah un a kawmah, “‘Na lupna la inla, pai in,’ hung Chipa koi ahiai?” chiin adong uhi.
43005013	Hizongleh suhdama umpa’n koi ahiai chih ahe sih hi, ajiahchu hu mun ah mipi tamtah aum a, Jesu lah achiahmangta hi.
43005014	A nunglamin Jesu’n amah chu Pathian biahinn ah amu a, a kawmah, “Ngai in, suhdamin na umta hi, sual kiit nawn sin, huchilou inchu sil hoihlou seem na tungah ahung tung kha diing hi,” achi hi.
43005015	Huin hu mipa chu achiahta a, amah sudampa chu Jesu ahi chih Judate avahilhta hi.
43005016	Hujiahin hi silte chu Sabbath ni a abawl jiahin Judate’n Jesu chu agawtbawl va, thah asawmta uhi.
43005017	Hizongleh Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Ka Pa in tutanin nna atong zing a, huleh ke’n zong ka tong zing,” achi hi.
43005018	Huchiin Sabbath ni abohsiat chauh hilou a, Pathian ka Pa ahi achih a, Pathian toh kibanga akibawl jiahin Judate’n Amah chu thah atum seem uhi.
43005019	Huin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Pa in abawl amuhte loungaal Tapa in Amah thuin bangmah abawl thei sih hi; ajiahchu Ama’n abawl photmah hute chu Tapa in zong abawl veu hi.
43005020	Ajiahchu Pa in Tapa alungsiat a, a silbawl zousiah Amah amusah veu hi; huleh thumah nasah diing uh hite saanga nna loupijaw amusah diing hi.
43005021	Pa in misite akaihthoh a, asuhhing mahbangin Tapa in zong auut pouhmah hinna ape thei hi.
43005022	Ajiahchu Pa in koima vai ahawmsah sih, hizongleh vaihawmna zousiah Tapa kawmah apekheta hi,
43005023	huchia Pa azahbawl bangva mi zousiah in Tapa zong azahbawl theihna diingun. Koipouh Tapa zahbawl lou in Pa, Amah sawlpa zong azahbawl lou ahi.
43005024	“Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh ka thu ja a, ahung sawlpa gingta in kumtuang hinna aneita; vaihawmkhumin aum sih diing a, hizongleh sihna apat hinna ah aluut jawta ahi.
43005025	Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, misite’n Pathian Tapa aw ajaahna diing uh hun hung tung diing ahita a, tuin zong atung zing hi, huleh aja photmah ahing diing uhi.
43005026	Ajiahchu Pa in Amah a hinna akineih bangin, Tapa in zong Amah a hinna akineih diingin apeta hi.
43005027	Huleh Mihing Tapa ahih jiahin a kawmah vaihawmna thu zong apeta hi.
43005028	“Hikhu thumahsa sih un, ajiahchu haan a um zousiah in a aw ajaahna diing uh hun chu hung tung diing ahita a,
43005029	huleh haan apat ahung pawtdoh diing va, sil hoih bawlte chu athoudoh diing va, hinna anei diing uh, huleh silgilou bawlte chu siamlouhtangin athoukiit diing uhi.
43005030	Ke’n ka thu in bangmah ka bawl thei sih, ka jaah bangin vai ka hawm veu hi; huleh ka vaihawm chu adih hi, ajiahchu keimah deihjawng hawl louin, Pa, ahung sawlpa deihjawng ka hawl jaw hi.
43005031	“Ke’n keimah leh keimah tanchin kiheetpih hitaleng, ka kiheetpihna chu adih sih hi.
43005032	Kei hung heetpih khat aum, huleh ka tanchin Ama’n aheetpih chu adih ahi chih ka he hi.
43005033	Nang un Johan kawmah mi na sawl uh, ama’n thutah chu aheetpih hi.
43005034	Mihing thu heetsahna ka pom sih, hizongleh hutdama na um theihna diingun hi silte ka soi ahi.
43005035	Johan chu thaumei kuang leh taang bang ahi a, huleh nang un a vaah ah tomkhat nopsah taahdih na uut uhi.
43005036	Hizongleh Johan a saanga heetpihna lianjaw ka nei hi, ka Pa’n ka toh zoh diinga ahung piaah ka natohte mah in Pa in ahung sawl chih ahung heetpih hi.
43005037	Huleh Pa ahung sawlpa ngeei in kei ahung heetpih hi. Nang un bangchihmahin a aw na ja ngei sih va, a meel zong na mu ngei sih uhi.
43005038	Huleh Amah ahung sawlpa na gintaat louh jiahun a thu na lung sungvah na vom sih uhi.
43005039	Pathian Lehkhathu na sim ngun ngeel uhi, ajiahchu hute sungah kumtuang hinna neiin na kingaihtuah uh; hute chu ka tanchin heetpihtu ahi uhi.
43005040	Ahiinlah hinna na neihna diingun ka kawmah na hung nuam sih uhi.
43005041	Mihing paahtawina ka pom sih hi.
43005042	Hizongleh Pathian lungsiatna nanguh ah aum sih chih ka hung he hi.
43005043	Ka Pa min in ka hung a, nang un na hung pom sih uh, midang khat amah mah min in kihung leh lah, na pom diing uhi.
43005044	Nanguh, khat leh khat kipaahtawi tuahna ngaina a, Pathian chauh apat a hung pawt paahtawina hawl loute’n bangchiin na gingta diviai?
43005045	“Pa kawma nanguh hung heeh diingin hung ngaihtuah sih un; nanguh hung heehtu khat aum, amah chu na muan uh Mosi ahi.
43005046	Ajiahchu Mosi anagingta hita uh lehchin, kei zong na hung gingta diing uhi; ajiahchu ama’n ka tanchin ahi anagelh.
43005047	Hizongleh amah thugelhte na gintaat louh uh leh, bangchiin kei thute na gingta diviai?” achi hi.
43006001	Hi silte nungin Jesu chu Galili Diil gaal, Tiberia Diil zong kichi lamah achiahta hi.
43006002	Huleh natna veite tunga a silmah bawlte amuh jiahun mipi nasatah in Amah ajui uhi.
43006003	Jesu chu taang ah achiah tou a, hutah ah a nungjuite toh atou hi.
43006004	Huleh Chiahkaan Kuut, Judate kuut chu anaita hi.
43006005	Huin Jesu adaah a, mi tampi a kawm lam hung juan amuhin Philip kawmah, “Hite neeh diing tanghou khoia lei diing i hiai?” achi hi.
43006006	Hizongleh Ama’n hichu Philip etkhiahna diinga asoi ahi, ajiahchu bang ahiai abawl pah diing Ama’n akiheet hi.
43006007	Philip in adawng a, a kawmah, “Mi chin in themkhat chiat a atan diing uh zong dinari za nih man tanghou in adaih sih diing hi,” achi hi.
43006008	A nungjuite laha khat, Simon Peter sanggampa Andru in a kawmah,
43006009	“Hitah ah barley buh tanghou pheeng ngaa leh nga nih nei naupang khat aum hi, ahihvaangin mi hizahpi lahah bangtham ahi diai?” achi hi.
43006010	Jesu’n, “Mipite tousah un,” achi hi. Huleh hutah ah hampa tampi aum hi. Huchiin pasalte chu atouta va, atam lam uh chu saang ngaa veel ahi uhi.
43006011	Huin Jesu’n tanghou chu ala a, huleh avangpiaah zohin nungjuite kawmah ahawm a, nungjuite’n atoute kawmah, huchibangmahin ngate zong adeihkhop un ahawm uhi.
43006012	Huin akham nungun Ama’n a nungjuite kawmah, “Bangmah manglou diingin a neehvaal nengte uh luaah un,” achi hi.
43006013	Hujiahin aluaahkhawm va, barley buh tanghou pheeng ngaa nete neehvaal a neng bawm sawmlenih aluaah dim uhi.
43006014	Huin Jesu chiamchihna bawl amuh tahun hu mipite’n, “Tahzetin Hi Pa chu khovel a Zawlnei hung diingpa ahi ngeei mei,” achi uhi.
43006015	Huin mipite’n Amah chu kumpipa a bawl diinga pawngmat pah diing ahi uh chih Jesu’n aheet tahin Amah ngenin taang lamah achiahtuamta hi.
43006016	Huleh nitaah ahung hihin a nungjuite diil ah achiahsuh va,
43006017	kuang khat ah atuang va, Kapernaum lam juanin diil tungah achiah uhi. Huleh khua amialta a, Jesu lah a kawmvah ahung nai sih hi.
43006018	Huin huihpi haattahin diil chu anawh sang hulhul hi.
43006019	Huchiin kilometar ngaa aha guup aha ajaap nungun Jesu diil tunga pai a, kuang lam hung naih amu va, amahuh alau uhi.
43006020	Hizongleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Keimah ka hi, lau sih un,” achi hi.
43006021	Huin amah un kipaahtahin Amah chu kuang ah atuangsahta va, huleh kuang chu kintahin azot gam uh atung pahta hi.
43006022	Ajiingni in diil gaal lehlam a ding mipite’n a nungjuite tuanna loungaal kuang neu dang aum sih chih leh Jesu a nungjuite toh kuang ah achiah sih a, a nungjuite angen un achiah uh chih aheta uhi.
43006023	Ahihvaangin Tiberia apatin Lalpa’n avangpiaah nunga tanghou aneehna mun kawmah kuang neu dang ahung tung hi.
43006024	Hujiahin, mipite’n Jesu leh a nungjuite aum nawn sih uh chih ahung heet tahun amahuh zong kuang ah atuang va, Jesu hawlin Kapernaum ahung tung uhi.
43006025	Huleh Amah chu diil gaal lehlam a amuh tahun a kawmah, “Rabbi, bangchiha hitah tung na hiai?” achi uhi.
43006026	Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, chiamchihnate na muh jiahva hung hawl na hi sih va, hizongleh tanghou na neeh va, na vah jiahun na hung hawl uh ahijaw hi.
43006027	An mangthang mei diingin tonggim sih unla, kumtuang hinna donga um zing diing an, Mihing Tapa in ahung piaah diing hawlin tonggim jaw un, ajiahchu Pa Pathian in Amah achiamchihta hi,” achi hi.
43006028	Huin amah un a kawmah, “Pathian nna ka toh theihna diingun bang ahiai ka bawl diing uh?” achi uhi.
43006029	Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Amah, ahung sawlpa na gintaat uh, hichu Pathian natohna ahi,” achi hi.
43006030	Hujiahin amah un a kawmah, “Ahihleh ka muh va, ka hung gintaat theihna diingun bang chiamchihna na hung ensah diai? Bang na tong diai?
43006031	Ka pulepate un gamdaai ah manna ane uh; ‘Ama’n vaan apatin neeh diing tanghou apia,’ chia kigelh bangin,” achi uhi.
43006032	Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, vaan apat a tanghou hung petu Mosi ahi sih a, hizongleh vaan apat a tanghou hung petu chu ka Pa ahijaw hi.
43006033	Ajiahchu Pathian tanghou chu vaan apat hung kumsuh, khovel kawma hinna pepa chu ahi,” achi hi.
43006034	Huin amah un a kawmah, “Lalpa, hu tanghou chu hung pe zingzing in,” achi uhi.
43006035	Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Kei hinna tanghou chu ka hi. Koipouh ka kawma hung chu agilkial ngei sih diing a, huleh koipouh kei hung gingta chu adangtaah ngei sih diing hi.
43006036	Hizongleh ka hung hilh ahi, nang un na hung muh un zong na hung gingta sih uhi.
43006037	Ka Pa’n ahung piaah zousiah ka kawmah ahung diing a, huleh ka kawma hung photmah chu bangchi zongleh ka nohdoh het sih diing hi.
43006038	Ajiahchu keimah deihjawng bawl lou a, ahung sawlpa deihjawng bawl diinga vaan apat hungsuh ka hijaw hi.
43006039	Huleh Pa ahung sawlpa deihjawng chu: Ama’n ahung piaah zousiah khat beeh mangsah lou a, hizongleh ni tawpni chianga ka kaihthoh chu ahi.
43006040	Huleh hichu ahung sawlpa deihjawng ahi, koipouh Tapa mu a gingta in kumtuang hinna aneih a, huleh ke’n ni tawpni chianga ka kaihthoh diing chu ahi,” achi hi.
43006041	Huin Ama’n, “Kei vaan apat hung kumsuh tanghou ka hi,” achih jiahin Judate a tungah aphun uhi.
43006042	Huleh amah un, “Hi Pa hi Jesu, Joseph tapa, a pa leh a nu zong i heet uh hilou ahiaimah? ‘Vaan apat hung kumsuh ka hi,’ bangchidaana achih ahiai?” achi uhi.
43006043	Hujiahin Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Phunphun sih un.
43006044	Pa, kei hung sawlpa’n ahiip louh leh, koimah ka kawmah ahung thei sih; huleh ke’n amah nitawp ni chiangin ka kaithou diing hi.
43006045	Zawlneite Lehkhabute ah, ‘Pathian hilhin aum veh diing uh,’ chih gelh ahi. Hujiahin mi chin Pa thu ja a, he photmah ka kawmah ahung veu hi.
43006046	Pathian apat a hungpa loungaal mi koimah in Pa amu ngei sih, Ama’n chu Pa amuta hi.
43006047	Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh kei hung gingta in kumtuang hinna aneita.
43006048	Kei hinna tanghou chu ka hi.
43006049	Na pulepate un gamdaai ah manna ane va, hizongleh asi uhi.
43006050	Hichu vaan apat hung kumsuh tanghou, mi’n aneeh a, asih louhna diing uh chu ahi.
43006051	Kei vaan apat hung kumsuh tanghou hing chu ka hi. Mi koipouh in hi tanghou aneeh inchu, kumtuangin ahing diing uh; huleh ka tanghou piaah diing chu khovel hinna diinga ka piaah ka tahsa ahi,” achi hi.
43006052	Hujiahin Judate hah nialin akinial va, “Bangchidaana Hi Pa’n a tahsa neeh diinga pe thei diing ahiai?” achi uhi.
43006053	Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Mihing Tapa tahsa na neeh va, huleh a sisan na dawn louh uh leh, nanguh ah hinna na nei sih uhi.
43006054	Koipouh ka tahsa ne a, huleh ka sisan dawn in kumtuang hinna aneita a, huleh ke’n amah chu ni tawpni chiangin ka kaithou diing hi.
43006055	Ajiahchu ka tahsa hi an ahi tahzet a, huleh ka sisan zong dawn diing ahi tahzet hi.
43006056	Koipouh ka tahsa ne a, ka sisan dawn chu kei ah aum zing a, huleh kei amah ah ka um zing hi.
43006057	Pa hingzing in ahung sawl a, Pa jiaha ka hin bangmahin koipouh kei hung ne chu kei jiahin amah zong ahing diing hi.
43006058	Hichu vaan apat a tanghou hing hung kumsuh chu ahi. Na pulepate un manna aneeh va asih bang uh hilouin, koipouh hi tanghou ne chu kumtuangin ahing diing hi,” achi hi.
43006059	Hi thute Ama’n Kapernaum khua a aum laiin sinagog a athusoina a asoi ahi.
43006060	Hujiahin a nungjuite tampi’n hi thu ajaah tahun, “Hichu thu hahsa ahi, kuan ahiai ngai thei diing?” achi uhi.
43006061	Huin Jesu’n hi thu ah a nungjuite aphun uh chih a lungsim a aheetin a kawmvah, “Hi thu in nanguh ahung lunghilousah maw?
43006062	Mihing Tapa tuma a aumna ngei a akaltouh mu leh uh chin bang na loh diviai?
43006063	Suhingtu chu Hagau ahi a, tahsa chu bangmah aphatuam sih. Na kawmva ka thusoite chu hagau ahi a, hinna zong ahi.
43006064	Hizongleh na lahvah gingtalou khenkhat na um uh,” achi hi. Ajiahchu Jesu’n atuung apat agingtaloute leh Amah mansah diingpa aheetsa ahi.

43006067	Huin Jesu’n sawmlenihte kawmah, “Nanguh zong na paimang nuam uh maw?” achi hi.

43006070	Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Nanguh sawmlenihte ka hung teel na hi sih viaimah? Huleh na lahva khat diabol ahi,” achi hi.
43006071	Hizongleh Ama’n Simon tapa, Juda Iskariot thu asoi ahi. Ajiahchu amah hi sawmlenihte laha telve, Amah mansah diingpa chu ahi.
43007001	Hi silte nungin Jesu chu Galili gam ah avaah lehleh a, Judate’n thah atup jiahun Judia gam apha nuam sih hi.
43007002	Huleh Judate Bawhta Kuut ahung naita hi.

43007004	Ajiahchu minthanna diing hawl mi koima’n aguuhin bangmah abawl ngei sih hi. Hi silte bawl na hih leh, khovel kawmah kimusah in,” achi uhi.
43007005	Ajiahchu a sanggamte ngeei in zong Amah agingta sih uhi.
