43007007	Khovel in nanguh ahung ho thei sih a, hizongleh kei chu ahung hua uhi, a natohte uh agilou chih ka heetsah jiahin.
43007008	Nanguh hi kuut ah chiahtou un, kei chu hi kuut ah ka hungtou nai sih diing hi, ajiahchu ka hun atung bukim nai sih hi,” achi hi.
43007009	Hi thute a kawma asoi zohin Amah chu Galili gam ah aum zing nalai hi.
43007010	Hizongleh a sanggamte kuut mangna a achiah touh nungun Amah zong vaantaang heetlouhin, aguuhin achiah tou hi.
43007011	Huin Judate’n kuut mangna ah Amah ahawl va, ‘Khoia um ahiai?’ achi uhi.
43007012	Huchiin Amah tungtaang ah mipite lahah phunna nasatah aumta hi. Ajiahchu khenkhat in, “Mihoih ahi,” achi va; adang in, “Adih sih, mite puikawi ahijaw,” achi uhi.
43007013	Ahihvaangin Judate lau jiahin koima’n atung thu alangtangin asoi ngam sih uhi.
43007014	Huleh kuut kimang saan laitahin Jesu chu Pathian biahinn ah achiah tou a, thu ahilh hi.
43007015	Huleh Judate’n thumah asa va, “Hi Pa’n jil ngeiloupi-a bangchidaana lehkha he ahiai?” achi uhi.
43007016	Huin Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Ka thuhilh chu keimah a hung kuan ahi sih a, ahung sawlpa a hung kuan ahijaw hi.
43007017	Mi koipouh in Amah deihjawng abawl uut inchu, thuhilhna chu Pathian apat ahiai, ahihlouhleh keimah phuaahthuh ka soi ahiai chih ahe diing uhi.
43007018	Koipouh amah phuaahthuh thusoi chu amah kipaahtawina diing deih ahi, hizongleh a sawlpa paahtawi diing deih chu, Amah ngeei chu midih ahi a, huleh Amah ah dihtatlouhna aum sih hi.
43007019	Mosi in nanguh daan thu ahung pe sih eimah? Hizongleh na lahva koima’n daan thu na jui sih uhi. Bang diinga thah hung tum na hi viai?” achi hi.
43007020	Mipite’n adawng va, “Dawipaai na hi ve, koi in ahiai nang thah hung tum?” achi uhi.
43007021	Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Nna khat ka tong a, na bawnun thumah na sa uhi.
43007022	Huchiin Mosi in zehtan thu nanguh ahung pia a (zehtan thu Mosi jiaha piaah ahi sih a, pulepate a hung kipan ahijaw hi), huleh Sabbath ni in mi zeh na tan uhi.
43007023	Mosi daan thu botse loua Sabbath ni a mi’n zeh atan theih leh, keima’n Sabbath ni a mi khat ka damsiangsah jiaha bang diinga ka tunga lungthah na hi viai?
43007024	Alatdaan bangin thu khen sih unla, dihtattahin khen jaw un,” achi hi.
43007025	Hujiahin Jerusalem apat mi khenkhat in, “Hi Pa hi thah atup pa uh hilou ahiaimah?
43007026	Endih vua, hangtahin thu asoi a, amah un lah a kawmah bangmah asoi sih uh. Amah hi Khrist chu ahi chih vaihawmtute’n ahe tahtah uh adiai?
43007027	Hizongleh enlah hi Pa khoia hung kipan ahiai chih i he ngaala, hizongleh Khrist ahung chiangin koima’n khoi apat ahih ahe sih diing hi,” achi uhi.
43007028	Huin Jesu chu Pathian biahinn ah thuhilhin akikou a, “Nang un kei na hung he va, huleh khoia hung kipan ka hiai chih zong na hung he uhi. Keimah thu a hung ka hi sih a, hizongleh kei hung sawlpa chu adih ahi, nang un Amah na he sih uhi.
43007029	Hizongleh ke’n Amah ka he hi, ajiahchu Amah apat a hung ka hi a, Amah hung sawl ka hi,” achi hi.
43007030	Hujiahin Amah mat atum va, hizongleh ahun atun nailouh jiahin koima’n a tungah khut aha sih uhi.
43007031	Huleh mipi tamtahin Amah agingta va, “Khrist ahung chiangin Hi Pa bawl saanga tamjaw chiamchihna abawl diai?” achi uhi.
43007032	Pharisaite’n atung thu ah mipite hutobanga aphun uh aja va, huleh Pharisaite leh siampu lalte’n Amah man diingin houtute asawl uhi.
43007033	Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Tomchakhat na kawmvah ka um diing a, huzohchian ahung sawlpa kawmah ka chiah diing hi.
43007034	Nang un na hung hawl diing va, na hung mu sih diing uh, huleh ka umna ah na hung thei sih diing uh,” achi hi.
43007035	Hujiahin Judate amahuh kihouin, “I muh louh diinga khoia chiah diing ade aw? Grikte laha kithehdalhte kawma chiaha Grikte thu vahilh diing ahiai?
43007036	‘Na hung hawl diing va, na hung mu sih diing uh, huleh ka umna ah na hung thei sih diing uh,’ chih thu hi bang achihna ahiai?” achi uhi.
43007037	Huleh kuut ni loupi, ni nunungpeen ah Jesu chu ading a, akikou a, “Koipouh adang ataah leh, ka kawmah hung henla, dawn heh.
43007038	Koipouh kei hung gingta chu Pathian Lehkhathu in asoi bangin a sung apatin tuihing luuite aluangdoh diing,” achi hi.
43007039	Hizongleh hichu Ama’n Amah gingtate’n amuh diing uh Hagau asoina ahi, ajiahchu Hagau Siangthou piaah ahi nai sih hi, Jesu paahtawia aum nai louh jiahin.
43007040	Hujiahin mipi tamtahte’n hi thu ajaah tahun, “Tahzetin Hi Pa Zawlnei ahi,” achi uhi.
43007041	Adangte’n, “Khrist ahi,” achi uhi. Hizongleh khenkhatte’n, “Khrist chu Galili gam ah ahung piang diaimah?
43007042	Pathian Lehkhathu in, Khrist chu David chihaahte laha leh David teenna khua Bethlehem ah ahung piangdoh diing, achi sih eimah?” achi uhi.
43007043	Huchiin Amah jiahin mite lahah kikhenna aumta hi.
43007044	Huleh a lahva khenkhat in Amah mat atum va, hizongleh koima’n a tungah khut aha sih uhi.
43007045	Huin houtute chu siampu lalte leh Pharisaite kawmah ahung va, amah un houtute kawmah, “Bang diinga Amah hung puilou?” anachi uhi.
43007046	Houtute’n adawng va, “Hi Pa thusoi bangin koima’n thu asoi ngei himhim sih,” achi uhi.
43007047	Huin Pharisaite’n adawng va, “Nanguh zong puimanga um na hita uh maw?
43007048	Vaihawmtute leh Pharisaite lahah Amah gingta mi aum khata eimah?
43007049	Hizongleh daan thu helou hi mipite chu haamsethuaah ahi uh,” achi uhi.
43007050	Nikodem, jaan a Jesu kawma hung, a lahva telpa’n a kawmvah,
43007051	“I daan thu un mi amah kam a thu jaah ahih ma leh a silbawlte heet main siamlouh atangsah ngei eimah?” achi hi.
43007052	Amah un adawng va, a kawmah, “Nang zong Galili mi na hi maw? Hawl inla, kan in, ajiahchu Galili gam ah zawlnei himhim apiang ngei sih hi,” achi uhi.
43007053	Huin mi chin a inn chiat vah achiahta uhi.
43008001	Hizongleh Jesu chu Olive Taang ah achiahta hi.
43008002	Huleh jiingkaal matahin Pathian biahinn ah ahung kiit a, mi zousiah a kawmah ahung va; huin Ama’n touin amahuh thu ahilh hi.
43008003	Huleh daanjilsahtute leh Pharisaite’n numei khat, a-aangkawm laia amat uh a kawmah ahung pui va, a laiva adinsah zohun,
43008004	a kawmah, “Houtupa, hi numei hi a-aangkawm laitaha kiman ahi.
43008005	Daan Lehkhabu ah Mosi in hitobang mi chu suang a sehlup diing thu ahung pia hi. Hizongleh nang bang na chi ngaih ei?” achi uhi.
43008006	Hichu Amah heehna diing amuh theihna diingva aje-etna va asoi uh ahi. Hizongleh Jesu chu akuun a, a khut zung in lei agial hi.
43008007	Huchia adoh mun jiahun ahung dingtang a, a kawmvah, “Na lahva sualna nei het loupeen in amahnu chu suang in sep masa heh,” achi hi.
43008008	Huin akuun kiit a, lei agial jeel hi.
43008009	Hizongleh amah un hi thu ajaah tahun a sialepha heetna un siamlouhtangsahin, a upapeen apat atawptanin khat khat in achiahmangta va, Jesu chauh leh a laia ding hu numeinu aum hi.
43008010	Huin Jesu ading a, numeinu chihlouh midang amuh louh tahin a kawmah, “Numei, nang hung heehte khoia um ahita viai? Koima’n siamlouh ahung tangsah sih maw?” achi hi.
43008011	Amahnu’n, “Koima’n hung tangsah lou, Lalpa,” achi hi. Huin Jesu’n a kawmah, “Ke’n zong siamlouh ka hung tangsah sih hi, chiah inla sual kiit nawn sin,” achi hi.
43008012	Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Kei khovel vaah ka hi, koipouh kei hung jui chu mial ah akhohei sih diing a, hizongleh hinna vaah anei jaw diing hi,” achi hi.
43008013	Hujiahin Pharisaite’n a kawmah, “Nangma’n nangmah tanchin na kisoi a, na thusoi adih sih,” achi uhi.
43008014	Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Keimah in keimah tanchin soi hitaleng, ka heetpihna chu adih hi, ajiahchu khoi apat hung ka hih leh, khoia chiah diing ka hih ka he hi; hizongleh nang un khoi apat hung ka hih leh khoia chiah diing ka hih na he sih uhi.
43008015	Nang un tahsa daan in vai na hawm uh, ke’n koima vai ka hawmsah sih.
43008016	Huleh vaihawmsah hita zongleng, ka vaihawm chu adih hi; ajiahchu kei ngen ka hi sih a, kei leh kei hung sawlpa ka Pa toh ka hijaw uhi.
43008017	Na daan vah zong mi nih thuheetpih chu adih ahi chih gelh ahi.
43008018	Kei chu keimah leh keimah thuheetpih ka hi a, huleh Pa ahung sawlpa’n ka thu ahung heetpih hi,” achi hi.
43008019	Huin amah un a kawmah, “Na pa khoiah aum ei?” achi uhi. Jesu’n adawng a, “Nang un kei lah na hung he sih va, ka Pa zong na he sih uhi. Kei hung he hileh uh chin, ka Pa zong na he diing uh,” achi hi.
43008020	Hi thute Jesu’n Pathian biahinn a thu ahilh laiin sumkoihna mun ah asoi a, huleh a hun atun nailouh jiahin koima’n a tungah khut aha sih hi.
43008021	Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Ka chiahmang diing a, nang un na hung hawl diing va, na sualna vah na si diing uhi. Ka chiahna ah na hung thei sih diing uh,” achi hi.
43008022	Hujiahin Judate’n, “Ama’n, ‘Ka chiahna diing ah na hung thei sih diing uh,’ achih jiahin Amah leh Amah akithat diing adiai?” achi uhi.
43008023	Huleh Ama’n a kawmvah, “Nanguh chu nuailam akipan na hi va, kei chu tunglam akipan ka hi. Nanguh hi khovel a na hi va, kei chu hi khovel a ka hi sih.
43008024	Hujiahin na sualna vah na si diing uh chih na kawmvah ka soi ahi; ajiahchu kei Amah ka hi chih na gintaat louh uh leh, na sualna vah na si diing uh,” achi hi.
43008025	Huin amah un a kawmah, “Nang koi na hiai?” achi uhi. Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Achiil apat a na kawmva ka soi khu mah ka hi.
43008026	Na tungthu vah soi diing leh vaihawmsah diing tampi ka nei hi, hizongleh ahung sawlpa chu adih hi; huleh Amah apat ka jaahte chu khovel kawmah ka soi veu hi,” achi hi.
43008027	Ama’n Pa tungtaang a kawmvah asoi ahi chih amah un ahe sih uhi.
43008028	Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Mihing Tapa na khaikaang zoh chiangun Amah ka hi chih leh keimah thuin bangmah ka bawl sih a, hizongleh ka Pa’n ahung hilh bangin hi thute ka soi jaw ahi, chih na he diing uh.
43008029	Amah ahung sawlpa ka kawmah aum hi. Pa in ka ngenin ahung nuse sih, ajiahchu akipaah jawng silte ka bawl zing hi,” achi hi.
43008030	Hi thute asoi laiin mi tampi’n Amah agingta uhi.
43008031	Huin Jesu’n amah gingta Judate kawmah, “Ka thu a na um zing uh leh, ka nungjuite na hi tahzet diing uhi.
43008032	Huleh thutah na he diing va, thutah in nanguh ahung jaleensah diing hi,” achi hi.
43008033	Amah un, “Abraham chihaahte ka hi va, bangchihmahin koima salin ka taang ngei sih uh. Bangchidaana, ‘Na jaleen diing uh,’ na chih ahiai?” chiin adawng uhi.
43008034	Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh sual bawl chu sual suaah ahi.
43008035	Suaah chu kumtuangin inn ah aum zing sih, hizongleh Tapa chu kumtuangin aum zing hi.
43008036	Hujiahin Tapa in ahung jaleensah inchu, na jaleen tahzet diing uhi.
43008037	Abraham chihaahte na hi uh chih ka hung he hi, hizongleh ka thu nanguh a aum louh jiahin, nang un kei thah diing na hung tum uhi.
43008038	Ke’n ka Pa kawma ka muhte ka soi a, nang un zong na pa kawmva na muhte uh na bawl uh,” achi hi.
43008039	Amah un adawng va, a kawmah, “Abraham chu ka pa uh ahi,” achi uhi. Jesu’n a kawmvah asoi a, “Abraham tate hita leh uh chin, Abraham natohte na tong diing uhi.
43008040	Hizongleh tuin kei, Pathian kawma ka jaah thutah na kawmva hung Hilhpa, thah na hung tum va, Abraham in hitobangin anabawl sih hi.
43008041	Nang un chu na pa uh silbawlte na bawl uhi,” achi hi. Huin amah un a kawmah, “Kingaihna thaanghuai apat piang ka hi sih uh, Pa khat ka nei uh, Amah chu Pathian ahi,” achi uhi.
43008042	Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Pathian na Pa uh hitaleh chu keimah na hung lungsiat diing uhi, ajiahchu Pathian apat a hung pawt ka hi a, keimah thuin ka hung sih a, Ama’n ahung sawl jawh ahi.
43008043	Bangchidaana ka soi hesiam lou na hi viai? Ka thu na jaah theih louh jiahun ahi.
43008044	Nanguh chu na pa uh diabol apat hung na hi va, huleh na pa uh deihjawng sual na bawl uut uhi. Amah chu achiil apat tualthattu ahi a, amah ah thutah aum louh jiahin thutah ah aum sih hi. Juau asoiin zong amah hihna ngeei apat asoi ahi, ajiahchu amah mijuau ahi a, huleh juauna pa zong ahi.
43008045	Thutah ka soi jiahin nang un na hung gingta sih uhi.
43008046	Na lahva kua na hi viai sual thu a siamlouh hung tangsah? Thutah ka soi leh bang diinga hung gingtalou na hi viai?
43008047	Mi, Pathian a in chu Pathian thu angaikhe veu a, Pathian a na hihlouh jiahun nang un chu na ngaikhe sih uhi,” achi hi.
43008048	Hujiahin Judate’n adawng va, a kawmah, “Samariami na hi a, huleh dawipaai na hi ka hung chih uh chu ka chi dih mahmah sih viaimah?” achi uhi.
43008049	Jesu’n adawng a, “Dawipaai ka hi sih a, hizongleh ka Pa ka paahtawi a, huleh nang un kei na hung paahtawi sih uhi.
43008050	Keimah loupina diing ka hawl sih, hukhu hawl leh vaihawmtu khat aum hi.
43008051	Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, mi koipouh in ka thu azop leh kumtuangin sihna amu ngei himhim sih diing,” achi hi.
43008052	Hujiahin Judate’n a kawmah, “Tuin chu dawipaai na hi chih ka hung heta uh, Abraham a sita a, huleh zawlneite zong a sita uh, hizongleh nang in, ‘Mi koipouh in ka thu azop leh, sihna achiam ngei himhim sih diing,’ na chi hi.
43008053	Asita ka pu uh Abraham saanga loupijaw na hiai? Huleh zawlneite lah asita va, nang banga kingai na hiaimah?” achi uhi.
43008054	Jesu’n adawng a, “Kei leh kei kipaahtawi hitaleng, ka kipaahtawina bangmah ahi sih diing, ahung paahtawi chu ka Pa, nang un ka Pathian uh ahi, na chih uh khu ahi.
43008055	Hizongleh nang un Amah na he sih uh, ke’n chu Amah ka he hi. Huleh ‘Amah ka he sih chita leng,’ nanguh banga mijuau ka hita diing hi; hizongleh Amah ka he a huleh a thu zong ka zop hi.
43008056	Na pu uh Abraham in ka ni amuh diing chu anuam mahmah a, huleh amu ngeei a, akipaah mahmah hi,” achi hi.
43008057	Huin Judate’n a kawmah, “Nang kum sawmngaa zong ching nailou chin a, Abraham na mu kha maw?” achi uhi.
43008058	Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, Abraham um ma a um KA HI,” achi hi.
43008059	Hujiahin amah un asehna diingin suang ala va, hizongleh Jesu chu akiphual a, Pathian biahinn apat apawt a, a lahva paisuaahin achiahta hi.
43009001	Huleh Jesu’n apai kawmin a pian apat mittaw khat amu hi.
43009002	A nungjuite’n a kawmah, “Rabbi, hi pa mittaw a apian, kuan ahiai sil sual bawl, hi pa’n ahiai, ahihlouhleh a nulepa in?” chiin adong uhi.
43009003	Jesu’n adawng a, “Hi pa lah asual sih a, a nulepa lah asual sih uh, hizongleh Pathian natohte amah a akilat theihna diingin ahijaw hi.
43009004	Suun ahihlaiin ahung sawlpa nna ka toh ngeeingeei diing ahi. Jaan hung tung diing ahita, hu hun chiangin koima’n nna atong thei sih diing uh.
43009005	Khovel a ka um sung teng khovel vaah ka hi,” achi hi.
43009006	Huchia asoi zohin Ama’n lei ah a chil asiat a, hu chil in tungman abawl a, huleh hu tungman chu mittawpa mit ah anuh a,
43009007	huleh a kawmah, “Chiah inla, Siloam diil ah vasil in,” achi hi (Siloam chu Sawl chihna ahi). Huchiin achiah a, asil a, huleh mutheiin ahung kiit hi.
43009008	Hujiahin a innveengte leh ma a mittaw ahih lai musate’n, “Hi pa hi khutdoha tou veupa hilou ahiaimah?” achi uhi.
43009009	Khenkhatte’n, “Amah ahi,” achi uhi. Adangte’n, “Akibatpih ahi,” achi uhi. Hizongleh ama’n, “Amah chu ka hi,” achi hi.
43009010	Hujiahin amah un a kawmah, “Bangchiin ahiai na mit ahung vaah?” achi uhi.
43009011	Ama’n adawng a, “Jesu kichi Mi khat in tungman abawl a, ka mit ahung nuhsah a, huleh ka kawmah, ‘Siloam diil ah chiah inla vasil in,’ ahung chi hi. Huchiin ka chiah a, ka sil a, ka mutheita hi,” achi hi.
43009012	Huin amah un a kawmah, “Amah khoiah aum ei?” achi uhi. Ama’n, “Ka he sih,” achi hi.
43009013	Huleh a ma a mittawpa chu Pharisaite kawmah ahung pui uhi.
43009014	Jesu’n tungman bawl a, a mit asuhvaah ni chu Sabbath ni ahi a,
43009015	Pharisaite’n zong a mit hung vaah daan a kawmah adong kiit uhi. Ama’n a kawmvah, “Ka mit ah tungman anuh a, ka vasil a, ka muta hi,” achi hi.
43009016	Hujiahin Pharisaite khenkhat in, “Hi Pa Pathian apat ahi sih, ajiahchu Sabbath ni atang sih hi,” achi uhi. Adangte’n, “Bangchiin misual in hitobangin chiamchihna abawl thei diai?” achi uhi. Huin a lahvah kikhenna aumta hi.
43009017	Huin amah un mittawpa kawmah, “Na mit ahung suhvaahsah jiahin Amah tungtaang nang bang na chi ngaihtuah ei?” achi kiit uhi. Ama’n, “Zawlnei ahi,” achi hi.
43009018	Hujiahin Judate’n a mit hung vaahpa nulepa akouh masiah uh, mittaw anahi a, ahung vaahta ahi chih a tungtaang thu agingta sih uhi.
43009019	Huleh amah un a nulepa kawmah adong va, “Hi, na tapa uh ahi maw, mittawa piang na chihpa uh? Bang chiin ahiai tua ahung muh theih taah?” achi uhi.
43009020	A nulepate’n amahuh adawng va, “Hi ka tapa uh ahi a, huleh mittawin apiang chih ka he uh.
43009021	Hizongleh bangchidaana tua ahung muhtheih taah ka he sih uh, huleh koi in a mit asuhvaahsah zong ka he sih uh. Mipiching ahi a, amah dong un, amah tungtaang ama’n akisoi mei diing,” achi uhi.
43009022	A nulepate’n Judate alau jiahun hi thute asoi uhi; ajiahchu Judate’n Amah chu Khrist ahi chia phuang aum leh, sinagog apat nohdoh diing chia thu analemsah uh ahita hi.
43009023	Hujiahin ahi a nulepate’n, “Mipiching ahi a, amah dong un,” achih uh.
43009024	Huin amah un mittawpa chu akou kiit va, a kawmah, “Pathian loupina pia in! Hi Pa jaw misual ahi chih ka he uh,” achi uhi.
43009025	Hujiahin ama’n adawng a, “Amah misual ahihleh hihlouh ka he sih, sil khat ka he hi, mittaw anahi hizongleng, tuin ka mu theita hi,” achi hi.
43009026	Huin amah un a kawmah, “Ama’n na tungah bang ahiai abawl? Na mit bang ahung chi suhvaahsah ei?” achi kiit uhi.
43009027	Ama’n, “Ka hung hilhta a, hizongleh na ja uut sih uh, bang diinga ja uut kiit na hi viai? Nanguh zong a nungjui hih na uut uh maw?” chiin adawng hi.
43009028	Hujiahin amah hahtaaiin ataai va, “Nang Amah nungjui na hi a, keiuh chu Mosi nungjuite ka hi uh.
43009029	Pathian in Mosi kawmah thu asoi chih ka he uh, hizongleh Hi Pa ahihleh khoi apat a hung ahih ka he sih uh,” achi uhi.
43009030	Amahpa’n adawng a, a kawmvah, “Khoi apat a hung ahih na heetlouh uh, hikhu mah ahi athumahna, Ama’n lah ka mit ahung suhvaahsah ngaala,
43009031	Pathian in misualte thu angaikhe ngei sih chih i he uhi. Hizongleh mi koipouh Pathian bia a, a deihjawng bawl chu Pathian in angaikhe veu hi.
43009032	Khovel um tuung akipan koima’n mittawa piang a mit asuhvaahsah chih akija ngei sih.
43009033	Hi Pa Pathian apat ahihlouh inchu, bangmah abawl thei sih diing,” achi hi.
43009034	Amah un adawng va, a kawmah, “Nang sual lumlet a piang in keiuh na hung hilh vial maw?” achi uhi. Huin amah chu anohdohta uhi.
43009035	Amah anohdoh uh chih Jesu’n aja a, huleh amah amuhin a kawmah, “Pathian Tapa na gingta ei?” achi hi.
43009036	Ama’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Ka gintaat theihna diingin, Lalpa, Amah koi ahiai?” achi hi.
43009037	Jesu’n a kawmah, “Amah na muta a, nang hung houpihpa ahi,” achi hi.
43009038	Huin ama’n, “Lalpa, ka gingta hi,” achi a, huin bohkhupin Amah abeta hi.
43009039	Huleh Jesu’n, “Muthei loute’n ahung muh theihna diing uh leh mitvaahte mit ahung tawt theihna diingin vaihawm diingin khovel ah ka hung ahi,” achi hi.
43009040	A kawma um Pharisai khenkhatte’n hi thute ajaah tahun a kawmah, “Keiuh zong mittaw ka hi viaimah?” achi uhi.
43009041	Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Mittaw hileh uh chin sualna neilou diing hi uh chin a; hizongleh tuin, ‘Ka mu thei uh,’ na chi uhi. Hujiahin na sualna uh aum zing hi.
43010001	“Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh kotkhaah a luut loua lam tuama kal a, belaam huang a luut chu guta leh suammang ahi.
43010002	Hizongleh koipouh kotkhaah a luut chu belaampu ahi.
43010003	Amah chu kotkhaah ngaahpa’n anahonsah a, belaamte’n a aw aja uhi. Huleh ama’n belaamte chu a min un akou a, apuidoh veu hi.
43010004	Huleh a belaamte apawtdohsah chiangin a ma vah apai a, a aw aheet jiahun belaamte’n a nung ajui uhi.
43010005	Midang chu ajui sih diing va, ataaimangsan jaw diing uhi, ajiahchu midang aw ahe thei sih uhi,” achi hi.
43010006	Hi tehkhinthu Jesu’n a kawmvah asoi a, hizongleh amah un a kawmva bang thu ahiai asoi chih ahe sih uhi.
43010007	Hujiahin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, kei belaam kotkhaah chu ka hi.
43010008	Ka ma a hung pai zousiah chu gutate leh suammangte ahi uh, hizongleh belaamte’n a thu uh angai sih uhi.
43010009	Kei kotkhaah chu ka hi, koipouh keimah a aluut leh, hutdamin aum diing a, huleh luutin apawt diing a, neeh diing amu diing hi.
43010010	Guta chu gu diing leh that diing leh suse diing loungaalin ahung sih. Kei chu amah un hinna a neihna diing uh leh tamtah aneihna diingva hung ka hi.
43010011	“Kei belaampu hoih chu ka hi, belaampu hoih in a belaamte diingin a hinna apia hi.
43010012	Hizongleh kiloh, belaampu hilou, belaam neitu hilou in chu ngei hung amuh chiangin belaamte anusia a, ataai veu hi; huleh ngei in amahuh aman a asudalh veu hi.
43010013	Kiloh chu ataai veu hi kiloh ahih jiahin, huleh belaamte angaihsah sih hi.
43010014	“Kei belaampu hoih chu ka hi, huleh ka belaamte ka he a, amah un zong kei ahung he uhi.
43010015	Pa’n kei ahung heet bangin ke’n zong Pa ka he hi; huleh belaamte diingin ka hinna ka pia hi.
43010016	Huleh hi belaam huang a lou belaam dang ka nei hi; amahuh zong ka hung pui diing a, ka aw aja diing va, huleh belaampu khat toh hon khat ahung hi diing uhi.
43010017	Hujiahin ka Pa’n ahung lungsiat hi, laah kiit diinga ka hinna ka piaah jiahin.
43010018	Koima’n ahung laahsah ahi sih a, ka thuin ka pia ahijaw hi. Piaah theihna leh laah kiit theihna thu ka nei hi. Hi thupiaah ka Pa apat ka muta hi,” achi hi.
43010019	Hujiahin hi thute jiahin Judate lahah kikhenna aum kiitta hi.
43010020	Hizongleh a lahva tampi’n, “Dawipaai ahi, angol ahi, bang diinga Amah thu ngaikhia na hi viai?” achi uhi.
43010021	Adangte’n, “Hi thu kisoite dawipaai mi thusoi ahi sih, dawi in mittaw mit asuvaah thei eimah?” achi uhi.
43010022	Huleh Jerusalem a Latna Kuut lai ahi a, phalbi lai ahi.
43010023	Jesu chu Pathian biahinn ah Solomon Innliim ah avaah lehleh hi.
43010024	Hujiahin Judate Amah kiimveel ah ahung va, a kawmah, “Bangtan ahiai lungawpkaia na hung koih diing? Khrist na hih leh, chiangtahin hung hilh in,” achi uhi.
43010025	Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Ka hung hilhta a, na gingta sih uh. Ka Pa min a ka natohte’n ka tanchin ahung heetpih uhi.
43010026	Hizongleh na kawmva ka soitaah bangmahin ka belaamte na hihlouh jiahun na gingta sih uhi.
43010027	Ka belaamte’n ka aw aja uh, ke’n amahuh ka he a, amah un ahung jui uhi.
43010028	Huleh keima’n a kawmvah kumtuang hinna ka pia hi, kumtuangin amangthaai sih diing va, koima’n ka khut apat ahung laahsah thei sih diing hi.
43010029	Ka Pa, amahuh kei hung pepa mi zousiah saangin alianjaw hi. Koima’n ka Pa khut apat ahung laahsah thei sih diing hi.
43010030	Kei leh Pa chu khat ka hi uh,” achi hi.
43010031	Huin Judate’n a sehna diingun suang ala kiit uhi.
43010032	Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Nna hoih tampi ka Pa akipanin nanguh ka hung musah a, hu natohte laha khoipeen jiahin ahiai suang a na hung seh tum uh?” achi hi.
43010033	Judate’n adawng va, “Natoh hoih jiahin suang in seh ka hung tum uh ahi sih, hizongleh Pathian na soisiat jiah leh nang Mihing hi ngaala, Pathian banga na kibawl jiahin ahijaw,” achi uhi.
43010034	Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Na daan vah, ‘“pathiante na hi uh,” ka chi,’ chih gelh hilou ahiaimah?
43010035	Pathian thu tunnate bawn pathiante chih ahihleh (Pathian Lehkhathu koima’n asuse thei sih diing hi),
43010036	‘Pathian Tapa ka hi’ ka chih jiahin Pa in asuhsiang a khovel a asawlpa tungah, ‘Pathian na soisia’ na hung chi uh ahi maw?
43010037	Ka Pa natohte ka toh louh leh, hung gingta sih un.
43010038	Hizongleh ka toh a ahihleh, kei hung gingta sih mahzongleh uh chin, natohte gingta un, Pa keimah ah aum a, kei Amah ah ka um chih na heet va, na gintaat theihna diingun,” achi hi.
43010039	Hujiahin Amah mat atum kiit va, hizongleh a khut vapat akiheem khia hi.
43010040	Huin Johan in achiil a baptis abawlna mun, Jordan gaal ah achiah kiit a, hutah ah ava-umta hi.
43010041	Huleh mi tampi a kawmah ahung va, “Johan in chiamchihna bangmah bawl anei sih a, hizongleh hi Pa tungtaanga Johan in asoi zousiah adih veh hi,” achi uhi.
43010042	Huleh hutah ah mi tampite’n Amah agingta uhi.
43011001	Huleh Mari leh a sanggamnu Martha teenna Bethani khua a mi khat Lazar kichi chu achina hi.
43011002	Hu Mari chu Lalpa thau namtuui nuh a, a sam a a keeng siahsahnu ahi a, a sanggampa Lazar chu achina hi.
43011003	Hujiahin a sanggamnute’n Jesu kawmah, “Lalpa, ngai in, na lungsiatpa achina hi,” chiin mi asawl uhi.
43011004	Jesu’n hu thu ajaahin, “Hi natna chu sihna diing hial ahi sih a, hizongleh hi jiaha Pathian Tapa paahtawia aum theihna diinga Pathian loupina diing ahijaw hi,” achi hi.
43011005	Jesu’n Martha leh a sanggamnu leh Lazar alungsiat hi.
43011006	Huchiin Lazar achina chih ajaahin aumna mun mah ah ni nih aum nalai hi.
43011007	Huzohin Ama’n nungjuite kawmah, “Judia gam ah i chiah kiit diing uh,” achi hi.
43011008	Nungjuite’n a kawmah, “Rabbi, tuma deuh mahin Judate’n suang in seh ahung tum va, hutah ah chiah na sawm kiit maw?” achi uhi.
43011009	Jesu’n adawng a, “Suun khat sungin daahkaal sawmlenih aum sih eimah? Mi koi zong suun a apai inchu, hi khovel vaah amuh jiahin akisui ngei sih hi.
43011010	Hizongleh amah a vaah aum louh jiahin, mi koi zong jaan a apai inchu, akisui veu hi,” achi hi.
43011011	Hi thute asoi zohin a kawmvah, “I lawmpa uh Lazar a-ihmuta a, hizongleh a ihmutna apat phawng diingin ka chiah diing,” achi hi.
43011012	Huin a nungjuite’n, “Lalpa, ihmu ahih inchu, adamkiit na diing hi,” achi uhi.
43011013	Ahiinlah Jesu’n Lazar sih thu asoi ahi a, hizongleh amah un ihmu a khawldam thu soi hiin angaihtuah uhi.
43011014	Hujiahin Jesu’n chiantahin a kawmvah, “Lazar asita hi.
43011015	Huleh na gintaat theihna diingun, nanguh vaanga hutah a ka um louh ka kipaah hi. Hizongleh a kawmah i chiah diing uh,” achi hi.
43011016	Huin Thomas Diduma kichipa’n a nungjui hihpihte kawmah, “Amah toh i sih khawm theihna diingin eiuh zong i chiah diing uh,” achi hi.
43011017	Huin Jesu ahung tunin Lazar chu haan ah ni li ana-umta chih ahung he hi.
43011018	Bethani chu Jerusalem kho kawm naih, kilometar thum veela gamla ahi.
43011019	Huleh Martha leh Mari chu a sanggampa uh sihna tunga hehneem diingin Judate tampi a kawmvah ahung uhi.
43011020	Hujiahin Jesu ahung chih ajaah tahin Martha chu achiah a, Amah avalamtuaah a, hizongleh Mari chu inn sungah atou nalai hi.
43011021	Huin Martha in Jesu kawmah, “Lalpa, hitaha um hilehchin chu, ka sanggampa si lou diing hi a,
43011022	hizongleh tuin zong Pathian kawma na nget photmah Pathian in ahung pe diing chih ka he hi,” achi hi.
43011023	Jesu’n amahnu kawmah, “Na sanggampa athou kiit diing hi,” achi hi.
43011024	Martha in a kawmah, “Ni tawpni a thohkiitna ah athou kiit diing chih chu ka he hi,” achi hi.
43011025	Jesu’n amahnu kawmah, “Kei thohkiitna leh hinna ka hi. Koipouh kei hung gingta chu si mahzongleh ahing diing hi.
43011026	Huleh koi hizongleh hing a huleh kei hung gingta photmah chu kumtuangin bangchihtanin asi sih diing hi. Hikhu na gingta ei?” achi hi.
43011027	Amahnu’n a kawmah, “Hi, Lalpa, nang chu Khrist, Pathian Tapa khovel a hung diingpa chu na hi chih ka gingta hi,” achi hi.
43011028	Huchia asoi zohin achiah a, a sanggamnu Mari chu a guuhin akou a, “Houtupa ahung a, ahung kou,” achi hi.
43011029	Mari in hu ajaahin kintahin athou a, a kawmah ahung hi.
43011030	Jesu chu khosung ahung tung nai sih a, Martha in avalamtuaahna mun ah aum nalai hi.
43011031	Huin Judate, inn sunga amah hehneema amah toh umte’n Mari chu kintaha thoua pawtdoh amuh tahun, “Haan ah kap diingin achiah,” chiin a nung ajui uhi.
43011032	Huin Mari in Jesu umna mun ahung tun a, Amah amuhin a keengbul ah apuuh a, a kawmah, “Lalpa hitaha um hilehchin chu ka sanggampa si lou diing hi a,” achi hi.
43011033	Hujiahin Mari kap a, amah toh hung Judate zong kapa um Jesu’n amuhin hagau in amaau a, amangbangta hi.
43011034	Huleh, “Amah khoiah na sial viai?” achi hi. Amah un a kawmah, “Lalpa, hung inla, en in,” achi uhi.
43011035	Jesu akapta.
43011036	Hujiahin Judate’n, “Endih vua, lungsiat hina mei e!” achi uhi.
43011037	Khenkhat in, “Hi Pa, mittawte mit suhvaahsahpa’n hi pa zong silousah theilou adiai?” achi uhi.
43011038	Hujiahin Jesu chu a lungsim a maau kiitin haan ah ahung a, haan chu kohawm ahi a, suang a sit ahi.
43011039	Jesu’n, “Suang ladoh un,” achi hi. Misipa sanggamnu Martha in a kawmah, “Lalpa, tuin chu auihta diing hi, ajiahchu a sihna ni li ahita hi,” achi hi.
43011040	Jesu’n amahnu kawmah, “Na gintaat a ahihleh, Pathian loupina na mu diing, na kawmah ka chi sih eimah?” achi hi.
43011041	Huin amah un misi umna apat suang chu aladoh va, huleh Jesu chu avaandaah a, “Pa, ka thu na ngaihkhiah jiahin na tungah ka kipaah hi.
43011042	Huleh na hung ngaikhe zingzing chih zong ka he hi, hizongleh ka kiim a ding mipite jiahin hikhu ka chi hi, huchia nangma’n na hung sawl ahi chih agintaat theihna diingun,” achi hi.
43011043	Huin hute asoi zohin aw ngaihtahin, “Lazar, hung pawtdoh in,” chiin akikou hi.
43011044	Huin misi chu a khut a keeng haan puan a kituamin ahung pawtdoh a; a maai chu puan a tuam ahi hi. Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Phel unla, paisah un,” achi hi.
43011045	Huchiin Mari kawma hung, Jesu silmah bawl mu Judate laha tampite’n Jesu agingtata uhi.
43011046	Hizongleh khenkhat chu Pharisaite kawmah achiah va, Jesu silbawlte avahilh uhi.
43011047	Hujiahin siampu lalte leh Pharisaite’n vaihawmtute akoukhawm va, “Bang i lohta diai? Ajiahchu Hi Pa’n chiamchihna tampi abawl hi.
43011048	Hichibanga i hahzan un chu, mi zousiah in Amah agingta diing va, huleh Romte ahung diing va, i mun leh i nam ahung laahsah diing uh,” achi uhi.
43011049	Huin a lahva mi khat, hu kum a siampu lalpeen Kaiapha in a kawmvah, “Bangmacha na he sih uh,
43011050	i nam pumpi aman louhna diinga mipi luanga mi khat asih eiuh diingin ahoih chih zong na ngaihtuah sih uh,” achi hi.
43011051	Hichu ama’n amah phuaahthuhin asoi ahi sih hi; hizongleh hu kum a siampu lalpeen ahih jiahin hu nam diinga Jesu asih diing asoilawh ahi.
43011052	Huleh hu nam chauh hilouin, Pathian ta kithehdalhte zousiah pawl khat a apuikhawm theihna diingin zong ahi.
43011053	Hujiahin hu ni apatin Amah thahna diing ngaihtuahin akihou khawm zingta uhi.
43011054	Hujiahin Jesu chu Judate lahah alangtangin avaah nawn sih a, hizongleh hu apat a gamdaai naih lamah Ephraim kichi khopi khat ah achiah a, hutah ah a nungjuite toh aum zingta uhi.
43011055	Huleh Judate Chiahkaan Kuut chu ahung naita a, mi tampite gam apatin kisusiang diingin Jerusalem ah Chiahkaan Kuut hun main achiah tou uhi.
43011056	Huin amah un Jesu ahawl va, Pathian biahinn a ding kawmin akihou va, “Bangchiin na ngaihtuah viai? Kuut a hung lou diing adiai?” achi uhi.
43011057	Siampu lalte leh Pharisaite’n Amah amat theihna diingun mi koipouh in a umna aheet leh, asoi lat diing ahi chih thu apeta uhi.
43012001	Hujiahin Chiahkaan Kuut umna diing ni guup main Jesu chu misi lah apat akaihthoh Lazar umna Bethani khua ahung tung hi.
43012002	Hujiahin hutah ah Jesu diingin nitaah an abawl va, Martha in neeh abawl a, hizongleh Lazar chu Amah toh ankuang uumte laha khat ahi.
43012003	Huin Mari in spainard thau namtuui man tamtah litra khat ahung tawi a, Jesu keeng anuh a, a sam in a keengte chu asiaah a, huleh thau gim in inn chu ajeelsuaahta hi.
43012004	Huleh nungjuite laha khat, Amah mansah diingpa Juda Iskariot, Simon tapa in,
43012005	“Bang diinga hi thau gimtuui dinari za thum a juaaha gentheite kawma kipelou ahiai?” achi hi.
43012006	Hichu ama’n gentheite akhawhsahpih jiah hilouin, guta ahi a, dangka-ip akol a, a sunga kikoih alaah veu jiahin asoi ahijaw hi.
43012007	Huin Jesu’n, “Ka kivui ni a diinga ama’n akoih theihna diingin amahnu subuai sih un.
43012008	Ajiahchu migentheite na kawmvah aumzing va, hizongleh kei chu na kawmvah ka umzing sih diing hi,” achi hi.
43012009	Hujiahin Judate tampi in Amah hutah ah aum chih aheta va, Jesu jiah chauh hilouin, misi lah apat akaihthoh Lazar zong amuhnop jiahun ahung uhi.
43012010	Hizongleh Lazar zong athah theihna diingun siampu lalte chu akihou uhi.
43012011	Ajiahchu amah jiahin Judate tampi apaimang va, Jesu agingtata uhi.
43012012	Ajiingni in kuut a hung mi tampite’n Jesu Jerusalem ah ahung diing ahi chih ajaah tahun,
43012013	tuum nahte atawi va, Amah lamtuaah diingin apawtdoh uhi. Huleh, “Hosanna! ‘LALPA min a hung paipa chu ahampha hi!’ Israelte Kumpipa ngeei chu!” achi uhi.
43012014	Huleh Jesu’n sabiltung tal gual khat amu a, a tungah atuang hi;
43012015	“Lau sin, Zion tanu, en in, na Kumpipa chu sabiltung talgual tunga tuangin ahung hi,” chia gelh bangin.
43012016	Nungjuite’n hi silte a tuungin ahesiam sih uhi; hizongleh Jesu paahtawia aum nungin hi thute Amah tungtaanga kigial ahi a, huleh a tungah hi silte abawl uh ahi chih ahung hedohta uhi.
43012017	Hujiahin haan apat Lazar akouhdoh a, misi lah apat akaihthoh laia a kawma umte’n a thu aheetpih uhi.
43012018	Hikhu jiahin mipite’n zong hi chiamchihna abawl chih ajaah jiahun Amah analamtuaah uhi.
43012019	Hujiahin Pharisaite akihou va, “Bangma na loh thei sih uh chih na he viai? En un, khovel in Amah ajuita hi!” chiin.
43012020	Huleh Pathian be diinga kuut a hungte lahah Grikmi hon khat aum va,
43012021	hujiahin amahuh chu Galili gam a Bethsaida khua a um Philip kawmah ahung va, “Pu, Jesu muh ka uut uh,” chiin angeen uhi.
43012022	Philip chu ahung a, Andru ahilh a, Andru leh Philip in Jesu ahilh uhi.
43012023	Huleh Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Mihing Tapa paahtawia aumna diing hun atungta hi.
43012024	Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, buhtang khat lei a akiaah a, asih louh leh, a ngenin aum zing hi; hizongleh asih inchu, tampiin agah veu hi.
43012025	Koipouh a hinna iit in ataan diing a, huleh koipouh hi leitung a a hinna hua in kumtuang hinna dongin ahuumbit diing hi.
43012026	Koipouh in ka nna atoh leh, hung jui heh; huleh ka umna ah ka suaahpa zong aum diing ahi. Mi koipouh in ka nna atoh leh, ka Pa in amah akipaahpih diing hi.
43012027	“Tuin ka hinna amangbang hi, bang ahiai ka soi diing? ‘Pa, hi hun lahah hung hunkhia in,’ ka chi diing adiai? Himahleh hikhu diing jiaha hi hun a hung ka hi ngaala.
43012028	Pa, na min paahtawi in,” achi hi. Huin vaan apat aw ahung suaah a, “Ka paahtawita a, ka paahtawi kiit diing hi,” chiin.
43012029	Hujiahin a kawma ding mipi leh hukhu jate’n vaan ging ahi, achi va; adangte’n lah, “Angel in Amah ahoupih ahi,” achi uhi.
43012030	Jesu’n adawng a, “Hi aw chu kei diinga hung suaah ahi sih a, nanguh diinga hung suaah ahijaw hi.
43012031	Tu chu hi khovel vaihawm lai ahi, hi khovel lal chu tuin paihkhiah ahi diing hi.
43012032	Huleh kei chu lei apat khaikaanga ka um leh, mi zousiah ka kawmah ka hiip diing hi,” achi hi.
43012033	Hichu Ama’n bangtobang sihna in ahiai asih diing chih heetsahna a asoi ahi.
43012034	Mipite’n Amah adawng va, “Khrist chu kumtuangin aum zing diing chih daan thu apat ka ja uhi. Bangchidaana nang in, ‘Mihing Tapa khaikaanga aum ngeei diing ahi,’ na chih ahiai? Mihing Tapa chu koi ahiai?” achi uhi.
43012035	Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Hun tomchakhat vaah na lahvah aum hi. Vaah na neih laiun mial in ahung lap louhna diingin khohei un; ajiahchu koipouh mial a khohei in khoilama pai ahih ahe sih hi.
43012036	“Vaah tate na hung hih theihna diingun vaah na neih laiun vaah chu gingta un,”achi hi. Hi thute Jesu’n asoi zohin apawt a, amahuh apat akibuta hi.
43012037	Hizongleh a ma vah chiamchihna tampi bawl zongleh Amah agingta tuan sih uhi.
43012038	Zawlnei Isai in, “Lalpa, ka thusoi uh koi in ahiai gingta? Huleh LALPA khut zong koi kawmah ahiai akilat?” chia asoi ahung taangtun theihna diingin.
43012039	Hujiahin agingta thei sih uh, ajiahchu Isai in,
43012040	“Ama’n a mit va amuh theihlouhna diingun a mit uh asuhtawtsah a, a lungtang va aheetsiam louhna diingun a lungtang uh asuhkhauhsah ahi, huchilou inchu a lungtang un ahesiam diingva ahung kiheikiit kha diing va, huchiin ke’n amahuh ka na suhdam kha diing hi,” achi kiit hi.
43012041	Hi thute chu Isai in Lalpa loupina amuh laia asoi ahi a, huleh Amah tungtaang thu asoina ahi.
43012042	Ahihvaangin vaihawmtu lamkaite lahah zong tampi’n Jesu agingta va, hizongleh Pharisaite jiahin Amah asoiphuang ngam sih uhi; huchilou inchu sinagog apat nohdohin aum kha diing uhi.
43012043	Ajiahchu amah un Pathian kipaahpiha um saangin mihingte kipaahpiha um adeihjaw uhi.
43012044	Hizongleh Jesu chu akikou a, “Koipouh kei hung gingta chu, kei hung gingta ahi sih a, ahung sawlpa gingta ahijaw hi.
43012045	Huleh koipouh kei hung mu chu ahung sawlpa mu ahi.
43012046	Koipouh ahung gingta chu mial a aum zing louhna diingin vaah diinga khovel a hung ka hi.
43012047	“Mi koipouh in ka thusoite jain gingta sih mahzongleh, ke’n ka vaihawm sih hi; ajiahchu khovel vaihawm diinga hung ka hi sih a, khovel hundam diinga hung ka hijaw hi.
43012048	Koipouh kei hung deihlou a, ka thusoite zong pomlou in siamlouhtangsahtu khat anei hi, ka thusoite mahmah in ni tawpni chiangin amah siamlouh atangsah diing hi.
43012049	Ajiahchu keimah phuaahtawmin ka soi sih a, hizongleh Pa, kei hung sawlpa’n ka soi diing leh ka hilh diing thu ahung pia hi.
43012050	Huleh a thupiaah chu kumtuang hinna ahi chih ka he hi. Hujiahin ka soi pouhmah chu Pa in ka kawma asoi bangin ka soi ahi,” achi hi.
43013001	Huleh Chiahkaan Kuut main, Jesu’n hi khovel apat paimanga Pa kawma achiah diing hun ahung tungta chih aheet tahin, khovel a um a mite chu analungsiatta a, amahuh chu a tawp tanin alungsiat hi.
43013002	Huin nitaah an neeh laiin diabol in Simon tapa Juda Iskariot lungtang ah Jesu matsah diing angaihtuahsah zouta hi.
43013003	Jesu’n Pa in sil bangkim a khut ah apeta chih leh Pathian apat a hung a, Pathian kawma chiah kiit diing ahih daan hein,
43013004	nitaah an uumlaiin ading a, a puansilh akoih a, kisiaahna puan lain ateeng hi.
43013005	Huleh kisilna kuang sunga tui asun zohin a nungjuite keeng asilsah a, kisiaahna puan ateen in asiaah jui peh hi.
43013006	Huin Simon Peter kawmah ahung a, Peter in a kawmah, “Lalpa, nang in maw ka keeng na sil diing?” achi hi.
43013007	Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Ka silbawl nang tuin na he sih a, hizongleh tunung chiangin na hung he diing hi,” achi hi.
43013008	Peter in a kawmah, “Ka keeng na sil hial sih diing,” achi hi. Jesu’n adawng a, “Ka hung sil louh leh, ka kawmah tan bangmah na nei sih diing,” achi hi.
43013009	Simon Peter in a kawmah, “Lalpa, ka keeng chauh hilouin, ka khut leh ka lu zong hung sil in,” achi hi.
43013010	Jesu’n a kawmah, “Koipouh kisilsa in a keeng loungaal sil amamoh sih hi; huleh nanguh chu na siang uhi, hizongleh na bawnun chu hilouin,” achi hi.
43013011	Ajiahchu Ama’n amansah diingpa ahe a, hujiahin “Na bawnva siang veh lou na hi uh,” achih ahi.
43013012	Huchiin a keeng uh asil zoh a, puansilh la a, atou kiit zohin a kawmvah, “Na tungva ka silbawl bang ahiai na he viai?
43013013	Nang un kei chu Houtupa leh Lalpa na hung chi va, na hung chi dih ngeei uh, ajiahchu ka hi him ahi.
43013014	Kei, Lalpa leh Houtupa in na keeng uh ka sil leh, nanguh zong khat leh khat keeng na kisilsah diing uh ahi.
43013015	Na tungva ka bawl banga na bawlna diingun na etton diing uh ka hung pia ahi.
43013016	Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, suaah chu a pu saangin alianjaw sih a, huleh thupotu zong a sawltu saangin alianjaw sih hi.
43013017	Hi silte hein bawl hileh uh chin, mihampha na hi diing uhi.
43013018	“Na bawnva thu ka soi sih, ka teelte ke’n ka he hi; hizongleh huchu ‘Ka tanghou nepa ngeei in ka tungah a khetuul alehta hi,’ chih Pathian Lehkhathu ataangtun theihna diing ahi.
43013019	“Ahung tun chianga Amah ka hi chih na gintaat theihna diingun ahung tun main tuin ka hung hilh ahi.
43013020	Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh ka mi sawl taphot pom chu kei hung pom ahi; huleh koipouh kei hung pom in ahung sawlpa apom ahi,” achi hi.
43013021	Jesu’n hi asoi zohin a lungsim amangbang a, “Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, na lahva khat in ahung mansah diing,” chiin ahesahta hi.
43013022	Nungjuite’n koipeen ahiai asoi chih helouin akientuah uhi.
43013023	Huleh a nungjuite laha khat, Jesu’n alungsiatpa chu Jesu aanga kingaiin aum hi.
43013024	Hujiahin Simon Peter in koi thu ahiai asoi chih dong diingin amah chu mitmei in ahoupih hi.
43013025	Huin Jesu kawma nungjui kingaipa’n a kawmah, “Lalpa, koipeen ahiai?” achi hi.
43013026	Jesu’n amah adawng a, “Tanghou them ka diah a, ka piaah peenpeen chu amah ahi,” achi hi. Huin tanghou them adiah zohin Simon tapa Juda Iskariot kawmah apia hi.
43013027	Huleh tanghou them apiaah zohin Setan chu a sungah aluutta a, Jesu’n a kawmah, “Na bawl diing chu kintahin bawl in,” achi hi.
43013028	Hizongleh dohkaan kiim a toute koimah in bang chihna a hu thu a kawma asoi ahiai chih ahe sih uhi.
43013029	Ajiahchu Juda in dangka-ip akol jiaha Jesu’n a kawma, “Kuut a i mamoh diing silte lei in,” chi ahihlouhleh gentheite kawma bang aha khat apiaah diing chi aha hiin a lahva khenkhat in angaihtuah uhi.
43013030	Huin tanghou them alaah zohin amah chu apawtdoh pah a, hu hun chu jaan ahi.
43013031	Hujiahin Juda apawtdoh nungin Jesu’n, “Tuin chu Mihing Tapa paahtawiin aumta, huleh Pathian zong Amah ah paahtawiin aum hi.
43013032	Amah a Pathian paahtawia aum inchu, Pathian in Amah ngeei ah Amah apaahtawi diing a, apaahtawi pahngaal diing hi.
43013033	“Ta deihtahte, tomchakhat na lahvah ka um tadih hi. Nang un na hung hawl diing va, Judate kawmah, ‘Ka chiahna ah na hung thei sih diing uh,’ ka chih mahbangin, tuin na kawmvah ka chi ahi.
43013034	Thupiaah thah na kawmvah ka hung pia hi, khat leh khat kilungsiat un; ke’n nanguh ka hung lungsiat bangin nanguh zong khat leh khat kilungsiat un.
43013035	Khat leh khat na kilungsiat uh leh, mi zousiah in ka nungjuite na hi uh chih ahe diing uhi,” achi hi.
43013036	Simon Peter in Amah kawmah, “Lalpa, khoiah ahiai na chiah diing?” achi hi. Jesu’n amah adawng a, “Ka chiahna diing ah tuin na hung jui thei sih diing uh, himahleh tunung chiangin na hung jui thei diing uhi,” achi hi.
43013037	Peter in a kawmah, “Lalpa, bangjiahin ahiai tua ka hung juih theih louh diing? Nang diingin ka hinna ka pe diing hi,” achi hi.
43013038	Jesu’n amah adawng a, “Keimah jiahin na hinna na pe diing maw? Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, nangma’n thumvei na hung kiheetmohbawl main aah akhuang sih diing hi.
43014001	“Na lungtang uh mangbangsah sih un, Pathian na gingta uh, kei zong hung gingta un.
43014002	Ka Pa inn ah umna tampi aum; umlou hileh, ka hung hilhta diing hi. Ajiahchu nanguh diinga mun bawla chiah diing ka hi.
43014003	Huleh ka chiah a, nanguh diinga mun ka bawl leh, ka hung kiit diing a huleh ka umna a nanguh zong na um theihna diingun ka kawmah nanguh ka hung la diing hi.
43014004	Khoia ka chiah diing na he va, a lampi zong na he uh,” achi hi.
43014005	Thomas in a kawmah, “Lalpa, khoia na chiah diing ka he sih uh, a lampi bangchiin ka he diviai?” achi hi.
43014006	Jesu’n a kawmah, “Kei lampi leh thutah leh hinna chu ka hi. Keimah a pailouin koimah Pa kawm atung ngei sih hi.
43014007	Kei hung he hileh uh chin, ka Pa zong na heta diing uh; huleh tu apat Amah na he va, muh zong na muta uhi,” achi hi.
43014008	Philip in a kawmah, “Lalpa, Pa chu keiuh hung musah in, huchiin keiuh diingin ahuntawh diing,” achi hi.
43014009	Jesu’n a kawmah, “Philip, hi tan veipi na kawmah ka um a, huchiin zong na hung he nai sih maw? Koipouh kei hung mu in Pa amu ahi, bangchidaana ‘Pa chu keiuh hung musah in,’ na chih ahiaimah?
43014010	Kei Pa ah ka um a, Pa kei ah aum chih gingta lou na hiaimah? Na kawmva ka thusoite, keimah thu in ka soi sih a, hizongleh Pa kei a um in, nna atong hi.
43014011	Kei Pa ah ka um a, Pa kei ah aum chih hung gingta un, ahihlouhleh silbawlte jiah beeh in hung gingta un.
43014012	Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, koipouh kei hung gingta in chu ka silbawlte ama’n zong abawl ve diing hi; ka Pa kawma ka chiah diing jiahin, hite saanga loupijaw zong abawl diing hi.
43014013	Tapa a Pa chu paahtawia aum theihna diingin, ka min a na nget photmah uh, huchu ka bawl diing hi.
43014014	Ka min a bangpouh na nget un chu, ka bawl diing hi.
43014015	“Kei na hung lungsiat uh leh, ka thupiaahte jui un.
43014016	Huleh na kawmva kumtuanga um diingin Pa ka ngeen diing a, Ama’n Panpihtu dang ahung pe diing hi,
43014017	khovel in aneih theih louh thutah Hagau ngeei chu, ajiahchu Amah amu sih va, he zong ahe sih uhi; ahihvaangin nang un chu Amah na he uh, ajiahchu na kawmvah aum a huleh na sungvah aum diing hi.
43014018	Tagah bangin ka hung nuse sih diing a, na kawmvah ka hung diing hi.
43014019	Tomchakhat nungin khovel in kei ahung mu nawn sih diing hi, hizongleh nang un chu na hung mu diing uhi. Kei ka hing jiahin, nanguh zong na hing diing uhi.
43014020	Hu ni chiangin kei ka Pa ah ka um a, nanguh kei ah na um uh chih leh kei nanguh ah ka um chih na he diing uhi.
43014021	Koipouh ka thupiaahte nei a, jui chu kei hung lungsiat ahi. Huleh koipouh kei hung lungsiat chu ka Pa lungsiatin aum diing a, ke’n amah ka lungsiat diing a, a kawmah ka kisulang diing hi,” achi hi.
43014022	Iskariot hiloupeen Juda in a kawmah, “Lalpa, keiuh kawmah kisulang a, khovel kawma na kisuhlat louh diing bangchidaan ahiai?” achi hi
43014023	Jesu’n adawng a, a kawmah, “Mi koipouh in ahung lungsiat leh, ka thu ajui diing hi; huleh ka Pa’n amah alungsiat diing a, a kawmah ka hung diing va, amah toh ka umkhawm zing diing uhi.
43014024	Koipouh ahung lungsiat louin ka thusoite ajui sih hi; thu na jaahte uh keimah a ahi sih a, Pa kei hung sawlpa a ahijaw hi.
43014025	“Na kawmva ka um taahdih sungin hi thute na kawmvah ka soi ahi.
43014026	Hizongleh Pa’n ka min a ahung sawl diing Panpihtu, Hagau Siangthou in sil zousiah nanguh ahung hilh diing a, huleh thu na kawmva ka soisa photmah nanguh ahung hedohsah diing hi.
43014027	Hamuanna ka hung nuutsiat hi, ka hamuanna ka hung pia hi; khovel in apiaah bangin ke’n nanguh ka hung pe sih. Na lungtang uh mangbangsah sih unla, lau zong lausah sih un.
43014028	“‘Ka chiahmang diing a, na kawmvah ka hung kiit diing,’ chia na kawmva ka soi na jata uhi. Kei na hung lungsiat un chu, ‘Pa kawmah ka chiah diing,’ ka chih jiahin na nuam diing uh, ajiahchu ka Pa kei saangin alianjaw hi.
43014029	A hun atun chianga na gintaat theihna diingun tuin ahung tun main ka hung hilhta hi.
43014030	Tu kalsiah na kawmvah thu tampi ka soi nawn sih diing hi, ajiahchu hi khovel vaihawmtu ahung hi, ama’n keimah ah bangmah anei sih hi.
43014031	Hizongleh khovel in keima’n Pa ka lungsiat ahi chih aheet theihna diingun, Pa in ahung thupiaah bangin ka bawl ahi. Thou un, hi apatin i chiah diing uhi.
43015001	“Kei grepgui dihtah chu ka hi, huleh ka Pa chu a huan enkoltu ahi.
43015002	Keimah a baa gahlou photmah chu alamang veu a, agah tam seem theihna diingin agah photmah chu ahahsiang veu hi.
43015003	Tuin nanguh chu na kawmva ka thusoi tungtawnin na siangzouta uhi.
43015004	Keimah ah um ngiitngeet un, kei zong nanguh ah ka um ngiitngeet diing hi. Baa in grepgui a aum ngiitngeet louhngaal leh, amah ngen a agah theih louh mahbangin, nanguh zong keimah a na um ngiitngeet louh uh leh na gah thei sih diing uhi.
43015005	“Kei grepgui chu ka hi, nanguh a baate na hi uh, koipouh keimah a aum ngiitngeet leh, kei amah a ka um ngiitngeetnapa chu tampi in agah veu hi; ajiahchu keimah louin bangma na bawl thei sih uhi.
43015006	Mi koipouh keimah a aum ngiitngeet louh leh, baa bangin paihdohin aum a, avuai veu hi; huleh mite’n amahuh atomkhawm va mei ah apaai va, akaang veu uhi.
43015007	Keimah a na um ngiitngeet va, huleh ka thu zong nanguh a aum ngiitngeet inchu, na uut-uut uh na ngeen diing va, huchu ahung kibawlsah diing hi.
43015008	Tampi a na gahna vah, ka Pa paahtawiin aum hi; huchiin ka nungjuite na hi diing uhi.
43015009	“Pa’n kei ahung lungsiat bangin ke’n nanguh ka hung lungsiat hi; ka lungsiatna ah um ngiitngeet un.
43015010	Ke’n ka Pa thupiaahte ka juih a, a lungsiatna a ka um ngiitngeet mahbangin, nang un ka thupiaahte na juih uh leh, ka lungsiatna ah na um ngiitngeet diing uhi.
43015011	Ka kipaahna nanguh a aumden theihna diing leh na kipaahna uh abukim theihna diingin hi thute na kawmvah ka soi ahi.
43015012	Ke’n nanguh ka hung lungsiat bangin nanguh zong khat leh khat kilungsiat un, chih hi ka thupiaah ahi.
43015013	Mi’n a lawmte diinga a hinna apiaah saanga lianjaw lungsiatna koima’n anei sih hi.
43015014	Thu ka hung piaah photmah na bawl un chu, ka lawmte na hi diing uhi.
43015015	Suaahte ka hung chi nawn sih diing hi, ajiahchu suaah in a pu in bang abawl ahe sih hi; lawmte ka hung chi jawta diing hi, ajiahchu ka Pa kawma ka jaah zousiah na kawmvah ka hung hesahta hi.
43015016	Nang un kei na hung teel sih va, hizongleh chiah a gah diing leh na gah uh umzing diingin ke’n nanguh ka hung teelin ka hung guatjaw hi, huchia ka min a Pa kawma na nget photmah uh ahung piaah theihna diingin.
43015017	Hi thute ka hung pia hi, khat leh khat kilungsiat un.
43015018	“Khovel in nanguh ahung huat leh, nanguh ahung huat main kei ahung haw zouta chih he un.
43015019	Khovel a hileh uh chin, khovel in amah a alungsiat diing hi. Hizongleh khovel a hilou a, khovel apat a ka hung teeldoh na hihjawh jiahun khovel in nanguh ahung hua ahi.
43015020	‘Suaah a pu saangin alianjaw sih,’ chih na kawmva ka thusoi hezing un. Amah un kei ahung suhduhdah un chu, nanguh zong ahung suduhdah diing uhi; ka thusoite ajuih uh leh, na thusoite uh zong ajui diing uhi.
43015021	Hizongleh ahung sawlpa aheet louh jiahun ka min jiahin hi silte zousiah na tungvah abawl diing uhi.
43015022	Kei hung loua a kawmva thu soi lou hileng, sualna neilou diing hi va, hizongleh tuin chu a sualna uh ngaihdamna diing aneita sih uhi.
43015023	Koipouh kei hung hua in ka Pa zong ahua ahi.
43015024	Midang koima bawl ngeilouh natohte a lahva bawllou hileng, sualna neilou diing hi va, hizongleh tuin chu muh zong ahung muta va, huleh kei leh ka Pa ka nih un hua zong ahung hua uhi.
43015025	Hizongleh hichu, ‘Amah un ajiah beiin ahung mudah uh,’ chih a daanbu va kigial thu ataangtunna diinga hung um ahi.
43015026	“Hizongleh Pa kawm apat na kawmva ka hung sawl diing, Pa apat hung pawt, Panpihtu, thutah Hagau ahung tun chiangin, Ama’n ka tanchin ahung heetpih diing hi.
43015027	Huleh achiil apat a ka kawma um na hih jiahun nanguh zong heetpihtuin na pang diing uhi.
43016001	“Kipalpuuhsaha na um louhna diingun hi thute na kawmvah ka soi ahi.
43016002	Sinagogte ah ahung nohdoh diing va; ahi, koipouh nanguh hung that in Pathian natong banga akingaihtuah hun uh ahung tung diing hi.
43016003	Huleh Pa leh kei ahung heet louh jiahun hi silte na tungvah abawl diing uhi.
43016004	Hizongleh ahun ahung tun chianga hute ka hung hilhta chih na heetdohna diingun hi silte nanguh ka hung hilhta ahi. Na kawmva ka um jiahin hi thute achiil in na kawmvah ka soi sih hi.
43016005	“Hizongleh tuin chu ahung sawlpa kawma chiah diing ka hi a, koimah in, ‘Khoia chiah diing na hiai?’ chiin na hung dong sih uhi.
43016006	Hizongleh hi thute na kawmva ka soi jiahin na lungtang uh lungkhamna in adimta hi.
43016007	Hizongleh thutah ka hung hilh hi, nanguh diingin ka chiahmang ahoihjaw hi; ajiahchu ka chiahmang louh leh, Panpihtu na kawmvah ahung sih diing hi; ka chiah inchu, na kawmvah Amah ka hung sawl diing hi.
43016008	Amah ahung tun chiangin sualna lam leh dihtatna lam leh vaihawmna lam tungtaang ah khovel siamlouh daan ahesah diing hi.
43016009	Kei ahung gintaat louh jiahun sual thu ah siamlouh atangsah diing hi.
43016010	Ka Pa kawma chiah a, na hung muh nawn louh diing jiahun, dihtatna thu ah siamlouh atangsah diing hi.
43016011	Hi khovel lal chu vaihawmsaha aumtaah jiahin vaihawmna thu ah siamlouh atangsah diing hi.
43016012	“Na kawmvah soi diing tampi ka nei a, hizongleh tuin na po zou nai sih uhi.
43016013	Hizongleh thutah Hagau ahung tun chiangin Ama’n nanguh thutah zousiah he diingin ahung pui diing hi; ajiahchu Ama’n phuaahthuh in thu asoi sih diing a, hizongleh ajaah photmah chu asoi jaw diing hi; huleh sil hung tung diingte ahung musah diing hi.
43016014	Ama’n kei ahung paahtawi diing hi, ajiahchu kei a ala diing a nanguh ahung musah diing hi.
43016015	Pa sil neih zousiah kei a ahi. Hujiahin Ama’n keimah a ala diing a, nanguh kawmah ahung phuangdoh diing ka chi hi.
43016016	“Pa kawma ka chiah diing jiahin tomchakhat nung chiangin nang un na hung mu nawn sih diing uh, huleh tomchakhat nung chiangin na hung mu kiit diing uhi,” achi hi.
43016017	Huin a nungjuite khenkhat in, “‘Tomchakhat nung chiangin kei na hung mu nawn sih diing uh; huleh tomchakhat nung chiangin kei na hung mu kiit diing uhi,’ achih khu toh, ‘Pa kawm a ka chiah diing jiahin,’ i kawma achih khu bang achihna adiai?” chiin akihou uhi.
43016018	Hujiahin amah un, “Hi a thusoi, ‘Tomchakhat nung chian,’ achih bang achihna ahiai? i he sih uh,” achi uhi.
43016019	Huchiin Amah adong nuam uh chih Jesu’n ahe a, a kawmvah, “‘Tomchakhat nung chian na hung mu nawn sih diing uh; huleh tomchakhat nung chian na hung mu kiit diing uh,’ chia ka soi na kidongtuah uh ahi maw?
43016020	Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, nanguh na kap diing va, na maau diing uh, hizongleh khovel akipaah diing; nanguh chu na lunggim diing va, hizongleh na lunggimna uh kipaahna suaahsah ahi diing hi.
43016021	Numei in a nau avei laiin na athuaah hi; hizongleh ahun atuntaah jiahin mihing khat khovel a ahung pian kipaahna jiahin nau asuaah zoh tahin hu hahsatna chu ahe nawn sih hi.
43016022	Hujiahin tuin lunggimna na nei uh ahi; hizongleh nanguh ka hung mu kiit diing a, na lungtang uh akipaah diing a, huleh na kipaahna uh koima’n ahung laahsah sih diing hi.
43016023	Hu ni chiangin nang un bangmah na hung dong sih diing uhi. Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, ka min a Pa kawma na nget photmah uh Ama’n nanguh ahung pe diing hi.
43016024	Tutanin ka min in bangmah na ngeen nai sih uhi. Na kipaahna uh akimna diingin, ngeen un, na mu diing uhi.
43016025	“Hi thute etsahna in na kawmvah ka soi ahi; hizongleh etsahna a na kawmva thu soi nawn lou a, Pa tungtaang chiantaha ka hung heetsah diing hun tung diing ahita.
43016026	Hu ni chiangin ka min in na hung ngeen diing uh, huleh nanguh diingin Pa kawmah ka ngeen diing ka chi ahi sih hi.
43016027	Ajiahchu nang un kei na hung lungsiat va, Pathian apat hung ka hi chih na gintaat jiahun Pa ngeei in nanguh ahung lungsiat hi.
43016028	Pa apat hung a khovel a hung ka hi. Huleh khovel nusia a Pa kawma chiah kiit diing ka hi,” achi hi.
43016029	A nungjuite’n a kawmah, “Ngai in, tuin chu etsahna in na soi sih a, chiantahin na soita hi.
43016030	Tuin chu silbangkim na he a, koimah in ahung dot na kiphamoh sih chih ka hechianta uhi. Hikhu jiahin Pathian akipan a hung pawt na hi chih ka gingta uhi,” achi uhi.
43016031	Jesu’n amahuh adawng a, “Tuin na gingta uh maw?
43016032	Ngai un, a hun ahung tung diing ahi, tuin zong atungta, mi chin na inn chiat vah na kithehdalh diing va, ka ngenin na hung nuse diing uhi. Ahihvaangin Pa ka kawma aum jiahin ka tang ka hi sih hi.
43016033	Keimah a hamuanna na neihna diingun hi thute na kawmvah ka soi ahi. Khovel ah gimthuaahna na nei uh, hizongleh hamuangtahin um un, ke’n khovel ka zouta hi,” achi hi.
43017001	Hi thute Jesu’n asoi zohin, vaanlam aentou a, “Pa, a hun atungta; na Tapa paahtawi in, na Tapa’n zong nangmah ahung paahtawi theihna diingin.
43017002	Nangma’n mi na hung piaahte tunga thuneihna na hung piaah bangin, mi na hung piaah zousiah tungah kumtuang hinna ka pe diing hi.
43017003	Huleh hichu ahi kumtuang hinna, nang Pathian tah chauh leh na sawl Jesu Khrist aheet theihna diing uh chu.
43017004	Leitung ah ka hung paahtawita a, bawl diinga na hung piaah nna ka tong zouta hi.
43017005	Tuin aw Pa, khovel um ma a na kawma ka neih loupina toh, nang ngeei toh hung paahtawi khawm in.
43017006	“Khovel apat a na hung piaahte kawmah na min ka sulangta hi. Amahuh nang a ahi va, kei kawmah na hung pia a, huleh na thu ajuita uhi.
43017007	Nangma’n ka kawma na hung piaahte photmah nangmah apat ahi chih tuin aheta uhi.
43017008	Ajiahchu nang in thu na hung piaahte a kawmvah ka peta hi; huleh amah un apomta va, tahzetin nang apat a hung ka hi chih aheta uh; huleh na hung sawl ahi chih agingtata uhi.
43017009	Amahuh diingin ka ngetsah hi. Khovel a diingin ka ngetsah sih hi, hizongleh nang in na hung piaahte diingin ka ngetsah jaw hi, ajiahchu amahuh nang a ahi uhi.
43017010	Kei a zousiah nang a ahi a, nang a zousiah kei a ahi, huleh amah vah paahtawiin ka um hi.
43017011	Tuin kei khovel ah ka um nawn sih diing a, hizongleh hite khovel ah aum diing va, huleh kei na kawmah ka hung diing hi. Pa siangthou, ei pumkhat i hih mahbanga amahuh zong pumkhat ahih theihna diingun, nang na hung piaahte na min in keem in.
43017012	Khovel a amahuh toh ka um sungin ka kawma na hung piaahte na min in ka keem hi. Amahuh ka keemta a, Pathian Lehkhathu ataangtun theihna diingin mangthang tapa loungaal khat beeh amangthang sih uhi.
43017013	Tuin na kawmah hung diing ka hita, huleh amahuh a ka kipaahna abukim theihna diingin hi silte khovel ah ka soi ahi.
43017014	Na thu amahuh ka peta a, kei khovel a ka hihlouh mahbanga amahuh khovel a ahihlouh jiahun, khovel in amahuh ahua hi.
43017015	Amahuh khovel apat a lamang diingin ka hung ngeen ahi sih a, hizongleh migiloupa apat veeng diingin ka hung ngeen ahijaw hi.
43017016	Amahuh khovel a ahi sih uh, kei khovel a ka hihlouh mahbangin.
43017017	Na thutah in amahuh koihsiangthou in, na thu chu thutah ahi.
43017018	Kei khovel a na hung sawl mahbangin, ke’n zong amahuh khovel ah ka sawl hi.
43017019	Thutah a amahuh zong suhsiangthou ahih theihna diingun, amahuh jiahin ka kisusiangthou hi.
43017020	“Hite a diing chauhin ka ngeen sih a, hizongleh a thu jiahva kei hung gingta diingte a diingin zong ka hung ngeen hi,
43017021	huchia pumkhat ahih theihna diingun, Pa, nang keimah a na um a, kei nangmah a ka um banga amahuh zong eimah a pumkhat ahih theihna diingun; huleh nang in na hung sawl chih khovel in agintaat theihna diingin.
43017022	Huleh ei pumkhat i hih banga amahuh zong pumkhat ahih theihna diingun nang in na hung piaah loupina amahuh ka peta hi:
43017023	kei amahuh ah, nang kei ah, huchia amahuh kipumkhat-a suhbukim ahihtheihna diingun, huleh khovel in nang in kei na hung sawl chih aheetna diing leh kei na hung lungsiat banga khovel in amahuh alungsiat theihna diingin.
43017024	“Pa Aw, kei na hung piaah loupina amah un amuh theihna diingun, kei na hung piaahte zong ka umna a kei toh aum diing uh ka deih hi; ajiahchu khovel siam ma pehin kei na hung lungsiatta hi.
43017025	Aw Pa dihtat, khovel in nang ahung he sih a, hizongleh ke’n chu ka hung he hi; huleh nang na hung sawl chih hite’n aheta uhi.
43017026	Huleh keimah na hung lungsiatna a kawmva aum theihna diing leh kei amahuh a ka um theihna diingin, a kawmvah na min ka hesahta a, ka hesah jeel diing hi,” achi hi.
43018001	Jesu’n hi thute asoi zohin a nungjuite toh Kidron Luuita gaal ah achiah va, hutah ah huan khat aum a, hutah ah a nungjuite toh aluut uhi.
43018002	Huleh amansahpa Juda in zong a mun ahe hi, Jesu a nungjuite toh hu lamah avaah veu uh chih aheet jiahin.
43018003	Huin Juda in siampu lalte leh Pharisaite apat biahinn veengtu houtute leh sepaih pawl puiin thaumeite leh meiselte leh gaalvante tawiin hutah ah ahungta hi.
43018004	Hujiahin Jesu’n a tunga siltung diing zousiah hein apawtdoh a, a kawmvah, “Koi ahiai na hawl uh?” achi hi.
43018005	Amah un adawng va, “Nazareth Jesu,” achi uhi. Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Kei ka hi,” achi hi. Huleh amansahpa Juda zong ading hi.
43018006	Huin, “Kei ka hi,” achih tahin anungtawl va, lei ah apuuh uhi.
43018007	Huin Ama’n, “Koi ahiai na hawl uh?” chiin adong kiit hi. Amah un, “Nazareth Jesu,” achi uhi.
43018008	Jesu’n adawng a, “Kei ka hi chiin ka hung hilhta hi. Hujiahin kei hung hawl na hih uh leh, hi mite chiahsah un,” achi hi.
43018009	Huchiin, “Nang na hung piaahte khatmah zong ka mangsah sih hi,” chia Ama’n asoi ataangtun theihna diingin.
43018010	Huin Simon Peter in naamsau khat anei a, azandoh a, siampu lalpeen suaahpa asaat a, a bil jiatlam asaatkhiahsah hi. Hu suaahpa min chu Malka ahi.
43018011	Huin Jesu’n Peter kawmah, “Na naamsau a paai ah siat in. Ka Pa’n nou ahung piaah chu ka dawn sih diaimah?” achi hi.
43018012	Huin sepaih pawlte leh sepaih houtu leh biahinn veeng houtute’n Jesu chu aman va, akaan uhi.
43018013	Amasapeenin Anna kawmah apui uhi, ajiahchu amah hu kum a siampu lalpeen Kaiapha sungpa ahi.
43018014	Huleh Kaiapha chu mipite luanga mi khat sih ahoihjaw hi, chia Judate kawma hilhpa ahi.
43018015	Huleh Simon Peter in Jesu ajui a, huchibangmahin nungjui dang khat in zong ajui hi. Hu nungjuipa chu siampu lalpeen meelheet ahi a, siampu lalpeen innhuang sungah Jesu toh aluut khawm hi.
43018016	Hizongleh Peter chu polam ah kotkhaah bul ah ading hi. Huin nungjui khatpeen, siampu lalpeen meelheetpa chu avapawt a, kotkhaah ngaahnu kawmah asoi a, Peter ahung puiluut hi.
43018017	Huchiin kotkhaah ngaah suaah nungaahnu’n Peter kawmah, “Nang zong hi Pa nungjuite laha khat hilou na hi maw?” achi hi. Ama’n, “Ka hi sih,” achi hi.
43018018	Huleh suaahte leh houtute hutah ah ading va, avot jiahin suangmeihol achih va, a-awi uhi. Huleh Peter in zong amahuh toh ding khawmin mei a-awi hi.
43018019	Huin siampu lalpeen in Jesu kawmah a nungjuite tungtaang leh a thuhilhna tungtaang adong hi.
43018020	Jesu’n amah adawng a, “Alangtangin khovel kawmah thu ka soi a, Judate umkhawm zingna sinagogte leh Pathian biahinn ah thu ka hilh zing a, aguuhin bangmah ka soi sih hi.
43018021	Bang diinga nang un kei hung dong na hi viai? Ka thusoi jate kawmah dong un, ngai un, amah un ka soi ahe uhi,” achi hi.
43018022	Hutobang asoi zohin a kawma ding houtute laha khat in Jesu abeeng a, “Siampu lalpeen bang huchiin na dawng maw?” achi hi.
43018023	Jesu’n amah adawng a, “Thu dihlou ka soi leh, ka dihlouhna hung hesah in; hizongleh ahoih ka soi leh, bang diinga hung beeng na hiai?” achi hi.
43018024	Huin Anna in Amah chu kaansain siampu lalpeen Kaiapha kawmah asawlta hi.
43018025	Simon Peter in chu dingin mei a-awi hi. Hujiahin amah un a kawmah, “Nang zong nungjuite laha khat hilou na hi maw?” achi uhi. Ama’n akiheetmohbawl a, “Ka hi sih,” achi hi.
43018026	Peter in a bil asaatkhiahsahpa sanggam, siampu lalpeen suaahte khat in, “Huan ah Amah toh na um khawm uh ka hung mu sih eimah?” achi hi.
43018027	Peter in akiheetmohbawl kiit a, huleh aah akhuang pahta hi.
43018028	Huin amah un Jesu chu Kaiapha inn apat Praitoriam ah apuita va, huchu jiingkaal matah ahi; huleh amahuh chu Praitoriam sungah aluut sih uhi, huchilou inchu akisubuaah kha diing va, Chiahkaan an ane thei sih kha diing uhi.
43018029	Pilat chu a kawmvah ahung pawt a, “Hi Pa heehna bang ahiai na neih uh?” achi hi.
43018030	Amah un adawng va, a kawmah, “Amah migilou hi sih leh, na kawma hung pekhe het lou diing ka hi uh,” achi uhi.
43018031	Huin Pilat in a kawmvah, “Pui unla, na daan dungjuiun vaihawmsah un,” achi hi. Judate’n a kawmah, “Keiuh diingin mi suhlup daan ahi sih hi,” achi uhi.
43018032	Hichu bangchibanga asih diing thu Jesu’n asoi ataangtun theihna diingin ahi.
43018033	Huin Pilat chu Praitoriam sungah aluut kiit a, Jesu akou a, a kawmah, “Judate Kumpipa na hi maw?” achi hi.
43018034	Jesu’n adawng a, “Hikhu nangmah lungsim a suaah na soi ahiai? Ahihlouhleh midang in ka tungtaang thu ahung hilh ahiai?” achi hi.
43018035	Pilat in adawng a, “Kei Juda mi ka hiaimah? Na chipihte leh siampu lalte’n nang ka kawmah ahung pekhia uhi. Bang ahiai na bawltaah?” achi hi.
43018036	Jesu’n adawng a, “Ka lalgam hi khovel a ahi sih. Ka lalgam hi khovel a hitaleh, Judate khut a piaahkhiah ka hih louhna diingin ka suaahte’n adou diing uhi; hizongleh ka lalgam chu hitah ahi nai sih hi,” achi hi.
43018037	Hujiahin Pilat in a kawmah, “Ahihleh kumpipa na hi maw?” achi hi. Jesu’n adawng a, “Kumpipa na chih chu ka hi. Huleh hikhu diinga piang ka hi a, thutah heetpih diinga khovel a hung ka hi. Koipouh thutah a hi photmah in ka aw aja uhi,” achi hi.
43018038	Pilat in a kawmah, “Thutah chu bang ahiai?” achi hi. Huleh hikhu asoi zohin Judate kawmah apawt kiit a, a kawmvah, “Amah ah dihlouhna ka mu het sih hi.
43018039	Hizongleh Chiahkaan Kuut ni a mi khat ka hung hahdohsah diing ahi chih tawndaan khat na nei uhi. Hujiahin Judate Kumpipa hung hahdohsah leng na uut viai?” achi hi.

43019001	Hujiahin Pilat in Jesu chu puiin ajeepta hi.

43019019	Huleh Pilat in heetsahna khat agial a, kros tungah ataah a, akigial chu: NAZARETH JESU, JUDATE KUMPIPA, chih ahi.
43019020	Huchiin Jesu akilhbehna uh khopi naih ahih jiahin hu heetsahna chu Judami tampite’n asim uhi. Huleh hichu Hebrai haam, Grik haam leh Latin haam a kigial ahi.

43019024	Hujiahin amah un, “I botkeeh sih diing a, kuan tang diing ahiai ai i saan diing uh,” chiin akihou uhi. Pathian Lehkhathu in, “Ka puansilhte a lahvah ahawm va, ka silhleteen diingin ai asaan uhi,” achih ataangtunna diingin. Hujiahin hi silte sepaihte’n abawl uhi.
43019025	Huleh Jesu kros kawmah a nu leh a nu sanggamnu, Kleopa ji Mari leh Mari Magdalini ading uhi.

43019030	Huin Jesu’n uain thuuh achep zohin, “Zoh ahita,” achi hi. Huin a lu akuun a, a hagau ahahta hi.
43019031	Huleh Kisahkhawl ni ahih jiahin a luangte uh Sabbath ni a kros dawn a aum louhna diingin Pilat kawmah a keengte uh suhgawpsah a, a luang uh lamang diingin angeen uhi, ajiahchu Sabbath ni chu ni loupi ahi.
43019032	Hujiahin sepaihte ahung va, akikilhbehpih masapeenpa leh a khatpa a keeng uh asuhgawpsah uhi.
43019033	Hizongleh Jesu kawm ahung phaah tahun Amah anasi zouta chih ahung muh un, a keengte asuhgawpsah sih uhi.
43019034	Hizongleh sepaihte laha khat in teipi in a naah asun a, hutah ah sisan leh tui ahung pawtdoh pah hi.
43019035	Huleh hikhu mupa’n aheetpihta a, a sil heetpih chu adih ahi; huleh na gintaat theihna diingun ama’n thutah asoi hi chih ama’n ahe hi.
43019036	Ajiahchu Pathian Lehkhathu in, “A guh khat zong suhgawp ahi sih diing,” achih chu ataangtun theihna diingin hi silte ahung umta ahi.
43019037	Huleh Pathian Lehkhathu dang in, “Amah un asutpa uh aen diing uh,” achi hi.
43019038	Hi nungin Joseph, Arimathia mi, Jesu nungjui, hizongleh Judate alauh jiaha aguuha juipa in, Jesu luang alaah theihna diingin Pilat kawmah avangeen a, Pilat in anaphal hi. Hujiahin amah chu ahung a, Jesu luang alata hi.
43019039	Huleh Nikodem, a tuung a jaan a Jesu kawma hung pa zong ahung a, murrah leh aloe thau litra za khat veel ahung tawi hi.

43020002	Huin ataai a, Simon Peter leh Jesu’n alungsiat nungjui khatpeen kawmah ahung a, a kawmvah, “Haan apatin Lalpa alamangta va, khoitaha akoih uh akihe sih,” achi hi.

43020016	Jesu’n a kawmah, “Mari!” achi hi. Amahnu chu akihei a, a kawmah, “Rabboni!” achi hi, (huchu, Houtupa chihna ahi).

43020018	Mari Magdalini chu ahung a, nungjuite kawmah Lalpa amuh thu leh hi silte Ama’n a kawmah asoi hi chih ahilhta hi.

43021001	Hi silte nungin Jesu chu Tiberia Diil ah, a nungjuite kawmah akilaah kiit a, hitobangin akilaah hi:
43021002	Simon Peter toh, Thomas, Diduma kichi toh, Galili gam a Kana khua a um Nathanael toh, Zebedi tate toh, huleh a nungjui dang nih umkhawn ahi uhi.
43021003	Simon Peter in a kawmvah, “Ngamanin ka chiah diing,” achi hi. Amah un a kawmah, “Keiuh zong na kawmah ka hung diing uh,” achi uhi. Huin achiahdoh va, kuang khat sungah atou pah va, hu jaan in bangmah aman sih uhi.
43021004	Hizongleh jiingkaal ahung hihin Jesu chu diil pangah ading a, ahihvaangin nungjuite’n Jesu ahi chih ahe sih uhi.
43021005	Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Naute, neeh diing bang aha na nei viai?” achi hi. Amah un, “Nei lou,” chiin adawng uhi.
43021006	Huin Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Kuang jiatlam ah sep leh uh chin, na man diing uh,” achi hi. Huin amah un asep va, huchiin nga atam mahmah jiahin akaidoh zouta sih uhi.
43021007	Hujiahin Jesu’n a lungsiatpa’n Peter kawmah, “Lalpa ahi,” achi hi. Huin Simon Peter in Lalpa ahi chih ajaah tahin a puannaah tungnung asilh a (ajiahchu saguaaha um ahi), huin diil ah atawmluutta hi.
43021008	Huleh nungjui dangte chu leen a nga awhte kai kawmin, kuang neu khat in ahung uhi, ajiahchu piaugaw apat gamlataha um ahi sih va, fi t za thum giap ahi.
43021009	Huin piaugaw ahung tun tahun amah un suangmeihol kichih leh a tunga nga leh tanghou kikoih amu uhi.
43021010	Jesu’n a kawmvah, “Tua na nga matte uh khenkhat hung tawi un,” achi hi.
43021011	Simon Peter chu achiah tou a, nga lianpipi za leh sawmngaa leh thum a dim leen chu piaugaw ah ahung kaidoh hi. Huchilawma tam hizongleh leen chu akeeh sih hi.
43021012	Jesu’n a kawmvah, “An hung ne un,” achi hi. A nungjuite’n Lalpa ahi chih aheet jiahun koimah in, “Koi na hiai?” achi ngam sih uhi.
43021013	Hujiahin Jesu ahung a, tanghou ala a, a kawmvah apia a, hutobangmahin ngate zong apia hi.
43021014	Huchu Jesu’n sihna apat athohkiit nunga a nungjuite kawma akilaah a thumveina ahi.
43021015	Huchiin an aneeh zohun Jesu’n Simon Peter kawmah, “Simon, Jonah tapa, hite saangin kei na hung lungsiat jaw ei?” achi hi. Ama’n a kawmah, “Hi, Lalpa; ka hung lungsiat ahi chih na he hi,” achi hi. Jesu’n, “Ka belaamnoute vaah in,” achi hi.
43021016	Jesu’n anihveina in a kawmah, “Simon, Jonah tapa, na hung lungsiat ei?” achi hi. Simon in a kawmah, “Hi, Lalpa; ka hung lungsiat ahi chih na he hi,” achi hi. Jesu’n a kawmah, “Ka belaamte ching in,” achi hi.
43021017	Jesu’n a thumveina in a kawmah, “Simon, Jonah tapa, na hung lungsiat ei?” achi hi. Jesu’n a kawma thumvei, “Na hung lungsiat ei?” achih jiahin Peter chu alungkham hi. Huin ama’n a kawmah, “Lalpa, nang in sil zousiah na he a; ka hung lungsiat ahi chih na he hi,” achi hi. Jesu’n a kawmah, “Ka belaamte vaah in.
43021018	Chihtahzetin, chihtahzetin ka hung hilh ahi, na naupan laiin nang leh nang na kawng na kigaah a, na uutna lamlam ah na chiah veu hi. Hizongleh na hung upat chiangin chu na khut na jaah diing a, midang in ahung gaah diing a, na uutlouhna lamlam ah ahung pui diing hi,” achi hi.
43021019	Hichu Ama’n bangtobang sihna in ahiai ama’n Pathian apaahtawi diing chih heetsahna diinga asoi ahi. Huleh hikhu asoi zohin Ama’n a kawmah, “Hung jui in,” achi hi.
43021020	Huleh Peter akinunghei a, Jesu’n alungsiat nungjuipa in amahuh hung juiin amu hi. Hi pa chu nitaah an neehna a Jesu aang a kingaai a, “Lalpa, koi ahiai nang hung mansah diing?” chipa ahi.
43021021	Peter in amah amuh tahin Jesu kawmah, “Lalpa, hi pa bangchi diing ahiai?” achi hi.
43021022	Jesu’n a kawmah, “Ka hung masiaha amah um diinga ka deih leh, hukhu nang diingin bang ahiai? Nang hung jui in,” achi hi.
43021023	Hujiahin hu nungjuipa chu asi sih diing chiin unaute lahah hi thu kisoi chu athang vengvungta hi. Jesu’n lah a kawmah amah asi sih diing, achi sih a, hizongleh, “Ka hung masiaha amah um diinga ka deih leh, hukhu nang diingin bang ahiai?” chi ahijaw hi.
43021024	Hi silte heetpih leh gelhtu chu hi nungjuipa ahi a, huleh a heetpihna chu adih ahi chih ka he uhi.
43021025	Huleh Jesu’n abawl sildang tampi zong aum hi. Hute gelh kim veh diing hitaleh, lehkhabu kigial diingte chu khovel in zong dawllou diingin ka ngaihtuah hi. Amen.
44001001	Aw Theophil, tuma a ka lehkhabu ah, Jesu silbawl leh a thuhilhte zousiah,

44002001	Huleh Pentikost ni ahung tun tahin, lungsim munkhat puain a bawnun mun khat ah aum khawm uhi.

44007059	Stephen in, “Lalpa Jesu, ka hagau la in,” chia Pathian akouh laiin suang in akisehhuan uhi.
44007060	Huin amah chu akhuupdin a, aw ngaihtahin akikou a, “Lalpa, hi a sualna moh uh posah sin,” achi hi. Huleh hi thu asoi zohin a-ihmuta hi.
44008001	Huleh Saul in zong Stephen sih chu lem asa hi. Hu hun laiin Jerusalem a kouhtuam tungah suhduhdahna nasatah aum panta hi. Huchiin apostolte chihlouh chu Judia leh Samaria gam zousiah ah adalhjaah vehta uhi.
44008002	Huleh Pathian ngaihsah kuate aha in Stephen chu avui va, nasatahin asuun uhi.
44008003	Saul in ahihleh inn chin a luutin, numei pasal akaidoh a, suangkul a khumin, kouhtuam asuduhdah mahmah hi.
44008004	Huleh suhdalha umte’n chu a chiahna phot vah tanchinpha asoita uhi.
44008005	Huin Philip chu Samaria khopi ah achiah suh a, a kawmvah Khrist thu asoi hi.
44008006	A silmah bawlte ajaah va amuh tahun, mipite’n Philip thusoi chu lungsim munkhatin angaikhia uhi.
44008007	Dawi niinte chu aw ngaihtaha kikouin mi tampi amatte uh sung apat ahung pawt uhi. Huleh jeng leh keengbai tamtahte zong ahung damta uhi.
44008008	Huleh hu khopi ah kipaahna nasatah aumta hi.
44008009	Hizongleh a min Simon kichi mi khat aum a, ama’n chu milian ka hi chiin, tuma lamin hu khopi ah mitphialdawi zangin Samaria mite chu limdangsatahin akoih veu hi.
44008010	Mi zousiah in, a neupeen apat a lianpeen tanphain, “Hi mipa ahi Pathian silbawltheihna loupi kichi chu,” chiin a thu angaihsah vehta uhi.
44008011	Huleh mitphialdawi a hun sawttah limdangsataha anakoihtaah jiahin, a thu angaihsah uhi.
44008012	Hizongleh amah un chu Pathian lalgam leh Jesu Khrist min tanchinpha Philip in asoi agintaat tahun, anumei apasal in baptisma atangta uhi.
44008013	Huin Simon nasan in zong ahung gingta a, baptisma atan nungin Philip kawmah aum zing a, chiamchihna leh silmah nasatah kibawlte amuhin, limdang asa thei mahmah hi.
44008014	Huin Jerusalem a um apostolte in Samariate’n Pathian thu a-awita uh chih aheet tahun, a kawmvah Peter leh Johan asawl va,
44008015	hu mite chu avatunsuh tahun Hagau Siangthou atan theihna diingun ahaamteisah uhi.
44008016	Humain chu a lahva kuamah tungah Hagau Siangthou atung nai sih hi. Himahleh Lalpa Jesu min a baptisma tang chauh ahi nalai uhi.
44008017	Huin Peter leh Johan in a tungvah a khut uh anga va, Hagau Siangthou atangta uhi.
44008018	Huleh Simon in apostolte khut ngah jiah a, Hagau Siangthou piaah ahi chih amuhin, sum apia a,
44008019	“Hitobang thuneihna hung pe ve un, kua tungah hizongleh khut ka ngahna phot in Hagau Siangthou amuhvena diingun,” achi hi.
44008020	Hizongleh Peter in a kawmah, “Pathian silpiaah dangka sum a lei na tup jiahin, na sum nangmah toh mangkhawm heh.
44008021	Hi thu ah tel lah na tel sih a, tan zong na nei ngaal sih hi, ajiahchu na lungtang Pathian muhin adih sih hi.
44008022	Hujiahin na giitlouhna kisiih inla, Pathian kawmah nasatahin haamtei in, huchiin na lungtang a na ngaihtuah hi ahung ngaidam khamoh sih diing hi.
44008023	Ajiahchu khaatna in na lungtang agaah a, huleh dihtatlouhna sal a taang na hi,” achi hi.
44008024	Huin Simon in adawng a, “Na sil soite uh bangmah ka tunga atun louhna diingin nang un Lalpa kawmah nasatahin hung haamteisah un,” achi hi.
44008025	Huin amah un Lalpa thu aheetsah leh asoi zoh nungun, Jerusalem ah achiah kiitta va, Samaria khua tamtah ah tanchinpha asoita uhi.
44008026	Lalpa angel in Philip ahoupih a, “Thou inla, simlam a Jerusalem apat Gaza pai suhna lampi ah chiah in,” achi a, huchu gamdaai a um ahi.
44008027	Huchiin amah chu athou a, achiahta hi. Huleh ngai in, Ethiopia mi, Ethiopia kumpinu Kandake nuaia michilgeh thunei liantah, amahnu gou teng keemtu chu Jerusalem a Pathian be diingin ahung a,
44008028	apaikiit lamin a kangtalai a toukawmin zawlnei Isai Lehkhabu asim hi.

44008032	Pathian Lehkhathu asim chu: “Thah diing belaam bangin Amah chu apui va; belaamnou a mulmeettu ma a asip khiinkhian bangin, Ama’n zong a kam akeeh sih;
44008033	Amah kimuhsitna ah dihtaha vaihawmna chu laahmangin aum hi. A haahte tanchin kuan ahiai hung soi diing? Ajiahchu leitung apatin a hinna laahsahin aum ngaal a,” chih ahi.
44008034	Huleh michilgeh in Philip ahoupih a, a kawmah, “Ka hung ngeen hi, hi thu khu zawlnei in koi thu asoina ahiai? Amah thu ahiai, midang thu?” achi hi.
44008035	Huin Philip in a kam akaah a, hu Pathian Lehkhathu ngeei apanin a kawmah Jesu thu asoita hi.
44008036	Lampi a apai laiun tui mun khat ahung tung va, michilgeh in, “Endua, hi ah tui aum, baptisma ka tanna diing bangin ahung daal ei?” achi hi.
44008037	Huin Philip in, “Na lungtang zousiah a na gintaat leh, na tang thei hi,” achi hi. Huleh ama’n adawng a, “Jesu Khrist chu Pathian Tapa ahi chih ka gingta hi,” achi hi.
44008038	Huin kaangtalai chu akhawlsah a; Philip leh michilgeh chu tui lahah achiah suh khawm va, huin Philip in amah chu baptisma atangsah hi.

44008040	Hizongleh Philip chu Azota khua a um ahi chih akihedohta a; huin paisuaah pehin Kaisaria khua atun masiah kho chin ah tanchinpha chu ataangkoupihta hi.
44009001	Hulaiin Saul in chu Lalpa nungjuite thah diingin avau zing a, siampu lalpeen kawmah avachiah a,
44009002	Damaska a sinagogte a diingin lehkha angeen hi, huchia mi koipouh, pasal hiin numei hitaleh hi Lampi pawl a mite amuh photmah kaansa a Jerusalem a ahung pui theihna diingin.
44009003	Azin laiin Damaska kawm ahung tung a, thakhatin vaan akipanin vaah a kiim vah ahung taang hi.
44009004	Huin lei ah apuuh a, “Saul, Saul, nang bang diinga hung suduhdah na hiai?” chiin aw aja hi.
44009005	Huin ama’n, “Lalpa, koi na hiai?” achi hi. Huin Lalpa’n, “Na suhduhdah Jesu ka hi. Vuaahna siihzum peeh nang diingin ahahsa hi,” achi hi.
44009006	Huleh ama’n kithing kawm leh limdangsatahin, “Lalpa, bang bawl diingin na hung deih ei?” achi hi. Huin Lalpa’n a kawmah, “Thou inla khopi sungah luut in, huchiin na bawl diing chu hilhin na um diing hi,” achi hi.

44009010	Huleh Damaska ah a min Anania kichi nungjui khat aum a; Lalpa’n kilaahna in a kawmah, “Anania,” achi hi. Ama’n, “En in, Lalpa, hi ah ka um,” achi hi.
44009011	Huleh Lalpa’n a kawmah, “Thou inla, kotzing Tang achih vah chiah inla, Juda inn a um, Tarsa khua a mi, a min Saul kichi kandoh in; ajiahchu, ngai in, ahaamtei laitah ahi.
44009012	Huleh ama’n kilaahna in mi khat a min Anania kichi hung luut a, a mit suvaah diinga a tunga khut ngain amuta hi,” achi hi.

44009016	Ajiahchu ka min vaanga gimna bangchituha thuaah diing ahiai, chih a kawmah ka hesah diing hi,” achi hi.

44009018	Thakhatin a mit apat phulip tobang ake pah a; huleh a mit ahung vaah a, huin athou a, baptisma atangta hi.

44009022	Hizongleh Saul chu ahung haat seem a, hi Jesu chu Khrist ahi tahtah hi chih hilhchianin, Damaska a Juda umte chu angaihna helouin akoih hi.
44009023	Huleh ni tamtah nungin, amah thah tumin Judate akihou uhi.
44009024	Hizongleh Saul in a siltup uh anahe hi. Huleh amah un amah thah tumin kulh kotkhaah suun leh jaan in ataang uhi.
44009025	Hizongleh nungjuite’n amah chu jaan in apui va, kulh baang ah bawm in akhaikheta uhi.
44009026	Huleh Saul Jerusalem atun in nungjuite kithuahpih atum a; hizongleh amah un nungjui ahihve agintaat louh jiahun alau chiat uhi.
44009027	Hizongleh Barnaba in amah apui a, apostolte kawmah ahung tonpih hi. Huleh ama’n lampi a Lalpa amuh a, Lalpa’n ahoupih daan bang leh Damaska a Jesu min a hangsantaha thu asoi daante bang asoita hi.

44009030	Huchu unaute’n aheet tahun, Kaisaria ah apuisuh va, Tarsa ah asawlmangta uhi.
44009031	Huin Judia gam, Galili gam leh Samaria gam veel ah kouhtuamte’n hamuanna anei va huleh suhkhangin aumta uhi. Huleh Lalpa lauin ahing va, Hagau Siangthou hamuanin aum va, ahung pung deuhdeuhta uhi.
44009032	Hichi ahung hi a, Peter in amahuh vehsuaah kawmin, Lidda khopi a misiangthou um zousiah kawmah zong achiah suh hi.

44009041	Huleh Peter in a khut apia a, akaithouta a, misiangthoute leh meithaite akou a, amahnu chu damin apeta hi.

44010001	Huleh Kaisaria khua ah a min Kornelia kichi mi khat aum a, Italy Pawl achih va sepaih zahoutu ahi.

44010028	Huleh a kawmvah, “Judami namdang toh kipawl a, a kawmva chiah chu daan kalh ahi chih na he uhi. Hizongleh kuamah daan kalh leh buaahbaang ka chih diing ahi sih, chih Pathian in ahung hesah hi.

44010033	Hujiahin na kawmah mi ka hung sawl pah a, na hung hi ahoih hi. Hujiahin tuin Pathian in na kawma ahung thupiaah zousiah ja diingin Pathian mitmuhin ka bawnun hi ah ka um uhi,” achi hi.
44010034	Huin Peter in asoi a, “Pathian in mi deihsahtuam anei sih hi, chih chiangtahin ka he hi.
44010035	Ahihvaangin, nam chin laha koipouh amah lau a, dihtaha gamta photmah chu apaahtaat mi ahi veu uhi.

44011001	Huleh Judia gam a apostolte leh unau umte’n Jentelte’n zong Pathian thu apomta uh chih ajata uhi.
44011002	Peter chu Jerusalem atun touh tahin zehtante’n a kawmah,
