44011005	“Joppa khopi ah haamtei in ka um a, huleh zelhin ka um a, manglam bangin bang aha bawm, puan liantah bang a ning li a khih, vaan apat hung kikhaikhia ka mu a, ka kawm ngeei ah ahung tung hi.
44011006	Huchu en den in ka ngaihtuah a, lei a gamsa keeng li neite, gamsate, ganhing bohvaahte leh tunga leeng vate ka mu hi.
44011007	Huleh aw in, ‘Peter, thou in, that inla ne in,’ hung chiin ka ja hi.
44011008	Hizongleh ke’n, ‘Lalpa, hilou e, ajiahchu abuaahbaang leh asianglou photmah ka kam ah aluut ngei sih,’ ka chi hi.
44011009	Hizongleh vaan akipanin aw in, ‘Pathian in asuhsiangsa nang sianglou chi sin,’ ahung chi kiit hi.
44011010	Huleh huchibang ngenin thumvei ahung um a, huin a bawnin vaan ah khaitouhin aum kiitta hi.
44011011	“Ngai in, mi thum Kaisaria apat ka kawma ahung sawlte uh ka umna inn ah anatung uhi.
44011012	Hagau in ginglel lou leh koimah khentuam neilou a, amahuh jui diingin ahung sawl hi. Hi unau guupte’n zong ahung jui va, hu mipa inn ah ka luut uhi.
44011013	Ama’n ka kawmah, a inn a angel kilaah amuh daan leh angel in a kawma, ‘Joppa khua ah mi sawl inla, Simon, Peter achih uh chu vakousah in,
44011014	ama’n thu ahung hilh diing a, hu thu in nang leh na innkuanpihte zousiah hutdamin na um diing uh,’ achih daan zong ahung hilh hi.
44011015	“Thu ka soi pat tahin, Hagau Siangthou i tunga ahung tun chiil lai mahbangin, a tungvah ahung tungta hi.
44011016	Huin Lalpa thu, ‘Johan in tui ah mi abaptis veu a, hizongleh nang un chu Hagau Siangthou in baptisma na hung tang diing uh,’ achih chu ka hung hedoh kiitta hi.
44011017	Huchiin eiuh Lalpa Jesu Khrist gingtate kawma, Pathian in silpiaah ahung piaah bang a kawmva apiaah leh, kei bang giap hi Pathian nial gual ka hiaimah?” achi hi.
44011018	Hu thu chu ajaah tahun asipta va, “Huchi ahihleh, Pathian in Jentelte zong hing diinga akisiih uh phal ahita ve,” chiin Pathian aphatta uhi.
44011019	Huin Stephen tungtaang toh kisaia suhduhdahna ahung um jiaha taaithaangte chu Phinisia gamte, Kupra gamte, Antiok khuate tanpha ah atung va, Judate kawm chauh ah thu asoi uhi.
44011020	Hizongleh a lahva khenkhat chu Kupra gam leh Kureni khua a mite ahi uhi. Hu mite’n Antiok khua atun tahun Grik haam zang Judate zong ahoupih va, Lalpa Jesu tanchinpha ahilhta uhi.
44011021	Lalpa khut in amahuh panpihin mi tamtahin agingta va, Lalpa lam ahung ngatta uhi.
44011022	Huin a tanchin uh Jerusalem khua a kouhtuam umte’n aja va, Antiok khua tung diingin Barnaba asawlkhia uhi.
44011023	Huleh amah avatun a, Pathian hehpihna avamuhin akipaah mahmah a, a bawnun Lalpa a munkhat a um diingin ahasuan hi.
44011024	Ajiahchu amah chu mihoihtah, Hagau Siangthou leh ginna a dim ahi. Huleh mi tamtah Lalpa kawmah atelbehta uhi.
44011025	Huin Barnaba chu Saul hawl diingin Tarsa khua ah achiah hi.
44011026	Amah amuhin, Antiok khua ah ahung pui hi. Huleh hichi ahung hi a, kum khat kouhtuamte kikhopna ah atel va, mi tampi thu ahilh uhi. Antiok khua ah nungjuite chu Khristian chiha kouh ahi masapeen uhi.
44011027	Huleh hulaiin zawlnei koite aha Jerusalem apatin Antiok ah ahung suh uhi.
44011028	Huleh a lahva mi khat, a min Agaba kichi ading a, khovel zousiah ah kial loupitah tung diing ahi chih, Hagau hilhin ahesah hi. Hu kial chu Klaudias Kaisar lal laiin ahung tung hi.
44011029	Huin nungjuite’n ahihtheih daan chiatun, Judia gam a umte kawmah panpihna thot atum uhi.
44011030	Huchu abawlta ngeei va, Barnaba leh Saul khut ah, upate kawmah athotta uhi.
44012001	Hulai veelin kumpipa Herod in kouhtuamte laha khen khat bawl gentheih tumin aman a,
44012002	Johan sanggampa Jakob chu naamsau in asaatlum hi.
44012003	Hikhu in Judate akipaahsah chih amuh jiahin, Peter zong mat atum sawn hi. Hulai chu Tolsohlouh Tanghou Kuut lai ahi.
44012004	Amah amat tahin suangkul ah akhum a, sepaih hon li li chiat jeelin akiveen kheel sah a, Chiahkaan Kuut zoh chianga mipite kawmah puidoh atum hi.
44012005	Hujiahin Peter chu suangkul ah akoih tadih a, hizongleh kouhtuamte’n amah diingin phatuamngaitahin Pathian kawmah ahaamteisah zing uhi.
44012006	Peter chu Herod puidoh diing ni tun ma jaan in, sepaih nih kikaal ah khainiang nih bulhin a-ihmu a, huleh a veengtute zong kotkhaahbul ah aum va suangkul chu aveeng uhi.
44012007	Huleh en in, Lalpa angel khat a kawmah ahung a, suangkul sungah vaah ahung taangta a; Peter chu apang beengin aphawng a, “Thou kin in,” achi hi. Huleh khainiangte a khut apat aketa hi.
44012008	Huin angel in a kawmah, “Na kawng gaah inla, na keengtophah but in,” achi hi. Huleh ama’n huchibangin abawl hi. Huin angel in a kawmah, “Na puan silh inla, hung jui in,” achi hi.
44012009	Huin Peter chu apawt a, ajuita hi. Angel silbawl chu atah ahih ahe sih a, hizongleh kilaahna amuh asa jaw hi.
44012010	Huleh veengtu masa leh anihna apelh nungun, khopi luutna siihkot chu atungta va, huchu amahuh diingin amah leh amah in ahung kihongta hi. Huleh apawt va, kotzing khat apaipeel va, huin, angel in apaisan pahta hi.
44012011	Huleh Peter chu ahung halh tahin, ama’n “Lalpa’n angel ahung sawl a, Herod khut leh Juda mite kinepna zousiah apatin ahung hundohta chih tuin chiantahin ka heta,” achi hi.
44012012	Hu sil angaihtuah zohin, Johan, Mark achih uh nu Mari inn ah avachiah a, hutah ah chu haamteina neiin mi tamtah ana-umkhawm uhi.
44012013	Peter in kotkhaah akiuh tahin, a min Rhoda kichi suaah nungaah nou khat adawng diingin ahung hi.
44012014	Peter aw ahih aheet tahin akipaah jiahin kot chu hong louin ataailuut kiit jawta a, Peter kotkhaahbul ah ading chih avasoi hi.
44012015	Amah un a kawmah, “Lungbuai hi teh,” achi uhi. Hizongleh ama’n chu thudih ahi chiin apang teeiteei hi. Huin amah un, “Hichu a angel ahi,” achi uhi.
44012016	Hizongleh Peter in kot akiu ngatngat a, huleh kot ahon tahun amah amu va, limdang asa mahmah uhi.
44012017	Hizongleh ama’n asipna diingun a khut in ajaap a, Lalpa’n suangkul apat amah apuidoh daan chu ahilhta hi. Huleh ama’n, “Hi thute Jakob leh unaute kawmah vahilh un,” achi hi. Huin apawt a, mun dang ah achiahta hi.
44012018	Ni asuaah tahin, sepaih haw chu Peter khoia um ahiai, chiin buai chihtahin abuaita uhi.
44012019	Herod in ahawl a, amuh louh tahin, a veengtute chu aendih a, thah diingin thu apeta hi. Huin Herod chu Judia gam apat Kaisaria khua ah achiah suh a, hutah ah aum zingta hi.
44012020	Huleh Herod chu Tura leh Sidon khua a mite tungah alungthah mahmah a, himahleh amah un kumpipa lupna pindan enkoltu Blasta chu athuzoh va, thukhat a luangin a kawmah ahung uhi, ajiahchu a khomite uh chu kumpipa gam a neehletaah a kinga ahih jiahun kilemna angeen uhi.
44012021	Huleh a ni chiam ni in Herod in a lalpuan asilh a, a laltouphah tungah atou a, a kawmvah thu asoi hi.
44012022	Huleh mipi chu kikouin, “Hichu pathian aw ahi, mihing a ahi sih,” achi uhi.
44012023	Huleh Pathian kawma paahtawina apiaah louh jiahin, Lalpa angel in amah aman pah ngaal a, huut in ane a, asita hi.
44012024	Hizongleh Pathian thu chu adalh a, apung jeel hi.
44012025	Huleh Barnaba leh Saul in a natoh uh azohun Jerusalem apat akihkiitta va Johan, Mark zong kichi chu a kawmvah apui uhi.
44013001	Antiok khua a kouhtuam umte lahah, zawlneite leh thuhilhtute aum uhi. Hute chu Barnaba leh Nigar achih uh Simeon leh Kureni a um Lukia leh gambung vaihawmtu Herod toh khang khawm Manaen leh Saul chihte ahi uhi.
44013002	Huleh Lalpa natong a an angawl laiun, Hagau Siangthou in, “Barnaba leh Saul keimah nna seem diinga ka kouh chu hung khenkhiahsah un,” achi hi.
44013003	Huleh an angawlva ahaamtei zohun, a tungvah a khut uh anga va, asawlta uhi.
44013004	Huchiin Hagau Siangthou sawldohin achiah va, Seliukia khopi ah achiah suh va, hu akipatin Kupra tuikulhgam lamah kuang in achiahta uhi.
44013005	Huleh Salamis a aum laiun, Judate sinagogte ah Pathian thu asoi va; Johan zong apanpih diingin apui uhi.
44013006	Huleh hu tuikulhgam chu tawnsuaahin Paphos ah atung va, hutah ah dawisiam, zawlnei tahlou, Judami khat amu va, a min chu Bar-Jesu ahi.
44013007	Hu mi chu gamoptu Sergia Paulas mipiltah kawma um ahi. Hu gamoptu’n Saul leh Barnaba chu akou a, Pathian thu jaah auut hi.
44013008	Hizongleh dawisiampa Elima (a haam va hu umjia chu dawisiam chihna mah ahi) in gamoptu chu ginlouhsah tumin, amahuh chu anadoudaal hi.
44013009	Huin Saul, Paul achih uh, chu Hagau Siangthou in adim a, amah chu aensaal a,
44013010	huin, “Aw nang miheem leh lepchiahna chinteng a dimpa, nang diabol tapa, nang dihtatna zousiah meelmapa, Lalpa lam dihtahte suhsiat tawplou diing na hi maw?
44013011	Tuin ngai in, Lalpa khut na tungah atu ahi, na mit ahung taw diing a, bangtan aha khovaah mulouin na um diing,” achi hi. Huin thakhatin meikaai leh mial a tungah ahung kia a; khut a kaitu diing hawlin avaah lehlehta hi.
44013012	Huin gamoptu in hu sil kibawl chu amu a, Lalpa thuhilh chu limdang asa mahmah a, agingtata hi.
44013013	Huin Paul chu amah toh umte toh Paphos khua apatin achiah va, Pamphilia gam a Perga khua atung va, huleh Johan in amahuh nusiain Jerusalem ah akihkiitta hi.
44013014	Hizongleh amahuh chu Perga khua apat achiah jeel va, Pisidia gam a Antiok khua atung va, huleh Sabbath ni’n sinagog ah aluut va, atou uhi.
44013015	Huleh Daan Lehkhabu leh Zawlneite Lehkhabute asim zohun sinagog a vaihawmte’n a kawmvah mi asawl va, “Ulenaute, mite hasotna thu soi diing na neih uh leh soi un,” achi uhi.
44013016	Huin Paul ading a, a khut a jaapin asoi a, “Israelmite leh nanguh Pathian laute, ngai un.
44013017	Hi Israel namte Pathian in i pulepate uh ateel a, Aigupta gam a aum laiun asuloupi a, tungnung khut haat in hu akipatin apuidohta hi.
44013018	Kum sawmli hun sung veel chu Ama’n gamdaai ah a silbawlte uh athuaah thei hi.
44013019	Huleh Kanaan gam a nam sagihte asuhmang zohin, a gam uh a kawmvah goutan in ahawmsah hi.
44013020	Hu nungin Ama’n kum za li leh sawmngaa sung vaihawmtute apia a, zawlnei Samuel chiangtanin.
44013021	Huleh hu nungin kumpi angeen va; huchiin kum sawmli sung diingin Pathian in Saul, Kis tapa Benjamin phung a mi, amahuh apia hi.
44013022	Huleh Ama’n amah asuanmang nungin a kumpipa diingun David atungdohta hi. Pathian in amah tungtaang ah hichu asoi a, ‘David, Jesse tapa, ka lungtang bang pua mi ka muta, ama’n chu ka deihlam phot abawl diing,’ achi hi.
44013023	“Hi mipa chihaahte lahah Pathian in a thuchiam dungjuiin Israel mite kawmah Hundampa Jesu ahung tungdohta hi.
44013024	Ahung main Johan in kisiihna baptisma thu Israel mi zousiah kawmah anahilh masa hi.
44013025	Huleh Johan in a lam ajuih zoh kuan laiin, ‘Nang un kua hi diingin na hung gingta viai? Amah chu hilou ka hi. Hizongleh ngai un, ka nung ah mi khat hung diing ahi, kei chu a keengtophah suut taah zong ka hi sih hi,’ achi hi.
44013026	“Ulenaute, Abraham suan tate haw, na lahva Pathian lau zousiahte haw, na kawmvah hi hutdamna thu ahung kithot hi.
44013027	Jerusalem a umte leh a lamkaite un Sabbath ni chin a asim uh zawlneite aw leh Amah chu ahe sih va, siamlouhtangsahin, hu thute anasutaangtungta uhi.
44013028	A sihna diing khop a tungah bangma amuh louh-un zong, Pilat kawmah hihlum diingin angeen uhi.
44013029	Huleh Amah tungtaang thu anakigelhsa zousiah asuhtaangtung zohun, sing dawn apatin alakhia va, haan ah asialta uhi.
44013030	Hizongleh Amah chu Pathian in misi lah apat akaithou kiitta hi.
44013031	Huleh Amah toh Galili gam apat a Jerusalem khua a chiah toute kawmah ni tampi sung akilaah veu a, hu mite chu tuin mite kawmah a thu heetpihtute ahi uhi.
44013032	“Huleh kei un zong i pulepate uh kawma chiamsa, hu thuchiam tanchinpha kipaah huai ka hung hilh uhi.
44013033	Pathian in Jesu akaihthoh kiitna ah, huchu, ei a tate uh kawmah asutaangtung ahi. Phatna Late nihna ah, ‘Nang chu ka Tapa na hi a, tuni in ka hung hingkheta hi,’ chih gelh bangin.
44013034	“Huleh muatna mun a pai kiit talou diinga Pathian in Amah misi lah apat akaihthoh diing daan thu chu hichiin asoi hi, ‘David kawma ka piaah khotuahna muanhuai chu nangmah ka hung pe diing,’ chiin.
44013035	“Hujiahin Ama’n Phatna Late dangah, ‘Na Misiangthou chu muatna mu diingin na phal saam sih diing hi,’ achi kiit jeel hi.
44013036	“Ajiahchu David in chu Pathian vaihawmsah banga amah khang a mite nna atoh zohin, a-ihmuta hi. Huleh a pulepate kawmah asial va, amuat mangta hi.
44013037	Himahleh Pathian in akaihthohpa’n chu muatna amu sih hi.
44013038	“Hujiahin hichu he un, mite leh unaute, hi Pa vaanga sual ngaihdamna thu na kawmva kisoi ahi.
44013039	Kuapouh Amah gingta phot chu, Mosi daan thu a siam na tan zohlouhna vapat sil zousiah ah siamtansahin aum uhi.
44013040	Hujiahin pilvaang un, huchilou inchu Zawlneite Lehkhabute a hu thu kisoi na tungvah ahung tung kha diing hi:
44013041	‘Nanguh musittute, ngai un, limdangsa unla, mangthaai un. Ajiahchu na damsung un nna khat ka tong hi. Hu nna chu mi’n nanguh hung hilh mahleh uh, na gingta top sih diing uhi,’ chih chu,” achi hi.
44013042	Huleh sinagog apat Judate apawt tahun, Jentelte’n Sabbath ni kiit chianga hu thute chu a kawmva soi diingin angeen uhi.
44013043	Huleh kikhawmte chu akikhen jaah tahun, Juda tamtahte leh Juda sahkhua a kihei Pathian ngaihsah mi tamtahte’n Paul leh Barnaba ajui va, amah un amahuh chu anahoupih va, Pathian hehpihna a um zing diingin athuzoh uhi.
44013044	Huleh Sabbath ni kiit in a khopi pumpi phial un Pathian thu ngaikhe diingin ahung kikhawm uhi.
44013045	Hizongleh Judate’n mipite amuh tahun, athangse mahmah va, Paul thusoi chu akalh va, asoisia uhi.
44013046	Huin Paul leh Barnaba in hangsantahin asoi va, “Pathian thu hi nanguh kawma soi masat diing mawng ahi. Hizongleh na khinkhiah va, kumtuanga hing taahlou a na kikoih nungun, Jentelte lam ka ngatta uhi chih he un.
44013047	Ajiahchu Lalpa’n hichi bangin kei uh thu ahung pia hi: ‘Jentelte vaah hi diingin ka hung guat a, kawlmong tanpha a hutdamna hi diingin,’ chih gelh bangin,” achi hi.
44013048	Huleh Jentelte’n hu thu ajaah tahun akipaah va, Lalpa thu chu atawisang va; kumtuanga hing diinga guat taphot in agingta uhi.
44013049	Huleh Lalpa thu chu hu gam pumpi ah adalhta hi.
44013050	Hizongleh Judate’n Pathian ngaihsah numei zahtaathuaite leh khopi sunga mipoimohte achiilsia va, Paul leh Barnaba chu asuduhdah va, a gam vapat adelhdohta uhi.
44013051	Huin amah un a tungvah a keengpeeh va leivui athing khia va, Ikoniam ah achiahta uhi.
44013052	Huleh nungjuite chu kipaahna leh Hagau Siangthou in adimta uhi.
44014001	Huleh Ikoniam ah hichi ahung hi a, Judate sinagog ah aluut khawm va, thu asoi uhi. Huchiin Judate leh Grikte tamtah in zong agingta uhi.
44014002	Hizongleh gingtalou Judate’n Jentelte achiilsia va, unaute amudahsahta uhi.
44014003	Hujiahin Lalpa ah hangsantaha thu soiin hutah ah sawttah aum uhi. Ama’n chiamchihnate leh sillimdangte a khut va hihsahin, a hehpihna thu ahesah jeel hi.
44014004	Hizongleh khopi sunga mipite chu akilangkhen uhi: khenkhat in Judate agum va, khenkhat in apostolte agum uhi.
44014005	Huin Jentelte leh Judate’n a houtute uh toh kithuaha apostolte zumhuaitaha bawl diing leh suang a seh diing angaihtuah va,
44014006	amah un hichu anahe va, Lukaonia gam a khopite Lystra, Derbe ah leh a kiimveel gamte ah ataaidohta uhi.
44014007	Hutah ah chu tanchinpha asoita uhi.
44014008	Huleh Lystra ah keeng zoi koiaha mi khat atou a, a pian tung apat jeng mawng ahi a, keeng in apai ngei sih hi.
44014009	Hu mi in Paul thusoi angaikhia a; Paul in guntahin aen den a, a damna diingin ginna anei chih ahe a,
44014010	aw ngaihtahin, “Na keeng in ding tang in,” achi hi. Huin amah chu akitawm a, a keeng in apaita hi.
44014011	Huleh mipite’n Paul silbawl chu amuh tahun, ngaihtaha kikouin, Lukaonia haamin, “Mihing banga pathiante chu i kawmva hung suh ahi uh,” achi uhi.
44014012	Huleh Barnaba chu Zeus, achi va, Paul chu thusoipeen ahih jiahin, Hermi, achi uhi.
44014013	Huin khopi kot maai a milem biahinn a Zeus siampupa’n bawngtalte leh paahkhi chu kotpi bul ah ahung tawi a, mipite toh amahuh geel biahna in lat atumta hi.
44014014	Hizongleh apostolte, Barnaba leh Paul in hichu atheih tahun, a puan uh abotkeeh va, mipi laha tawmluutin akikou va,
44014015	“Unaute, bang diinga hi silte bawl na hi viai? Keiuh zong nanguh toh pianken kibang mihing ka hi uhi. Hi sil thulimloute na kiheisan va, vaan leh lei, tuikhanglian leh a sunga sil um zousiah bawlpa Pathian hing kawma na hung kihei theihna diingun tanchinpha ka hung tut uh ahi.
44014016	Huleh Pathian in chu nidanglaiin nam chin amahuh lampi chiat a achiah uh anaphal hi.
44014017	Ahihvaangin Amah tungtaang heetsahna bawllouin ana-umsah sih hi. Huchiin sil hoih abawl jeel a, vaan apat guahtui leh gahpha bangkim ahung pia a, i lungtang uh neeh diing leh kipaahna in asudim zing hi,” achi uhi.
44014018	Huleh hi thute soiin, mipite’n amahuh biahna diinga gan agoh diing uh akhap zou haamhaam uhi.
44014019	Huleh Antiok leh Ikoniam khua apat Judate hutah ah ahung va, mipite chu athuzoh zou va, huchiin Paul chu suang in asep va, si a agintaat jiahun khopi gei lamah akaidoh uhi.
44014020	Ahihvaangin nungjuite a kiim a adin laiun, ahung thou a, khopi sungah ahung luut kiitta hi. Huleh a jiing in Barnaba toh Derbe khua ah achiahta uhi.
44014021	Amah un hu khopi ah tanchinpha asoi va, nungjui tampi asiam va, Lystra, Ikoniam leh Antiok khua ah akihkiitta va,
44014022	“Gimna tampi thuaahin Pathian lalgam ah i luut diing mawng ahi,” chiin nungjuite lungsim akipsah va, ginna a um zingzing diingin ahasot uhi.
44014023	Kouhtuam chin a upate ateel va, an ngawla ahaamtei zohun, amahuh chu agin uh Lalpa kawmah akeemsahta uhi.
44014024	Pisidia gam chu atawnsuaah va, Pamphilia gam atung uhi.
44014025	Perga khua a thu asoi zohun, Attalia ah achiah suh uhi.
44014026	Hutah apatin kuang in akitawl va, hu a natoh zohte uh tong diinga Pathian hehpihna a kepsaha aumna mun uh Antiok ah akilehkiitta uhi.
44014027	Huleh ahung tunun, kouhtuamte chu akoukhawm va, Pathian in amahuh zanga sil abawl zousiah leh Jentelte diinga ginna kotkhaah ahonsah daante ahilh uhi.
44014028	Huchiin nungjuite toh sawttah aum khawmta uhi.
44015001	Huleh mi bangzah aha Judia gam apatin ahung suh va, “Mosi daan banga zeh na tan louh uh leh hutdam na hi thei sih diing uh,” chiin unaute ahilh uhi.
44015002	Huleh huchia Paul leh Barnaba chu amahuh toh kikhinga hahniala akinial phetun, Paul leh Barnaba chu a lahva mi bangzah aha toh hu thubuai tungtaang ah, Jerusalem a apostolte leh upate kawma chiah tou diingin aguat uhi.
44015003	Huin kouhtuamte’n amahuh chu asawl va, amah un Jentelte kisiih kiit daan thu soi jeelin, Phinisia gam leh Samaria gam tawnin apai va, huchiin unaute zousiah nasatahin akipaahsah uhi.
44015004	Huleh Jerusalem atunun kouhtuamte leh apostolte leh upate’n amahuh anakipaahpih va; huin Pathian in amahuh zanga a silbawlte zousiah asoi uhi.
44015005	Hizongleh Pharisai pawl a gingtu koite aha ading va, “Jentelte’n zeh atan uh akuul a, huleh Mosi daan jui diinga hilh diing ahi uh,” achi uhi.
44015006	Huin apostolte leh upate chu hu thu ngaihtuah diingin akikhawm uhi.
44015007	Sawttah akinial nungun, Peter ading a, a kawmvah, “Ulenaute, Jentelte’n keimah kam a tanchinpha ja a, a gintaatna diingva Pathian in nidanglaia, i lah vapat ahung guatdaan na he uhi.
44015008	Huleh lungsim hetu Pathian in eihaw ahung piaah bangmahin Hagau Siangthou a kawmva piain, aheetpihta hi.
44015009	Huleh eihaw leh amahuh khentuam neilouin, ginna in a lungsim uh ahih siangthou hi.
44015010	Huchiin i pulepate leh eihawn zong i zohlouhsa uh namkol chu tuin nungjuite ngawng a baat tuma bang diinga Pathian je-et na hi viai?
44015011	Hizongleh amahuh tobangin, eihaw zong Lalpa Jesu Khrist hehpihna a hutdam diing hiin i kigingta uhi,” achi hi.
44015012	Huin mipi zousiah asipta va, Barnaba leh Paul in Pathian in amahuh zanga Jentelte laha chiamchihna leh sil loupi abawl thu asoi uh angaikhia uhi.
44015013	Asoi zohun, Jakob in asoi a, “Ulenaute, ka thu ngai un.
44015014	Pathian in Amah min po diingin a lah vapat mi hon khat ladoh diingin amasain Jentelte aveh hi chih thu Simon in asoita hi.
44015015	Huleh hi thu leh Zawlneite Lehkhabute thu akituaah hi:
44015016	‘Hizoh chiangin ka hung kiit diing a, David biahbuuh puuhsa ka bawl kiit diing; a siatna ka bawl kiit diing a, huchiin ka tungding diing hi.
44015017	Midangte leh Jentelte ka min a kikou zousiahte’n LALPA ahawlna diingun, hi silte zousiah bawlpa LALPA’N achi hi,’ chih gelh bangin.
44015018	“Pathian in a silbawlte zousiah chu kumtuang apat aheet ahi.
44015019	“Hujiahin Jentelte laha Pathian lama kiheite chu hihbuai dah lei chih ka ngaihdaan ahi.
44015020	Milem biahna, sil sianglou neehte, kingaihna thaanghuai, akiheehlup thoh sa leh sisan neeh chihte tawpsan diingin a kawmvah gial lehhang, ka chi jaw hi.
44015021	Ajiahchu sinagogte a Sabbath ni tenga amah thu chu sim ahih jiahin, nidanglai apatin khopi chin ah Mosi in amah tungtaang soitu anei hi,” achi hi.
44015022	Huin apostolte leh upate’n kouhtuam zousiah toh, a lahva mi teel a Paul leh Barnaba toh Antiok khua a chiahsah hoih asa uhi. Ateelte uh min chu Barsaba kichi Juda, achih uh leh Sila ahi va, amahuh chu unaute laha houtu ahi uhi.
44015023	Hichibanga kigial lehkhathot chu a khut vah athot uhi: Apostolte leh upate leh unaute’n Antiok khua leh Syria leh Silisia gam a um Jentel unaute kawmah: Chibai.
44015024	Ka lah vakipatin mi khenkhat, “Zeh na tan va, daan thu zong na juih diing uh ahi,” chia thu soiin nanguh hung subuaiin, na lungsim uh amangbangsah chih ka he va, a kawmvah lah thu bangmah ka pe ngaal sih uhi.
44015025	Hujiahin ka kithugual zohun, mi teeldoh a, ka deihtah uh Barnaba leh Paul,
44015026	Lalpa Jesu Khrist min jiaha sih khawhsaloua um tegeel toh, na kawmva mi hung sawl chu hoih ka sa uhi.
44015027	Huchiin Juda leh Sila ka hung sawl va, amah un zong hi thu kam in ahung hilh diing uhi.
44015028	Ajiahchu Hagau Siangthou leh kei un hi thu poimohte chihlouh puaahgih dang bangmah na tungvah ngahlouh hoih ka sa uhi:
44015029	milem biahna sa neeh bang, sisan neeh bang, akiheehlup thoh sa neeh bang leh kingaihna thaanghuai bang tawp leh uh chin ka chi uhi. Hi haw na tawp uh leh, nanguh diingin ahoih diing hi. Damtahin um un, chiin.
44015030	Huchiin asawlkheta va, Antiok khua atun tahun mipi akoukhawm va, lehkhathot chu apeta uhi.
44015031	Huchu asim zohun, hamuanna thu jiahin akipaah mahmahta uhi.
44015032	Juda leh Sila zong zawlnei ahi va, thu tamtah in unaute chu ahamuan va, asukip uhi.
44015033	Huleh hutah a sawttah aum nungun amahuh chu hamuangtahin unaute lah apat apostolte kawmah achiahsahta uhi.
44015034	Sila in chu hu mun a umtaahdih hoih asa hi.
44015035	Paul leh Barnaba chu Antiok ah Lalpa thu hilh leh soiin midang tamtah toh aum zing uhi.
44015036	Ni bangzah aha nungin Paul in Barnaba kawmah, “I chiahkiit diing a, kho chin a Lalpa thu i soina zousiah a unaute vaveh ni, bangchiin aum viai chih i vaen diing,” achi hi.
44015037	Huleh Barnaba in Mark kichi Johan chu a kawmvah pui atum hi.
44015038	Hizongleh Pamphilia gam a amahuh kiihsan a, natohna a amahuh toh anachiah loupa chu a kawmva pui diing Paul in hoih asa sih hi.
44015039	Huchiin nasataha kinialin akikhen uhi. Barnaba in Mark apui a, Kupra gam ah kuang in achiahta hi.
44015040	Huleh Paul in Sila ateel a, unaute’n Pathian hehpihna a akolsah nungun achiahdohta hi.
44015041	Huleh kouhtuamte sukip jeelin Syria leh Silisia gam tawnin achiah uhi.
44016001	Huin amah chu Derbe leh Lystra ah ahung a; ngai in, hutah ah Timothi kichi, nungjui khat aum hi. Amah chu gingtu, Juda numei koiaha tapa ahi a, hizongleh a pa chu Grikmi ahi.
44016002	Amah chu Lystra leh Ikoniam aum unaute’n asoiphat mahmah uh ahi.
44016003	Paul in amah chu tonpih diingin adeih a, apui hi. Hu kiimveel a Juda umte jiahin a zeh atansah hi, amah un a pa Grikmi ahi chih aheet jiahun.
44016004	Khopite tawna apai kawm-un, amah un Jerusalem a um apostolte leh upate’n anamdet uh thupuuhnate chu a kawmvah juih diingin apekhia uhi.
44016005	Huchiin kouhtuamte chu ginna ah asukipta va, ni chin in apung deuhdeuhta uhi.
44016006	Asia gam a thusoi diing Hagau Siangthou in akhap jiahin amah un Phrigia gam leh Galatia gam atawnsuaah va,
44016007	Mysia gam kawm atun tahun, Bithunia gam ah luut atum va, hizongleh Hagau in aphal sih hi.
44016008	Huchiin Mysia gam akhen va, Troas ah achiahsuhta uhi.
44016009	Huleh jaan laiin Paul in kilaahna amu a, Makedonia gam a mi khat dingin, “Makedonia gam ah hung gaalkaai inla, hung panpih in,” chia ngeenin amu hi.
44016010	Huleh hu kilaahna amuh zohin a kawmva tanchinpha soi diingin Lalpa’n ahung kou ahi chih ka heetun, Makedonia gam ah chiah ka tum pah uhi.
44016011	Huchiin Troas khua apat kuang in ka pawt va, zangtahin Samothrake tuikulhgam ah ka chiah va, a jiing in Niapoli ah ka chiah jeel uhi.
44016012	Hu apatin Philippi ah ka chiah va, huchu Makedonia gam a kho poimoh khat ahi a, Rom mite teenna veeng ahi. Hu khopi ah ni bangjaat aha ka taam uhi.
44016013	Sabbath ni in khopi polam a luuipang ah haamteina mun hia ka gintaat vah ka chiah uhi. Huin ka tou va, numei hung paikhawmte kawmah thu ka soi uhi.
44016014	Huleh numei khat a min Lidia, puan sandup juaah, Thiateira khopi a um, Pathian be mi in ka thu uh aja a, Paul thusoi jui diingin Lalpa’n a lungtang asuhvaahsah hi.
44016015	Huleh amah leh a innkote’n baptisma atan zohun, “Lalpa a ginuma na hung ngaih uh leh, ka inn ah hung unla hung tung un,” chiin ahung kou hi. Huchiin ahung houtaang teeiteeita hi.
44016016	Huleh hichi ahung hi a, haamteina mun a ka chiah laiun, suaah nungaah kua aha aisaansiam jawl in ahung kituaahpih hi. Ama’n chu a aisaan jiahin a pute sum tamtah amuhsah veu hi.
44016017	Hu mi in chu Paul leh keiuh kikouin ahung jui a, “Hi mite, hutdamna lampi hung hilhte hi Tungnungpeen Pathian suaahte ahi uh,” achi hi.
44016018	Huchiin ni tamtah huchibangin ahih a, huin Paul in jadah mahmahin akihei a, dawi kawmah, “Jesu Khrist min in a sung apat pawt diingin thu ka hung pia ahi,” achi hi. Huleh amah chu hu laitahin apawt pah hi.
44016019	Huleh a pute’n summuh akinepna uh abei, chih aheet tahun, Paul leh Sila aman va dawlmun ah thukhentute ma ah akailuut uhi.
44016020	Thukhentute kawmah apui va, “Hite hi Judami ahi va, ka khopi uh atohbuai mahmah uhi.
44016021	Ei Rom mite’n i laah va i zop sianglou tawndaante juihsah ahung tum uhi,” achi uhi.
44016022	Huchiin mipite chu amahuh sual diingin ahung kipan uhi. Thukhentute’n a puan uh abohkeehsah va chiangpum a jeep diingin thu apia uhi.
44016023	Tampivei ajeep zohun, suangkul ah akhum va, a suangkul veengtu kawmah bittaha veeng diingin thu apia uhi.
44016024	Huchitaha thu apiaah jiahun, ama’n chu suangkul sungnung jaw ah akhum a, a keengte vah singkol abutsah hi.
44016025	Hizongleh jaankhang laiin Paul leh Sila chu ahaamtei va, Pathian kawmah phatna la asa va, huleh mitaangte’n angaikhia uhi.
44016026	Thakhatin jiil nasatahin ahung kiliing a, huchiin suangkul innbulte ahung liing a, kot zousiah chu kihong pahin, mi chin kolbuhte ahung kiphel vehta hi.
44016027	Huin suangkul veengtu chu ihmu ahung halh a, suangkul kotkhaahte kihong amuhin mitaangte chu taaimangta uh asa a, a naamsau adoh a, kithah atum hi.
44016028	Hizongleh Paul chu aw ngaihtahin akikou a, “Bangmah kiloh sin, ajiahchu ka bawnun hi ah ka um uhi,” achi hi.
44016029	Huin a veengtu’n chu thaumei akan a, atawmluut a, kithing kawma hungin, Paul leh Sila ma ah akhupbohta hi.
44016030	Huleh amahuh chu ahung puidoh a, “Pute, hutdama umna diingin bang ahiai ka bawl diing?” achi hi.
44016031	Huin amah un, “Lalpa Jesu Khrist gingta in, huchiin hutdamin na um diing, nang leh na innkuante,” achi uhi.
44016032	Huin amah un a kawm leh a inn a um zousiah kawmah Lalpa thu asoita uhi.
44016033	Ama’n amahuh chu hu jaan hu daah mahin apui a, ajeepna golhte uh asilsiang hi. Huin amah leh a innkote zousiah in baptisma atang pah ngaal uhi.
44016034	Amahuh chu a inn sungah apui a, a ma vah an alui a, Pathian agintaat jiahun a innkote zousiah toh akipaah uhi.
44016035	Ni asuaah in, thukhentute’n, “Hu mite hah in,” chiin mimantute asawl uhi.
44016036	Suangkul veengtu in Paul kawmah hu thu ahilh a, “Thukhentute’n nanguh hah diingin mi ahung sawl uhi; hujiahin tuin pawt unla hamuangtahin chiah un,” achi hi.
44016037	Hizongleh Paul in a kawmvah, “Rom khualetui hihna nei mite ka hi ngaalva, ka tungthu uh atanna umlouin vaantaang mitmuhin ahung jeep va, suangkul ah ahung khum uhi. Tuin aguuha hung delhkhiah sawm ahi uh maw? Hithei ngeilou diing! Amahuh mahmah hung uh henla hung puidoh uh heh,” achi hi.
44016038	Huleh mimantute’n hu thute chu thukhentute kawmah ahilh uhi. Rom khualetui hihna nei mite ahi uh chih ajaah tahun alauta uhi.
44016039	Huin amahuh ahung va, ajawl va, apuidoh va, khopi nuse diingin angeen uhi.
44016040	Huleh amahuh chu suangkul apat apawt va Lidia inn ah aluut va; unaute amuh tahun ahasot va, apawtta uhi.
44017001	Huleh Amphipoli leh Apollonia apaipeel va, Thessalonika atungta va, hutah ah chu Judate sinagog aum hi.
44017002	Paul chu amah ngeinain, a kawmvah aluut a, Sabbath ni thumvei Pathian Lehkhathu apat akikuppih a,
44017003	Khrist chu gimthuaah diing mawng ahihdaan bang, huleh misi lah apat thou kiit ngeei diing ahihdaan hilhchianin, “Hi na kawmva ka soi Jesu chu Khrist ahi” chiin ahilhchian a, asulang hi.
44017004	Huchiin a lahva mi khenkhat in agingta va Paul leh Sila chu azopta uhi, Pathian ngaihsah Grik mipi nasatah leh numei lamkai tamtahte toh.
44017005	Hizongleh ginglou Judate’n ahuphulh jiahun dawlmun a migilou thasia kuate aha a kawmva pui in mipi akoukhawm va, khopi sung teng asubuaita uhi. Huin Jason inn aluh va, amahuh chu vaantaang laha puikhiah atum uhi.
44017006	Huleh amahuh amuh louh phetun, Jason leh unau dang kuate aha khopi sung thukhentute kawmah akailuut va, kikouin, “Hi khovel hihbuai lumlette hi ah zong ahung uh;
44017007	Jason in anazintungsah a, hite zousiah in kumpi dang, a min Jesu aum hi, chiin Kaisar thuphuan kalhin aum uhi,” achi uhi.
44017008	Mipite leh khopi sung thukhentute’n hu thu ajaahun abuaita uhi.
44017009	Huleh amah un Jason leh midangte kawm apatin a luangva heen diing sil alaah zohun, amahuh ahahta uhi.
44017010	Huleh unaute’n ajaan ajaan in Paul leh Sila chu Beria ah asawlkhe pah uhi. Hutah avatun tahun Judate sinagog ah aluut uhi.
44017011	Hu mite chu Thessalonika a mite saangin a lungsim uh anakihong jaw va, lungsim kilawptahin thu chu apom va, a thusoi uh chu adih leh dihlouh heetna diingin ni chinin Pathian Lehkhathu ah ahawl uhi.
44017012	Hujiahin amahuh laha tamtah in agingta uhi, Grik numei leh pasal zahum tampite toh.
44017013	Hizongleh Thessalonika khua a Judate’n Paul in Beria khua ah Pathian thu asoita chih aheet tahun, hutah ah zong ahung va, mipite ahung tohbuai uhi.
44017014	Huin kintahin unaute’n Paul chu tuikhanglian tan a chiah diingin asawlkhe pah va, hizongleh Sila leh Timothi chu hutah ah aum denta uhi.
44017015	Paul puitute’n chu Athen tanin apui va; Sila leh Timothi chu akintheipatawpa a kawma hung diinga a thuhaah chu puain achiahta uhi.
44017016	Paul in Athen a amahuh anangaah laiin, hu khopi chu milem pathiante a dimin amu a, a lungsim asuna hi.
44017017	Hujiahin sinagog ah Judate leh Pathian ngaihsahte ahoulimpih a, dawlmun ah zong ana-um photmahte chu ni chinin ahoulimpih jeel hi.
44017018	Huin Epikuriamite leh Stoikmite laha mipil kuate aha in zong amah ahung kinialpih uhi. Huleh khenkhat in, “Hi thasia kamtam in bang ahiai asoi tup?” achi uhi. Akhen dangte’n, Jesu thu leh thohkiitna tanchinpha asoi jiahin, “Amah chu gam dang pathiante thusoitu ahihtuaah hi,” achi uhi.
44017019	Huleh amah chu apui va Areopaga ah atut va, a kawmah, “Hi thuhilhna thah na soi hi na hung hesah thei diai?
44017020	Silmah bang aha ka bil vah na hung tut ahi; hujiahin hi silte umjia ka he uut uhi,” achi uhi.
44017021	Ajiahchu Athenmi haw zousiah leh a khua va zin umte’n zong, ahun uh sildang bangmaha zang louin thu thah taphot soiin aha, angaikhe beehin aha aum veu uhi.
44017022	Huin Paul chu Areopaga mual laitah ah ading a, thu asoi hi, “Nanguh Athen mite haw, bangkim ah sahkho ngaihsahtah mi na hi uh chih ka he hi.
44017023	Ajiahchu ka vaahleh kawm a, na biahte uh ka et leh maitaam khat tungah, HEETLOUH PATHIAN A DIING, chia kigial ka mu hi. Hujiahin heloupi-a na biah uh, hu Amah chu ka hung hilh ahi.
44017024	“Pathian, khovel leh a sunga sil zousiah siamtu chu, vaan leh lei Lalpa ahihjiahin, khut a bawl biahinnte bang ah aum ngei sih hi.
44017025	Amah chu sil tasam bangin mihing khut a natohsahin zong aum ngei sih hi. Ajiahchu Amah ngeei chu bangkim kawmah hinnate, haihna leh sil zousiah petu ahijaw hi.
44017026	Leitung zousiah a teeng diingin sisan khat apatin nam chin a mihingte Ama’n asiam hi. Amahuh diingin hunbiihte aguat a, a teenna gamgi uh zong akhamsah hi.
44017027	Amah chu eite chiat apat gamla sih zongleh, amah un Lalpa ahung hawl va, amai amai va Amah ahung muhna diing uh ahi.
44017028	Ajiahchu Amah ah i hing va, i taang va, i um uhi, na laphuaahsiam uh kuate aha in zong, ‘Ei zong Amah haahte i hi ngaalva,’ chia asoi bangun.
44017029	“Huchiin Pathian haahte i hih jiahun, Pathian Pianken Umdaan chu sana pouh, dangka pouh, suang pouh, mihing khutsiam leh suhtuaha kheen milem tobang ahi, chih i ngaihtuah diing uh ahi sih.
44017030	Pathian in i heetlouh laite uh akiheetmohbawl a, hizongleh tuin chu mun chin a mi zousiah kisiih diingin thu apeta hi.
44017031	Ajiahchu Ama’n Mi aguatpa tungtawna khovel dihtatna a avaihawmna diing ni chu aguatta hi; huchiin Ama’n misi lah apat Amah akaihthohna ah a silguat muanhuaina mi zousiah kawmah alangsahta hi,” chiin.
44017032	Huleh amah un misi lah apat thohkiitna thu ajaah tahun, khenkhat in anuihsan va, adang in, “Hi thu na kawmah ka ngaikhe kiit diing uh,” achi uhi.
44017033	Huchiin Paul chu a lah vakipat apawtta hi.
44017034	Hizongleh mi khenkhatte’n amah azop va huleh agingta uhi. Huleh amahuh laha khenkhat chu Areopaga pawl a mi Dionisia leh numei khat, a min Damari ahi a, huleh a kawmva midangte toh ahi uhi.
44018001	Hu silte zohin Paul chu Athen apat apawt a, Korinth ah achiahta hi.
44018002	Huleh a min Akuila, Judami khat amu a, hu mi chu Ponta gam a piang ahi a, Klaudias in Judate zousiah Rom apat pawt diingin thu apiaah jiaha a ji Prisilla toh Italy gam apat hung tungpan phet ahi va; Paul chu a kawmvah ahung hi.
44018003	A natoh uh kibang ahih jiahin a kawmvah atung a, a natoh uh chu puanbuuh bawl ahih jiahin atongkhawmta uhi.
44018004	Sabbath ni chinin sinagog ah thu asuutpih a, Judate leh Grikte chu thuzoh atum hi.
44018005	Huleh Sila leh Timothi chu Makedonia apat ahung tunun, Hagau in Paul chu thusoi diingin aphuut a, huleh Jesu chu Khrist ahi chih Judate kawmah ahilhchian veu hi.
44018006	Hizongleh amah un amah chu kalhin asoisia va, Paul in a puan athing a, a kawmvah, “Na sisan moh uh na tungvah kituh heh; na sisan vapat kei ka siang ahi. Tu kalsiah Jentelte kawmah ka chiahta diing hi,” achi hi.
44018007	Hu apatin achiah a, mi khat a min Jasta achih uh inn ah aluut a, hu mi’n chu Pathian abe veu a, a inn zong sinagog toh kizom ahi.

44018009	Huin jaanin Lalpa chu Paul kawmah manglam bangin akilaah a, “Lau sinla, sip louin thu soi jeelin.
44018010	Ajiahchu na kawmah ka um zing ahi, hung suna diingin kuamah in na tungah khut aha sih diing uh, hi khopi ah mi tampi ka nei ngaala,” achi hi.
44018011	Huleh Paul chu hutah ah a lahva Pathian thu hilhin kum khat leh ha guup aumta hi.
44018012	Huleh Gallio, Akaia gamoptu ahih laiin, Judate’n kithutuaahin Paul asual va, vaihawmna touphah ma ah atut va,
44018013	“Hi pa soplai in daan kalh jawngin Pathian be diingin mi aheem puuh hi,” achi uhi.
44018014	Huleh Paul in dawng diinga akisah laitahin, Gallio in Judate kawmah, “Aw nanguh Judate, hi haw hi sil dihlou thu aha, sil hihsual thu aha beeh hileh, ka hung ngaihsahna diing jiah aum diing hi.
44018015	Hizongleh thute, minte, nanguh daan thute giap ahihleh vaang, nang un kingaihtuah jaw un; ajiahchu ke’n huchibang thu ka ngaihtuah uut sih hi,” achi hi.
44018016	Huleh vaihawmna touphah apatin amahuh adelhmangta hi.
44018017	Huin Grikmi zousiah in sinagog houtu Sostheni aman va, vaihawmna touphah ma ah avua uhi. Himahleh Gallio in hu a silbawlte uh poi asa sih hi.
44018018	Huleh hu nungin Paul chu ni sawttah ataam nalai hi. Huzohin unaute chu kampha in akhen a, Prisilla leh Akuila toh Syria gam lamah kuang in achiahta uhi. Kichiamna aneih jiahin, Kenkria ah Paul in a sam ameet hi.
44018019	Huin Ephesi atung a, amahuh hutah ah anuseta hi; hizongleh amah chu sinagog ah aluut a, Judate toh thu asuutkhawmta uhi.
44018020	Huleh amah un a kawmva sawt deuh taam diingin angeen va, amah auut sih a,
44018021	hizongleh kampha in akhen a, “Jerusalem a kuut um diing ah tel ngeei ka tum hi. Pathian in aphal leh, na kawmvah ka hung kiit diing hi,” achi hi. Huleh Ephesi akipatin kuang in achiahta hi.
44018022	Huleh Kaisaria ahung kaaiin, achiah tou a, kouhtuamte chibai abuuh a, Antiok ah achiahsuhta hi.
44018023	Huleh hutah ah ni tam lou aum nungin, achiah kiit a, nungjuite zousiah sukip diingin Galatia gam leh Phrigia gam zousiah atuansuaah hi.
44018024	Huleh Judami khat a min Apollo, Alexandria khua a piang, thusoi siam leh Pathian Lehkhathu he deuh mei, Ephesi ah achiah hi.
44018025	Hu mi chu Lalpa lampi thu jilsiamsahsa ahi a, Johan baptisma chauh he hizongleh, hagau a guntuhtaha Lalpa tanchin dihtaha soiin ahilh jeel hi.
44018026	Huleh sinagog ah hangsantahin thu asoi panta hi. Prisilla leh Akuila in a thusoi ajaah tahun a inn vah apui va, a kawmah Pathian lampi thu kichian seemin ahilh chianta uhi.
44018027	Huleh ama’n Akaia gam a chiah peh atup phetin, unaute’n ahasuan va, amah anakipaahpihna diingun nungjuite kawmah lehkha athotta uhi. Amah atun tahin, hehpihna jaala gingtate nasatahin apanpih hi.
44018028	Ajiahchu ama’n silbawltheitahin vaantaang heetin Judate anialdong a, Pathian Lehkhathu zangin Jesu chu Khrist ahi, chih ahilhchian hi.
44019001	Huleh hichi ahung hi a, Apollo hi Korinth a aum kaalin Paul chu khosah gamte tuansuaah zouin Ephesi ahung tung hi. Huleh nungjui kuate aha ahawldoh hi.
44019002	Ama’n a kawmvah, “Na gintaat laitahun Hagau Siangthou na tang viai?” achi hi. Amah un a kawmah, “Hagau Siangthou aum chih zong ka ja kha ngei mawngmawng sih uh,” achi uhi.
44019003	Huin ama’n a kawmvah, “Bang baptisma ahiai na tan uh?” achi hi. Amah un, “Johan baptisma,” achi uhi.
44019004	Huin Paul in, “Johan in chu mi kawmah a nunga hung diing Khrist Jesu chu na gintaat diing uh ahi, chiin kisiihna baptisma in abaptis ahi,” achi hi.
44019005	Amah un hichu ajaah tahun, Lalpa Jesu min in baptisma atangta uhi.
44019006	Huleh Paul in a tungva a khut angah tahin, Hagau Siangthou a tungvah ahung tungta a, haamdangte in ahaam va, zawlnei bangin thu asoilawh uhi.
44019007	Huleh a bawnun pasal sawmlenih veel ahi uhi.
44019008	Huleh Paul chu sinagog ah aluut a, ha thum sung diing hangsantahin thu asoi a, Pathian lalgam tungtaang thu ah houlimpihin mi ajawl tuuntuun jeel hi.
44019009	Hizongleh khenkhat in a lungtang uh akhauhsah va thu amang sih va, mipi ma a hu Lampi chu asoisiat tahun, amahuh achiahsan hi. Nungjuite apuituam a, Tiranna skul ah ni chinin akihoulimpihta hi.
44019010	Huleh hichibangin kum nih sung aum a; huchiin Asia gam a um zousiah, Judate leh Grikte’n Lalpa Jesu thu ajata uhi.
44019011	Huleh Pathian in Paul khut in silmah tungtuang tahtahte abawlsah hi.
44019012	Huchiin a sa tung apatin puan themte aha teenthuahte aha bang damloute kawmah ahung tawi va, anatnate uh adam jeel a, huleh a sung vapat dawite zong apawt jeel uhi.
44019013	Huin dawite nohdoh siam Judami vaah lehleh khenkhat in, “Paul in a thu ataangkoupih veu Jesu min in ka hung vau uhi,” chiin dawipaaite tungah Lalpa Jesu min alou veu vial uhi.
44019014	Huleh Judami, siampu lal khat, Skeva in hutobang bawl tapa sagih anei hi.
44019015	Hizongleh dawi gilou in chu adawng a, “Jesu ka he hi, Paul zong ka he hi, himahleh nanguh koite na hi viai?” achi hi.
44019016	Huin dawipaai pa’n chu amahuh ahung boh a, azou a, anuaisiahta a; huchiin hu inn apatin saguaah leh liamin ataaidohta uhi.
44019017	Huleh hichu Ephesi khua a teeng zousiah, Judate leh Grikte kawmah athangta a; lauhna chu a bawnva tungah ahung tung a, Lalpa Jesu min chu tawisangin aumta hi.
44019018	Huleh agingta zong tamtah ahung va, a silbawlte uh thupha atawi va, akiphuangta uhi.
44019019	Mitphialdawi tawi mi tampi in zong a lehkhabu uh ahung tawi khawm va, mi zousiah mitmuhin ahaalta va; aman asuut va, dangka saang sawmngaa apha hi.
44019020	Huchiin loupitahmaiin Lalpa thu chu nasatahin akithehdalh a, agualzou jeel hi.
44019021	Hu silte abawlzoh nungin, Paul in Hagau in, Makedonia gam leh Akaia gam atotsuaah zoh chianga Jerusalem a chiah atum a, “Hu a ka chiah zoh chiangin, Rom zong ka vapha teeiteei diing,” achi hi.
44019022	Huchiin amah panpihtute mi nih Timothi leh Erasta chu Makedonia gam ah asawl a, hizongleh amah chu Asia gam ah hun tomkhat aum tadih hi.
44019023	Hulai veelin hu Lampi thu jiahin mi abuai nasaten uhi.
44019024	Ajiahchu mi khat a min Demetria, dangka siih kheengtu, dangka siih a Artemis milem biahinn bawltu in khutsiamte kawmah kilohna tampi ape jeel hi.
44019025	Hu mipa’n a natoh banguh tongte toh amahuh akoukhawm a, huin a kawmvah, “Pute aw, hi natohna hi i hauhna uh ahi, chih na thei uhi.
44019026	Hi Ephesi chauh ah hilouin, Asia gam pumpi phial ah zong, khut a bawlte chu pathiante ahi sih uh, chiin hi Paul in mi tampi athuzoh a, akiheisah zouta hi chih, nanguh ngeei in na mu un na ja uhi.
44019027	Huchiin i kiveina uh manlouh ahung suah diing lauhuai chauh zong ahi sih a, pathiannu loupi Artemis biahinn zong simmohin ahung um kha diing a, huleh Asia gam pumpi leh khovel in abiah uh amahnu ngeei zong a loupina apat suhngiamin ahung um kha diing chih alauhuai ahi,” achi hi.
44019028	Huleh hu thute ajaah tahun athangtawm mahmah va, “Ephesi mite Artemis chu aloupi hi!” chiin akikou uhi.
44019029	Huin a kho pumpi abuai vehta va, Gaia leh Aristarka, Makedonia gam a mi, Paul in a khualzinna a atonpih tegeel chu aman va, kituaahtahin etnop inn ah ataailuutpihta uhi.
44019030	Paul in mi laha luut atup leh nungjuite’n aphal sih uhi.
44019031	Huleh Asia gam a houtute laha Paul lawmte khenkhat in a kawmah mi asawl va, etnop inn a luut het lou diingin angeen uhi.
44019032	Khenkhat thu khatin akikou va, khenkhat thudang in akikou uhi, ajiahchu kikhawmte chu abuai va, mi tamjaw in a kikhopna san uh zong ahe sih uhi.
44019033	Huleh mipi lah apat Alexandar akaidoh va, Judate’n amah chu ama lamah asawn uhi. Alexandar in a khut in ajaap a, mipite kawmah a siamna thu soi atum hi.
44019034	Hizongleh amah Judami ahi chih aheet tahun, daah kaal nih sung diing veel aw kituaahtahin, “Ephesi mite Artemis chu aloupi hi!” chiin akikou kou uhi.
44019035	Huleh khopi lehkhagialtu in mipi adaihsah zohin, “Nanguh Ephesi mite, Ephesi hi Artemis pathiannu loupi biahinn keemtu khopi ahi chih leh a lim vaan apat hung kesuh khu keemtu ahi chih helou koi aum ei?
44019036	Huchiin hi thu nial gual ahihlouh nungin, na sip khiinkhian diing uh ahi. Kin hehuin bangma na bawl diing uh ahi sih hi.
44019037	Ajiahchu hi na hung mipuite uh hi biahinn luhmi lah ahi sih va, na pathiannu soisete zong ahi sih uhi.
44019038	Demetria leh a tohpih khutsiam haw in mi kua tung aha a thubuai aneih uh leh, vaihawmna innte akihong zing a, gamoptute zong aum uhi. Khat leh khat kiheeh uh heh.
44019039	Hizongleh sildang a buaina nei na hih uh leh daan banga kikhopna ah lep diing ahi.
44019040	Tuni a buaina jiahin i tungvah thu ahung um diing lauthawng ahuai hi, i kikhopna san peen hih ahi chih theih diing lah aum sih ngaala,” achi hi.
44019041	Huleh ama’n huchia asoi zohin kikhopna chu atawpsahta hi.
44020001	Huleh buaina adaih nungin, Paul in nungjuite a kawmah akou a, amahuh ahasot a, kampha in aha a, Makedonia gam a diingin achiahta hi.
44020002	Huleh hu gam veel atotsuaah a, a kawmva hasotna thu tampi asoi zohin, Greece gam atungta hi.
44020003	Huleh hutah ah ha thum ataam a, Syria gam lama kuang a apai sawm laiin, Judate’n amah aguuh taan jiahun, Makedonia gam lehtot kiit atumta hi.
44020004	Huleh Beria khua a Sopater, Thessalonika khua a Aristarka leh Sekunda, Derbe khua a Gaia leh Timothi, huleh Asia gam a Tikika leh Trophima, amah un Asia gam dongin atonpih uhi.
44020005	Hite chu ka ma vah anachiah va, Troas ah ahung na ngaah uhi.
44020006	Huleh kei uh chu Tolsohlouh Tanghou nite zohin Philippi apat kuang in ka pai va, ni ngaa nungin a kawmvah Troas khua ah ka tung va, hutah ah ni sagih ka taam uhi.
44020007	Hapta ni masapeenin, nungjuite tanghou balkeeh diinga ahung kikhop laiun Paul in ajiingni a pai atup jiahin a kawmvah thu asoi a, huleh jaankhang dongin asoi hi.
44020008	Huleh pindan tungnung a ka kikhopna vah thaumei tampi aum hi.
44020009	Huleh a min Eutika kichi khangdawng khat kotta ah atou a, tuuitahin ana-ihmu hi. Paul in thu asoi sawt taahluat jiahin, anaihmu kha a, innsawng thumna apatin akesuh a, a sisain atawm uhi.
44020010	Huleh Paul akumsuh a, a tungah abohkhum a, akawi a, “Mangbang sih un, ajiahchu amah ah hinna aum nalai hi,” achi hi.
44020011	Huin pindan tungnung a akaltouh kiit phetin, tanghou abalkeeh a, ane a, sawttah khovaah dongin a kawmvah thu soiin ahoulim a, huchiin achiahta hi.
44020012	Huleh amah un tangvaalpa chu ahingin ahung pui va, huleh amahuh chu nasataha hamuanin aumta uhi.
44020013	Huleh keiuh chu long lamah ka na chiah masa va, Asso khopi juanin kuang in ka paita va, hutah ah Paul tuansah diing ka sawm uhi; ajiahchu ama’n a keeng a chiah tumin huchi bangin achi mawng ahi.
44020014	Huleh Asso a ahung kituaahpih tahin ka tuangsahta va, Mitylene ka tungta uhi.
44020015	Huleh hu apatin kuang in ka chiah kiit va, ajiingni in Kios tuikulhgam lehlam jawn ka tung uhi. Huleh ajiingni in Samos tuikulhgam ka tung va, Trogiliam ah ka taam uhi. Ajiingni in Mileta ka tung uhi.
44020016	Ajiahchu Paul in Asia gam a um sawt autlouh jiahin Ephesi chu kuang a paikheel atupsa him ahi a, ahihtheih leh Jerusalem ah Pentikost ni a um atup jiahin akin pai hi.
44020017	Huleh Mileta akipatin Ephesi ah mi asawl a, kouhtuam upate avakousah hi.
44020018	Huleh amahuh a kawma ahung tun tahun, ama’n a kawmvah, “Asia gam a ka hung chiil ni masa apat na kawmva ka um sung siaha ka umdaan na he uhi.
44020019	Kingaingiamtah leh Judate’n thah diinga thu aphial jiahva mittui tampi leh sil hahsa ka tunga hung tungte thuaah kawmin Lalpa nna ka tong hi.
44020020	Huleh nanguh phattuamna diing sil bangmah phuangdoh louin ka iim sih a, ka hung hesah veh a, vaantaang lah leh inn chin ah ka hung thuhilh veu hi.
44020021	Judate leh Grikte kawmah zong Pathian lama lungsim kisiih thu leh i Lalpa Jesu Khrist ginna thu ka hesah jeel hi.
44020022	“Huleh tuin ngai un, hagau in Jerusalem a chiahtou diingin ahung phuut hi. Hu mun a ka tunga sil hung tung diingte ka he sih hi.
44020023	Kaanna leh hahsatna in ahung ngaah hi, chia khopi chin a Hagau Siangthou in ahung heetsah veute chauh ka he hi.
44020024	Hizongleh ka kitaaidemna kipaahtaha ka taaitung theihna diing leh Lalpa Jesu apat ka muh Pathian hehpihna tanchinpha heetsah diing natohna ka tohzoh theihna diingin hi silte khat beeh in ahung hihliing sih a, ka hinna zong iit taahin ka ngai sih hi.
44020025	“Huleh tuin, nanguh zousiah in ngai un, Pathian lalgam thu soia ka vaahlehnate’n ka meel na mu nawn sih diing uh, chih ka he hi.
44020026	Hujiahin mi zousiah sisan ah ka siang ahi chih tuni in ka hung hesah hi.
44020027	Ajiahchu Pathian thuguat zousiah na kawmvah phuandoh louha iim ka nei sih hi.
44020028	Hujiahin Pathian kouhtuam, Amah sisan a aleite vaah diingin, Hagau Siangthou in houtu a ahung siamna belaam pawlte zousiah leh nanguh tungah pilvaang un.
44020029	Ajiahchu ka chiah nung chiangin ngei huhamte na lahvah ahung luut diing va, belaam pawlte ahawi sih diing uh chih ka he hi.
44020030	Nanguh lah ngeei ah zong nungjui pawlte amahuh lama kaimang diingin thu heikawi na hung um diing uhi.
44020031	Hujiahin kiveeng un, kum thum sung zet mittui luang puma suun leh jaan a mi chin taaihilh ka tawp louh daan hezing un.
44020032	“Huleh tuin unaute, Pathian kawmah leh nanguh hung khangsah thei leh nanguh suhsiangthousate tengteng kawma goutan hung pe theitu Pathian hehpihna thu ah ka hung keemsah hi.
44020033	Kuamah dangka, sana, silhleteen ka eeng ngei sih hi.
44020034	Hi khutte’n keimah leh ka lawite taahsap atongdoh jeel chih nanguh ngeei in na he uhi.
44020035	Hitobanga tonggimin haatloute na panpih diing uh ahi chiin sil zousiah ah ka hung ensahta hi. Lalpa Jesu ngeei in, ‘Laah saangin, piaah hi vangpiaahna sangjaw ahi’ chia asoi khu hezing un,” achi hi.
44020036	Huleh huchibang thu asoi zohin akhuupdin a, a bawnun ahaamtei khawm uhi.

44020038	a meel amuh nawn louh diing uh thu asoi chu alungkhampih diaah uhi. Huleh long mun tanphain avahata uhi.
44021001	Huleh hichi ahung hi a, amahuh toh ka kikhen zohun, long in ka chiah va, zangtahin Kos tuikulhgam ka tung uhi. Huleh a jiing in Rhode tuikulhgam ka tung va, hu apatin Patara khopi ka tung uhi.
44021002	Phinisia gam tawn diing long khat ka mu va, ka tuang va, ka chiah jeel uhi.
44021003	Kupra tuikulhgam ka muh un, hu gam chu veilam pang ah ka peel va, Syria gam lamah ka chiah jeel va, huleh Tura ah ka kinga uhi, hu mun a long a vante suahkhiah diing ahih jiahin.
44021004	Huleh nungjuite ka hawldoh va, hutah ah ni sagih ka taam uhi. Amah un Hagau a heetsahna in Paul chu Jerusalem a chiah lou diingin ahilh uhi.
44021005	Ka um hun diing tan uh ka um zohun, ka kipandoh va, ka chiahna diing uh ka juanta uhi. Huleh amah un a bawnun, a jite leh a tate uh toh khopi gei dongin ahung ha uhi. Huin tuikhanglian geiah ka khuupdin va, ka haamtei uhi.
44021006	Kampha a ka kihaah zohun, keiuh long ah ka tuang va, amahuh inn lamah akihkiitta uhi.
44021007	Tura khua apat kuang a chiahin Tolemai khua ka tung va, unaute chibai ka buuh va, a kawmvah ni khat ka taam uhi.
44021008	Ajiingni in keiuh Paul lawite teng ka kipandoh va, Kaisaria ka tung uhi. Dikon sagihte laha khat, sawlleh Philip inn ah ka luut va, amah toh ka um uhi.
44021009	Hu mipa’n ta nungaah siangthou li anei a, amah un thu asoilawh jeel uhi.
44021010	Hu a ni bangzah aha ka taam laiun, Judia gam apat a min Agaba kichi zawlnei khat ahung suh hi.
44021011	Amah ka kawmvah ahung a, Paul kawnggaah ala a, a khutte leh a keengte a kikaanin, “Hichu Hagau Siangthou in achih ahi: ‘Hi kawnggaah neitu hi Jerusalem a Judate’n hichi bangin akaan diing va, Jentelte khut ah apekhe sawn diing uh,’” achi hi.
44021012	Hi thu ka jaah tahun, keiuh leh hu mun a umte’n Paul chu Jerusalem a chiah lou diingin ka ngeen uhi.
44021013	Huin Paul in, “Bang diinga na kah va, ka lung na natsah uh ahiai? Ajiahchu Jerusalem a kaan chauh hi louin, Lalpa Jesu min in sih zong ka ngaap ahi,” chiin adawng hi.
44021014	Huleh houhzoh gual ahihlouh tahin ka sipta va, “Lalpa deihjawng bawl hihen,” ka chita uhi.
44021015	Hu hun nungin ka vante uh ka siam va, Jerusalem ah ka chiah touta uhi.
44021016	Kaisaria apatin nungjuite khenkhat in ahung jui va, ka tunna diing uh Kupra a nungjui masa Mason inn ah ahung pui uhi.
44021017	Huleh Jerusalem ka hung tun tahun, unaute’n kipaahtahin ahung na dawn uhi.
44021018	Huleh ajiingni in Paul leh kei un Jakob ka vaveh va, hutah ah kouhtuam upate zousiah aum uhi.
44021019	Huleh Paul in amahuh chibai abuuh zohin, a natohna zanga Pathian in Jentelte laha sil abawlsah zousiah chu abaan baan in asoi hi.
44021020	Huleh amah un hu thu ajaah tahun, Lalpa apaahtawi va, huin Paul kawmah, “Unaupa, Judate lahah gingtute saang tamtah na mu a, huleh a bawnun daan tungtaang ah phatuam angai uhi.
44021021	Nang Jentelte laha Juda um haw zousiah kawma a tate uh zehtan louh diing leh tawndaan banga um louh diing, chiin Mosi daan paihkhiahna diing thu na hilh jeel chih mi kam apatin na tanchin ahe uhi.
44021022	Bang i bawlta diai le? Mipi ahung paikhawm ngeei diing uhi, ajiahchu na hung tung chih lah ja ngeei diing ahi uhi.
44021023	Hujiahin na kawma ka soi bangun bawl in: Kichiamna nei pasal li ka nei uhi.
44021024	Hu mite pui inla, amahuh toh kisusiang inla a sam uh a meetna diing uh sum tuaah in, huchiin mi zousiah in mi kam a na thu ajaah teng uh bangmahlou ahi chih leh nang chu daan juiin kijentahin na umjaw chih ahe diing uhi.
44021025	Jentelte laha gingtute tungtaang thu chu, milem biahna sil neeh apat, sa sisan neeh apat, heehlup sa neeh apat, huleh kingaihna thaanghuai apat, akihepkhiah louhngaal uh sildang ajuih uh angai sih, chiin thupuuhna ka la va, ka gialta uhi,” achi uhi.
44021026	Huin Paul in ajiingni in kichiamna nei pasal lite chu apui a, amahuh toh kisusiang zouin, kisiansahna ni bei hun diing leh amahuh chiat a diinga a sillat hun diing uh vakihesah diingin Pathian biahinn ah aluut hi.

44021032	Ama’n sepaihte leh sepaih zahoutute apui pah ngaal a, a kawmvah ataai suh uhi. Huin amah un sepaih houtulian leh sepaihte amuh tahun, Paul avuaah uh chu atawpta uhi.
44021033	Huin houtulian in ahung naih a, Paul atu a, khainiang nih a khih diing thu apia hi. Huleh koi hi a bang bawl kha ahiai, chih adong hi.
44021034	Mipi lahah akhen thukhatin akikou va, akhen thudang in akikou uhi. Huleh buai jiahin thudih ahe thei sih a, sepaihte giahbuuh a puiluut diingin thu apia hi.
44021035	Huleh Paul chu kalbi atun laiin, mipi asousang nasat jiahun sepaihte’n amah adomkaang uhi.

44021038	Tuma a mite buaina bawla mihel saang li gamdaai a puikhetu, Aiguptami hilou na hi maw?” achi hi.

44021040	Huleh lem asah tahin, Paul chu kalbi ah ading a, mipi lam a khut in ajaap a, asip duam tahun, a kawmvah, Hebrai haam in thu asoi a:
44022001	“Ulenaute leh pate haw, tuin na kawmvah ka siamna thu ka soi diing hi, ngai un,” achi hi.

44022003	“Kei chu Juda mi ka hi a, Silisia gam a Tarsa khopi a piang, hizongleh hi khopi a khanglian ka hi. Huleh Gamaliel nuaia i pulepate uh daan thu khauhtah dungjuia jilsaha um, tunia nanguh zousiah banga Pathian lama anaphatuamngai ka hi.
44022004	Huleh hi Lampi pawl a mite hi sihna khopin ka suduhdah jeel a, numei pasal in ka kaan a suangkul ah ka khum jeel hi.
44022005	Huin siampu lalpeen leh upate zousiah in zong hu thu chu ahung heetpih uhi. Amahuh kawm apat unaute piaah diingin lehkha ka mu a, amahuh sawisa diingin Damaska khopi tana umte, Jerusalem a kaansa a hung pui diingin ka chiah hi.
44022006	“Huleh hichi ahung hita a, ka chiah a, Damaska gei ka tunin, suunkim veel tahin, thakhatin vaan apat vaah nasatah ka kiim ah ahung vaahsot hi.

44022008	Huleh ke’n, ‘Lalpa, koi na hiai?’ chiin ka dawng hi. Huleh Ama’n ka kawmah, ‘Nazareth Jesu, na suhduhdah chu ka hi,’ achi hi.
44022009	Huleh ka kawma umte’n vaah chu amu va alau uhi, hizongleh ka kawma thusoitu aw chu ahesiam sih uhi.
44022010	Huleh ke’n, ‘Bang ka bawl diai, Lalpa?’ ka chi hi. Lalpa’n ka kawmah, ‘Thou inla Damaska ah chiah inla, hutah ah sil zousiah na bawl diinga kiguatte chu hilhin na um diing hi,’ achi hi.
44022011	Huleh hu vaah loupi jiahin khua ka mu thei nawnta sih a, ka lawite’n khut in ahung kai va, Damaska ah ka luutta hi.
44022012	“Huleh mi khat Anania, daan toh kituaahtah a Pathian ngaihsah leh hu a um Judate zousiah in azahtaat uh,
44022013	ka kawmah ahung a ka kawma ding in, ‘Unaupa Saul, khua muta in,’ ahung chi hi. Huleh huchih laitahin amah chu ka muta hi.
44022014	Huleh ama’n, ‘I pulepate uh Pathian in a deihlam he diing leh Midihtat chu mu a, a kam a suaah aw ja diinga ahung guat na hita hi.
44022015	Ajiahchu na muh leh na jaah thu ah mi zousiah kawmah Amah thu heetpihtu na hi diing hi.
44022016	Huleh bang diinga khongai nalai na hiai? Thou inla baptisma tang in, huleh Lalpa min kouin na sualna kisusiang in,’ ahung chi hi.
44022017	“Hichi ahung hi a, Jerusalem a ka chiah kiit a, Pathian biahinn a ka haamtei laiin, zelhin ka um a,
44022018	‘Kin inla Jerusalem apat kintahin pawt in, ajiahchu ka tanchin na soi diing pomlou diing ahi uh,’ hung chiin Amah chu ka mu hi.
44022019	Huleh keima’n, ‘Lalpa, amah un sinagog a umte suangkul a ka khum a, nang hung gingtate ka vuaah veu ahe uhi.
44022020	Na thu hetu Stephen sisan asuah laiun, kei zong a kawmah ka ding a, suhlup diing lemsatu ka hi a, amah thattute puante zong ka na keem ahi,’ ka chi hi.
44022021	Ama’n ka kawmah, ‘Chiah in, gamlataha Jentelte kawmah ka hung sawl diing ahi,’ ahung chita,” achi hi.
44022022	Huleh amah un hi tanchiang a thusoi angaikhia va, huin aw ngaihtahin, “Hitobang phet mi hi khovel akipatin suchimit un, ajiahchu hingtaah ahi sih hi,” achi uhi.
44022023	Huleh akikou va, a puante uh asepkhia va, vaanlam a leivui atheh laiun,
44022024	sepaih houtulian in Paul chu sepaihte giahbuuh a puiluut diingin thu apia a, a tunga hutobang lawma akikouna san uh aheetna diingin jeep a dohchian diing achi hi.
44022025	Hizongleh savun khau a akaan zohun, Paul in a kawma ding sepaih zahoutu kawmah, “Rom khualetui hihna nei mite mawngmawng siamlouh tansahna bei a vuaah phal ahiaimah?” achi hi.
44022026	Sepaih zahoutu’n hu ajaah tahin, sepaih houtulian kawmah achiah a, “Na silbawl diing pilvaang in, ajiahchu hi pa Rom khualetui hihna nei ahi,” chiin ahilh hi.
44022027	Huin sepaih houtulian ahung a, a kawmah, “Hung hilh in, Rom mi na hi maw?” achi hi. Ama’n, “Hi e,” achi hi.
44022028	Huleh sepaih houtulian in, “Hi khualetui hihna ke’n sum tampi a ka lei ahi,” chiin adawng hi. Huleh Paul in, “Kei chu Rom mi mawnga piang ka hi,” achi hi.
44022029	Hujiahin dotchian tumte’n amah achiahsan pah va, sepaih houtulian in zong Rom mi ahi chih aheettahin, amah mah in akaansah ahih jiahin alauta hi.
44022030	Ajiingni in, Judate’n bang jiahin ahiai Paul aheeh uh chih heetchian auut jiahin, sepaih houtulian in amah akaanna vapat aphel hi. Siampu lalte leh vaihawmtute zousiah kikhawm diingin thu apia a, Paul ahung pui va, a ma vah adingsahta uhi.
44023001	Huleh Paul in vaihawmtute aen teentaan a, “Ulenaute, tuni tanin Pathian mitmuhin sialepha heetna hoihtah zousiah toh ka um zing hi,” achi hi.
44023002	Huin siampu lalpeen Anania in Paul kawma dingte’n a kam behsah diingin asawl hi.
44023003	Huin Paul in a kawmah, “Nang, baang kinuh vaampa, Pathian in nang ahung beeng jaw diing hi. Nang daan thu banga ka thu ngaihtuah diingin na tou a, daanlou banga kei beh diingin na hung chi maw?” achi hi.
44023004	Huleh a kawma dingte’n, “Nang in Pathian siampu lalpeen na soisia maw?” achi uhi.
44023005	Huin Paul in “Unaute, siampu lalpeen ahih ka he sih a ahi; ajiahchu, ‘Na mite uh tunga vaihawmtu soise sin,’ chih gelh ahi,” achi hi.
44023006	Hizongleh Paul in, khenkhat Sadukaite ahi va adang Pharisaite ahi uh chih aheet tahin, vaihawmtute lahah akikou a, “Ulenaute, kei chu Pharisai, Pharisai khat tapa ka hi, misite kinepna leh thohkiitna thu ah vaihawmsaha um ka hi,” achi hi.
44023007	Huleh ama’n hichia asoi zohin, Pharisaite leh Sadukaite kaal ah kinialna ahung um a, mi paikhawmte chu akilangkhenta uhi.
44023008	Ajiahchu Sadukaite’n misi thohkiitna mawngmawng aum sih, angelte zong aum sih, hagau zong aum sih, achi va; hizongleh Pharisaite’n hute chu aum veh hi chih apom uhi.
44023009	Nasatahin abuaita va, Pharisai pawl laha daanjilsahtute khenkhat in dingdohin anial va, “Hi mi a giitlouhna bangma i mu sih uh; hagau in aha, angel in aha a kawmah thu soi ahihtaah leh, Pathian i dou sih diing uh,” achi uhi.
44023010	Huleh ahung kinial naah deuhdeuh phetun, sepaih houtulian in Paul chu aloihtel khaah diing uh alau a, sepaihte chu vachiah suh a, a lah vapat a Paul chu thagum a ladoh a, sepaihte giahbuuh a hung pui ngeei diingin thu apia hi.
44023011	A jaan in Lalpa chu Paul kawmah ading a, “Paul, hamuangtahin um in, Jerusalem a ka thu na heetsah bangin, Rom ah zong na hesah diing hi,” achi hi.
44023012	Huleh khua ahung vaah tahin Judate hunkhop akithukum va, Paul athah masiah va bangmah ne lou leh dawn lou diingin akichiamta uhi.
44023013	Huleh mi thah sawma kithukumte chu sawmli saanga tamjaw ahi uhi.
44023014	Huleh amahuh chu siampu lalte leh upate kawmah achiah va, “Paul ka thah masiah va bangma ne lou diingin nasatahin haamsia louin ka kichiam uhi.
44023015	Hujiahin nang un vaihawmtute toh a thu kichian seem a ngaihtuah diing kipangin na kawmva puikhe diingin sepaih houtulian kawmah vasoi un; huleh ama’n na kawm uh ahung phaah ma a anathat diinga mansa ka hi uhi,” achi uhi.
44023016	Huleh Paul tupa, a sanggamnu tapa in aguuh taan thu uh anaja a, sepaihte giahbuuh ah avaluut a Paul avahilhta hi.
44023017	Huin Paul in sepaih zahoutute laha khat a kawmah akou a, “Hi tangvaal chu sepaih houtulian kawmah pui in, a kawmah soi diing bang aha anei hi,” achi hi.
44023018	Huchiin ama’n sepaih houtulian kawmah apui a, “Paul mitaangpa in a kawmah ahung kou a, hi tangvaal in na kawma soi diing bang aha aneih jiahin na kawma hung pui diingin ahung ngeen hi,” achi hi.
44023019	Huin sepaih houtulian in a khut in atu a, atuamin apuidoh a, “Ka kawma na soi diing chu bang ahiai?” chiin aguuhin adong hi.
44023020	Huleh ama’n, “Paul thu kichian seema ngaihtuah tum bangin, jiing chianga vaihawmtute kawma puisuh diingin Judate’n hung nget lem asata uhi.
44023021	Hizongleh a thu uh na zop sin, ajiahchu a lahva mi sawmli saanga tamjaw in aguuh taan va, hu mite’n amah athah masiah va bangma ne lou diing leh dawn lou diingin akichiam uhi; huleh tuin na thu ngaahin mansain aum uhi,” achi hi.
44023022	Huchiin sepaih houtulian in tangvaal chu achiahsah a, “Hi thute na hung hesahta chih koimah hilh sin,” chiin thu apia hi.
44023023	Huleh sepaih zahoutute laha nih akou a, “Jaan daah thum chianga Kaisaria tana chiah diingin sepaih za nih toh, sakol tungtuang mi sawmsagih toh, teitawi mi za nih toh kimansain koih un;
44023024	huleh gamoptu Felix kawma bittaha aluut theihna diingin Paul tuanna diing sakol zong guatsah un,” achi hi.
44023025	Huleh ama’n hichibangin lehkhathot agial hi:
44023026	“Klaudias Lisias in gamoptu zahumpeen Felix chibai abuuh hi.
44023027	Hi mi Judate’n amat va athah diing kuan-un, kei chu sepaihte toh ka vachiah a, amah hi Rom mi ahi chih ka heetin ka hundohta hi.
44023028	Huleh a heehna jiah peen uh heet ka uut a, a vaihawmtute uh kawmah ka pui hi.
44023029	Amah chu a daan thu uh bang aha a kiheeh ahi chih ka he a, hizongleh a heehna thu vah sihna leh kaanna diing khop bangma aum sih, chih ka kandoh hi.
44023030	Huleh Judate’n amah ataang uh chih hilh ka hih tahin, na kawmah amah ka hung sawl ngaal hi; huleh amah heehte’n a tunga thubuai aneih phot uh na ma a soi diingin thu ka pia hi. Mangpha.” chiin.
44023031	Huchiin sepaihte’n a thupiaah bangin Paul chu jaan in apui va, Antipatri atunpih uhi.

44023033	Amahuh Kaisaria khopi atung va, gamoptu kawmah lehkhathot chu apia va, Paul zong ama ah adingsah uhi.
44023034	Huleh gamoptu in lehkhathot asim zohin, Paul umna gam adong hi. Huleh Silisia gam apat ahi chih aheet tahin,
44023035	“Nang hung heehte ahung tun chiangun, na thu ka ngaikhe diing,” achi hi. Huleh Herod Praitoriam sunga koih diingin thu apia hi.
44024001	Huleh ni ngaa nungin siampu lalpeen Anania toh, upate khenkhat leh thusoi siam Tartulla toh ahung suh va, Paul tunga thubuai chu gamoptu kawmah asoi uhi.
44024002	Huleh Paul akouhdoh tahun, Tartulla in Felix ma ah Paul aheehpanta a, “Nangmah vaanga lemna nasatah ka neih jiah uh leh na lunggeelsiamna a hi gam a kisiamhoihnate ahung tun jiahin,
44024003	bangchihtanin khoimun pouh ah lungkimtahin ka kipaah zing uhi, zahumtah Felix.
44024004	Ahihvaangin, nang diinga chimtaahhuai talua hih ka uut sih, na migiitna a ka thu uh themkhat hung ngaihkhiahsah diingin ka hung ngeen ahi.
44024005	“Ajiahchu kei un hi mihuathuaitah, mun chin a vaahleh a, khovel a Judate zousiah tohbuaitu leh Nazarethmite pawl a a makaipeen uh khat ahih ka he uhi.
44024006	Pathian biahinn suhbuaah zong atum a, huin amah chu ka man va, ka daan thu bangun vaihawmsah ka tum uhi.

44024008	amah heehtute na kawma hung diing thu apia hi. Nang ngeei in amah dong chianin ka heehna thute zousiah uh na he thei diing hi,” achi hi.

44024010	Huin gamoptu’n thusoi diinga khut a ajaap tahin, Paul in, “Nang chu kum tamtah hi nam vaihawmsahtu na hih ka heet jiahin kipaahtahin ka dihna thu ka soi diing hi.
44024011	Jerusalem a Pathian be diinga ka chiah touh nung ni sawmlenih vaal ahi nai sih diing chih na he thei diing hi.
44024012	Huleh Pathian biahinn a mi toh ka kinial aha, ahihlouhleh sinagog leh khopi sunga mipi ka chiilsiatna bangma amu sih uhi.
44024013	Tuin zong ahung heehnate uh kichiantahin abul asuikhe thei sih uhi.
44024014	Hizongleh hichu na kawmah ka soidoh ahi: amah un biahdaan tuam achih uh Lampi juiin ka pulepate uh Pathian ka bia hi, Daan leh Zawlneite Lehkhabute a kigial zousiah gingta kawmin.
44024015	Huleh midihtatte leh dihtatloute thohkiitna aum diing chia amah un zong agintaat uh, huchu ke’n Pathian lamah ka kineppih ahi.

44024017	“Tuin kum bangzah aha nungin ka namte uh kawma silpiaah diing leh lat diing hung tawiin ka hung hi.
44024018	Hu sil ka piaah laiin, Asia gam a hung kipan Judami koite aha in mipi tellou leh buailouin Pathian biahinn a ka kihihsiangthou chu ahung mu uhi.

44024020	Ahihlouhleh vaihawmtute ma a ka din laiin hi mite ngeei in, ka suhkhelh muh aneih uh leh, soi uh heh.
44024021	A lahva ding a, ‘Misi thohkiitna thu ah tuni’n na ma ah vaihawmsahin ka um ahi,’ chia ka kikou khiah jiah ahih louhngaal leh,” chiin adawng hi.
44024022	Huleh Felix in hi thute ajaah tahin hu Lampi thu chu ahechian deuh a, amahuh kawmah, “Sepaih houtulian Lisias ahung tun suh chiangin na thu uh ka ngaihtuah veh diing,” chiin kikhopna atawpsah phot hi.
44024023	Huleh ama’n Paul chu veeng a, thuthawl deuh a umsah a, a lawite’n a nna atohsah uh khaplou diingin sepaih zahoutu khat kawmah thu apia hi.
44024024	Huleh ni bangzah aha nungin, Felix chu a ji Juda numei Drusilla toh ahung va, Paul akousah a, Khrist a ginna thu angaikhia hi.
44024025	Huleh Paul in dihtatna thute, kideehna thute leh vaihawmna hung tung pai diingte asoi leh Felix chu lauin akithing a, “Tuin chiah kiit phot in, hun lem ka neih tahchiangin ka hung kou diing,” achi hi.
44024026	Huleh ahahkhiahna diinga Paul in sum apiaah bang akineem a, akousah mun sim a, ahoupih thimthem hi.
44024027	Huleh kum nih nungin Porkia Festa in Felix chu ahung hengta a, hizongleh Felix in Judate kipaahsah aut jiahin Paul chu suangkul a khumin anuseta hi.
44025001	Huchiin Festa chu hu gam ahung tun ni thum nungin, Kaisaria apatin Jerusalem ah achiah tou hi.
44025002	Huin siampu lalpeen leh Juda lamkaite’n a kawmah Paul tungthu ahiloulam in ahesah uhi.
44025003	Huleh Paul kalha deihsahna atan va, lampi a anaguuh taan va, anathah theihna diingun a kawmah Paul chu Jerusalem a vapui tousah diingin angeen uhi.
44025004	Hizongleh Festa in Paul chu Kaisaria ah kep ahih daan leh amah zong hu lamah chiah pah diing ahihdaan ahilh hi.
44025005	Huchiin ama’n, “Hu mipa’n giitlouhna nei ahih heetna diingin, na lahva thu neithei photmah in hung juisuh uh henla heeh uh heh,” chiin adawng hi.
44025006	Huleh a lahva ni sawm vaal ataam nung in Kaisaria ah achiahsuh a; a jiing in vaihawmna touphah ah atou a, Paul chu hung pui diingin thu apia hi.
44025007	Amah ahung tunin, Jerusalem apat hung suh Judate chu a kiim ah ading va, Paul tungah thubuai tampi soiin, setahin aheeh va, hizongleh a heehna thu dihtah asulang thei tuan sih uhi.
44025008	Paul in a dihna thu asoi a, “Judate daan thu ah hiin, Pathian biahinn thu hita henla, Kaisar tungah hitazongleh, sil mawngmawng ka hihkhial sih hi,” achi hi.
44025009	Hizongleh Festa in Judate deihjawng bawl auut a, Paul kawmah, “Jerusalem a chiahtouh a hutah a ka ma a hi thute ngaihtuah hileh na uut ei?” chiin adong hi.
44025010	Huin Paul in, “Vaihawmsah a ka umna diing mah, Kaisar vaihawmna touphah ma ah ka ding hi. Nang in zong chiantaha na heet bangin, Judate tungah bangma ka hihkhial sih hi.
44025011	Migilou ka hih a, sihna khopa sil hihkhial ka hih leh, sih zong ka nial sih; hizongleh hite’n ahung heehna teng uh adihtah aum louh leh, koima’n a kawmvah ahung pekhe thei sih diing hi. Kaisar kawmah ka tut ahi,” achi hi.
44025012	Huin Festa in vaihawmtute ahoupih kiimveel zohin, “Kaisar kawmah na tutta a, Kaisar kawmah na tung ngeei diing hi,” chiin adawng hi.
44025013	Huleh ni bangzah aha nungin, kumpipa Agrippa leh Berniki chu Kaisaria a hungin Festa chibai abuuh uhi.
44025014	Huleh amahuh hu a ni bangzah aha ataam nungun, Festa in Paul tungthu kumpipa kawmah asoi a, “Felix in mi taang khat anusia a;
44025015	Jerusalem a ka umlaiin siampu lalte leh Judate upate’n a thu ahung hesah va, siamlouhtangsah diingin ahung ngeen uhi.
44025016	“Ke’n a kawmvah, ‘A heehpa uh leh a heehte akimaaituah va, a heehna thu va ama’n adihna thu soina lemtaang aneih main, mi kuamah gawt diinga piaahkhiah Rom mite daan ahi sih hi,’ chiin ka dawng hi.
44025017	Hujiahin amahuh hitah ahung tunun, sawt hallouin ajiingni in vaihawmna touphah ah ka tou a, hi mi chu hung pui diingin thu ka pia hi.
44025018	Huleh a heehtute adin laiun, ka gintaat bangtahin a tungah giitlouhna thubuai bangmah lah asoi sih uhi.
44025019	Hizongleh amahuh biahdaante leh mi khat, Jesu asisa, Paul in ahing kiit chia asoi thu ah kinialna nei ahijaw uhi.
44025020	Huleh ke’n hutobang kinialnate khendaan ka heetlouh jiahin Jerusalem a chiah a, hutah a hu thu khen auut leh uutlouh ka dong hi.
44025021	Hizongleh Paul in Augusta thupuuhna diinga siit anget jawh jiahin Kaisar kawma ka sawl theih masiah veeng diingin thu ka pia hi,” achi hi.
44025022	Huin Agrippa in Festa kawmah, “Ke’n zong hupa thusoi ka ngaikhe uut,” achi hi. Ama’n, “Jiingchiangin a thusoi na ngaikhe diing,” achi hi.
44025023	Hujiahin ajiingni in Agrippa leh Berniki chu loupitahin ahung va, sepaih houtuliante leh khopi a miliante toh thusoina inn ah ahung luut va, Festa thupiaahna jiahin Paul chu ahung pui uhi.
44025024	Huin Festa in, “Kumpipa Agrippa leh hi mun a ka kawmva um zousiahte’n hi pa na mu uhi, amah chu Juda mipi zousiah in Jerusalem ah leh hi mun ah ka kawmah aheeh va, hing taah ahi sih chiin ngaihtahin akikou uhi.
44025025	Hizongleh sihna diing khop hial bangmah abawl sih chih ka he a, ama’n Augusta kawma thu atut jiahin sawl ka sawm ahita.
44025026	Hizongleh amah tungtaang ah bangmah ka lalpa kawma gelh diing lah ka thei sih hi. Hujiahin na ma vah ka hung puikhia ahi; ajiahchu a thu dotveel nunga gelh diing neu khat beeh ka muh theihna diingin, kumpipa Agrippa Aw, nang ma a hung pui ka hi diaahkhol hi.
44025027	Mitaang khat vaihawm diinga sawl a, a tunga a heehna thu uh heetsah louh ngolhuai hiin ka he ngaala,” achi hi.
44026001	Huin Agrippa in Paul kawmah, “Na dihna thu na soi thei hi,” achi hi. Huin Paul in a khut ajaah a, adihna thu asoi a:
44026002	“Kumpipa Agrippa, Judate’n ahung heehna zousiah ah ka dihna thu tuni a na ma a ka soi diing jiahin ka kipaah hi,
44026003	ajiahchu Judate tawndaan zousiah leh thubuaihuai thute na heet mahmah jiahin. Hujiahin thuaahtheitaha na hung ngaihkhiahsah ka hung ngeen hi.
44026004	“Ka naupan lai apat, amasapeen a ka chipihte lah leh Jerusalem a ka umdaan Judate zousiah in ahe uhi.
44026005	Achiil apat a ka sahkho daanva akhauhpeen dungjuia Pharisai anahi ka hi chih ka tanchin ahe va, auut uh leh ahung soipih thei uhi.
44026006	Huleh tuin ka pulepate uh kawma Pathian thuchiam chu kineppihna jiahin hitah ah vaihawmsahin ka ding ahi.
44026007	Hu thuchiam kinepna chu, ka nam uh sawmlenihte’n suun leh jaan a Pathian nna phatuamngaitaha tongin muh akineem uhi. Kumpipa Agrippa hu kinepna jiahin Judate’n ahung heeh uh ahi.
44026008	Pathian in misite akaithou chih bang diinga gintaat huailoua ngai na hi viai?
44026009	“Ke’n zong Nazareth Jesu min kalh jawngin sil tampi bawl leng hoih diingin ka na gingta veu hi.
44026010	Hu bang chu Jerusalem ah zong ka na bawl hi. Huleh siampu lalte kawm apat thuneihna ka laah nungin, misiangthoute laha mi tampi suangkul a ka khum chauh hilouin, amahuh athah laiun lemsa lamah ka na pang jeel hi.
44026011	Huleh sinagog chin ah amahuh ka gawt zing a, Jesu min soisiatsah ka tum hi. A tungvah ka gilou mahmah a, gam dang a khopite tanpha ah ka suduhdah hi.
44026012	“Hutobang bawl diingin, siampu lalte thupiaah mu a, a phalna lehkha uh tawia Damaska a ka chiah laiin,
44026013	Aw kumpipa, suun laitahin, vaan akipan vaah, ni saanga vaahjaw kei leh ka tonpihte kiim ah vaahin ka mu hi.
44026014	Huleh ka bawnun tual ah ka puuh va, Hebrai haam in, ‘Saul, Saul, nang bang diinga hung suduhdah na hiai? Vuaahna siihzum peeh nang diingin ahahsa hi,’ chiin aw khat ka ja hi.
44026015	V“Huleh ke’n, ‘Lalpa, kua na hiai?’ ka chi hi. Huin Ama’n, ‘Na suhduhdah Jesu ka hi.
44026016	Hizongleh thou inla ding in; ajiahchu na sil muhte leh na kawma ka hung phuandoh diingte seem diing leh heetpihtu diinga nang hung guat diingin na kawmah ka hung kilaah ahi.
44026017	Judate leh tua ka hung sawlna Jentelte khut apat ka hung hundoh diing hi,
44026018	Jentelte mit suvaah diing leh mial apat vaah lam ngatsah diingin, huleh kei ahung gintaat jiahva suhsiangte laha gou aluah theihna diingun, Setan thuneihna apat Pathian lama akihei theihna diing uh leh sual ngaihdamna amuhna diingun ka hung sawl hi,’ achi hi.
44026019	“Hujiahin, Aw kumpipa Agrippa, vaanlam kilaahna thu chu ka nial sih hi.
44026020	Huchiin amasain Damaska khua a mite kawmah, huleh Jerusalem khua a mite kawmah, huleh Judia gam zousiah a mite kawmah leh Jentelte kawmah zong, huchia akisiih va, Pathian kawm azot va, kisiihna toh kiphu nna atohna diingun ka hesahta hi.
44026021	Hite jiahin Judate’n Pathian biahinn ah ahung man va, thah ahung tum uh ahi.
44026022	Pathian akipan panpihna ka muh jiahin, tuni tanin aneu leh aliante kawmah thu hesahin ka um nalai hi. Zawlneite leh Mosi in hung tung diing achih uh thu chauh loungaal thu dang ka soi sih hi;
44026023	huchu Khrist in gim athuaah diing a, misite lah apat thoukiit masapeen ahi diing a, Judate leh Jentelte kawmah vaah chu ataangkoupih diing achih thu uh,” achi hi.
44026024	Huleh huchia adihna thu asoi laiin, Festa in aw ngaihtahin, “Paul, angol hita teh! Na lehkhasiam taahluatna in hung sungol ahi,” achi hi.
44026025	Hizongleh ama’n, “Zahumpeen Festa, angol ka hi sih hi, thu dihtah leh pilna thu ka soi ahijaw hi.
44026026	Hi thute kumpipa’n ahe hi, hujiahin a kawmah zong kimuangtahin ka soi ahi. Hi silte bangma a kawmah heet louh aum sih chih ka he hi, ajiahchu hi silte ningkawm khat a kibawl ahi sih hi.
44026027	Kumpipa Agrippa, zawlneite thu na gingta ei? Na gingta chih ka he hi,” achi hi.
44026028	Huin Agrippa in Paul kawmah, “Hun tomkhat sunga Khristian a hung thuzoh tum na hi,” achi hi.
44026029	Huleh Paul in, “Hun tomkhat hiin hun sawtpi hitaleh, nang chauh hilouin tunia ka thu ja zousiah keimah banga um diingin Pathian kawmah ka ngeen hi, hi kolte ahihleh but louin,” achi hi.
44026030	Huleh Paul in huchia asoi zohin, kumpipa leh gamoptu leh Berniki chu a kawmva toute toh ading chiat uhi.

44027001	Huleh Italy gam a kuang a ka chiah diing uh thu suhpuuh ahih phetin, Paul leh mitaang dang khenkhat chu Augusta Pawl a mi sepaih zahoutu, a min Julias kichi akeemsah uhi.
44027002	Huleh Asia gam tuipi geia khua umte tawn diing Adramittiam khopi long ah ka tuang va, ka kitawlta uhi. Makedonia gam, Thessalonika khua a um Aristarka in kou ahung tonpih hi.

44027013	Huleh sim huih awl-awla ahung nun tahin, adeihjawng uh mu kisain siihka chu akaitou va, Krit tuikulhgam ning juuljuul ah akitawl uhi.

44027017	Akaihdoh zohun apanpihna khaute zangin, long nuai lamah avial va; huin ajawhleh Sirti sehneel phu kha inteh chih lauin puanjaahna bangkim akai ngiam va, huchiin ahung mawh toh lehlehta hi.

44027019	A ni thum ni’n ka khut ngeei un kuang van ka paikhia uhi.

44027021	Hizongleh sawttah an neloua um nungin, Paul a lahvah ading a, “Pute aw, ka thusoi nana juih jawh diing va, Krit apat kitawlkhe loua um a, huleh hibang siatna leh manna tuaah louh diing hi jeen a.
44027022	Huleh tuin, lungmuangtaha um diingin ka hung hasuan ahi, ajiahchu na lahva kuamah in hinna ataan sih diing uh, long chu se diing ahi.

44027024	‘Lau sin, Paul, Kaisar ma ah na ding ngeei diing ahi; en in, long a na tuanpihte zousiah zong Pathian in ahung piaah na hita,’ ahung chi hi.

44027027	Hizongleh Adria Tuilianpi a huih in adung avaai a ahung muut leengna a jaan sawmleli jaan in, jaan kimlai diingin longpute’n gam khat tung diing bangin akiheta uhi.

44028001	Huleh bittaha asuaahtaat phetun, hu tuikulhgam chu Malta ahi chih aheta uhi.

44028018	Ahung etdih zohun, sihna khop hial ka tunga bangma aum louh jiahin hahkhiah ahung sawm uhi.

44028021	Amah un a kawmah, “Na tanchin Judia gam apatin lehkhathot in ka mu sih va, unaute koima’n zong hi a hungin na tung thubuai bangmah ahung ensah sih va, asoi zong ahung soise ngei sih uhi.
44028022	Hizongleh na ngaihdaan chu nangmah apat ka ja nuam uhi; ajiahchu hi pawl hi gam chin a soisiat a aum uh ka he uhi,” achi uhi.
44028023	Huleh ni aguat va, hu atun ni in a kawmvah mi tampi ahung va, jiingkaal apat nitaahlam dongin a kawmvah Pathian lalgam thu hilhchianin ahesah a, Mosi Daan thu leh Zawlneite Lehkhabute thu in, Jesu lamah amahuh ajawl tuuntuun hi.
44028024	Khenkhat in thu kisoi chu agingta va, khenkhat in agingta sih uhi.
44028025	Huleh amahuh akithugual theih louh phetun, Paul in thu khat asoi zohin apawtkheta uhi, a thusoi chu hih ahi: “Hagau Siangthou in zawlnei Isai kam a i pulepate uh kawma asoi chu adih ngeei mei,
44028026	‘Hi mite kawmah chiah inla vasoi in, “Ja chu na ja diing va, angaihna na he sih diing uh; mu chu na mu diing va, hizongleh heetsiamna na nei sih diing uhi;
44028027	ajiahchu hi mite lungtang ataahta a, a bil uh angongta a, a mit uh asiingta uhi; huchilou inchu a mit un amu kha diing va, a bil un aja kha diing va, a lungtang un ahesiam kha diing va, huchiin ahung kiheikiit kha diing va, ke’n ka na sudam kha diing hi,”’ achih chu.
