45001001	Paul, Jesu Khrist suaah, apostol hi diinga kouh, Pathian tanchinpha diinga sehtuam in,
45001002	hu tanchinpha Pathian in malai peha zawlneite kam a Pathian Lehkhathu Siangthou a anachiamsa,
45001003	huchu tahsa daan a David suan a piang, a Tapa Jesu Khrist i Lalpa uh tungtaang,
45001004	huleh Amah chu misi lah apat thohkiitna jaalin sianthouna Hagau dungjuiin silbawltheihna toh Pathian Tapa ahi chiin phuandohin aumta hi, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist chu.
45001005	A min jiaha nam chin laha mi ginna lama thumangsah diingin Amah vaangin hehpihna leh apostol hihna ka tangta uhi.
45001006	Hute lahah nanguh zong Jesu Khrist a kouhte na hi uhi.
45001007	Pathian deihtahte, misiangthou hi diinga kouhte, Rom khua a um zousiah kawmah, i Pa uh Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist kawm apat hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
45001008	Khovel pumpi a na ginna uh athansuaah jiahin na bawnva tunga ka kipaahna thu, amasapeenin Jesu Khrist tungtawnin ka Pathian kawmah ka soi hi.
45001009	Huchi ahih jiahin ka haamteina ah na min uh ka lou ngiitngeet chih a Tapa tanchinpha a ka hagau a a nna ka tohsah zing Pathian chu ahung heetpihtu ahi.
45001010	Bangchidaan aha khat a tu beeha na kawmva ka hungna diing Pathian deihdaan a lampi ka muhtheiha ahihleh chiin ka ngeen hi.
45001011	Ajiahchu na detna diingva hagaulam silpiaah bang aha ka hung piaah theihna diingin nanguh hung muh ka uut hi;
45001012	huchu na ginna uh leh ka ginna a nanguh leh kei i kisuhhaattuah theihna diingin ka chihna ahi.
45001013	Huleh unaute, Jentel dangte kawma ka tohgimna gah ka muhtaah bangmaha nanguh laha zong ka muh theihna diingin na kawmvah tampivei hung ka tumta a, hizongleh tu dongin daalin ka um zing chih na heetlouh uh ka deih sih hi.
45001014	Grikte leh Grik hiloute kawmah bat ka nei hi, mipil leh mipilloute kawmah zong.
45001015	Huchiin nanguh Rom khua a umte kawmah zong tanchinpha soi diingin ka kithalawp zing hi.
45001016	Bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh Khrist tanchinpha chu ka zumpih sih hi, ajiahchu agingta photmah diingin hichu hutdamna diinga Pathian silbawltheihna ahi: Judate diingin ahi masa a, huleh Grikte diingin zong ahi.
45001017	Ajiahchu hikhu ah Pathian dihtatna chu ginna apat ginna ah suhlatin aumta hi; “Midihtat chu ginna in ahing diing,” chih gelh bangin.
45001018	Ajiahchu thutah dihtatlouhna a daaltu, mihingte Pathian ngaihsahlouhna leh dihtatlouhna zousiah tungah Pathian lungthahna chu vaan apatin suhlatin aumta hi.
45001019	Pathian in aheetsahtaah jiahin Pathian tanchin heet diing chu amahuh ah suhlatin aumta hi.
45001020	Ajiahchu khovel siam chiil apat a sil muhtheihlouhte, a kumtuang silbawltheihna leh a Pathian jia natan chiang silsiam ah akilang a, chiantaha muhin aum a, hujiahin suanlam diing anei sih uhi.
45001021	Ajiahchu Pathian he ngaalin Pathian bangin apaahtawi sih va, kipaahthu zong asoi sih va, himahleh a ngaihtuahna uh chu thulimlou ahung suaahta a, huleh a lungtang ngol uh chu ahung mialta hi.
45001022	Pil kisain mingol ahung suaahta va,
45001023	sitheilou Pathian loupina chu sithei mihingte, vate, keenglinei sate leh aboh a vaah ganhingte lim ah atangsahta uhi.
45001024	Hujiahin Pathian in amahuh chu a sapum uh zumhuaitaha kibawltuah diing leh a lungtang uh uutjawng banga sil niin abawl uh phalin apedohta hi.
45001025	Hute’n chu Pathian thutah juau a tangsahin, kumtuanga phattaah a Siamtu saangin a silsiam biain a nna atohsah jawta uhi. Amen.
45001026	Hujiahin Pathian in zumhuaitaha ahuuh uh phalin apedohta hi. Ajiahchu a numeite uh nasan in zong a pianken umdaan ngeina uh daanlou banga um diingin akibawl limdang uhi.
45001027	Hutobangmahin pasalte’n zong numei zatdaan ngeina tawpsanin huuhin khat leh khat akienlah va, pasal leh pasal kilawmloutahin akibawl va, apaikhial man muh diing uh chu amahuh ah akimuh uhi.
45001028	Huleh a lungsim va Pathian aheet uutlouh jiahun, Pathian in sil kilawmloute bawl diinga lungsim manlouh aneih uh phalin apedohta hi;
45001029	dihtatlouhna, numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaina, giitlouhna, duhaamna, kimuhdahna zousiah a dimin; thangsiatnate, tualthahnate, kinialnate, kiheemnate, mi siatna diing ngaihtuahnate in adim va; amahuh chu misoisiathaatte,
45001030	miheehsete, Pathian mudahte, kihau haatte, kiliansahte, kichapousahte, silgilou pandohtute, nulepa thumangloute,
45001031	heetsiamna neiloute, ginumloute, pianpih lungsiatna neiloute, kilem uutloute, zahngaihna neiloute ahi uhi;
45001032	amah un hutobang sil bawlte chu sitaah ahi chih Pathian vaihawmna he ngaalun, amahuh chauh bawl zong hilouin hizongleh midang hutobang bawlte zong akipaahpih uhi.
45002001	Hujiahin, aw mihing, mi soiseel haat koi hitazongleh chin, suanlam diing himhim neilou na hi, ajiahchu midang na soiseelna tah ah nangmah siamlouh na kitangsah ahi; nang asoiseeltu in zong hutobang silte na bawl thou jiahin.
45002002	Hizongleh Pathian vaihawmna chu hutobang sil bawlte tungah thutah dungjuiin atu ahi chih i he hi.
45002003	Aw mihing, hutobang sil bawlte soiseel a, nang lah hute mah bawl thou ngaal, Pathian vaihawmna peel diinga kigingta na hiaimah?
45002004	Ahihlouhleh Pathian hoihna in kisiih diingin nang ahung pui chih helouin, a hoihna leh a jaidoh daan leh a thuaahtheihna hauhdaante simmoh na hiaimah?
45002005	Hizongleh na lungtang khauh jiah leh na kisiih nuamlouh jiahin, Pathian lungthahna ni leh vaihawmna dihtat hung kilat ni chianga diingin na tungah lungthahna na kikholkhawm ahi.
45002006	Ama’n chu “mi chin a silbawl bang jeelun athuhkiit diing”:
45002007	sil hoih bawla kuhkaltaha pang a, loupina leh paahtawina leh manthaai theihlouhna hawl mite kawmah kumtuang hinna ape diing hi.
45002008	Hizongleh soihah a thutah juilou a, dihtatlouhna juite tungah chu lungthahna leh thangtawmnate aum diing a,
45002009	thuaahgimna leh lungngaihna nasatah chu silgilou bawl zousiah tungah aum diing hi, Judate tungah aum masa diing a huleh Grikte tungah zong aum diing hi;
45002010	hizongleh sil hoih bawl photmahte kawmah chu loupinate, paahtawinate leh hamuannate piaah ahi diing hi: Judate kawmah piaah masat ahi diing a, huleh Grikte kawmah zong piaah ahi diing hi.
45002011	Ajiahchu Pathian ah deihsahtuamna aum sih hi.

45002027	Huleh piandaana zehtanlou mi’n daan ajuih leh, nang, lehkhathu leh zehtan daan nei ngaala daan bohsetu chu ahung soiseel sih diaimah?

45003004	Suaahsah lou hial! Pathian chu adih a, hizongleh mi chin ajuau uhi: “Na thusoi a siamtanga na um a, vaihawmsaha na um chianga zong na zoh theihna diingin,” chia gelh bangin.

45003010	Hichia gelh bangin, “Koimah midihtat mawngmawng aum sih, khatmah zong aum sih.

45003026	tulai hun a a dihtatna sulang diingin, huchia Amah chu midihtat ahihtheihna diing leh Jesu gingta photmahte siamtangsahpa ahihtheihna diingin.
45003027	Ahihleh kisahtheihna diing khoiah aum ei? Aum thei mawngmawng sih hi. Bang daan in ahiai siam i tan uh? Silbawl daan in ahiai? Hilou, ginna daan in ahijaw hi.

45004001	Ahihleh tahsa daan a i pu uh Abraham in amuh bang ahiai i soi diing uh?

45004010	Ahihleh huchu bangchi kingaih ahiai? Azehtan nungin ahiai, ahihlouhleh azehtan main? Azehtan nungin ahi sih a, azehtan main ahijaw hi.
45004011	Huleh zehtanlouha aum laia ginna a amuh dihtatna heetna zehtan chiamchihna chu amu a; zehtanlouh hizongleh uh agingta zousiah pa ahih theihna diingin, dihtatna chu amahuh diinga zong seha aum theihna diingin,

45006016	Mi khat kawma suaah banga thumang diinga na kipiaah chiangun, na thuman pa uh suaahte na hi va, nanguh chu sihna tuntu sual suaahte aha, ahihlouhleh dihtatna tuntu thumanna suaahte hijaw aha, na hi uh chih helou na hi viaimah?

45006020	Ajiahchu sual suaahte na hih laiun dihtatna lam ah nana jaleenta uhi.

45006023	Ajiahchu sual man sihna ahi a, hizongleh Pathian silthawnpiaah chu i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist jaalin kumtuang hinna ahi.
45007001	Unaute, daan in mi a damsung teng a tungah thu aneihkhum ahi chih na he sih viai mah (daan he mite kawmah ka soi ahi)?
45007002	Ajiahchu numei pasal nei chu a pasal damsung siah daan a a pasal a kaanin aum ahi. Hujiahin a pasal asih inchu, pasal lam thu ah daan apat hahkhiahin aum hi.
45007003	Huchiin a pasal dam zinga midang akiteenpih inchu, aangkawmnu akichi diing hi. Hizongleh a pasal asih inchu, hu daan thu apatin ajaleenta a, midang toh kiteeng zongleh aangkawmnu ahi sih diing hi.
45007004	Hujiahin, ka unaute, midang khat, sihna apat kaihthoha umpa na kiteenpih theihna diingun, daan thu lamah Khrist sapum tungtawnin asi na hung hita uhi, huchia Pathian lama gah i suah theihna diingun.
45007005	Ajiahchu tahsa a i um laiin, daan in atohthou i sual uutnate’n sihna tun diinga gah suang diingin i sapum hiangte ah nna atong uhi.
45007006	Hizongleh tuin eiuh hung kaantu chu sihsan zouin, daan apat hahkhiahin i umta uhi, huchia lehkhagelh lui bangphet hilou a Hagau hinna thah a nna i toh theihna diingin.
45007007	Ahihleh bang i soita diai? Daan chu sualna hi adiai? Hilou hial! Aleh lamah, daan jiahin hilou leh chu, sual kichi helou diing hi ing a. Ajiahchu daan in, “Na een louh diing ahi,” na chi sih leh, een kichi helou diing ka hi.
45007008	Hizongleh sual in thupiaah tungtawnin hun lemtaang muin ka sungah eenna chinteng aumsah hi. Ajiahchu daan umlouin sual chu asi ahi.
45007009	Huleh tumalamin kei chu daan louin ka na hing a, hizongleh thupiaah ahung um tahin sual ahung hingdoh a huleh kei ka sita hi.
45007010	Huleh hinna hung po diing thupiaah chu sihna diing ahung hita chih ka hung hedohta hi.
45007011	Ajiahchu sual in thupiaah jiaha hun lemtaang muin ahung heem a, hukhu zangin ahung sulumta hi.
45007012	Hujiahin daan chu asiangthou a, huleh thupiaah zong asiangthou a huleh adihtat a huleh ahoih hi.
45007013	Ahihleh sil hoih khu kei diinga sihna hung hita adiai? Hilou hial! Hizongleh sual chu sual a akilat theihna diingin sual in sil hoih tungtawnin keimah ah sihna ahung tongdoh hi. Hujiahin sual chu thupiaah tungtawna sual nasatah ahung hihtheihna diingin.
45007014	Ajiahchu daan chu hagaulam sil ahi chih i he hi, hizongleh kei chu sami, sual suaaha khotsa ka hi.
45007015	Ajiahchu sil ka bawl peen ka hesiam sih hi. Ajiahchu sil ka bawl uutpeen chu ka bawl sih a; hizongleh ka uutlouh peen ka bawl hi.
45007016	Ka bawl uutlouh peen ka bawl inchu, daan ahoih hi chia pom ka hita diing hi.
45007017	Huchiin tuin a bawltu chu kei ka hita sih a, hizongleh sual keimah a um bawl ahijaw hi.
45007018	Ajiahchu keimah ah (chih chu ka tahsa ah) sil hoih mawngmawng ateeng sih chih ka he hi; abawl uutna peen chu keimah ah aum a, hizongleh hu a hoih bawl theihna keimah ah ka mu sih hi.
45007019	Ajiahchu sil hoih ka bawl uut peen ka bawl sih a; hizongleh sil hoihlou ka bawl uutlouh peen ka bawljaw hi.
45007020	Ka uutlouh peen ka bawl inchu, a bawltu keimah ka hita sih a, sual keimah a um bawl ahijaw hi.
45007021	Huchiin hi daan ka hung hedohta, sil hoih ka bawl uut laiin giitlouhna ka kawmah aum hi.
45007022	Ajiahchu ka mihing lungsim sunglam ah Pathian daan tungah ka kipaah hi.
45007023	Hizongleh ka tahsa hiangte ah daan tuam khat aum chih ka he hi. Hukhu in ka lungsim daan adou a, huleh ka tahsa hiangte a um sualna daan kawmah suaahin ahung pui veu hi.
45007024	Migenthei hina meijeen ing e! Hi sihna sapum lah apat koi in ahiai hung suaahtasah diing?
45007025	I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist jaalin Pathian kawmah kipaahthu ka soi hi. Huchiin keimah tah in chu ka lungsim in Pathian daan ka tong a, hizongleh tahsa in chu sualna daan ka tong hi.
45008001	Hujiahin tuin chu Khrist Jesu a umte, tahsa daan a hing lou a, hizongleh Hagau daan a hingte diingin siamlouhtansahna mawngmawng aumta sih hi.
45008002	Ajiahchu Khrist Jesu a um hinna Hagau daan in sual leh sihna daan apat ahung jaleensahta hi.
45008003	Daan in tahsa tungtawna a haatlouh jiaha abawl guallouh chu, Pathian in a Tapa ngeei chu sual tahsa tobang pua a sual jiaha ahung sawlna ah, tahsa sual chu siamlouh atangsahta hi,
45008004	huchia tahsa daan a hing lou a, himahleh Hagau daan a hingjaw eihaw tunga dihtatna daan poimohte suhtaangtunga aum theihna diingin.
45008005	Ajiahchu tahsa daan a umte’n tahsa lam silte alunggulh va, hizongleh Hagau daan a umte’n chu Hagau silte alunggulh uhi.
45008006	Ajiahchu tahsa lam silte ngaihtuah chu sihna ahi a, hizongleh Hagau silte ngaihtuah chu hinna leh hamuanna ahi.
45008007	Ajiahchu tahsalam lungsim chu Pathian toh kimeelmaatna ahi; bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh huchu Pathian daan nuaiah aum sih a, um zong aum theilou him ahi.
45008008	Huchiin tahsa a umte’n Pathian akipaahsah thei sih uhi.
45008009	Hizongleh Pathian Hagau nanguh a aum tahzet inchu, tahsa a um na hi sih va hizongleh Hagau a um na hijaw uhi. Hizongleh mi koipouh in Khrist Hagau aneih louh inchu, Amah a ahi sih hi.
45008010	Huleh Khrist nanguh a aum leh, sapum chu sual jiahin asi ahi; hizongleh Hagau chu dihtatna jiahin ahing ahi.
45008011	Hizongleh misi lah akipat Jesu kaithoupa Hagau nanguh a aum inchu, misi lah akipat Khrist kaithoupa’n nanguh a um Hagau tungtawnin na sapum uh sitheite zong asuhing diing hi.
45008012	Hujiahin unaute, bat nei i hi uhi, tahsa a hilouin, tahsa daan a hing diing hi louin.
45008013	Ajiahchu tahsa daan a na um un chu, na si diing va; hizongleh sapum silbawlte Hagau a na suhlup jeel un chu, na hing diing uhi.
45008014	Ajiahchu Pathian Hagau puia um photmahte chu Pathian tate ahi uhi.
45008015	Lau a um kiit diingin suaah hihna hagau na mu uh ahi sih a, hizongleh ta hihna Hagau na mu uh ahijaw a, hu Hagau jiahin “Abba, Pa,” chiin i kikou uhi.
45008016	Hagau ngeei in eimah hagau toh Pathian tate i hi chih ahung heetpih hi.
45008017	Huleh tate i hih-un chu, gouluahtute i hi; Amah toh i thuaahgim tahzet un chu Pathian gouluahtute leh Khrist gouluahpihtute i hi uhi; huchia eite zong Amah kawma paahtawia i um theihna diingun.
45008018	Ajiahchu tulaia thuaahgimnate chu ijawchianga eiuh a loupina suhlat-a um diing toh tehkaahthamin ka ngai sih hi.
45008019	Ajiahchu silsiam zousiah in kineem mahmahin Pathian tate kilatna diing angaahlah mahmah uhi.
45008020	Ajiahchu silsiam zousiah chu umjebei a umsahin aumta uh, amahuh uutthu hilouin, kinepna neia amahuh a thu nuaia umsahpa jiahin ahijaw hi.
45008021	Ajiahchu silsiam zousiah zong siatna suaah apat suahtaatsaha umin Pathian tate jaleenna loupi ah aluut diing uhi.
45008022	Ajiahchu silsiam zousiah tutan dongin thuum leh nauvei na thuaahin aum uh chih i he uhi.
45008023	Huleh amahuh chauh hilouin, Hagau gah masa nei eihaw ngeei zong ta hihna, i sapum uh tatna muhna diing, ngaahlah mahmahin lungsim in i maau uhi.
45008024	Ajiahchu kinepna a hutdamin i um uhi; hizongleh muhsa zinga kinep chu kinepna ahi sih hi, mi’n amuhsa zing ah bang diingin akineem nalailai diviai?
45008025	Hizongleh i muhlouh i kineppih inchu, kuhkaltahin i ngaah hi.
45008026	Hutobangmahin, Hagau in zong i haatlouhnate ah ahung panpih hi. Ajiahchu bangchi banga haamtei diing i hiai chih i he sih a; hizongleh Hagau in thuumna soi guallouhin ahung ngetsah zing hi.
45008027	Huleh Pathian deihjawng banga misiangthoute diinga angetsah jiahin, Amah lungtang entu in Hagau lungsim bang ahiai chih ahe hi.
45008028	Huleh Pathian lungsiatte, Ama’n aguat banga akouhte diingin sil zousiah chu a hoihna diingun atongkhawm chiat hi chih i he uhi.
45008029	Ajiahchu aheetlawhte chu Amah Tapa banga um diingin aguatlawh hi, a Tapa chu unau tampite laha tachiil ahung hihtheihna diingin.
45008030	Huleh Ama’n aguatlawhte chu kouh zong akou a; akouhte chu siam atangsah a; siam atansahte chu apaahtawi hi.
45008031	Ahihleh hi thute ah bang i soita diai? Pathian i lama apan leh, koi in ahiai hung dou thei diing?
45008032	Amah Tapa ngeei zong hawilou a, hizongleh i bawnva diinga hung pedohpa in bang diingin sil zousiah athawnin Amah toh ahung pekhawm lou diai?
45008033	Pathian miteelte koi in ahiai heeh diing? Siamtangsahtu Pathian ahi ngaala.
45008034	Koi in ahiai siamlouhtangsah diing? Asi chu Khrist ahi ngaala; ahi, athoukiit jawta a, Pathian jiatlam ah aum a, eiuh diinga hung ngetsahtu zong ahi.
45008035	Khrist lungsiatna akipan koi in ahiai hung khen diing? Gimthuaahna in ahiai, lungngaihna in ahiai, suhduhdahna in ahiai, kial in ahiai, saguaahna in ahiai, lauhuaina in ahiai, naamsau in ahiai hung khen diing?
45008036	“Nangmah jiahin nitumin thahin ka um va, goh diing belaam banga ngaih ka hi uhi,” chia gelh bangin.
45008037	Khenlou hial diing, hite zousiah ah ahung lungsiattu jaalin gualzoute saanga tungtuang jaw i hi uhi.
45008038	Ajiahchu sihna aha, hinna aha, angelte aha, lalnate aha, silbawltheihnate aha, sil umzingte aha, sil hung um diingte aha,
45008039	saanna aha, thuuhna aha, ahihlouhleh silsiam dang mawngmawng in zong i Lalpa uh Khrist Jesu a um Pathian lungsiatna akipan eite ahung khen thei sih diing chih chiantahin ka he hi.
45009001	Khrist ah thutah ka soi ahi, ka juau sih, Hagau Siangthou ah ka sialepha heetna in zong ahung heetpih hi,
45009002	ka lungtang ah hahsatna daaitheilou leh lungngaihna nasatah ka nei hi.
45009003	Bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh ka unaute, tahsa lama ka chipihte luangin keimah Khrist kawm apat koihtuam khopa haamse thuaahin um leng chiin ka haamtei hi.
45009004	Israelmi ahi ngaalva; ta hihnate, loupinate, thuhunte, daan thu piaahnate, Pathian biahinn a natohnate leh thuchiamte bang amahuh neih ahi.
45009005	Pulepate amahuh a ahi a, tahsa lam thu ah Khrist zong amahuh lah apat a hung pawt ahi a, Amah chu sil zousiah tunga um kumtuanga paahtawi taah Pathian ahi. Amen.
45009006	Hizongleh Pathian thu bangmalou banga umta ahi sih hi. Ajiahchu Israel haahte a bawnun Israel mi ahi veh sih uhi.
45009007	Abraham chihaahte ahih jiahun zong a bawnun tate ahi veh tuan sih uh; hizongleh, “Isak ah na haahte akichi diing,” chih ahijaw hi.
45009008	Hu tahsa tate chu Pathian tate ahi sih va; hizongleh thuchiam tate chu chihaah a ngaih ahijaw uh chihna ahi.
45009009	Ajiahchu hikhu thuchiam ahi: “Tu bang hun in ka hung diing a, Sarah in tapa anei diing,” chih chu.
45009010	Huleh hi chauh hilouin, Rebekah in, mi khat, i pu uh Isak tungtawna nau apaai laiin,
45009011	(naupangte chu piang nailouin, sil hoih leh silsia zong bawl nailouin, teel lam thu a Pathian siltupnajiah adet theihna diingin, silbawl jiah hilou a hizongleh a koutu deih jiah hijawin),
45009012	a kawmah, “A upajaw in a naupangjaw nna atohsah diing,” Pathian in achi hi.
45009013	“Jakob ka lungsiat a, hizongleh Esau chu ka mudah hi,” chih gelh bangin.
45009014	Ahihleh bang i soita diai? Pathian ah dihtatlouhna aum a adiai? Hilou hial!
45009015	Ajiahchu Ama’n Mosi kawmah, “Ka khotuah uut photmah ka khotuah diing a, ka lainat uut photmah ka lainat diing,” chiin anasoita hi.
45009016	Huchiin adeihpa jiahin ahi sih a, muhsawma taaipa jiahin zong ahi diaah sih, hizongleh akhotuahtu Pathian jiahin ahijaw hi.
45009017	Ajiahchu Pathian Lehkhathu in Pharaoh kawmah hichiin achi, “Hi jiah tahin ka hung tungding a, nangmah a ka silbawltheihna ka etsah theihna diing leh leitung pumpi a ka min phuana aum theihna diingin,” achi hi.
45009018	Hujiahin Pathian in auut photmah akhotuah a, auut photmah zong asoihahsah veu hi.
45009019	Nang in ka kawmah, “Bang diinga Ama’n i dihlouhna hung kawh ahiai? A deihjawng koi in akalh ei?” na chi ahi meithei.
45009020	Hizongleh tahzetin, Aw mihing, nang Pathian dawng vialtu koi na hiai? Silsiam in a siamtu kawmah, “Bang diinga hitobanga hung siam na hiai?” achi diaimah?
45009021	Beelkhengtu in beel leitang khat apat beel khat phatuam a zattaaha kheeng diing leh beel khat zattaahloua kheeng diingin, beel leitang tungah thu anei sih eimah?
45009022	Pathian in a lungthahna leh silbawltheihna suhlat auut a, manthaaina tuaah diinga kiguatsa lungthahna beelte tunga athuaahzoh haamhaam leh, bang akhawh diai?
45009023	Huleh Ama’n malai apat loupina tang diinga aguatlawhsa hi khotuahna beelte tunga a loupina hauhsatna asuhlat theihna diinga,
45009024	Judate lah apat chauh hilou a, hizongleh Jentelte lah apat akouhdoh eite tunga zong athuaahzoh haamhaam leh, bang akhawh diai?
45009025	Hosea Lehkhabu a, “Ka mi hi ngeiloute chu ka mite ka chi diing a, lungsiat ngeilouh mite zong ka lungsiatte ka chi diing hi.
45009026	Huleh hichi ahung hi diing a, a kawmvah, ‘Ka mite na hi sih uh,’ chiha umna ngeei ah, Pathian hing tate chihin aum diing uh,” anachih bangmahin.
45009027	Huleh Isai in zong Israelte tungtaang thu anataangkoupih a: “Israel tate jaw tuikhanglian sehneel bangin tam zongleh uh, agawtmawh chauh hutdamin aum diing uh.
45009028	Ajiahchu LALPA’N leitung a nna tomkhat abawl diing jiahin, Ama’n hu nna chu azou diing a, dihtatna in asutom diing hi” chiin.
45009029	Huleh Isai mah in, “Sepaihte LALPA’N chihatu diing hung na hawisahlou hileh, Sodom bangin i umta diing va, Gomorrah banga bawlin i umta diing uhi,” chia anasoilawh bangin.
45009030	Ahihleh bang i soita diai? Dihtatna delhlou Jentelte’n dihtatna aphata uh ahi, ginna jiaha dihtatna chu.
45009031	Hizongleh daan a dihtatna delh Israelte’n hu dihtatna daan chu aphazouta sih uhi.
45009032	Bang jiahin? Ginna in adelh sih va, daan silbawlte a muhtheih banga adelh jiahun ahi. Ajiahchu puuhna suang ah apuuhta uhi.
45009033	“Ngai in, Zion ah puuhna suang leh daalna suangpi ka koih hi, koipouh Amah gingta chu azahtasah sih diing hi,” chia gelh bangin.
45010001	Unaute, Israelte diinga ka lungtang deihpeen leh Pathian kawma ka haamteina peen chu hutdama ahung um theihna diing uh ahi.
45010002	Ajiahchu Pathian lamah phattuam ngaihna anei uh chih ka heetpih hi, ahihvaangin heetna dungjuiin chu ahi sih hi.
45010003	Ajiahchu Pathian dihtatna helouin, amahuh dihtatna tundoh tumin, Pathian dihtatna ah akituluut nuam sih uhi.
45010004	Ajiahchu agingta photmahte diingin Khrist chu dihtatna muhna diingin daan suhtawpna ahi.
45010005	Ajiahchu daan a kuan dihtatna tungtaang Mosi in agial hi, “Hu silte juitu chu hute in ahing diing,” chiin.
45010006	Hizongleh ginna a dihtatna in chu hichiin achi hi, “Na lungsim in, ‘Vaan ah koi akaltou diai?’ chi sin” (huchu, tunglam apat Khrist puikhiah diing chihna ahi),
45010007	“ahihlouhleh, ‘Lei nuaiah koi akumsuh diai?’” chi sin (huchu, misi lah apat Khrist puitouh diing, chihna ahi).
45010008	Hizongleh bang ahiai asoi? “Thu in ahung naih hi, na kam leh na lungtang ah aum hi” (huchu ginna thu ka soi uh chu ahi):
45010009	huchu na kam a Jesu chu Lalpa ahi chia na phuan a, misi lah apat Pathian in Amah akaithou chih na lungtang a na gintaat leh, hutdamin na um diing hi.
45010010	Ajiahchu mi’n lungtang in agingta a dihtatna amu hi, huleh kam in aphuang a hutdamna amu hi.
45010011	Ajiahchu Pathian Lehkhathu in, “Koipouh Amah gingta chu azahtasah sih diing,” achi hi.
45010012	Ajiahchu Judate leh Grikte kilimdanna bangma aum sih hi, ajiahchu a bawnva tunga Lalpa chu khat ahi a, Amah kou zousiah tungah ahausa hi.
45010013	Ajiahchu “LALPA min kou photmah chu hutdamin aum diing hi.”
45010014	Ahihleh Amah agintaat louhpi uh bangchiin akou diviai? Huleh a thu ajaah louhpi uh bangchiin agingta diviai? Huleh a soitu umlouin bangchiin aja diviai?
45010015	Huleh sawl ahihlouh uh leh bangchiin thu asoi diviai? “Hamuanna tanchinpha leh sil hoih kipaah huai hung tutte keeng kilawm hina mei e!” chia gelh bangin.
45010016	Hizongleh tanchinpha a bawnun ajom veh sih uhi. Ajiahchu Isai in, “Lalpa, ka thusoi uh kua in ahiai gingta?” anachi hi.
45010017	Huchiin ginna chu jaahna jiahin ahung um a, huleh jaahna chu Pathian thu tungtawnin ahung um hi.
45010018	Hizongleh ka chi ahi, amah un aja sih va ahiaimah? Ja tham e: “A aw uh leitung pumpi ah athangsuaah a, a thu uh kawlmong tanphain athangta hi.”
45010019	Hizongleh ka chi ahi, Israelte’n ahe sih va ahiaimah? Amasapeenin Mosi’n, “Nam zong hiloute zangin ka hung thangsesah diing a, heetsiamna neilou namte zangin ka hung sulungthah diing hi,” anachi hi.
45010020	Huleh Isai in hangsantahin, “Ahung hawl loute in ahung mu va; ahung kou loute kawmah suhlatin ka umta hi,” achi hi.
45010021	Hizongleh Israelte kawmah chu, “Mithumangloute leh soihahte diingin suun nitum in ka baan ka jaah hi,” chiin asoi hi.
45011001	Ahihleh Pathian in a mite paaikheta ahiaimah? Paaikhe lou hial! Ajiahchu kei zong Israelmi, Abraham chihaah, Benjamin phung a mi ka hi.
45011002	Pathian in a mi aheetlawhte apaaikhe sih hi. Pathian Lehkhathu in Elijah thu asoi na he sih viaimah? Ama’n Israelte tungthu Pathian kawmah atut a,
45011003	“LALPA, na zawlneite athat va, na maitaamte asuchim va, keimah tangin ka um a, kei zong thah ahung tum uhi,” chiin.
45011004	Hizongleh Pathian in a dawnna in bangchiin asoi ei? “Baal lim ma a khuupdin ngeilou mi saang sagih keimah diingin ka koih hi,” chiin adawng hi.
45011005	Hutobangin tulaiin zong Pathian hehpihna a teel ahih dungjuiin gawtmawh hon khat aum nalai hi.
45011006	Huleh hehpihna jiah ahih inchu, natoh jiah ahita sih hi; huchilou inchu hehpihna chu hehpihna ahita sih diing hi. Hizongleh natoh jiah ahih inchu, hehpihna ahita sih diing; huchilou inchu natoh zong natoh ahita sih diing hi.
45011007	Ahihleh bang ahita diai? Israelte’n ahawl uh amu sih va; hizongleh teelte’n chu amu uh, adang zousiah chu suhtawtin aumta uhi.
45011008	“Pathian in tuni dongin a kawmvah motna hagau apia hi, amuh theihlouhna diing uh mitte leh ajaah theihlouhna diing uh bilte toh,” chih gelh bangin.
45011009	Huleh David in, “A dohkaan uh chu amahuh diingin thaang leh pial hung suaah henla, puuhna leh phubalaahna hung suaah heh.
45011010	Khua amuh louhna diingun a mitte uh hung mial henla, huleh a kawng uh kuunsah zing in,” achi hi.
45011011	Ahihleh ka chi ahi, a puuhna diingun akisui viai? Kisui lou hial! Hizongleh a giitlouhna jiahva Jentelte athangsiat theihna diingun Jentelte kawmah hutdamna ahung tung jawta hi.
45011012	Huleh a giitlouhna uh bawn khovel suhhauhsatna ahih a, huleh a lohsapna uh zong Jentelte hauhsatna ahih inchu, a buchinna uh bangchipheta hauhsatna ahita diai mah!
45011013	Ajiahchu nanguh Jentelte kawmah ka soi ahi, kei Jentelte apostol ka hih jiahin ka natohna ka paahtawi hi,
45011014	bangchijawng ahakhat-a ka chipihte ka thangsiatsah a, a lahva khenkhatte beeh ka hutdam theih khaah leh chiin.
45011015	Ajiahchu amahuh paihkhiahna bawn khovel toh Pathian kilepna ahihleh, amahuh pomkiitna chu sihna apat hinna loungaal bang ahi diai?
45011016	Ajiahchu a gahmasa asianthouin chu, a lom pumpi zong huchibangmahin asiangthou hi; huleh a zung asianthouin chu, a baate zong huchibangmahin asiangthou hi.
45011017	Olive sing tah baa khenkhatte saattanin um henla, huleh nang olive tahlou a lahvah phuhluutin um lehchin, olive zung hauhsatna kikoppihtu na hung hita diing a,
45011018	baate tungah kiuangsah sin. Hizongleh kiuangsah zongleh chin a zung chawmtu nangmah na hi sih a, a zung chu nang hung chawmtu ahijaw hi, chih he in.
45011019	Ahihleh nang in, “Phuhluut-a ka um theihna diingin baate suhtana um ahi,” na chi ahi diing.
45011020	Ahi, agintaatlouh jiahun ahi suhtana aum uh, huleh nang na ginna jiahin na ding ahi. Kiuangsah sinla, hizongleh lau jaw in.
45011021	Ajiahchu Pathian in pianpih baa tahte bawn ahawi louh inchu, nang zong ahung hawi tuam sih diing hi.
45011022	Hujiahin Pathian hoihdaan leh thukhauhdaan en in: apuuhte tungah chu akhauh a; hizongleh a hoihna a na umzing leh, nang tungah chu ahoih diing hi. Huchi ahihlouh inchu, nang zong saatkhiahin na um ve diing hi.
45011023	Huleh amahuh zong gingtaloua aum zing louh un chu, phuhluutin aum diing uhi, ajiahchu Pathian in amahuh aphutluut thei hi.
45011024	Ajiahchu nang, pianken a olive tahlou apat saatkhiah bawn pianken loutaha olive sing hoih a phuhluut-a na um leh, hi pianken mawnga baa tahte chu amahuh olive sing ngeei ah bangchituha phuhluut seemin aumta diviai?
45011025	Ajiahchu unaute, na kipilsah louhna diingun hi thukiphual, Jentelte bukimna ahung tun tokaalin Israelte tungah lungngonna hunkhop chiang ahung tung tadih ahi, chih na heetlouh uh ka deih sih hi.
45011026	Huchiin Israel zousiah hutdamin aum diing uhi, “Zion apatin Hundampa ahung diing a, Jakob apatin Pathian ngaihsahlouhna asumang diing hi.
45011027	Ajiahchu a sualnate uh ka laahmang tahchianga a kawmva ka thuhun diing chu hikhu ahi,” chih gelh bangin.
45011028	Tanchinpha lam ngaihtuahin chu nanguh jiahin meelma ahi uhi, hizongleh teel thu lam ngaihtuahin chu pulepate jiahin deihtahte ahi uhi.
45011029	Ajiahchu Pathian silthawnpiaahte leh a kouhna chu henlamdang theihlouh ahi.
45011030	Ajiahchu nang un nidanglaia Pathian thu na manlouh bang va, hizongleh tua amahuh thumanlouhna jiaha khotuahna na muh bangun,
45011031	hutobangmahin tuin amah un agingta sih uh, huchia nang un khotuahna na muhta jiahva amah un zong khotuahna amuh theihna diingun.
45011032	Ajiahchu Pathian in akhotuah veh theihna diingin, amahuh zousiah chu thumanlouhna nuaiah akhum vehta hi.
45011033	Aw, Pathian pilna leh heetna thuuh hina lawmlawm e! A lemguatnate hawl guallouh leh a lampite muh guallouh hina meijeen e!
45011034	“Ajiahchu LALPA lungsim koi in ahiai he? Ahihlouhleh kua ahiai Amah lemguatpihtu a pang ngei?”
45011035	“Ahihlouhleh aditkiit diinga zong koi in ahiai Amah kawma sil pe masa phot?”

45013001	Mi chin a tunga vaihawmtute nuaiah kituluut heh. Ajiahchu Pathian thu louin koimah vaihawm aum sih hi. Vaihawmtu a umte chu Pathian guat ahi uhi.
