46001018	Ajiahchu kros thu chu mangthaaite diingin ngolhuai ahi a, hizongleh eiuh hutdama umte diingin chu Pathian silbawltheihna ahi.
46001019	Ajiahchu, “Mipil pilna ka suse diing a, huleh lemhetu lemheetna ka koihmang diing hi,” chih gelh ahi.
46001020	Mipil khoiah aum ei? Daanjilsahtu khoiah aum ei? Hi khang a nialhaatmi khoiah aum ei? Pathian in hi khovel pilna ngolhuai asuaahsah sih eimah?
46001021	Ajiahchu Pathian pilna ah, khovel in pilna tungtawna Pathian aheet louh nungun, thu kisoi ngolhuai tungtawna agingtate hutdam diing chu Pathian kipaahpih ahita hi.
46001022	Ajiahchu Judate’n chiamchihna angeen va, Grikte’n pilna ahawl uh;
46001023	hizongleh kei un chu Khrist kilhbeha um thu ka soi uhi, huchu Judate diingin puuhna, huleh Grikte diingin ngolna ahi;
46001024	hizongleh Judate hiin Grikte hitazongleh, kouhte diingin Khrist chu Pathian silbawltheihna leh Pathian pilna ahi.
46001025	Ajiahchu Pathian ngolna mihing saangin apiljaw a, huleh Pathian haatlouhna zong mihing saangin ahaatjaw hi.
46001026	Ajiahchu unaute, kouh na hihna uh ngaihtuah dihvua. Tahsa lama mipil tampite, mihaat tampite, milian tampite kouh ahihlouh daan uh.
46001027	Hizongleh Pathian in mipilte azahtaatsahna diingin khovel sil ngolhuaite ateel jawta a, huleh sil haatte azahtaatsahna diingin khovel sil haatloute ateel jawta hi;
46001028	huleh khovel sil ngiamte leh sil muhsithuaite Pathian in ateel a, huleh sil umlou tanin ateel hi, sil umte bangmalou asuaahsah theihna diingin,
46001029	huchia Pathian ma a koimah akiuahsah theihlouhna diingin.
46001030	Hizongleh nanguh chu Amah vaangin Khrist Jesu ah na um uhi, Jesu chu Pathian apat eiuh diingin pilna, dihtatna, suhsiangthouna leh tatdohna ahung hita hi.
46001031	Huchia, “Akisuang phot chu LALPA ah kisuang heh” chia kigial bangin.
46002001	Huleh unaute, kei chu na kawmva Pathian thu heetpihna phuanga ka hung laiin, thusoi siamna sangtah leh pilna toh hung ka hi sih hi.
46002002	Ajiahchu ke’n Jesu Khrist leh Amah kilhbeha um thu chauh lou chu na lahvah bangma dang heet ka tum sih hi.
46002003	Huleh kei chu haatlou leh lauin, nasataha kithing kawmin na lahvah ka um hi.
46002004	Ka kamsuahte leh ka thusoite chu mihing pilna a jawlsiamna thu ahi sih a, hizongleh Hagau leh silbawltheihna suhlatna in ahijaw,
46002005	huchia na ginna uh mihing pilna a kinga lou a, Pathian silbawltheihna a akingah jawhna diingin.
46002006	Ahiinlah pichingte lahah chu pilna thu zong ka soi jeel uhi, ahihvaangin hi khang pilna thu ahi sih a, hi khang vaihawmtu hung mangthaai diingte pilna thu zong ahi sih hi.
46002007	Hizongleh kei un chu Pathian pilna thukiphual, Pathian in khovel um ma a i loupina diingva anaguatlawhsa pilna kiphualgu thu ka soi jaw uhi.
46002008	Huchu hi khang vaihawmtute khatbeeh in ahe sih uhi; ajiahchu anahe hita uh leh, loupina Lalpa chu anakilhbeh sih diing uhi.
46002009	Hizongleh, “Mit a muh ngeilouh, bil a jaah ngeilouh, huleh mihing lungtang a zong luut ngeilou, Pathian in Amah lungsiatte diinga abawlsah silte chu,” chia gelh bangin.
46002010	Hizongleh Pathian in hute chu a Hagau in i kawmah ahung hesahta hi. Ajiahchu Hagau in sil bangkim ahawldoh a, ahi, Pathian sil thuuhtahte zong.
46002011	Ajiahchu mihing silte chu mihing a um hagau loungaal koi ahiai he diing? Huchibangmahin Pathian silte zong Pathian Hagau loungaal koimah in ahe sih hi.
46002012	Huchiin Pathian in athawna ahung piaah silte i heettheihna diingun ei un chu khovel hagau hilouin, hizongleh Pathian a kuan Hagau chu i tang uh ahi.
46002013	Hi silte chu mihing pilna a soi louin, hizongleh Hagau Siangthou thuhilhna in hagaulam silte chu hagaulam thute a hilhchian in ka soi jaw uhi.
46002014	Hizongleh tahsa mi in chu Pathian Hagau silte apom thei sih hi, ajiahchu amah ngaihin hute chu ngolhuai ahi; hite chu hagau a heet ahih jiahin he zong ahe thei sih hi.
46002015	Hizongleh hagau mi in chu sil zousiah ahechian veu a, amah ahihleh koima’n ahechian sih hi.
46002016	Ajiahchu “Amah thuhilh thei diinga LALPA lungsim koi in ahiai he?” Hizongleh ei un chu Khrist lungsim i pua uhi.
46003001	Huleh unaute, hagau mite kawma soi bangin na kawmvah thu ka soi thei sih a, hizongleh tahsa mite kawma soi bangin, Khrist a naungeehte kawma soi bangin ka soi ahi.
46003002	An gum hilouin nawitui in ka hung vaah hi; ajiahchu na ne thei nai sih va, huleh tutanin zong na ne thei nai sih uhi;
46003003	ajiahchu nanguh na tahsami nalai uhi. Na lahva kithangsiatna, kinialna leh kipawlkhenna aum jiahin, tahsami hi nalai leh mihing meimei banga khosa nalai hilou na hi uh maw?
46003004	Ajiahchu khat in, “Kei Paul lawi ka hi,” huleh adang in, “Kei Apollo lawi ka hi,” na chih laisiah uh tahsami hilou na hi viaimah?
46003005	Ahihleh Paul koi ahiai, huleh Apollo koi ahiai? Hizongleh Lalpa’n apiaah bangjeela amahuh tungtawna na gintaat uh thunatongtute hilou ahi viaimah?
46003006	Keima’n ka suan a, Apollo in tui abuaah a, hizongleh Pathian in akhangsah hi.
46003007	Huchiin asuantu zong bangmah ahi sih a, tui buaahtu zong bangmah ahi sih, akhangsahtu Pathian chauh loungaal chu.
46003008	Huleh asuantu leh tui buaahtu chu akibang ahi va, mi chin in atohgim bang jeelun kipaahman akimuh chiat diing uhi.
46003009	Ajiahchu keiuh chu Pathian natohkhawmpihte ka hi uh; nanguh chu Pathian louma na hi va, Pathian inn na hi uhi.
46003010	Pathian hehpihna kei hung kipia dungjuiin, innlamtu siamtah bangin ke’n innbulphuh chu ka lemta a, midang in a tungah inn alam uhi. Hizongleh mi chin hu a tunga a innlam daan vah pilvaang chiat uh heh.
46003011	Ajiahchu innbulphuh lepsa loungaal innbulphuh dang kuama’n alem thei nawn sih hi, hu innbulphuh chu Jesu Khrist ahi.
46003012	Tuin hi innbulphuh tungah mi koipouh in sana in, dangka in, suangmantam in, sing in, hampa in, buhpawl in lamta leh,
46003013	mi chin natoh chu ahung kisulang diing hi; ajiahchu mei a suhlat hi diing ahih jiahin a Ni in aphuangdoh diing hi; huleh mei in mi chin natoh chu bangchi bang ahiai chih asuchian diing hi.
46003014	Innbulphuh tunga koi natoh zong aum zing leh, amah in kipaahman amu diing hi.
46003015	Koi natoh zong akaah inchu, manna athuaah diing hi; hizongleh amah tah chu hutdamin aum diing a, ahihvaangin mei a paisuaah bang ahi diing hi.
46003016	Pathian inn na hi va, huleh na sungvah Pathian Hagau ateeng chih helou na hi viaimah?
46003017	Mi koipouhin Pathian inn asuhbolhhoh inchu, Pathian in amah asuse diing hi. Ajiahchu Pathian inn chu asiangthou a, hu inn chu nanguh na hi uhi.
46003018	Mi koimah amah leh amah kiheem sih heh. Na lahva mi koiaha hi khang a pil akisah leh, ahung pil theihna diingin mingol hung suaah heh.
46003019	Ajiahchu hi khovel pilna chu Pathian ngaihin ngolna ahi. Ajiahchu, “Amah in mipilte a pil lepchiahna vah aman hi,” chih gelh ahi.
46003020	Huleh hubaan ah, “LALPA’N mipil ngaihtuahnate ahe a, hute chu bangmalou ahi,” chia gelh bangin.
46003021	Hujiahin mi koimah mihing ah kisuang sih heh. Ajiahchu sil zousiah nanguh a ahi:
46003022	Paul hiin Apollo hiin Kepha hizongleh, ahihlouhleh khovel hiin hinna hiin sihna hizongleh, sil um nalaite hiin sil hung um diingte leh sil zousiah chu nanguh a ahi.
46003023	Huleh nanguh chu Khrist a na hi va, huleh Khrist chu Pathian a ahi.
46004001	Huchiin mi’n keiuh chu Khrist suaahte leh Pathian thukiphual enkoltute bangin hung he uh heh.
46004002	Hubaan ah, hitah a enkoltute chu mi ginum ahih uh apoimoh hi.
46004003	Hizongleh nang un na hung etkhiah uh aha ahihlouhleh mihing thukhenna a na hung etkhiah uh chu kei diingin sil neutakhat ahi. Adihtahin kei leh kei zong ka kienkhe sih hi.
46004004	Ajiahchu keimah ah ahung awimohtu bangmah umin ka he sih hi, ahiinlah huin siam ahung tangsah ahi tuan sih; hizongleh ahung enkhetu chu Lalpa ahi hi.
46004005	Hujiahin a hun main Lalpa hung masiahin bangmah enkhe sih un. Ama’n chu mial a sil kiphualte vaah ah ahung podoh diing a, huleh lungtang a ngaihtuahte zong ahung sulang diing hi. Hu hun chiangin mi chin in paahtawina chu Pathian apat atang chiat diing uhi.
46004006	Unaute, tuin hi silte chu nang un akigialta khu kheellam bangma na ngaihtuah louh diing uh chih keiuh apat na jil theihna diing uh leh huchia nanguh koimah in khat na kiuahsahpih va, khat na kalh louhna diingun, na phattuamna diingun keimah leh Apollo tungah etsahna thu in ka kizang ahi.
46004007	Ajiahchu kuan ahiai nang midang apat hung tuamsah? Huleh na muh louh bang ahiai na neih? Tuin amuta ngeei na hih leh, bang diinga mulou banga kisathei na hiai?
46004008	Tuin na kichingta uh! Na hung hausata uhi! Keiuh louin kumpipate na hung hita uh, huleh huchia keiuh zong nanguh toh ka lal theihna diingun, adihtahin kumpipate na hih uh ka deih hi!
46004009	Ajiahchu Pathian in keiuh apostolte chu si diinga guatsa bangin anunungpeen a hung koih hiin ka ngaihtuah hi. Ajiahchu khovel mitmuhin, angelte leh mihingte mitmuhin etnop a et ka hung hita uhi.
46004010	Keiuh chu Khrist a diinga mingol ka hi va, hizongleh nanguh chu Khrist ah mipil na hi uhi! Keiuh chu ka haat sih va, hizongleh nanguh chu na haat uhi! Nanguh chu na zahum va, hizongleh keiuh chu simmohin ka um uhi!
46004011	Tu daahkaal dongin ka gilkialun ka dangtaah va, silhleteen tasamin ka um va, mite vuaahthop leh teenna mumal beiin ka um uhi.
46004012	Huleh ka khut un nna ka tong uhi. Housiata ka um un ka vangpiaah va, suhduhdaha ka um un ka thuaah teeiteei uhi.
46004013	Soisiat-a ka um un neemtahin ka dawng uhi. Tutanin khovel niinnoh, sil zousiah bolhhoh bang ka hung hita uhi.
46004014	Na zahtaatna diingun hi thute ka gial ahi sih a, hizongleh ka ta deihtahte bangin ka hung taaihilh ahijaw hi.
46004015	Ajiahchu nang un Khrist ah hilhtu saang sawm nei zongleh uh chin, pa chu tampi na nei sih uhi; ajiahchu tanchinpha jaalin Khrist Jesu ah nanguh ka hung hingkhia hi.
46004016	Huchihjiahin ka umdaan juitute hi diingin ka hung hasot hi.
46004017	Hikhu diing jiahin Lalpa a ka ta deihtah leh ginum Timothi na kawmvah ka hung sawl hi. Ama’n chu gam chin a kouhtuam zousiah ka thuhilh bangin, Khrist a ka umdaan nanguh ahung hesah kiit diing hi.
46004018	Na kawmva hung nawnlou diing banga hung na ngaihtuahin na lahvah khenkhat anakiuangsah uhi.
46004019	Hizongleh Lalpa’n lem achih leh, na kawmvah ka hung baih diing a, huchiin kiuangsahte chu a thusoi uh hilouin a silbawltheihna uh ka heta diing hi.
46004020	Ajiahchu Pathian lalgam chu thu ah aum sih a, silbawltheihna ah aum jaw hi.
46004021	Bang ahiai na deih uh? Na kawmvah chiang tawiin ka hung diai, ahihlouhleh lungsiatna leh lungneemna hagau toh ka hung diai?
46005001	Na lahvah kingaihna thaanghuai aum chih athang vengvung a, huchibang kingaihna thaanghuai Jentelte lahah zong aum ngei sih, huchu mi khat in a pa ji akiteenpih hi.
46005002	Huleh huchibang silbawlpa chu na lah vapat nohdoh diinga lungngaih naahsaangin na kiuahsahpih jaw uhi.
46005003	Ajiahchu keimah tahsa a ka tel louh vaangin hagau in ka tel a, na lahva tel tobangin hutobanga gamtapa chu atung vai ka hawm zouta hi.
46005004	I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist min in, ka hagau toh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist silbawltheihna toh na kikhopkhawm chiangun,
46005005	huchibang mi chu Lalpa Jesu Ni chianga a hagau hutdama aum theihna diingin, a tahsa suhmangna diingin Setan kawmah pedoh un.
46005006	Na kisahtheihna uh ahoih sih hi. Tol themchakhat in tanghou beu a pumin ajeelsuaah veu hi chih na he sih uh maw?
46005007	Hujiahin tolsohlouh na hih ngeei bangmah un, tanghou beu thah na hihtheihna diingun, tol lui chu paaimang un. Ajiahchu adihtahin i Chiahkaan uh Khrist chu ei a diingin latin aumta hi.
46005008	Hujiahin tol lui toh hilouin, giitlouhna leh suhsiat tupna tol toh zong hilouin, hizongleh chihtahna leh thutahna tolsohlouh tanghou toh kuut chu i nei diing uhi.
46005009	Kingaihna thaanghuai a kibualte kithuahpih lou diingin ka lehkhathon ah ka hung gialta hi.
46005010	Hi khovel a kingaihna thaanghuai a kibualte toh aha, mihuaihamte toh aha, leepgute toh aha, ahihlouhleh milem bete toh aha kithuah het louh diing ahi chi chu ka hi sih hi, ajiahchu huchi diing hileh khovel apat na chiahdoh uh ngai diing ahi.
46005011	Hizongleh tuin chu koipouh unau chih hingaala kingaihna thaanghuai aha, huaiham aha, milem bia aha, soisiat haat aha, zukham haat aha, leepguuh haat aha, huchibang mi chu kithuahpih lou diing leh neeh tanpha ne khawm lou diingin na kawmvah tuin ka hung gialta hi.
46005012	Ajiahchu polam mite keimah in ka vaihawm diing bang aum ei? Nang un a sunga umte vaihawm lou na hi viai mah?
46005013	Hizongleh polam a mite chu Pathian in avaihawm hi. Hujiahin “na lah vapatin hu migiloupa chu koihdoh un.”
46006001	Na lahva koiaha khat in midang tungah thubuai neita leh uh chin, misiangthoute ma a tut louin, daan a heeh diingin midihtatloute ma ah na tut ngam diviaimah?
46006002	Misiangthoute’n khovel vaihawm diing ahi uh chih na he sih viaimah? Huleh khovel vaihawm diing na hih uh leh, sil neupeente vaihawm diinga taahlou na hi uh maw?
46006003	Angelte tunga vaihawm diing i hi chih na he sih viaimah? Huchi ahih inchu, hi damsung silte giap i vaihawm taahluat diing hilou maw?
46006004	Huchi ahihleh hi damsung silte tungtaang a vaihawmna na neih uh leh, kouhtuam a mi zahumlou peente vaihawm diingin na tousah viaimah?
46006005	Hichu na zumna diingun ka soi ahi. Na lahvah mipil, a unaute kikaal a vaihawm thei khat beeh umlou ahiaimah?
46006006	Himahleh unau in unau daan ah na heeh va, hu zong gingloumite ma ah ahi nalai hi!
46006007	Huchi ahih jiahin khat leh khat daan a na kiheehtuah uh chu na guallelhna lianpi uh ahi. Bang diinga amohjaw hi a kikoih meilou na hi viai? Bang diinga dihloutaha bawlna thuaah jaw meilou na hi viai?
46006008	Hilou, nanguh mah in na bawl sual va na heem uh, huleh hu zong na unaute uh tungah ahi na bawl uh!
46006009	Midihtatloute’n Pathian lalgam aluah sih diing uh chih na he sih viaimah? Heemzohin um sih un. Kingaihna thaanghuai a bualte aha, milem bete aha, aangkawmte aha, mihuuhte aha, tohuuhte aha,
46006010	gutate aha, eenhaatte aha, zukham haatte aha, misalh haatte aha, huleh leepgute aha in Pathian lalgam aluah sih diing uhi.
46006011	Huleh na lahva khenkhat huchibang nana hi uhi. Hizongleh nanguh chu silsiang leh suhsiangthou na hita uh, nanguh chu Lalpa Jesu min leh i Pathian uh Hagau a siamtansah na hita uhi.
46006012	Sil zousiah bawl kei diingin phal ahi a, hizongleh sil zousiah bawl chu ahoihkim sih hi. Sil zousiah bawl kei diingin phal ahi a, hizongleh bangmah in thuneihna ka tunga aneih ka phal sih hi.
46006013	Ante chu gilpi a diing ahi a, huleh gilpi zong an a diing ahi, hizongleh anihun Pathian in asumang diing hi. Huleh sapum chu kingaihna thaanghuai a diing ahi sih a, hizongleh Lalpa a diing ahijaw a, huleh Lalpa chu sapum a diing ahi.
46006014	Pathian in Lalpa chu akaithou a, huleh eiuh zong a silbawltheihna in ahung kaithou diing hi.
46006015	Na sapum uh Khrist hiangte ahi chih na he sih viaimah? Ahihleh Khrist hiangte chu lain nohchijuaahte hiang in ka bawl diing ahiaimah? Bawllou hial diing!
46006016	Ahihleh nohchijuaah toh kizop photmah chu amahnu toh sapum khat ahi uh chih helou na hi viaimah? Ajiahchu Ama’n, “Anihun sapum khat ahung hita diing uh,” achi hi.
46006017	Hizongleh Lalpa toh kizop photmah chu Amah toh hagau a pumkhat ahi uhi.
46006018	Kingaihna thaanghuai taaisan un. Mihing sualna zousiah chu sapum polam ahi a, hizongleh kingaihna thaanghuai a sual bawl in chu amah sapum tungah sil abawlsual ahi.
46006019	Ahihlouhleh na sapum uh chu Pathian apat na neih uh, Hagau Siangthou inn ahih daan leh na sapum uh nanguh a ahihlouh daan na he sih viaimah?
46006020	Ajiahchu man a leisa na hi uhi; hujiahin na sapum uh leh na hagau un Pathian paahtawi un, huchu Pathian a ahi.
46007001	Huleh ka kawma na hung sil gelhte uh thu ah: Pasal in numei suhkhaah louh ahoih hi.
46007002	Ahihvaangin kingaihna thaanghuai aum jiahin, pasal chin in ji kineih chiat henla, huleh numei chin in zong pasal kineih chiat heh.
46007003	Pasal in a ji kawmah a tan diing chu pia heh, huleh huchibangmahin numei in zong a pasal kawmah pia heh.
46007004	Ji in amah sapum tungah thu anei sih a, a pasal in anei jaw hi. Huleh huchibangmahin pasal in zong amah sapum tungah thu anei sih a, a ji in anei jaw hi.
46007005	An ngawl leh haamteina a na kipumpiaah theihna diingva hun tomkhat a diinga na kilungtuaah uh ahih louhngaal leh, khat in khat tan diing dawl kikhaam sih un; huleh na kisuum zohlouh jiahva Setan in ahung heem louhna diingin hung umkhawm kiit un.
46007006	Hizongleh hi thu chu thupiaah banga soi louin, phalsah thuin ka soi jaw ahi.
46007007	Ajiahchu mi zousiah keimah bang chiat uh leh ka deih hi. Hizongleh mi chin in Pathian apat silpiaah tuam chiat anei uh, khat in hitobangin, adang in hutobangin anei chiat uhi.
46007008	Hujiahin kiteeng nailoute leh meithaite kawmah hichiin ka chi hi: Keimah bangin um uh leh amahuh diingin ahoih diing hi.
46007009	Ahihvaangin akisuum zohlouh uh leh chu kiteeng uh heh, ajiahchu tahsa uutna a kisuumzohlouh saangin kiteen ahoihjaw hi.
46007010	Tuin kiteengsate kawmah thu ka pia hi, kei piaah hilouin Lalpa piaah ahijaw hi: Ji in a pasal paisan sih heh.
46007011	Hizongleh apaisan inchu, pasal neilouin umzing jaw heh, ahihlouhleh a pasal toh kilem kiit uh heh. Huleh pasal in a ji khuul sih heh.
46007012	Hizongleh adangte kawmah chu, Lalpa’n asoi hilouin, ke’n ka soi hi: Unau koiaha in gingloumi ji a aneih a, amahnu a kawma aum nuam zing leh, khuul sih heh.
46007013	Huleh gingloumi pasal a nei in chu a pasal in a kawma um zing auut leh, nuse sih heh.
46007014	Ajiahchu ginglou pasal chu a ji jiahin suhsiangthouin aum a, huleh ginglou ji zong a pasal jiahin suhsiangthouin aum hi. Huchi hilou hileh chu na tate uh asiang sih diing uh, hizongleh tuin chu asiangthou uhi.
46007015	Hizongleh a ginglou jaw in akhen leh, khen mei heh. Unaupa aha, unaunu aha chu huchibang thu ah kaanin aum sih hi. Hizongleh Pathian in eiuh chu kituaaha um diingin ahung kou hi.
46007016	Ajiahchu Aw ji, na pasal na hutdam diing leh diing louh bang na he ei? Ahihlouhleh Aw pasal, na ji na hutdam diing leh diing louh bangchiin na he ei?
46007017	Hizongleh Pathian in mi chin kawma ahawmsahtaah bangin, Lalpa’n mi chin akouhtaah bangin, huchiin um heh. Huleh huchibangin keimah in kouhtuam chin ah thu ka pia hi.
46007018	Zehtansa a kouh mi aum ei? Zehtanlouh hung hi tuan sih heh. Zehtanlouh a kouh mi aum ei? Zehtan hi tuan sih heh.
46007019	Zehtan bangmah ahi sih a, zehtan louh zong bangmah ahi sih hi, hizongleh apoimoh chu Pathian thupiaahte juih khu ahi.
46007020	Mi chin kouha aumna mah vah um zing uh heh.
46007021	Suaah hihlai a kouh na hiai? Poisa sin; hizongleh suahtaatsah theih na hihin chu, suaahta mei in.
46007022	Ajiahchu suaah hihlai a Lalpa a kouh chu Lalpa mi jaleen ahi. Huchibangmahin jaleen hihlai a kouh zong Khrist suaah ahi.
46007023	Man a leisa na hi uh; mite suaah hi sih un.
46007024	Unaute, mi chin kouha aumna bang chiatin hutah ah Pathian toh umzing uh heh.
46007025	Huchiangleh nungaah siangthoute tungtaang ahihleh Lalpa thupiaah bangmah ka nei sih hi. Hizongleh ginum diinga Lalpa hehpihna tang ka hih jiahin, ka ngaihdaan ka soi diing hi.
46007026	Huchiin tulai hahsatna jiahin hichu hoih diingin ka ngaihtuah hi, huchu mi aum ngeia aum zing chu ahoih hi, ka chi hi.
46007027	Ji a kaan na hiaimah? Kisuutkhiah tum sin. Ji apat kaan nawnlouh na hiaimah? Ji neih tum sin.
46007028	Hizongleh ji na neih zongleh sil bawlsual na hi sih; huleh nungaah siangthou in zong pasal nei mahleh sil bawl sual ahi sih hi. Ahihvaangin huchibang mite’n leitung khosahna ah buaina athuaah diing uhi; hizongleh ke’n chu na thuaah louh uh ka deih hi.
46007029	Hizongleh unaute, hikhu ka soi ahi, hun atomta hi, huchiin ji neite chu neilou bangin,
46007030	huleh kapte kaplou bangin, kipaahte chu kipaahlou bangin, sil leite chu aneilou bangin,
46007031	huleh khovel sil zangte chu azang nuamlou bangin um uh heh. Ajiahchu hi khovel umdaan hi abeimang zing hi.
46007032	Hizongleh ke’n chu lungkhamna beia na um uh ka hung deihsah hi. Ji neilou in chu Lalpa akipaahsah theihna diingin, Lalpa lam silte angaihsah hi.
46007033	Himahleh ji nei in chu a ji akipaahsah theihna diingin khovel silte angaihsah hi.
46007034	Pasal nei leh nungaah siangthou zong akibang sih hi. Pasal neilou in chu tahsa leh hagau a siangthoutaha aum theihna diingin Lalpa lam silte angaihsah hi. Hizongleh pasal nei in chu a pasal akipaahsah theihna diingin khovel lam silte angaihsah hi.
46007035	Huleh hite chu na hoihna diingva ka soi ahi. Nanguh deihjawng khap tuma ka soi ahi sih a, himahleh umdaan kilawm hun a na um theihna diing uh leh Lalpa nna buailoua na toh theihna diingva ka soi ahijaw hi.
46007036	Hizongleh mi koipouh in a ta nungaah siangthou akuul donga aleensah a, a tunga dihlou kisa a, a pasal neih diing khawh asah leh, hoih asah bangin bawl heh. Abawl sual sih; pasal neisah mei heh.
46007037	Ahihvaangin lungsim dettah pua a, phamohsahna neilou a, amah lungsim uutna kithunun zou a, a ta nungaah siangthou kepzing a lungtang a tumpa in chu abawl hoih hi.
46007038	Huchiin a ta nungaah siangthou pasal neisahpa in abawl hoih a, hizongleh pasal neisahloupa in abawl hoihjaw hi.
46007039	Ji chu a pasal adamsung siah daan thu a kaan ahi. Hizongleh a pasal asih inchu, Lalpa a um mi chauh, adeih photmah akiteenpih thei hi.
46007040	Hizongleh kei ngaihtuah daanin chu aum ngeiin um leh nuam asajaw diing hi; huleh keimah in Pathian Hagau neiin zong ka kingaihtuah hi.
46008001	Huleh milemte biahna kithoihna sil latte tungtaang ahihleh koipouh in heetna i nei chiat uh chih i he uhi: Heetna in mi achapousah a, himahleh lungsiatna in mi asiamhoih hi.
46008002	Mi koiaha in bangkim he a akingaihtuah inchu, aheet diing bangin ahe nailou ahi.
46008003	Hizongleh mi koiaha in Pathian alungsiat inchu, hu mi mah chu Pathian heetin aum hi.
46008004	Hujiahin milem biahna kithoihna silte neeh lam thu ahihleh, khovel ah milem kichi bangmah ahi sih chih leh khat chauh loungaal Pathian dang aum sih chih i he uhi.
46008005	Ajiahchu pathian tampi leh lalpa tampi aum mahbangin, pathian chia minvohte vaan ah aha ahihlouhleh lei ah aha um zongleh uh,
46008006	ahihvaangin eiuh diingin chu Pa, Pathian khat chauh aum a, Amah apat sil zousiah ahung um a, huleh eiuh chu Amah diingin i hing uhi; huleh Lalpa khat, Jesu Khrist aum a, Amah tungtawnin sil zousiah aum a, huleh Amah tungtawnin eiuh i hing uhi.
46008007	Ahiinlah hu heetna chu mi teng in anei sih hi; himahleh khenkhatte in chu tutan chiangah milem biahna toh akingeinaseh jiahun, milem kawma kilaanta banga geelin hu an chu ane va; huleh a sialepha heetna uh ahaatlouh jiahin suhbolhhohin aumta hi.
46008008	Hizongleh neeh in Pathian paahtaat ahung lohsah sih hi; ajiahchu i neeh jiahun i hoihjaw uh ahi sih a, ne sih zonglei i sejaw uh ahi tuan sih hi.
46008009	Hizongleh pilvaang un, huchilou inchu hi na jaleenna uh bangchi ahain mi haatloute diingin puuhna ahung suaah kha diing hi.
46008010	Ajiahchu heetna nei nang mi koiaha in milem biahna ankuang uum a tou hung muta leh, amah sialepha heetna haatloupa chu milem biahna silte ne diinga haansanloh talou diing ahiaimah?
46008011	Huchiin na unau haatlou, amah luanga Khrist sita chu na heetna jiahin amangthaai diing adiai?
46008012	Huleh huchia unaute tunga na sual va, a sialepha heetna haatlou uh na suhliamsah chiangun Khrist tungah na sual uh ahi.
46008013	Hujiahin neeh in ka unau asuhpuuh inchu, sa ka ne nawn mawngmawng sih diing hi, huchilou inchu ka unau ka supuuh kha diing hi.
46009001	Apostol hilou ka hiaimah? Jaleen hilou ka hiaimah? I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist ka mu sih eimah? Nanguh Lalpa a ka natoh gah hilou na hi viaimah?
46009002	Midangte diingin apostol hi sih zongleng, nanguh diingin chu ka hi ngeei mei hi. Ajiahchu nanguh chu Lalpa a ka apostol hihna chiamchihna na hi uhi.
46009003	Kei hung enkhetute kawma ka kiveenna chu hikhu ahi:
46009004	Neeh theihna diing leh dawn theihna diing jaleenna neilou ka hi viaimah?
46009005	Apostol dangte leh Lalpa unaute leh Kepha banga gingtu khat ji a nei a, kipuileh theilou ka hi viaimah?
46009006	Ahihlouhleh kei leh Barnaba chauh in nna tong lou diinga thuneihna neilou ka hi viaimah?
46009007	Sepaih koi ahiai amah neihsa seenga gaal kuan ngei? Grephuan bawl ngaala a gah ne lou koi aum ei? Ahihlouhleh gan hon khawi ngaala a nawi dawn lou koi aum ei?
46009008	Hi thute mihing ngaihdaan chauh a soi ka hiaimah? Ahihlouhleh daan thu in zong humah asoi sih eimah?
46009009	Ajiahchu Mosi daan bu ah, “Bawngtal in buh achil laiin a muuh kaan sin,” chih gelh ahi. Pathian in bawngtalte diing angaihtuah ahiaimah?
46009010	Ahihlouhleh Ama’n eiuh diing jiah maha soi ahiaimah? Eiuh diing jiaha gelh ahi tahzet hi, huchu lei lettu in kineemtahin alet diing ahi a, huleh kineem puma buh votu in zong a kinepna chu amuh diing mah ahi.
46009011	Kei un na kawmva hagaulam silte tuh ka hih uh leh, nanguh apat na tahsa lam silte uh aat leh ung sil loupi ahiaimah?
46009012	Midangte’n na tungvah hi thuneihna tang ahih uh leh, kei un zong ka tangjaw tham sih diviaimah? Ahihvaangin hi thuneihna ka zang sih va, hizongleh sil zousiah ka thuaah uh; huchilou inchu Khrist tanchinpha ka daal kha diing uhi.
46009013	Pathian biahinn a natongte’n biahinn a silte ane va, huleh maitaam a natongte’n maitaam a silte ah tan anei uh chih na he sih viaimah?
46009014	Huchibangmahin tanchinpha soitute chu tanchinpha mah a ahin diing uh ahi chiin Lalpa’n aguatta hi.
46009015	Hizongleh ke’n chu hi silte khatbeeh ka zang sih a, huleh hi silte ka tungah kibawl leh chia gelh zong ka hi sih hi; ajiahchu koiaha in ka kisuanna peen bangmalou a abawl saangin kei diingin sih ahoihjaw hi.
46009016	Ajiahchu tanchinpha soi zong leng suan diing bangmah ka nei sih hi, bawllouh theihlouh ka tunga kinga ahih jiahin; ahi, tanchinpha soi sih leng ka tung gih diing ahi!
46009017	Ajiahchu hi sil thanuamtaha bawl ka hih leh, kipaahman muh diing ka nei hi; hizongleh ka uut thu lou a bawl ka hihin chu, tanchinpha keemtu hihna mohpuaahna chu piaah ka hita him hi.
46009018	Huchi ahihleh ka kipaahman bang ahita diai leh? Huchu tanchinpha a ka thuneihna ka zatkhial louhna diinga Khrist tanchinpha ka soi chianga a manbeia ka soi theihna diingin.
46009019	Ajiahchu mi zousiah apat jaleen himahleng, mi tam seem ka laahluut theihna diingin mi zousiah suaah in ka kibawl hi.
46009020	Judate ka laahluut theihna diingin Judate kawmah Judami bangin ka um hi. Daan nuaia umte ka laahluut theihna diingin, daan nuaia umte kawmah daan nuaia umte bangin ka um hi.
46009021	Daan neiloute ka laahluut theihna diingin, daan neiloute kawmah daan neilou bangin ka um hi, Pathian daan nuaia umlou tuanlouin, hizongleh Khrist daan nuaia um ngaalin.
46009022	Mi haatloute ka laahluut theihna diingin, mi haatloute kawmah haatlou bangin ka um hi. Bangchijawng aha a mi khenkhat beeh ka hutdam theihna diingin mi zousiah kawmah sil bangkimin ka kibawl hi.
46009023	Nanguh toh tan ka neih theihna diingin tanchinpha jiahin hichu ka bawl ahi.
46009024	Kitaaidemte chu a bawnun ataai va, hizongleh khat chauh in kipaahman amu veu uh chih na he sih viaimah? Na tan theihna diingun taai un.
46009025	Huleh koipouh kitaaidemna a kipaahman muh tum mi chu sil zousiah ah akideeh veu uhi. Amah un vaang lallukhuh sethei muhna diingin abawl uh ahi, hizongleh eite’n chu lallukhuh setheilou diingin i bawl uhi.
46009026	Hujiahin tup bei hilouin, huchibangmahin ka taai a, huih guaah lahpi tuum hilouin ka pang ahi.
46009027	Hizongleh ka tahsa ka sawi a, ka thu nuaiah ka koih hi, huchilou inchu midangte kawma tanchinpha ka soi zoh nungin keimah houh paihkhiahin ka um kha diing hi.
46010001	Hubaan ah, unaute, hite na heetlouh uh ka deih sih hi, huchu i pulepate a bawnun mei nuaia ana-um va, huleh a bawnun tuipi akaan va,
46010002	huleh a bawnun mei leh tuipi a Mosi kawma baptis-in aum va,
46010003	a bawnun hagaulam an kibang ane va,
46010004	huleh a bawnun hagaulam dawn diing kibang adawn chiat uhi. Ajiahchu amah un amahuh juitu hagaulam Suangpi apat adawn chiat va, hu Suangpi chu Khrist ahi.
46010005	Hizongleh a lahva mi tamjawte tungah Pathian alungkimta sih a, hujiahin gamdaai ah a luang uh apuuhlum gamta uhi.
46010006	Huchia silgilou alunggulh bangva i lunggulh louhna diingun, hite chu i etton diingva siltung ahi.
46010007	A lahva khenkhatte chu milem bemi ahih bangun milem bemi hi sih un. “Mipite chu ne diing leh dawn diingin atou va, huleh nopleninga um diingin ading jeel uh,” chih gelh bangin.
46010008	A lahva khenkhat in kingaihna thaanghuai abawl va, ni khat a saang sawmnih leh saang thum apuuhloh bangun, ei un kingaihna thaanghuai i bawl sih diing uhi.
46010009	A lahva khenkhat in aje-et va, guulte a suhmanga aum bangun, ei un jaw Khrist i je-et sih diing uhi.
46010010	A lahva khenkhat aphun va, sumangtu suhmanga aum bangun, i phun sih diing uhi.
46010011	Huchiin hite zousiah chu etton diingin a tungvah anatung ahi a, huleh eiuh huntawp hung tunnate kawma thuhilhna diinga gelh ahi.
46010012	Hujiahin dinga kingaihtuah chu pilvaang heh, huchilou inchu apuuh kha diing hi.
46010013	Mihing diinga heemna taangpi chihlouh heemna bangmahin ahung man kha nai sih hi; hizongleh Pathian chu aginum hi, Ama’n na thuaahzoh vaal uh heemna na tuaah diing uh aphal sih diing; hizongleh na thuaahzohna diingun heemna toh kitonin taaikhiahna lampi zong ahung siamsah diing hi.
46010014	Hujiahin ka deihtahte, milem biahna taaisan un.
46010015	Mipilte kawma thusoi bangin ka soi ahi; ka thusoi ngaihtuah un.
46010016	Vangpiaahna nou i dawn uh Khrist sisan kipawlkhawmpihna hilou ahiaimah? Tanghou i balkeeh uh Khrist tahsa i kikoppihna hilou ahiaimah?
46010017	Ajiahchu eiuh tampi hizonglehhang tanghou beu khat leh tahsa khat i hi uhi; ajiahchu hu tanghou beu khat ah tan i nei khawm chiat uhi.
46010018	Tahsa daan a Israelte en un: kithoihna sa nete maitaam toh tan nei khawm ahi sih viaimah?
46010019	Ahihleh bang ahiai ka soi? Milem chu sil bang ahakhat ahiai, ahihlouhleh milem biahna a sil kilaante zong sil bang aha khat ahiai?
46010020	Jentelte kithoihna chu Pathian kawmah hilouin, dawite kawmah akithoih uh chih soi ka hijaw a, huleh nanguh dawite toh na kipawlkhawm uh ka deih sih hi.
46010021	Lalpa nou leh dawite nou na dawnkhawm thei sih diing uh; Lalpa dohkaan a leh dawite dohkaan a zong na nekhawm thei sih diing uhi.
46010022	Ahihlouhleh Lalpa thangsiat diinga suhlungthah tum i hi viai? Amah saanga haatjaw i hi viaimah?
46010023	Sil zousiah bawl kei diingin phal ahi a, hizongleh sil zousiah ahoihkim veh sih hi. Sil zousiah kei diingin phal ahi a, hizongleh sil zousiah in asiamhoih sih hi.
46010024	Mi koimah in amah ngen hoihna diing hawl sih henla, hizongleh mi chin in midang hoihna diing hawl jaw heh.
46010025	Dawl a sa kijuaah photmah chu sialepha heetna jiahin bangma dongse louin ne un.
46010026	Ajiahchu, “Leilung leh a sunga um zousiah LALPA a ahi.”
46010027	Ginglou mite laha koiaha in an ne diinga ahung chial a, huleh chiah na uut ngaal inchu, na ma va alui phot uh sialepha heetna jiahin bangma dongse louin ne mei un.
46010028	Hizongleh mi koiaha in, “Hichu kithoihna ahi,” chia ahung hilh leh, amah ahung hilhpa jiah leh sialepha heetna jiahin ne sih un; ajiahchu “leilung leh a sunga um zousiah LALPA a ahi.”
46010029	Nangmah sialepha heetna chi ka hi sih a, hizongleh midang sialepha heetna chi ka hijaw hi. Ajiahchu midang sialepha heetna in bang diinga ka jaleenna hung vaihawm diing ahiai?
46010030	Ajiahchu kipaahtaha ka neeh leh, bang diinga kipaahthu ka soina an tunga soisiat-a um ka hiai?
46010031	Hujiahin na neeh un hileh, na dawn un hitaleh, na bawl photmah uh Pathian loupina diingin bawl veh un.
46010032	Judate aha Jentelte aha ahihlouhleh Pathian kouhtuamte aha lungnatna diing bangmah bawl sih un,
46010033	huchia amahuh hutdam ahih theihna diingva, keimah phattuamna diing chauh hawllou a, hizongleh mi tampite phattuamna diing ka hawljawh mahbangin.
46011001	Kei Khrist umdaan juitu ka hih mahbangin nanguh ka umdaan juitute hi un.
46011002	Huleh unaute, sil zousiah a na hung heetzing va, thugousiah ka hung piaahsawn bang jeela na kolzing jiahun ka hung paahta hi.
46011003	Hizongleh pasal photmah lutang chu Khrist ahi a, numei lutang chu pasal ahi a, huleh Khrist lutang chu Pathian ahi chih na heet uh ka hung deih hi.
46011004	Pasal a lu khuh puma haamtei aha, ahihlouhleh thusoi aha photmah in a lu azahbawl lou ahi.
46011005	Hizongleh numei a lu khuh loua haamtei aha, ahihlouhleh thusoi photmah in a lu azahbawl lou ahi; ajiahchu huchibanga bawl chu a sam kimeet kiau toh kibang giap ahi.
46011006	Ajiahchu numei in a lu akhuh louhngaal inchu, meetkiau mei heh. Ahihvaangin numei diinga sammeet ahiai mah, ahihlouhleh meetkiau azumhuai jiahin khuh heh.
46011007	Ajiahchu pasal hi Pathian lim leh loupina ahihjiahin a lu akhuh louh diing mawng ahi; hizongleh numei chu pasal loupina ahi.
46011008	Ajiahchu pasal chu numei apat siam ahi sih a, hizongleh numei ahihleh pasal apat siam ahijaw hi.
46011009	Pasal chu numei a diinga siam ahi sih a, hizongleh numei chu pasal a diinga siam ahijaw hi.
46011010	Hikhu jiahin numei in a lu tunga thuneihna chiamchihna angelte jiahin aneih ngeeingeei diing ahi.
46011011	Ahihvaangin Lalpa ah chu numei apat pasal ajaleen thei sih a, pasal apat numei zong ajaleen thei diaah sih hi.
46011012	Ajiahchu numei hi pasal apat siam ahih mahbangin, pasal zong numei tungtawnin apiang hi; hizongleh sil zousiah chu Pathian apat ahi veh hi.
46011013	Nang un kingaihtuah un. Numei in a lu khuhloua Pathian kawma ahaamtei akilawm eimah?
46011014	Pasal in sam sau aneih leh, amah diingin azumhuai hi chih pianken ngeinadaan in zong ahung hesah sih eimah?
46011015	Hizongleh numei in sam sau aneih inchu, amah diingin loupina ahijaw hi; ajiahchu a sam chu a khuhna diinga piaah ahi.
46011016	Hizongleh mi koiaha in anial nuam inchu, huchibang tawndaan i nei sih va, Pathian kouhtuamte’n zong anei sih uhi.
46011017	Hizongleh nanguh hi thu ka hung hilhna ah ka hung phat thei sih hi, ajiahchu a hoihjawhna diingin na kikhawm sih va, asiatjawh seemna diingin na kikhawm veu uhi.
46011018	Ajiahchu amasapeenin kouhtuam a na kikhop chiangun na lahvah kilangkhennate aum chih ka ja a, huleh gin zong gingtaatna khat ka nei hi.
46011019	Ajiahchu na lahva midih a pomte heetdoh ahih theihna diingun, na lahvah kilangkhennate zong aum diing mawng ahi.
46011020	Hujiahin na kikhop chiangun Lalpa nitaah an ne diinga hung na hi sih uhi.
46011021	Ajiahchu na neeh chiangun mi chin in midangte main nanguh nitaah an na kineeh chiat va; huchiin khat agilkial a, adang in akham hi.
46011022	Bangchidaan ahiai? Neehna diing leh dawnna diing inn kineih lou na hi viaimah? Ahihlouhleh Pathian kouhtuamte na musit-un bangma neiloute na selphou uh ahiaimah? Na kawmvah bang ahiai ka soi diing? Hi thu ah ka hung paahta diing adiai? Ka hung paahta hial sih hi.
46011023	Ajiahchu Lalpa kawm apat ka muh chu nanguh ka hung hilhsawn ahi: huchia Lalpa Jesu’n matsaha aum jaanin tanghou ala a,
46011024	huleh kipaahthu asoi zohin abalkeeh a, “La unla, ne un; hichu ka tahsa nanguh diinga kibalkeeh chu ahi; na hung heetzingna diingun hichu bawl un,” achi hi.
46011025	Huchibangmahin an aneeh zohin nou zong ala a, “Hi nou chu thuhun thah a ka sisan ahi. Na dawn tengva na hung heetzingna diingun hichu bawl un”, achi hi.
46011026	Ajiahchu hi tanghou na neeh va hi nou na dawn tengun, ahung kiit masiah Lalpa sihna na phuangdoh jeel uh ahi.
46011027	Hujiahin mi koipouh taahloupi-a Lalpa tanghou ne leh nou dawn in chu Lalpa tahsa leh sisan tungah siamlouh atang diing hi.
46011028	Huleh mi amah kienchianjaw heh, huchiin tanghou chu ne henla, nou chu dawn heh.
46011029	Ajiahchu Lalpa tahsa hesiam lou a ne taahlou leh dawn taahloupi-a ne leh dawn in chu amah siamlouh kitanna diingin anein adawn hi.
46011030	Hikhu jiahin na lahvah mi tampi na jawngkhaal va huleh na china va, huleh tampi na ihmuta uhi.
46011031	Ajiahchu ei leh ei dihtaha i kietchian leh, vaihawmsahin i um sih diing uhi.
46011032	Hizongleh vaihawmkhuma i um chiangun khovel toh siamlouhtanga i um louhna diingun Lalpa taaihilhin i um veu uhi.
46011033	Hujiahin ka unaute, ne diinga na kikhop chiangun, khat leh khat kingaah chiat un.
46011034	Hizongleh mi koipouh a gil akial leh a inn lamah ne heh, huchia vaihawmna na thuaahna diingva hung kikhawm na hihlouhna diingun. Huleh thu dangte chu ka hung chiangin ka lemtuaah veh na diing hi.
46012001	Huleh unaute, hagaulam silpiaahte tungtaang heloua na um uh ka deih sih hi.
46012002	Jentelte na hih laiun puia na um bang jeelun, milem haamtheiloute lamah puimangin na um uh chih na he uhi.
46012003	Hujiahin koima’n Pathian Hagau a thu soiin Jesu chu haamse thuaah ahi, achi ngei sih a, huleh koima’n Hagau Siangthou jaal louin Jesu chu Lalpa ahi, achi thei ngei sih, chih ka hung hesah hi.
46012004	Huchiin silpiaah tuamtuam aum a, hizongleh Hagau kibang ahi.
46012005	Huleh thunatohna tuamtuam aum a, hizongleh Lalpa kibang ahi.
46012006	Huleh natohna tuamtuam aum a, hizongleh bangkim a bangkim bawltu Pathian khat ahi.
46012007	Hizongleh mi zousiah phattuampih diingin Hagau natoh kilatna chu mi chin kawmah piaahin aum hi.
46012008	Ajiahchu mi khat kawmah Hagau tungtawnin pilna thu piaah ahi a, huleh midang kawmah hu Hagau tungtawn mah in heetna thu piaah ahi;
46012009	midang kawmah hu Hagau mah in ginna piaah ahi a, huleh midang kawmah hu Hagau mah in suhdamtheihna silpiaahte piaah ahi;
46012010	midang kawmah silmah bawltheihnate piaah ahi a, midang kawmah thusoilawhtheihna piaah ahi a, huleh midang kawmah hagaute heetkhentheihna piaah ahi a, midang kawmah haam tuamtuamte a thusoitheihna piaah ahi a, midang kawmah haam tuamtuamte lehdohtheihna piaah ahi.
46012011	Hizongleh hute zousiah chu Hagau khat mah in hi silte zousiah chu atongdoh a, mimal chin kawmah adeih bangjeelin ahawm hi.
46012012	Ajiahchu sapum chu khat ahi a, hizongleh hiang tampi anei hi; hiang zousiah chu tam mahleh uh sapum khat ahih bangun, Khrist ah zong hutobangmah ahi.
46012013	Ajiahchu eiuh Judate hiin Jentelte hitalei, suaah hiin suaah lou hilei, i bawnun sapum khat a um diingin Hagau khat a baptis-in i um va, huleh i bawnun Hagau khat mah a dawnsahin i umta uhi.
46012014	Ajiahchu sapum chu hiang khat chauh ahi sih a, hizongleh hiang tampi ahijaw hi.
46012015	Keeng in, “Khut ka hihlouh jiahin sapum a pang ka hi sih,” chi leh, hijiahin sapum a panglou ahi diaimah?
46012016	Huleh bil in, “Mit ka hihlouh jiahin sapum a pang ka hi sih,” chi leh, hijiahin sapum a panglou ahi diaimah?
46012017	Sapum chu a pumpi in mit hitaleh, khojaahna khoiah aumta diai? A pumpi in khojaahna hitaleh, gimnam heetna khoiah aumta diai?
46012018	Hizongleh Pathian in hiang chinteng chu pha asah bangin sapum ah akoih hi.
46012019	Huleh a bawnun hiang khat chauh hitaleh uh, sapum khoiah aumta diai?
46012020	Hizongleh tuin hiang tampi aum a, ahiinlah sapum khat chauh ahi.
46012021	Huleh mit in khut kawmah, “Bangmahin ka hung mamoh sih,” achi thei sih a, lutang in zong keeng kawmah, “Bangmahin ka hung mamoh sih,” achi thei tuan sih hi.
46012022	Chitheilou chauh hi thamlouin, sapum hiang haatloua kilangte chu apoimohjaw mahmah hi.
46012023	Huleh i sapum hiang zahtaat thamlouh a i ngaihte tungah zahna lianjaw i pia va, huleh i hiang suhlat thamlouhte’n naahpiihtahin kilawmna aneijaw uhi.
46012024	Hizongleh i hiang suanhuaite’n huchibang amamoh sih uhi. Hizongleh Pathian in poimoh thamlou hiangte chu zahna lianjaw piain, sapum chu alemkhawm hi,
46012025	huchia sapum a kikhenna aum louh a, hizongleh hiangte chu khat leh khat akingaihsah chiat theih jawhna diingun.
46012026	Huleh hiang khat in athuaahin zong, hiang zousiah in athuaahpih hi; huleh hiang khat paahtawia aum leh, hiang dang zousiah in akipaahpih uhi.
46012027	Tuin nanguh chu Khrist sapum na hi va, a mimal malin a hiangte na hi uhi.
46012028	Huleh Pathian in kouhtuam ah hite akoih hi: amasapeenin apostolte, anihna ah zawlneite, athumna ah thuhilhtute, hubaan ah silmah bawltute, huzohin suhdamtheihna silpiaahte, panpihtheihnate, vaihawm siamnate, haam tuamtuamte a haamtheihnate.
46012029	A bawnun apostol ahi viai? A bawnun zawlnei ahi viai? A bawnun thuhilhtu ahi viai? A bawnun silmah bawltute ahi viai?
46012030	A bawnun suhdamtheihna silpiaahte anei viai? A bawnun haamdangte in thu asoi viai? A bawnun haam aletthei viai?
46012031	Hizongleh silpiaah hoihpeente chu lunggulh jaw un. Huleh lampi hoihjaw ka hung musah nalai diing hi.
46013001	Mihing haamte leh angel haamte in thu soi mahleng, lungsiatna ka neih louhin chu, sum-eng tumging aha ahihlouhleh daah khutbeh ging aha bang ka hi giap hi.
46013002	Huleh thusoilawhtheihna silpiaah nei in, thukiphual zousiah leh heetna zousiah hesiam veh mahleng, taang kisuantheihna khop ginna zousiah nei mahleng, lungsiatna ka neih louh inchu, bangmah ka hi sih hi.
46013003	Huleh ka neih zousiah migentheite vaahna diingin pedoh vehin, huleh ka sapum haaltum diingin pedoh zongleng, lungsiatna ka neih louh inchu, bangma ka phattuampih sih hi.
46013004	Lungsiatna in athuaahthei a huleh aching hi; lungsiatna in athangse sih; lungsiatna chu akiphat sih a, akiuangsah sih hi;
46013005	akilawmlouin agumtat sih a, amah deihjawng chauh angaihtuah sih a, alungthah baih sih a, silgilou angaihtuah sih hi;
46013006	dihtatlouhna ah akipaah sih a, hizongleh thutah ah akipaah hi;
46013007	sil zousiah puaah daan asiam a, sil zousiah agingta a, sil zousiah alamen a, sil zousiah athuaah mualsuaah hi.
46013008	Lungsiatna chu bangchihmahin abei sih diing hi. Hizongleh thusoilawhtheihnate um mahzongleh, ahung bei diing hi; haamdangte um mahleh, ahung tawp diing hi; heetnate um mahleh, ahung mang diing hi.
46013009	Ajiahchu akimlouin i he a, akimlouin i soilawh uhi.
46013010	Hizongleh abukim chu ahung tun chiangin akimlou chu suhbei ahita diing hi.
46013011	Ka naupan laiin naupang haam in ka haam a, naupang heet in ka he a, naupang ngaihtuah in ka ngaihtuah hi; hizongleh ka hung pichin phetin naupanlai silte ka paaikheta hi.
46013012	Ajiahchu tuin liimlang a et bangin chianloutahin i mu hi, hizongleh hu hun chiangin chu kimaaituahin i muta diing hi. Tuin chu akimlouin ka he a, hizongleh hu hun chiangin chu kei hung kiheet bangin ka heta diing hi.
46013013	Huleh tuin ginna, kinepna leh lungsiatna hi teng thum aum zing hi; hizongleh hi teng laha lianpeen chu lungsiatna ahi.
46014001	Lungsiatna chu delh jeel unla huleh hagaulam silpiaahte lunggulh un, adiaahkholin thusoilawhtheihna diing lunggulh un.
46014002	Ajiahchu haam tuam khat a haam in chu mi kawma thusoi hilouin, Pathian kawmah asoi ahijaw hi, koimah in asoi aheetlouh jiahin; ahiinlah hagau ah chu thukiphual asoi ahi.
46014003	Hizongleh thusoitu in chu mihing kawmah siamhoihna thute, hasotna thute leh hamuanna thute asoi ahi.
46014004	Haamdang a thusoi in chu amah chauh akisiamhoih a, hizongleh thusoitu in chu kouhtuamte asiamhoih hi.
46014005	Na bawnva haamdangte a na haam uh chu ka hung deihsah hi, hizongleh hu saangin thu na soitheih uh ka hung deihsahjaw hi; ajiahchu kouhtuam in siamhoihna atan theihna diinga aletdoh louhngaal leh, haamdangte a haam saangin thusoi mi chu aloupijaw hi.
46014006	Tuin unaute, haamdangte a thusoiin na kawmvah hungta leng, thuphuandoh in aha, heetna in aha, thusoilawhtheihna in aha, ahihlouhleh thuhilhna in aha na kawmvah soi sih leng, bang in ka hung suphatuam diai?
46014007	Sil hinna neilou gingthei theile aha ahihlouhleh tingtang aha ngeei zong umjia neia agin louh leh, bang kimuut a, bang kitum ahiai chih bang achi kiheet theih diai?
46014008	Ajiahchu peengkuul mumal beiin kimuut leh, koi ahiai gaal kuan diinga kisa diing?
46014009	Huchibangmahin nang un zong haam heettheih diinga na soi louh uh leh, bang kisoi ahiai chih bang achi kiheet diai? Ajiahchu huih laha haam na hi giap diing uhi.
46014010	Khovel ah haam chi tuamtuam tampi aum ahi mei thei, hizongleh umje neilou khatmah zong aum sih hi.
46014011	Hujiahin, hu haam umjia ka heetlouh inchu, hu thusoipa diingin kei chu gamdangmi ka hi a, huleh kei diingin a soipa zong gamdangmi ahi diing hi.
46014012	Huchi mahbanga nang un zong hagaulam silpiaahte na lunggulh jiahun, kouhtuam siamhoihna diinga na hung khantouh theihna diing uh hawl un.
46014013	Hujiahin haamdang khat a thusoitu in alehdoh theihna diingin haamtei heh.
46014014	Ajiahchu haamdang khat in haamteita leng, ka hagau chu ahaamtei a, hizongleh ka heetna chu asuphatuam sih hi.
46014015	Ahihleh a thutawpna bang ahita diai? Hagau in ka haamtei diing a, heetsiamna toh zong ka haamtei diing hi. Hagau in la ka sa diing a, heetsiamna toh zong la ka sa diing hi.
46014016	Huchilou inchu, hagau a kipaahthu na soi chiangin bangma hesiam loupa in na kipaahthu soi ah bangchiin na thusoi heloupiin, “Amen,” achi thei diai?
46014017	Ajiahchu nang in chu kipaahthu na soi hoih ngeel a, hizongleh midang chu asiamhoih tuan sih hi.
46014018	Nanguh zousiah saanga haam dangte a thu ka soi tam jawh jiahin Pathian kawmah kipaahthu ka soi ahi.
46014019	Ahiinlah kouhtuam lahah chu haam dang khat a thu saang sawm ka soi saangin, ka thusoi a midangte ka hilh theihna diingin ka heetsiamna toh thu teng ngaa soi ka uut jaw hi.
46014020	Unaute, heetsiamna lamah naupang sih unla, ahiinlah giitlouhna lamah chu naupang un; huleh heetsiamna lamah piching un.
46014021	Daan Lehkhabu ah, “Haam dang mite leh gamtuam mite kam in hi mite kawmah thu ka soi diing a; huchiin zong ka thu angaikhe tuan sih diing uhi,” Lalpa’n achi, chih gelh ahi.
46014022	Hujiahin haam dangte chu gingtute diingin hilouin hizongleh gingloute diingin chiamchihna ahi; hizongleh thusoilawhna chu gingloute diingin ahi sih a, gingtute diingin ahijaw hi.
46014023	Hujiahin kouhtuam pumpi mun khat a na kikhopna vah mi zousiah haam dangte in haamta leh uh chin, hutah ah ahe nailoute ahihlouhleh gingloumite hungta leh, nanguh chu mingol ahung chi sih diviaimah?
46014024	Hizongleh mi zousiah in thu soilawhta leh uh, ginglou ahiai ahihlouhleh heloumi khat hutah ah hung leh, amah chu mi zousiah in misual ahihdaan ahesah diing va, misual ahi chiin amah leh amah akihedohsah diing uhi.
46014025	Huchiin a lungtang thuguuhte chu suhlatin aumta diing a, huleh khupboha puuhin Pathian abe diing a, na lahvah Pathian aum tahzet hi chih asoisawn diing hi.
46014026	Bangchih diing ahita diai, unaute? Na hung kikhop tengun mi chin in phatna la bang, thuhilhna bang, haam tuam bang, thuphuandoh bang, haam lehdohna bang na nei chiat uhi. Sil zousiah chu siamhoihna diinga bawl hi heh.
46014027	Mi koipouh in haam tuam khat a thu asoi leh, nih aha ahihlouhleh atam tawpin thum in aha soi heh, hu zong kikheel jeelin hi henla, huleh mi khat in letdoh heh.
46014028	Alettu diing aum louh leh, amah chu biahinn ah sipkhianin um henla, huleh amah leh Pathian kaal ah kisoi heh.
46014029	Thusoilawhtute nih aha thum aha in soi uh henla, adangte in asoi uh ngaihtuah uh heh.
46014030	Hizongleh a kawma tou thusoilawh dang khat kawma thuphuandoh ahung um leh, amasapeen sip heh.
46014031	Ajiahchu mi zousiah in ajil va, mi zousiah hasot-a aum theihna diingin na bawnun khat khat in thu na soilawh thei uhi.
46014032	Huleh zawlneite hagau chu zawlneite thuthu in aum uhi.
46014033	Ajiahchu Pathian chu buaina Pathian ahi sih a hizongleh hamuanna Pathian ahijaw hi, misiangthoute kouhtuam tengteng a ahih mahbangin.
46014034	Na numeite uh chu kouhtuam kikhopnate ah sip uh heh, ajiahchu amahuh diingin thusoi phal ahi sih hi; hu thamlouin daan Lehkhabu in zong asoi bangin akituhluut diing uh ahi.
46014035	Huleh bang aha heet nuam aneih un chu, inn lamah a pasalte uh dong uh heh; ajiahchu kouhtuam kikhopna a numei thusoi chu azumhuai hi.
46014036	Ahihlouhleh Pathian thu achiil a nanguh apat hung suaah ahiaimah? Ahihlouhleh nanguh kawm chauha hung tung ahiaimah?
46014037	Mi koipouh in thusoilawhtu ahiai ahihlouhleh hagaumi ahiaimah hia akingaihtuah leh, na kawmva ka thugelhte chu Lalpa thupiaah ahi chih he uh heh.
46014038	Hizongleh mi koipouh ahelou aum leh, amah chu helouin um mei heh.
46014039	Hujiahin unaute, thusoilawh theihna chu lunggulh unla, haam dangte a haam zong khap sih un.
46014040	Sil zousiah hoihtah leh kituuptaha bawl hi heh.
46015001	Hubaan ah, unaute, na kawmva ka tanchinpha hung soi, pom zong na pom va huleh humah ngeei zong na dinna uh hi chu ka hung hesah ahi,
46015002	na kawmva ka hung soi thu na pomdet uh leh, humah a hutdam zong na hi uhi, huchi ahihlouh inchu, athawnin na gingta uh ahi.
46015003	Ajiahchuamasapeeninkeimah in zong ka muh chu nanguh ka hung hilh sawn ahi: huchu Pathian Lehkhathu dungjuiin Khrist chu i sualnate jiahin asi a,
46015004	huleh Amah chu vuiin aum a, Pathian Lehkhathu dungjuiin ni thum ni in kaihthohin aumta a,
46015005	huleh Kepha kawmah akilaah a, huzohin apostol sawmlenihte kawmah.
46015006	Hunungin unau za ngaa saanga tamjawte kawmah khatvei thuin akilaah a, amahuh chu atamjaw tutanin adam nalai va, hizongleh khenkhat chu a-ihmuta uhi.
46015007	Hunungin Jakob kawmah akilaah a, huin apostol zousiah kawmah.
46015008	Huleh atawppeenin ahun loua piang kei kawmah zong akilaah hi.
46015009	Ajiahchu apostolte laha aneupeen ka hi, Pathian kouhtuamte ka suhduhdah jiahin apostol minvoh taah zong ka hi sih hi.
46015010	Hizongleh Pathian hehpihna jiahin tua ka hihna chu ka hita a, huleh a hehpihna ahung piaah chu athawnin aum sih hi; hizongleh amahuh haw zousiah saangin ka tonggimjaw hi, ahihvaangin kei toh ahi sih a, Pathian hehpihna ka kawma umin atong jaw ahi.
46015011	Hujiahin kei hiin amahuh hitaleh, huchiin ka soi va, nang un na gingta uhi.
46015012	Ahihleh tuin Khrist chu misi lah apat athoukiit chih akisoi ngaal leh, bangchidaana na lahva mi khenkhat in misi thohkiitna aum sih na chih uh ahiai?
46015013	Hizongleh misi thohkiitna umlou ahih inchu, Khrist zong kaihthoha umlou ahi diing hi.
46015014	Huleh Khrist kaihthoha umlou ahih inchu, ka thusoi uh athawn ahi a, na ginna uh zong athawn ahi hi.
46015015	Ahi, misite thoukiit lou ahih un chu, Pathian in Khrist akaihthou louhpi akaithou hi chia ka heetpihtaah jiahun, keiuh chu Pathian heetpihtu dihlou hia ngaihin ka umta diing uhi.
46015016	Ajiahchu misite athohkiit louh un chu, Khrist zong kaihthoh ahi sih diing hi.
46015017	Huleh Khrist kaihthoha aum louh inchu, na ginna uh athawn ahi diing a, na sualna vah na um nalai diing uhi.
46015018	Huchiangleh Khrist a ihmute amangthaai ahita diing uhi.
46015019	Tu damsung chauha Khrist a kinepna i neih un chu, mi zousiah laha mi lungsiathuai peen i hi diing uhi.
46015020	Hizongleh tuin Khrist chu misi lah apat kaihthohin aumta a, ihmute gahmasa ahung hita hi.
46015021	Ajiahchu mihing jiaha sihna ahung um jiahin, Mihing jiah mahin misi thohkiitna zong ahung umta hi.
46015022	Ajiahchu Adam a mi zousiah asih mahbangin, Khrist ah mi zousiah suhhingin aum diing uhi.
46015023	Hizongleh mi chin chu amahuh hun chiat ah ahi diing va: Khrist chu gahmasapeen ahi a, huchiin ahung kiit chiangin Khrist a te hun ahi diing hi.
46015024	Huchiin Ama’n lalgam Pa Pathian kawma apiaahkhiah chiangin, vaihawmna zousiah leh thuneihna zousiah leh silbawltheihna zousiah asuhmang chiangin, a tawpna ahung tung diing hi.
46015025	Ajiahchu Ama’n a meelmate zousiah a keeng nuaia akoih masangsiah vai ahawm ngeei diing ahi.
46015026	Meelma nunungpeen suhmanga um diing chu sihna ahi.
46015027	Ajiahchu “Ama’n sil zousiah a keeng nuaiah akoihta hi.” Himahleh “sil zousiah a thu nuaiah akoih” achih khu in a thu nuaia sil zousiah koihtu chu ahuam sih chih akilang hi.
46015028	Huleh sil zousiah a thu nuai a aum chiangin, Pathian chu bangkim a bangkim ahihtheihna diingin, Tapa ngeei zong sil zousiah a thu nuaia koihpa nuaiah akituluutta diing hi.
46015029	Huchilou inchu, misite thoukiit mawngmawng lou ahihleh, misite a diinga baptisma tangte’n bang abawlta diviai? Ahihleh bang diinga misite a diinga baptisma atansah uh adiai?
46015030	Huleh bang diinga eite zong daahkaal chin a lauhhuai dinmun a umzing i hi viai?
46015031	I Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist a ka hung suanna jiahin nitengin ka si chih tahzetin ka soi ahi.
46015032	Mihing hihdaan banga Ephesi a gamsate kisualpih ka hih leh, kei diingin bang aphatuam diai? Misite thoukiit lou ahihleh, “Nein i dawn diing uh, ajiahchu jiing chianga si diing i hi!”
46015033	Heemin um sih un: “Lawm gilou in umdaan hoih asusia hi.”
46015034	Dihtatna lamah halh unla, sual sih un; ajiahchu khenkhat in Pathian heetna anei sih uhi. Hichu na zahtaatna diingva ka soi ahi.
46015035	Hizongleh mi khenkhat in, “Misite bangchiin kaihthoh ahi diing viai? Bangchi bang sapum neiin ahung pawt diviai?” achi ahi diing.
46015036	Nang mingol, na haichi tuh zong asih louh leh, ahingdoh sih hi.
46015037	Huleh na tuhin a kung hung um diing khu na tuh sih a, gehu hiin haichi dangdang hitaleh, a tang mah ahi na tuh.
46015038	Hizongleh Pathian in pha asah bangjeelin a kung apia a, huleh haichi chin kawmah amah kung chiat apia hi.
46015039	Tahsa zousiah chu tahsa kibang ahi sih a, hizongleh mihing tahsa jaat tuam ahi a, gamsate tahsa jaat atuam a, ngate tahsa jaat atuam a, vate tahsa jaat atuam hi.
46015040	Vaanlam sapum aum a, leilam sapum zong aum hi; hizongleh vaanlam sapum loupina atuam a, leilam sapum loupina atuam hi.
46015041	Nisa loupina tuam khat aum a, ha loupina tuam aum a, huleh aahsite loupina tuam aum hi; ajiahchu aahsi leh aahsite zong loupina daan ah akibang sih uhi.
46015042	Huchibangmahin misi thohkiitna zong ahi. Sapum chu muattheia tuhin aum a, muattheiloua kaihthohin aum hi.
46015043	Simmoh umtaha tuhin aum a, loupitaha kaihthohin aum hi. Haatloutaha tuhin aum a, silbawltheitaha kaihthohin aum hi.
46015044	Pianpih sapuma tuhin aum a, hagaulam sapum neia kaihthohin aum hi. Pianpih sapum aum a, hagaulam sapum zong aum hi.
46015045	Huleh hichia gelh ahi, “Mi masa Adam chu hinna nei mi ahung hita hi.” Adam nunung chu hinna petu Hagau ahung hita hi.
46015046	Ahihvaangin, hagaulam chu aum masa sih a, hizongleh tahsalam aum masa a, huleh hunungin hagaulam ahung um hi.
46015047	Mihing masa chu lei a siam, leivui apat ahi a; Mihing nihna chu vaan apat Lalpa ahi.
46015048	Lei a siam mite chu lei a kisiampa bang ahi va, vaanlam mite chu vaan a Mi bang ahi uhi.
46015049	Huleh lei a kisiampa meel i puaah bangun, vaan Mi meel zong i po diing uhi.
46015050	Unaute, tuin hi ka soi ahi, tahsa leh sisan in Pathian lalgam aluah thei sih a, muatthei in zong muattheihlouhna aluah thei sih hi.
46015051	Ngai un, thukiphual ka hung hilh ahi: I bawnun i ihmu veh sih diing va, hizongleh i bawnun suhlimdangin i um veh diing uhi,
46015052	thakhatin, mitphet kaallouin, peengkuul nunungpeen gin chiangin. Ajiahchu peengkuul ahung ging diing a, huleh misite chu muattheiloua kaihthohin aum diing va, eite zong suhlimdangin i umta diing uhi.
46015053	Ajiahchu hi muatthei in muattheihlouhna asilh diing a, huleh hi sithei in sihtheihlouhna asilh ngeei diing hi.
46015054	Huchia hi muatthei in muattheihlouhna asilh a, huleh hi sithei in sihtheihlouhna asilh hun tahchiangin, “Sihna chu zohna ah valhin aumta.
46015055	Aw sihna, na gu khoiah aum tai? Aw haankhuuh, na gualzohna khoiah aum tai?” chia kigialte chu ahung taangtungta diing hi.
46015056	Sihna gu chu sual ahi a, huleh sual silbawltheihna chu daan thu ahi.
46015057	Hizongleh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist jaala gualzohna hung pepa Pathian kawmah kipaahthu um heh.
46015058	Hujiahin ka unau deihtahte, dettahin, suhliing guallouhin, Lalpa natoh phatuamngaitaha tong gigein um un, na tohgimna uh chu Lalpa ah athawn sih diing chih na he ngaalva.
46016001	Huleh misiangthoute diinga thohlawm tungtaang thu chu, Galatia gam a kouhtuamte ka thupiaah bangin nang un zong bawl un.
