47006015	Huleh Khrist leh Belial in bang kituaahna anei viai? Ahihlouhleh gingtu leh gingloumi in bang tankhawm anei viai?
47006016	Huleh Pathian biahinn leh milemte in bang kilemna anei viai? Ajiahchu nanguh chu Pathian hing biahinn na hi uhi. Pathian in, “Amahuh ah ka teeng diing a, amahuh lahah ka vaahleh diing a; huleh a Pathian uh ka hi diing a, amahuh ka mite ahi diing uh,” achih bangin.
47006017	Hujiahin, “A lahva kipan hung pawtdoh unla, atuamin um un, Lalpa’n achi. Huleh sil sianglou khoih sih un, huchiin ka hung pom thei diing hi.
47006018	Huleh nanguh diingin na Pa uh ka hi diing a, nanguh chu ka tapate leh ka tanute na hi diing uh, Bangkimbawlthei LALPA in achi,” achih bangin.
47007001	Hujiahin unau deihtahte, hi thuchiamte i neih jiahun, Pathian launa a sianthouna subukimin, tahsa leh hagau bolhhohna zousiah apat i kisusiangthou diing uhi.
47007002	Keiuh hung pom un. Koimah alam louin ka bawl sih uh, koimah ka suse sih uh, koimah ka heembawl sih uhi.
47007003	Nanguh siamlouh tansahna diinga hi thu ka soi ahi sih; ajiahchu i sih leh si khawm a, i hin leh hing khawm diingin ka lungtang vah na teeng uh chih tumain ka soita hi.
47007004	Nanguh lama thu ka soi ngam daan aloupi a, nanguh a ka kisuanna aloupi hi. Lungmuanna in ka dim a; ka gimthuaahna zousiah vah nasatahin ka kipaah ahi.
47007005	Ajiahchu Makedonia gam ka hung tun un, ka tahsa un khawldamna anei sih a, lehlam lehlam ah suhgimin ka um jaw uhi. Polam ah kihaunate aum a, sunglam ah launate aum hi.
47007006	Hizongleh lungkete hamuantu Pathian in Tita hungna jiahin ahung hamuanta hi.
47007007	Huleh amah hungna jiah chauh hilouin, ama’n nanguh a hamuanna aneih daan, nang un kei na hung ngaih daan uh, na hung hasiatpih daan uh, kei diinga na phattuamngaih daan uh ahung hilh phetin ahung hamuangsahta a, huchiin ka kipaah seemta hi.
47007008	Ajiahchu keima’n ka lehkhathot in hung sulungkham zongleng tuin ka kisiih sih hi, anakisiihta himahleng. Ajiahchu hu lehkhathot in nanguh tomtakhat sung chauh ahung sulungkham chih ka he hi.
47007009	Tuin chu ka kipaah ahi, suhlungkhama na um jiahuh hilouin, na lungkhamna un kisiihna ahung tutjaw jiahin ahi. Ajiahchu nang un kei uh jiaha manna bangma na tan louhna diingva Pathian deihjawnga suhlungkhama um na hi uhi.
47007010	Ajiahchu Pathian deihjawnga lungkhamna in hutdamna umna diingin kisiihna atun a, huchu adahhuai sih hi; hizongleh khovel lungkhamna in chu sihna atun hi.
47007011	Ajiahchu ngai un, Pathian deihjawnga lungkhamna ngeei in nanguh ah bang atun ei en un: bang thanopnate, dihtatna deih jiaha bang lunghihlouhnate, bang launate, bang lunggulhnate, bang phattuamngaihnate, bang thudih bawl deihnate atun eimah! Hi silte zousiah ah na siang uh chih na suchianta uhi.
47007012	Huchiin na kawmvah gial zongleng, adihlou bawlpa jiah aha ahihlouhleh dihloutaha thuaahpa jiaha ka gelh zong ahi sih hi, hizongleh na tungva ka phattuamngaih daan uh Pathian mitmuh a na kawmva suhlat-a aum theihna diinga ka gelh ahijaw hi.
47007013	Hujiahin na hamuanna vah ka hamuangta uhi. Na bawnva Tita lungsim na tohhalhsah jiahun, amah kipaahna ah ka kipaah tungtuang uhi.
47007014	Ajiahchu Tita kawma nanguh ka hung kisuanpihna photmah ah suhzumin ka um sih hi. Hizongleh thutah a sil zousiah na kawmva ka soi bangun, nanguh tungtaang Tita ma a ka hung suanna uh zong thutah ahi ngeei hi.
47007015	Huleh nanguh na bawnva na thuman daante uh, lau leh kithing puma amah nana saan daante uh ageeldoh chiangin, a lungsung ah nanguh ahung lungsiatna azual deuhdeuh hi.
47007016	Hujiahin sil zousiah a na tungva muanna ka neih jiahin ka kipaah hi.
47008001	Huchiangleh unaute, Makedonia gam a kouhtuamte tunga Pathian hehpihna piaaha um chu ka hung hesah uut uhi:
47008002	huchu suhgimna je-etna nasatah laha a kipaahna uh kichindaan leh a jawn mahmahna va kiphalna ahauh daan uh ahi.
47008003	Ajiahchu ahihzoh bangun, huleh ahihzoh saangva zong nasajawin uuttahin apia uh chih ka heetpih hi.
47008004	Amah un hi hehpihna silpiaah chu pomsah diingin leh misiangthoute panpihna natohna a atel theihna diingun hah ngetin ahung ngeen uhi.
47008005	Huleh hichu ka na lamet bang uh hilouin, Pathian deihlamin amahuh mahmah Lalpa kawmah leh keiuh kawmah akipe masa phot uhi.
47008006	Huchiin tuma a apattaah banga hu hehpihna chu na lahva bawlzou diingin Tita ka ngeen uhi.
47008007	Hujiahin silbangkim a na hauh bangun, ginna ah, thusoitheihna ah, heetna ah, phattuamngaihna zousiah ah leh keiuh na hung lungsiatna va na hauh bangun, hi hehpihna ah zong na hauhna diing uh ngaihtuah un.
47008008	Thupiaah bangin chu ka soi sih a, midangte phattuamngaihna tungtawna na lungsiatna uh tahjia etna diingin ka soi jaw hi.
47008009	Ajiahchu i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna chu na he uh, a gentheihna jiaha na hung hauhsat theihna diingun, Amah chu hausa mahzongleh, nanguh jiahin ahung gentheita hi.
47008010	Huleh hitah ah ka ngaihdaan ka soi hi: Nang un kum khat paita a hikhu bawl diinga nana kipat uh chauh hilouin, bawl diing nana lunggulh him jiahun hichu nanguh diingin ahoih ahi.
47008011	Hujiahin tuin bawl taangtung un, uut diinga kipeihna aum banga, na neih bang jeelva na piaah kim theihna diingun.
47008012	Ajiahchu uutna lungsim aum masat phot leh, mi a neihlouh daan dungjui hilouin a neih daan dungjuia pomsah ahi.
47008013	Ajiahchu midangte thadamtaha um a, nanguh gihtaha um diing hung chi ka hi sih;
47008014	hizongleh kibatgualna diingin ka chi ahijaw hi, huchia tu huntah a na neih vaal uh chu amahuh taahsap awnghuhna ahung hih a, amahuh neih vaal zong nanguh taahsap awnghuhna ahung hih theihna diingin ahi, huchia kibatgualna ahung um theihna diingin.
47008015	“Alakhawmtam in avaalin anei sih a, alakhawmtawm in lah atasam tuan sih,” chih gelh bangin.
47008016	Hizongleh nanguh diinga ka phattuamngaihna toh kibanga Tita lungtang a phattuamngaihna umsahtu Pathian kawmah kipaahthu um heh.
47008017	Ajiahchu keiuh ngetna apom chauh hilouin, amah mawnga phatuamngai a, amah uutthu a na kawmva hung ahi.
47008018	Huleh Tita toh unaupa khat, tanchinpha lam thu a kouhtuam zousiah in asoiphat uh, ka hung sawl uhi.
47008019	Huleh huchi chauh zong hilouin, amah chu kouhtuamte’n keiuh toh hi silpiaah toh zinkhawm diinga aguat uh zong ahi a, hu silpiaah chu Lalpa ngeei loupina diing leh na lungsim kipeih daan uh suhlatna diinga kei un ka guanggalh uh ahi a,
47008020	hi silpiaah tamtah ka hawmna vah koima’n ahung dem louhna diingin ka pilvaang uhi.
47008021	Lalpa mitmuh chauh ah hilouin, mihing mitmuh ah zong dihtaha bawl ka ngaikhawh uhi.
47008022	Huleh amahuh toh i unaupa uh ka sawl va, amah chu sil tampi a aphattuamngaihdaan tamveitah ka muchianta va, tu diahin na tungva tahsanna liantah aneih jiahin phatuam angai nasa seem ahi.
47008023	Tita tungtaang thu ahihleh, amah hi nanguh lam thu a ka kithuahpih leh ka natohpih ahi. Huleh i unaute uh ahihleh, kouhtuamte thupotute ahi va, Khrist loupina ahi uhi.
47008024	Hujiahin amahuh kawm leh kouhtuamte ma ah, na lungsiatna uh heetchianna leh nanguh ka hung suanna uh chu ensah un.
47009001	Ajiahchu misiangthoute diinga panpihna toh kisai na kawmva ka hung gelh angai sih hi.
47009002	Bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh na lungsim kipeih daante uh ka he a, hu thu ah Akaia gam kipeihsa a aumna kum khat ahita, chiin Makedonia gam mite kawmah ka hung suang a, huleh na phattuamngaihna un mi tamjawte asuthathou hi.
47009003	Ahihvaangin hichilam thu a nanguh ka hung suanna athawn ahih louhna diingin unaute ka hung sawl hi; huchia ka soi bangtaha kipeihsa a na um theihna diingun;
47009004	huchilou inchu Makedonia gam a mi khatpouh kei toh hungin, nanguh kimansalouin hung muta leh ung, nanguh soi louh, keiuh zong nanguh ka hung suanna lamvah ka mualphou kha diing uhi.
47009005	Hujiahin tuma a nana chiamsa uh silpiaah chu laahsah thoh hilou a, phaltaha pe jaw a, mansa diama na koihna diingun, ahun main unaute chu na kawmva hung masa diingin hasot ngaiin ka ngaihtuah hi.
47009006	Hizongleh hichu ka soi ahi: Atheh tawm in a-at tawm diing a, atheh tam in a-at tam diing hi.
47009007	Phallou sasa a, ahihlouhleh piaahlouh theihlouha ngaia pelouin, mi chin in a lungtang a atup bangjeelin pia heh, ajiahchu Pathian in kiphaltaha petu chu alungsiat hi.
47009008	Huleh Pathian in hehpihna zousiah na tungvah ahung vuh thei hi, huchia nanguh bangchihlaipouha sil hoih zousiah a buchinga um zing a, nna hoih chinteng na toh theihna diingun.
47009009	“Ama’n ahawmjaah a, migentheite kawmah apia a, a dihtatna chu kumtuangin aum zing hi,” chih gelh bangin.
47009010	Huleh athehtupa kawma haichi petu leh neeh diinga tanghou hung pepa in, na haichi theh diing uh hung piain, apungsah diing a, huleh na dihtatna gahte uh akhangsah diing hi.
47009011	Na silphalna jiahun bangkim ah suhhauhsatin na umta va, hukhu ngeei in keiuh tungtawnin Pathian kawmah kipaahthu soina aumsah hi.
47009012	Ajiahchu hi natohna in misiangthoute taahsap awng ahuhsah chauh ahi sih a, Pathian kawma kipaahthu soina tamtah ah aluangleet hi.
47009013	Hi natohna suhchetna tungtawnin, Khrist tanchinpha na phuanna va na thumanna jiah uh leh amahuh leh mi zousiah tunga na kiphalna jiahun, amah un Pathian apaahtawi uhi.
47009014	Huleh amah un zong nanguh diinga ahung haamteisahna jiahun, nanguh a Pathian hehpihna loupitah um khu jiahin ahung ngai mahmah uhi.
47009015	A silthawnpiaah soiseeng guallouh jiahin Pathian kawmah kipaahthu um hen!
47010001	Huleh na lahva nunneem leh na um louhna va khauh kei, Paul in, Khrist nunneemna leh jaidamna in ka hung ngeen ahi.
47010002	Hizongleh tahsa daan banga gamta a keiuh hung ngaihtuah khenkhatte tunga khauh diing ahi chia ka ngaihtuah banga, na kawmva ka um chianga huchia ka khauh louhna diingin ka hung ngeen hi.
47010003	Ajiahchu tahsa in um mahleh ung, tahsa daan in ka dou sih uhi.
47010004	Ajiahchu ka gaaldouna gaalvan uh chu tahsa daan ahi sih a, kulhpi dettahte suhchimna diinga Pathian a silbawltheihna ahijaw hi.
47010005	Suangtuahnate leh Pathian heetna doudaala kisangkoihna chintengte ka supuuh va, ngaihtuahna chinteng Khrist thumanna suaahin ka pui uhi.
47010006	Huleh na thumanna uh suhbukim ahih chianga thumanglou zousiah gawt diingin kimansain ka um uhi.
47010007	Nang un sil apolama kilatdaan a en na hi viaimah? Mi koipouh in Khrist a hia amah leh amah akimuan a ahihleh, hichu ama’n ngaihtuah kiit heh, amah Khrist a ahih bangin keiuh zong Khrist a ka hi uhi.
47010008	Ajiahchu nanguh suhsiatna diing hilouin, khantouhna diing jawa Lalpa hung piaah ka thuneihna uh neukhat suang deuh zong leng, ka zum sih diing hi,
47010009	huchia lehkhathonte a nanguh hung suhlau tum banga ka kilat louhna diingin.
47010010	Ajiahchu amah un, “A lehkhathonte jaw agihin akhauh a, hizongleh amun ah tahsa a aumna ah ajawngkhaal a, a thusoi zong amuhsithuai hi,” achi uhi.
47010011	Huchibang mi in hikhu ngaihtuah heh, na kawmva ka umlouh laiva lehkha thugelh a ka hihna bangbang un, na kawmva ka um chiangun zong natoh ah ka hi diing uhi.
47010012	Ajiahchu keiuh chu amah leh amah kiphatte lahah ka kisimtel ngam sih va, amahuh toh teh zong ka kitehkaah ngam sih uhi. Hizongleh amahuh chu amahuh leh amahuh kitehtuahin, huleh amahuh leh amahuh akitehkaah va, heetsiamna beiin aum uhi.
47010013	Hizongleh keiuh chu ka tehna hun vaal un ka kisuang sih diing uhi, hizongleh Pathian hung guatsah, nanguh zong huap diinga tehna hu bangjeelin ka kisuang jaw diing uhi.
47010014	Ajiahchu nanguh kawm hung tungpha lou banga keiuh hung kigolhsau talua ka hi sih uhi; ajiahchu Khrist tanchinpha toh nanguh kawm tan ka hungta uhi.
47010015	Ka tehna vaal va kisuang hilouin, chih chu midangte tohsa a kisuang louin, hizongleh na ginna uh akhan dungjuiin na lahva ka kizatna bial uh nasatahin na hung keehletsah diing uh chih kinepna ka nei uhi,
47010016	huchia na gam kallam va tanchinpha ka soi theihna diingun, huleh midang bialsung a natohsa tunga ka kisuang louhna diingun.
47010017	Hizongleh, “Akisuang phot chu LALPA ah kisuang heh.”
47010018	Ajiahchu amah leh amah kisoipha chu pomin aum sih a, hizongleh Lalpa’n asoiphat mi chu pom ahijaw hi.
47011001	Ka ngol deuhna ah nang un na hung thuaah theih uh ka deih hi, huleh na hung thuaah thei ngeei uhi.
47011002	Ajiahchu Pathian thangsiatna in na tungvah ka thangsia hi. Ajiahchu Khrist kawma nungaah siangthou banga ka hung piaah theihna diingin na pasal diing uh khat ka hung hualsah hi.
47011003	Hizongleh guul in a doha zanga Evi aheem bangin, Khrist kawma na kipiaahna uh tahna leh sianthouna apat na lungsim uh suhsiatin aum kha diing chih ka lauthawng hi.
47011004	Ajiahchu koiaha khat ahung a ka soi louh uh Jesu dang asoi leh, ahihlouhleh na tan ngeilouh uh hagau dang na tan va, ahihlouhleh na tan ngeilouh uh tanchinpha dang na tanva ahihleh, na pom baih talua uh ahi!
47011005	Ajiahchu apostol lianpeente saanga nengtakhat a zong neujawin ka kingaihtuah sih hi.
47011006	Himahleh thusoi ah siam sih zong leng, heetna lamah chu ka huchi sih hi. Tahzetin huchu sil bangkim ah na lahvah ka sulangta uhi.
47011007	Na kawmva Pathian tanchinpha athawna ka soi jiaha, tawisanga na um theihna diingva ka kingaihngiamna ah sil bawlsual ka hiaimah?
47011008	Nanguh nna ka hung tohsah theihna diingin amahuh apat loh lain kouhtuam dangte chu a neih uh ka laahsah hi.
47011009	Huleh na kawmva ka um laia ka taahsapin koimah a diingin puaahgih ka hi sih hi, ajiahchu Makedonia gam apat hung unaute’n ka taahsap awng teng ahung huhsah uhi. Huleh sil bangkim ah nanguh puaahgih hilou diingin ka kibawl a, huchibangin ka kibawl jeel diing hi.
47011010	Khrist thutah keimah a aum bangin, Akaia gam sunga hi ka kisuanna chu koima’n ahung sutawp sih diing hi.
47011011	Bangjiahin? Nanguh ka hung lungsiat louh jiahin maw? Pathian in ahe hi!
47011012	Hizongleh a kisuanna silte va keiuh banga ngaiha aum theihna diingva hunlemtaang deihte apat hunlemtaang ka laahmang theihna diingin ka bawl chu ka bawl jeel diing hi.
47011013	Ajiahchu huchibang mite chu Khrist apostolte hia kibawlthuh, natongtu heemhaatte, apostol tahloute ahi uhi.
47011014	Huleh hichu alimdang sih hi, ajiahchu Setan ngeei zong vaah angel in akibawlthuh hi.
47011015	Huchihjiahin a natongtute zong dihtatna natongtute banga akibawlthuh uh leh, huchu sil limdang ahi sih hi. A tawpna uh chu a natoh bang dungjuiun ahi diing hi.
47011016	Ka soi kiit ahi, koima’n mingol in hung ngaihtuah sih heh. Ahihlouh vaanglah leh, keimah neukhat beeh ka kisuang theihna diingin mingol bangin hung pom un.
47011017	Ka thusoi chu Lalpa soi diing bangin ka soi sih a, hi kisahtheihna ah ngoltah bangin ka soi jaw hi.
47011018	Mi tampi tahsa lama akisuan jiahun kei zong ka kisuang diing hi.
47011019	Ajiahchu nanguh mipil na hi va, mi ngolte kipaahtahin na thuaah zou jeel uhi!
47011020	Ajiahchu mi khat in suaahin hung bawl leh, hung ne gam leh, amahuh lawhna diingin nanguh hung zang leh, amah leh amah kiliansah leh, na maai vah hung beeng leh, na thuaah zou jeel uhi.
47011021	Ka zumna diingin haatlou ka hi uh chiin ka soi ahi! Hizongleh mingol bangin ka soi ahi, midang hangsanna ah chu kei zong ka hangsan ahi.
47011022	Hebraimi ahi uh maw? Kei zong ka hi. Israelmi ahi uh maw? Kei zong ka hi. Abraham chihaahte ahi uh maw? Kei zong ka hi.
47011023	Khrist natongtute ahi uh maw? (Mingol bangin ka soi ahi.) Kei ka hi seem hi; tohgimna bang ah atamjaw seemin, vuaahna bang ah atuang avaalin, suangkul taanna bang ah mun seemin, sihna bang ah tampivei.
47011024	Judate lahah vuaahna sawmli chinna diing khat a sam ngaavei ka tuaah hi.
47011025	Thumvei chiangpum a jeepin ka um a, khatvei suang a sehin ka um a, thumvei kuang siatna ka tuaah a, jaan khat leh suun khat tuithuuh laiah ka um hi.
47011026	Khualzinna ah tampivei, tui tunga lauhuai ah, suamhaatte laha lauhuai ah, ka chipihte laha lauhuai ah, Jentelte laha lauhuai ah, khopi sung a lauhuai ah, gamdaai a lauhuai ah, tuilianpi a lauhuai ah, unau tahloute laha lauhuai ah,
47011027	tohgimna leh hahsatna ah, tampivei jaan ihmut louhna ah, gilkialna leh dangtaahna ah, tampivei an ngawlna ah, dap thuaahna leh saguaahna ah ka um hi.
47011028	Polam a hu silte chih louh zong kouhtuamte zousiah ka ngaihtuahna ni chin a hung net zing ka tungah aum hi.
47011029	Kua haatlouhna ka thuaahpih louh aum ei? Koi puuhna ka lungnatpih louh aum ei?
47011030	Kisuang diing mawng hitaleng, ka haatlouhna lam silte ka suang diing hi.
47011031	Pathian leh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pa, kumtuanga paahtawia um in ka juau sih chih ahe hi.
47011032	Damaska ah kumpipa Areta nuai a gamoptupa’n kei hung matsah tumin Damaskate khopi aveengsah hi.
47011033	Huleh kotta ah bawm in kulh pangah ahung khaikhesuh va, huchiin a khut apat ka suaahta hi.
47012001	Keiuh diingin kisuang phatuam sih mahzongleh, silmuh leh Lalpa kilaahna ka hung soi diing hi.
47012002	Kum sawmleli paita in Khrist a um mi khat ka he a, sapum in ahiai aum ka he sih a, sapumlou in ahiai aum ka he sih a, Pathian in ahe hi, huchibang mi khat vaan thumna tan ah laahtouhin aum hi.
47012003	Huleh huchibang mi khat chu ka he a, sapum in ahiai sapum louin ahiai aum ka he sih a, Pathian in ahe hi.
47012004	Amah chu Paradis ah laahtouhin aum a, soi guallouh thu avaja a, huchu mihing diinga soi phallouh ahi.
47012005	Huchibang mi chu ka suang diing hi; kei mah ka hihleh ka haatlouhna loungaal bangmah ka suang sih diing hi.
47012006	Ajiahchu kisuan uut mahleng, mingol ka hi sih diing hi, ajiahchu thutah soi diing ka hi ngaala. Hizongleh mi koiaha in ahung muhdaan bang leh ka thu ajaah bang saanga ahung ngaih loupi louhna diingin ka kideeh diing hi.
47012007	Huleh kilaahnate anasat beeh jaala ka kingaihsang taahluat louhna diingin Setan thupotu ahung sun diing ling khat ka tahsa ah ahung kipia hi, huchilou inchu ka kingaisang talua kha diing hi.
47012008	Kei apat achiahmangna diingin hi sil jiahin Lalpa kawmah thumvei ka ngeen hi.
47012009	Huleh Ama’n ka kawmah, “Ka hehpihna chu nang a diingin ahuntawh hi, ajiahchu ka haatna chu haatlouhna ah suhbukimin aum hi,” achi hi. Hujiahin Khrist silbawltheihna ka tunga aum theihna diingin, kipaahtahin ka haatlouhnate ka suang jaw diing hi.
47012010	Hujiahin haatlouhnate ah, housiatnate ah, taahsapnate ah, suhduhdahnate ah, hahsatnate ah Khrist jiahin ka lungkim hi. Ajiahchu ka haatlouh huntah chiangin ka haat hi.
47012011	Kisuangna in mingol ka hung suaahta a, nang un huchilou theilouin na hung bawl uhi. Ajiahchu na hung soiphat jawh diing uh ka hi, ajiahchu bangma hi sih zongleng, apostol lianpeente ka phaah lelhna bangma aum sih hi.
47012012	Tahzetin apostol hihna chiamchihnate chu kuhkalna chinteng in, chiamchihnate in, silmahte in, silbawl loupite in na lahvah bawl ahi.
47012013	Ajiahchu kei nanguh diinga puaahgih ka hihlouh chih louhngaal, bang lamah ahiai kouhtuam dangte saanga nuainungjaw a na um uh? Hi suhkhelhna hung ngaidam un!
47012014	Ngai un, na kawmva hung diinga ka kipeihna a thumveina ahita hi. Huleh nanguh diingin puaahgih ka hi sih diing hi, ajiahchu na sil neih uh hawl ka hi sih a, nanguh hung hawl ka hijaw hi. Ajiahchu tate’n nulepa a diinga akholkhawm diing uh ahi sih a, hizongleh nulepate’n tate diinga akholkhawm diing uh ahijaw hi.
47012015	Huleh ke’n nanguh ka hung lungsiat seem a, nang un na hung lungsiat louh seem vaangun, ke’n chu na hinna uh diingin kipaahtahin ka neih chu ka seeng diing a, ka kiseeng bei diing hi.
47012016	Hizongleh ahi hi hitaleh, nanguh puaahgih ka hung guan sih hi. Ahihvaangin lungsim siama doha a ka hung mat na hi uhi!
47012017	Na kawmva ka hung sawlte laha koiaha zangin, nanguh apat punna ka siam kha eimah?
47012018	Tita chu na kawmva hung diingin ka ngeen a, huleh amah toh unaupa khat ka hung sawl hi. Tita in amah lawhna diingin nanguh ahung zang mawleh? Hagau kibangin ka gamta khawm sih viaimah? Kalsuan kibanga chiah hilou ka hi viaimah?
47012019	Na lahva keiuh leh keiuh dihna thu kisoi a hung ngaihtuah na hi uh maw? Khrist ah Pathian ma ah thu ka soi uhi. Hizongleh deihtahte, sil zousiah chu nanguh bawlhoihna diingin ka bawl uhi.
47012020	Ajiahchu ka hung chianga nanguh ka hung muh diing banga ka hung muhlouh khaah diing leh kei na hung muhlouh diing bangva na hung muhkhaah diing uh ka lau hi; huchilou inchu kinialnate, kithangsiatnate, thangtawmnate, kikhinnate, kisoisiatnate, kiguuhhounate, uanghaamnate leh buainate ahung um kha diing hi;
47012021	huchilou inchu, ka hung kiit chiangin ka Pathian in na lahva ahung sumualphou diing a, huleh tuma a anatasual a himahleh a sianglouhna uh leh a kingaih thaanghuaina uh leh a huuhna silchiinte vapat kisiihlou mi tampite ka lungngaihkhum kha diing hi.
47013001	Hichu na kawmva ka hung a thumveina diing ahi. “Heetpihtu nih ahihlouhleh thum kam ah thu chinteng suhchetin aum diing hi.”
47013002	Tumain na kawmva ka um anihveina laiin ka soita a, huleh tuin umlou hizongleng malaia sil anabawlsualte leh midang zousiah kawmah ka hung gial ahi, huchia ka hung kiitin chu koima ka hawi sih diing hi,
47013003	nang un keimah a thusoi Khrist heetchianna na hawl jiahun, Amah chu nanguh lamah haatlou ahi sih a, hizongleh na lahvah silbawltheitah ahijaw hi.
47013004	Ajiahchu haatlouhna jiahin kilhbehin um mahleh, Pathian silbawltheihna in ahing zing ahi. Ajiahchu keiuh zong Amah ah haatlou ka hi va, hizongleh Pathian silbawltheihna in nanguh lamah Amah toh ka hingkhawm diing uhi.
47013005	Ginna ah na umna viai mah nanguh leh nanguh kienkhia unla, nanguh mimal kienchian un. Ahihlouhleh nanguh leh nang un Jesu Khrist nanguh ah aum chih kiheet lou na hi viaimah?– etkhiahna a chingzoulou tahzet na hih louhngaal uh leh.
47013006	Hizongleh keiuh chu etkhiahna a chinglou ka hi sih uh chih na he diing uh chih ka kineem hi.
47013007	Huleh silgilou na bawllouhna diingun Pathian kawmah ka ngeen hi, huchu keiuh etkhiahna a chinga ka kilat theihna diing uh ahi sih a, etkhiahna ah keiuh chinglou bangin kilang mahleh ung, a dih na bawl theihna diing uh ahijaw hi.
47013008	Ajiahchu thutah a diinga bawl chihlouh chu thutah kalhin bangma ka bawl thei sih uhi.
47013009	Ajiahchu keiuh ka haatlouh va nanguh na haat chiangun ka kipaah uhi. Huleh na hoih bukimna diingun zong ka ngeen hi.
47013010	Hujiahin suse diing hilou a, bawlhoihna diing jaw a Lalpa hung piaah thuneihna dungjuiin na kawmva ka um chianga khauhtaha ka hung bawl louhna diingin, na kawmva ka umlouh laiin hi silte ka hung gial ahi.
47013011	Atawppeenin, unaute, kipaahtahin um un. Hoihbukimin um un. Hamuangtahin um unla, lungsim mun khat pua unla, kituaahtahin um un; huleh lungsiatna leh hamuanna Pathian na kawmvah aum diing hi.
47013012	Kitawpna siangthou in khat leh khat chibai kibuuh un.
47013013	Misiangthoute zousiah in nanguh chibai ahung buuh uhi.
47013014	Lalpa Jesu Khrist hehpihna leh Pathian lungsiatna leh Hagau Siangthou kipawlpihna na bawnva kawmah umta hen. Amen.
48001001	Paul, apostol in (mihing apat hilou, mihing vaanga zong hilou, hizongleh Jesu Khrist leh misi lah apat a Amah kaithoutu Pa Pathian vaanga hijaw in),
48001002	huleh ka umpih unau zousiahte’n, Galatia gam a kouhtuamte kawmah:
48001003	Pa Pathian leh i Lalpa Jesu Khrist kawm apat hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen,
48001004	Pathian leh i Pa uh deihdaan dungjuiin tulai hun giloutah lah apat ahung suahtaatsah theihna diingin Amah chu i sualnate uh luangin akipeta hi.
48001005	Pathian kawmah loupina kumtuang kumtuangin um zingta hen. Amen.
48001006	Khrist hehpihna a nanguh hung koupa apat tanchinpha tuam a kintaha na kituan mei uh chu thumah ka sa hi,
48001007	huchu tanchinpha dang ahi sih; himahleh nanguh hung subuai leh Khrist tanchinpha ahilou jawnga hei uut mi hunkhop aum uhi.
48001008	Hizongleh keiuh hiin, vaan apat angel hitaleh, tanchinpha na kawmva ka soi uh loungaal tanchinpha dang mawngmawng na kawmva ahung soi aum leh, haamselohin um heh.
48001009	Tuma a ka soi mahbangun tuin zong ka soi jeel ahi, tanchinpha na muhsa peen uh loungaal tanchinpha dang mi koipouhin na kawmva ahung soi leh, haamselohin um heh.
48001010	Ajiahchu ke’n tuin mihing kipaahsah ahiai ka hawl, ahihlouhleh Pathian kipaahsah ahiai ka hawl? Ahihlouhleh mihing suhlungkim tum ka hiaimah? Mihing suhlungkim tum nalai hitaleng, Khrist suaah ka hi sih diing hi.
48001011	Hizongleh unaute, ka tanchinpha soi chu mihing deihdaan ahi sih chih ka hung hesah hi.
48001012	Ajiahchu mihing apat ka muh zong ahi sih a, mi hung hilh zong ka hi sih a, hizongleh Jesu Khrist hung kilaahna jiaha ka muh ahijaw hi.
48001013	Ajiahchu bangtobanga Pathian kouhtuamte tehguallouha suduhdah a, ka suhbei veh tum daan tuma a Juda sahkhua a ka umlaiin ka tungtaang na jata uhi.
48001014	Huleh ka pulepate tawndaan a phatuam ka ngaih diaahkhol jiahin Juda sahkhua lamah zong ka chipihte laha ka khangual tampi ka na khuup hi.
48001015	Hizongleh ka nu gil sunga ka umlai apat hung koihtuamtu leh a hehpihna a hung koutu Pathian in,
48001016	Jentelte laha a tanchinpha ka soi theihna diinga a Tapa chu keimah a kilaahsah pha asah tahin; hulaiin mihing koima ka dong pah sih a,
48001017	Jerusalem a kei saanga apostol hi masate kawmah zong ka chiahtou sih a, hizongleh Arabia gam ah ka chiah jaw a, huin Damaska ah ka kilehkiitta hi.
48001018	Huin kum thum nungin Jerusalem ah Peter kimuhpih diingin ka chiahtou a, a kawmah ni sawmlengaa ka vaum hi.
48001019	Hizongleh Lalpa sanggampa Jakob chihlouh apostol dangte khatbeeh ka mu sih hi.
48001020	(Tua na kawmva ka thu gelhte, tahzetin, Pathian ma ah ka juau sih hi.)
48001021	Hu nungin Syria gamkaih leh Silisia gam ah ka chiahta hi.
48001022	Huleh Judia gam a Khrist a um kouhtuamte meelheetlouhin ka na um nalai hi.
48001023	Hizongleh, “Tuma a eiuh hung suduhdahpa’n khatvei laia asuhmang sawm ginna tanchinpha chu tuin ataangkoupihta,” chih thu chauh aja uhi.
48001024	Huleh amah un keimah jiahin Pathian apaahtawita uhi.
48002001	Huin kum sawmleli nungin Barnaba toh Jerusalem ah ka chiahtou kiit a, Tita zong ka pui hi.
48002002	Huleh kilaahna jiahin ka chiah tou a, Jentelte kawma ka tanchinpha soi chu a kawmvah ka hesah hi, hizongleh mi zahumte chu atuamin ka hilhchian a, huchilou inchu bangchi aha in athawna taai ka hi kha diing hi.
48002003	Hizongleh ka tonpih Tita chu Grikmi ahihvaangin zehtansah teeiteeiin aum sih hi.
48002004	Hi zehtanna thu ahung um jiah chu suaaha ahung taansah theihna diing va, Khrist Jesu a jaleenna i neih uh enkhe diinga guuhsima hung luut unau tahloute jiah ahi.
48002005	Tanchinpha thutah chu na kawmva aum zing theihna diingin daahkaal khat sung jiang zong a thu nuai va kipeluut lou ka hi uhi.
48002006	Hizongleh mizahumte chu bangtobang hitaleh uh kei diingin aphatuam sih; Pathian in koimah deihsah tuam anei sih, ajiahchu mi zahumte’n bangma ahung behlapsah tuan sih uhi.
48002007	Hizongleh huchih naah saangin, zehtante diing tanchinpha Peter kawma kepsaha aum bangin zehtanlouhte diing tanchinpha chu ka kawmah kepsahin aum chih ahe uhi.
48002008	(Ajiahchu zehtante apostol hi diinga Peter a sil nasataha bawltu ngeei in, Jentelte apostol hi diingin keimah ah sil nasatahin abawl a),
48002009	khuam chiha heet Jakob, Kepha leh Johan in ka kawma hehpihna hung kipia aheet phetun, Jentelte kawma chiah diingin kei leh Barnaba chu kipawlkhawmna khut jiatlam ahung pia uhi, huleh amahuh zehtante kawma chiah diingin.
48002010	Amah un migentheite ka heetzing diing uh chauh adeih va, huchu ke’n zong bawl ka tup zing mawng ahi.
48002011	Hizongleh Antiok a Peter ahung tun tahin amah chu dem abaang jiahin a maaitang ah ka na nial hi.
48002012	Ajiahchu Jakob kawm apat mi koite aha ahung maun, ama’n Jentelte kawmah an ane veu hi; hizongleh amahuh ahung tahun zehtante alauh jiahin anungtawl a, aumtuamta hi.
48002013	Huleh Judami dangteng zong huchibangin amah toh alepchiah va, huchiin Barnaba nasan zong a lepchiahna va puimangin aumta hi.
48002014	Hizongleh tanchinpha thutah dungjuiin aum sih uh chih ka muhin, a bawnva ma ah, Peter kawmah, “Nang Judami hinapi a, Judate um banga umlou a, Jentelte um banga na um ngaal leh, bang diinga Jentelte khu Judamite um banga umsah tum haam na hiaimah?
48002015	“Jentel misualte hilou a, keiuh pianken a Judami mawnga piangte in,
48002016	daan thute bawl jiahin mi siamtangin aum sih a, hizongleh Jesu Khrist gintaat jiah chauhin siamtangin aum chih ka he va, kei un zong daan silbawl jiah hilouin, Khrist ginna jiaha siamtanga ka um theihna diingin Khrist Jesu chu ka gingta uhi; ajiahchu daan juih jiahin koimah siamtangin aum sih diing hi.
48002017	“Hizongleh Khrist a siamtan ka sawm lai ngeei va zong misualte ka na hih uh leh, Khrist chu sualna natongtu ahiaimah? Hilou hial!
48002018	Ajiahchu keima’n ka sil suhsiatte bawlpha kiitta leng, kei leh kei daan botsetu a kisiam ka hi diing hi.
48002019	Ajiahchu Pathian lama ka hin theihna diingin, kei chu daan jiahin daan lamah ka sita hi.
48002020	Khrist toh kilhbehin ka umta a, keimah hing hi nawn louin, hizongleh Khrist keimah ah ahing ahijaw hi; huleh tua tahsa a ka hin chu ahung lungsiat a ka luanga kipepa, Pathian Tapa a ginna a hing ka hi.
48002021	Pathian hehpihna chu bangmalou ka suaahsah sih; ajiahchu daan jiaha siamtanna hung kuan ahihin chu, Khrist chu athawna si ahi diing hi,” ka chi hi.
48003001	Galatia mingolte aw, na lahva na mitmuh ngeeiva Jesu Khrist chu kilhbeha chiantaha suhlat hita a, hu thutah chu muanglou diinga koi in hung bumngol ahita ei?
48003002	Na lahva kipan hi chauh ka he nuam hi: daan thute bawl jiahin ahiai Hagau chu na muh uh, ahihlouhleh ginna thu na jaahva na gintaat jiahun?
48003003	Hichilawmin na ngol uh ahi maw? Hagau a pan zoutain, tahsa a suhbukim hi diing na hi uh maw?
48003004	Athawn ahih tahtah leh, sil huzahpi athawna thuaah na hi uh maw?
48003005	Huchiin daan na juih jiahva Pathian in Hagau hung pia a, na lahva silmah bawl ahi maw, ahihlouhleh na thujaah uh na gintaat jiahun?
48003006	“Abraham in Pathian agingta a, huchu amah diinga dihtatna a sehsah” ahih bangin.
48003007	Hujiahin ginna a umte chauh Abraham tate ahi uh chih he un.
48003008	Huleh Pathian Lehkhathu in, ginna jiahin Pathian in Jentelte siam atangsah diing chih helawhin, Abraham kawmah, “Nangmah ah nam zousiah vangpiaahin aum diing uh,” chiin tanchinpha anasoita hi.
48003009	Huchi ahih jiahin ginna a umte chu gingtu Abraham toh vangpiaah khawmin aum uhi.
48003010	Ajiahchu daan silbawlte a um photmahte chu haamse nuaia um ahi uh; ajiahchu hichibanga gelh ahi, “Daan bu a bawl diinga kigial zousiah juizing lou chu haamsiatin aum uhi,” chiin.
48003011	Hizongleh Pathian mitmuh ah koimah daan jaala siamtang aum sih uh chih alang chian hi, ajiahchu, “Midihtat chu ginna in ahing diing,” chih ahi.
48003012	Huleh daan thu chu ginna jiahin ahi sih a, hizongleh, “Huchibanga bawltu chu hute ah ahing diing hi,” chih ahijaw hi.
48003013	Khrist chu ei luanga haamsiat-a hung umin, daan thu haamsiatna apatin eite ahung tandohta hi, ajiahchu hichibanga gelh ahi, “Singdawn a khailup photmah chu haamse thuaah ahi uh,” chiin,
48003014	huchia Abraham vangpiaahna chu Jesu Khrist jaala Jentelte tunga ahung um theih a, huchia eihaw in Hagau chiam chu ginna tungtawna i muh theihna diingun.
48003015	Unaute, mihing daan in ka soi ahi: Hichu mihing thuhun chauh hitamahleh, suhkip ahihin chu, koima’n aphel ngei sih a, beh zong abehlap ngei sih hi.
48003016	Huleh Abraham leh a chihaah kawmah thuchiamte chu anakipia hi. Ama’n tampite soina in, “Chihaahte kawmah,” achi sih a, mi khat tungthu soina in, “Na chihaah kawmah,” achi jaw hi, huchu Khrist ahi.
48003017	Huleh hichu ka soi ahi, Pathian in Khrist a asuhkipsa thuhun chu kum za li leh kum sawmthum nunga hung um daan thu in thuchiam chu bangmalou suaah diingin asumang thei sih hi.
48003018	Gouluah diing chu daan thu jiah hitaleh, thuchiam jiah ahita sih diing hi, hizongleh Pathian in thuchiam jiahin huchu Abraham anapeta hi.
48003019	Ahihleh bang diinga daan thu um ahiai leh? Hichu thuchiam kipiaahnate kawma Chihaah ahung masiah in bohsiatna jiahin behlapsahin aum hi, huleh hichu angelte zanga palai khat khut a suhkip ahi.
48003020	Huleh palai chu langkhat chauh luanga palai ahi sih a, hizongleh Pathian chu khat ahi.
48003021	Ahihleh daan thu chu Pathian thuchiamte kalh ahiaimah? Hilou hial! Hinna pethei daan thu anakipia hitaleh, dihtatna chu daan thu jiahin aum ngeei diing hi.
48003022	Hizongleh Jesu Khrist gin jiaha thuchiam chu a gingtate akipiaah theihna diingin, Pathian Lehkhathu in mi zousiah chu sualna nuaiah akhaahkhumta hi.
48003023	Hizongleh ginna ahung tun main daan thu nuaia kolin i na um va, ahung kiphuanglang diing ginna ah khaahkhumin i naum uhi.
48003024	Huchiin ginna jiaha siam i tan theihna diingin daan thu chu Khrist kawma hung puitu diing eiuh hung hilhtu ahung hita hi.
48003025	Hizongleh ginna ahung tun nungin hilhtupa nuaiah i um nawnta sih uhi.
48003026	Ajiahchu na bawnun Khrist Jesu ginna jiahin Pathian tate na hi uhi.
48003027	Ajiahchu Khrist a baptisma tang photmah chu Khrist a kithuam na hita uhi.
48003028	Hu ah chu Judami, Grikmi aum nawn sih a, saltaang leh jaleen zong aum nawn sih, huleh numei leh pasal zong aum nawn sih hi; ajiahchu na bawnun Khrist Jesu ah pumkhat na hita uhi.
48003029	Huleh Khrist a na hih un chu, Abraham chihaah, thuchiam dungjui a gouluah diingte na hi uhi.
48004001	Huleh hichiin ka chi hi, gouluahtu diing chu bangkim neitu hizongleh naupang ahih laisiah, suaah toh kilimdanna anei tuan sih hi.
48004002	Hizongleh a pa hun guat atun masiahin a dontute leh a enkoltute nuaiah aum jaw hi.
48004003	Huchibangmahin ei zong naupang i hih laiun khovel lam kithuhilhna meimeite nuaiah suaahin i naum uhi.

48004005	daan nuaia umte tankhe diingin, huchia ta a pomna i tan theihna diingun.
48004006	Huleh tate na hih jiahun Pathian in a Tapa Hagau chu “Abba, Pa,” chia kikouin na lungtang sungvah ahung sawlta hi.
48004007	Hujiahin suaah na hi nawn sih a, ta na hijawta hi; huleh ta na hih leh, Khrist jaala Pathian gouluahtu diing zong nahi hi.
48004008	Huchi hitamahleh, hu hun laiin Pathian na heet maun, a pianken mawng va pathian hiloute nna nana tong uhi.

48004010	Nite, hate, hunte leh kumte na tang veu uhi.
48004011	Bangchi ahain na tungvah ka tonggim thawn kha diing chih ka hung lausah hi.
48004012	Unaute, ka hung ngeen hi, keimah bangin um un, ajiahchu kei zong nanguh bangin ka um hi. Dihlouin na hung bawl kha het sih uhi.

48004015	Ahihleh hampha na kisahna uh khoia um ahita ei? Ajiahchu hithei hileh bawn, na mit uh kheidohin na hung pe hial diing uh chih heetpihna ka hung nei hi.
48004016	Huchia thutah ka hung hilh jiahin na meelma uh hung hita ka hiaimah?
48004017	Amah un phatuamngaitahin nanguh ahung hawl va, hizongleh hoihna diingun ahi sih hi; nang un amahuh na hawl theihna diingva hung koihtuam tum ahijaw uhi.
48004018	Hizongleh bangchihtanin ahoih lama phatuamngaitaha hawla um zing chu ahoih hi, na kawmva ka um sung chauh hilouin.
48004019	Ka taneute aw, nanguh a Khrist siampichinga aum masiah nausuaah nat thuaahin ka hung thuaah kiit hi.
48004020	Tuin na kawmva um a, ka aw suah suhlimdang ka uut ngeei mei; ajiahchu na tung thu uh ka hung lauthawngpih hi.
48004021	Hung hilh un, nanguh daan nuaia um uutte, daan thu ngaikhe lou na hi viaimah?
48004022	Ajiahchu hichibanga gelh ahi, Abraham in tapa nih anei a: khat chu a suaahnu toh ahi a, huleh khatpeen chu a suaahlounu toh ahi.
48004023	Hizongleh suaahnu toh peen chu tahsa daan a piang ahi a, suaahlounu toh peen chu thuchiam jiaha piang ahi a,
48004024	hichu tehkhinna ahi. Ajiahchu hi numei nihte chu thuhun nihte ahi uh: khat chu Sinai Taang apat sala taang diinga ta neinu ahi a, huchu Hagar ahi.
48004025	Ajiahchu Hagar chu Arabia gam a Sinai Taang ahi a, tulaia um Jerusalem toh kibang ahi a, huleh a tate toh sala taang khawm ahi uhi.
48004026	Hizongleh tunglam Jerusalem chu ajaleen a, huchu i bawnva nu ahi.
48004027	Ajiahchu hichibanga gelh ahi, “Nang, ta neiloua chiingnu, nuam in, nang nausuaah nat thuaahlou nu, ngaihtahin kikou doh in, ajiahchu pasal neinu saangin lungjuang nu in ta anei tamjaw hi.”
48004028	Huchiin unaute, eiuh chu Isak banga thuchiam tate i hi uhi.
48004029	Hizongleh hulaia tahsa daan a piang in Hagau daan a piang asuhduhdah bangin, tuin zong huchi ahi.
48004030	Ahihvaangin Pathian Lehkhathu in bang ahiai asoi? “Suaahnu chu a tapa toh delhmang un, ajiahchu suaahnu tapa in suaahlounu tapa toh gou aluahkhawm sih diing hi,” achi hi.
48004031	Huchiin unaute, suaahnu tate i hi sih a, suaahlounu tate i hijaw uhi.
48005001	Hujiahin jaleen diinga Khrist in ahung jaleensahta na ah dingkip unla, huleh suaah ngawngkol ah taang kiit nawn sih un.
48005002	Ngai un, zeh na tan uh leh, Khrist chu nanguh diinga bangma phatuam lou ahi diing, chiin kei Paul in na kawmvah ka soi ahi.
48005003	Ajiahchu zehtan zousiah kawmah daan thu zousiah jui diinga bat nei ahi uh, chih ka hesahkiit hi.
48005004	Nanguh daan a siamtan tum pouhmahte, Khrist toh khenin na umta uh; hehpihna apat na puuhta uhi.
48005005	Ajiahchu kei un Hagau jaalin ginna a dihtatna kinepna chu kilawptahin ka ngaah uhi.
48005006	Ajiahchu Jesu Khrist ah zehtan leh zehtan louhin bangmah phattuamna anei sih a, hizongleh lungsiatna jiaha ginna natoh chu aphatuam hi.
48005007	Hoihtahin na taai uhi. Thutah jui lou diingin koi in ahiai nanguh ahung daal?
48005008	Hi phuutna chu nanguh hung koupa apat ahi sih hi.
48005009	Tol tawmtakhat in tanghou beupi ajeelsuaah hi.
48005010	Nang un lungdang na geel sih diing uh chih Lalpa ah ka hung muang hi; hizongleh nanguh hung subuaitu in, koi hitazongleh, atunga vaihawmna chu athuaah diing hi.
48005011	Huleh unaute, ke’n zehtan thu soi nalai ka hih leh, bang diinga suhduhdahna thuaah nalai ka hiai? Huchi ahihleh kros a kipalpuuhna chu suhbei ahita diing hi.
48005012	Nanguh hung subuaite kisaatkhe hial mei leh uh ka uut hi!
48005013	Ajiahchu unaute, jaleen diinga kouh na hi uh; na jaleenna uh tahsa uutna diinga lemtaanna in zang sih unla, hizongleh lungsiatna in khat leh khat nna kitohsah jaw un.
48005014	Ajiahchu, “Nangmah na kilungsiat banga na innveengte na lungsiat diing ahi,” chih thupiaah khat ah daan thu zousiah suhbukimin aum hi.
48005015	Hizongleh na kikeih va, na kineeh tuah uh leh, pilvaang un, huchilou inchu khat leh khat na kisuhmang tuah kha diing uhi!
48005016	Huleh hi ka soi ahi, Hagau ah um un, huchiin tahsa uutna na supiching sih diing uhi.
48005017	Ajiahchu tahsa uutna in Hagau adou a, Hagau in tahsa adou hi; sil na bawltumte uh na bawl theihlouhna diingun, hite chu akikalh tuah uh ahi.
48005018	Hizongleh Hagau puia na um un chu, daan nuaia um na hi sih uhi.
48005019	Huleh tahsa uutna silbawlte chu akilang chiang hi: hute chu, aangkawmna, kingaihna thaanghuai, thaanghuaina, huuhna kihdah huai,
48005020	milem biahna, dawi aisaanna, muhdahna, kihauna, thangsiatna, thangtawmna, mahni masialna, kikhenna, ginna dihloute,
48005021	deihgohna, tualthahna, zukhamna, eltol gualnop bawlna leh huchibang dang dangte ahi. Huchibang silbawltute’n Pathian lalgam aluah sih diing uh, chih tuma a ka hung hilhtaah bangmahin, ka hung hilh khawl hi.
48005022	Hizongleh Hagau gah ahihleh lungsiatna, kipaahna, hamuanna, thuaahtheihna, jaineemna, hoihna, ginumna,
48005023	thunuaigolhna leh kisuumtheihna ahi. Hichibangte kalhin daan aum sih hi.
48005024	Huleh Khrist a hi mite’n tahsa chu a lunggulhna leh a uutna toh akilhbehta uhi.
48005025	Hagau a hing i hih leh, Hagau mah ah i um diing uhi.
48005026	Khat leh khat kilang leh kithangsiat a um louin, i kiloupisah sih diing uhi.
48006001	Unaute, mi koiaha a suhkhelhna a matdoha aum leh, nanguh hagau mite’n nanguh ngeei in zong heemna na tuaah kha diing chih ngaihtuahin, huchibang mi chu jaineemna lungsim neitahin tungding kiit un.
48006002	Khat leh khat na puaahgih uh kidawn chiat unla, huchiin Khrist daan juikim un.
48006003	Ajiahchu mi bangma hiloupi-a amah leh amah akingaihsang leh, amah leh amah akiheem ahi.
48006004	Hizongleh mi chin in amah natoh kietchian chiat jaw hen, huchiin midang tung hilouin, amah chauh tungah suan diing anei diing hi.
48006005	Ajiahchu mi chin in amah puaah chiat akipuaah diing hi.
48006006	Thu hilha umpa’n ahilhtu kawmah sil hoih zousiah hawm heh.
48006007	Heemin um sih un, Pathian chu muhsit gual ahi sih hi; ajiahchu mi’n atuh phot uh, humah chu a-at kiit diing uhi.
48006008	Ajiahchu tahsa lama tuhpa’n tahsa lam apat siatna a-at diing a, hizongleh Hagau a tuhpa’n chu Hagau apat kumtuang hinna a-at diing hi.
48006009	Huleh sil hoih bawl i chimtaah sih diing uh, ajiahchu i lungkiaah louh leh, ahuntahin i aat diing uhi.
48006010	Hujiahin hun lemtaang i neih bangjeelin mi zousiah kawmah sil hoih i bawl diing uh, adiaahkholin ginna a i innkuanpihte kawmah i bawl diing uhi.
48006011	Keimah khut ngeei a na kawmva jeem gol pipi a lehkha ka hung gelh en un.
48006012	Tahsa a kilat hoih tum photmahte’n zehtan diingin nanguh ahung sawl teeiteei uhi; huchia Khrist kros jiaha suhduhdahna athuaah louhna diing jiah chauhun ahi.
48006013	Ajiahchu amahuh zehtante nasan in zong daan ajui tuan sih va, hizongleh na tahsa va suan diing aneih theihna diingun zeh tan leh uh chin chih adeih uh ahijaw hi.
48006014	Hizongleh ke’n chu i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist kros loungaal ka suang het sih diing hi, Amah jiahin khovel kei diingin kilhbeh ahita a, huleh kei khovel diingin kilhbeh ka hita hi.
48006015	Ajiahchu Khrist Jesu ah chu siamthahna loungaal, zehtan leh zehtanlouh zong, bangmah aphatuam sih hi.
48006016	Huleh hi daan banga umte zousiah tungah hamuanna leh khotuahna um hen, huleh Pathian Israelte tungah zong.
48006017	Tua kipanin koima’n hung subuai nawn sih heh, ajiahchu ka tahsa ah Lalpa Jesu chiamtehnate ka pua hi.
48006018	Unaute, i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist hehpihna na hagau uh kawmah um hen. Amen.
49001001	Paul, Pathian deihjawng a Jesu Khrist apostol in, Ephesi khua a um misiangthoute leh Khrist Jesu a mi ginumte kawmah:
49001002	Pathian i Pa uh leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist kawm akipan hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen.
49001003	Vaan munte a Khrist a hagaulam vangpiaahna chinteng a vaang hung pepa i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pathian leh Pa chu phatin um hen.
49001004	Ama’n a ma a siangthou leh soiseelbeia i um theihna diinga leilung siam ma a lungsiatna a Khrist a ahung na teel dungjui in,
49001005	Amah hung deihsahna hoih deihjawng dungjuiin Amah a diingin Jesu Khrist tungtawna ta a eite hung bawl diingin ahung na guatlawhta hi,
49001006	a hehpihna loupidaan paahtawi diingin, hu hehpihna chu alungsiat mahmahpa ah athawnin ahung peta hi.
49001007	A hehpihna hauhdaan dungjuiin a sisan jaalin Amah ah tatkhiahna, i sualnate ngaihdamna i nei uhi,
49001008	hu hehpihna chu Ama’n pilna leh lemheetna zousiah ah eite tungah akiningchingsah a,
49001009	Ama’n ahung deihsahna hoih dungjuia Amah a bawl atup bangin a deihjawng thukiphual i kawmah ahung hesah hi,
49001010	huchia hunbi khenna kim ahung tun chianga vaan a sil umte leh leitung a sil umte Amah ah, a bawna Khrist a khat a asuhtuahkhawm theihna diingin.
49001011	Amah deihjawng lemguatna dungjui a sil zousiah bawlpa tup banga guatlawhsa i hihtaah jiahun, Amah ah gouluahtute zong i hita uhi,
49001012	huchia eiuh Khrist a anakineem masate chu a loupina paahtawina i hih theihna diingun.
49001013	Thutah thu, na hutdamna tanchinpha uh na ngaihkhiah nungun Amah ging zong na gingtata va; Amah na gingtaat nungun chiamna Hagau Siangthou a chiamchih na hita uhi,
49001014	Hagau Siangthou chu Pathian loupina paahtawina diinga gou leisa tatkhiahna hun masiah a diinga i gouluah diing uh khaamna ahi.
49001015	Hujiahin ke’n zong Lalpa Jesu a na ginna uh leh misiangthoute zousiah tunga na lungsiatna uh ka na jaahin,
49001016	ka haamteinate ah na min uh louin, nanguh jiaha kipaahthu soi ka tawp sih hi,
49001017	huchia i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pathian, loupina Pa in Amah heetna lam thu a pilna leh thuphuandohna hagau nanguh ahung piaah theihna diingin.
49001018	A kouhna kinepna bang ahiai chih leh misiangthoute a a goutan loupina hauhjia bang ahiai chih na heet theihna diingun, na lungsim mitte uh suhvaaha ahung um theihna diingin ka haamtei hi,
49001019	huleh a silbawltheihna haatna natoh dungjuia ei agingtate lama a silbawltheihna nasat daan bang ahiai na hung heet theihna diingun,
49001020	hu silbawltheihna chu Ama’n misi lah apat a Khrist akaihthoh a huleh vaan munte a a jiatlam a atousah laiin Khrist tungah azangta hi,
49001021	hi khovel chauh hilouin, khovel hung tung diing ah zong- lalnate, thuneihnate, silbawltheihnate, vaihawmnate leh min kiphuaah zousiah tunglam peh a Khrist atousah laiin azangta hi.
49001022	Huleh sil zousiah a keeng nuaiah Pathian in akoihta a, Amah chu sil zousiah tunga lutang hi diingin kouhtuam kawmah apeta hi,
49001023	hu kouhtuam chu a sapum ahi, Amah bangkim zousiah sudimpa taangchinna ngeei chu.
49002001	Huleh nanguh na bohsiatna uh leh na sualna vah na sita va,
49002002	hutah ah chu tuma laiin hi khovel daan bangin na um va, huihkhua a thuneitu lal, tua thumanglou tate a tong zingtu hagau daan bangin na um uhi.
49002003	Hute lahah eiuh zong tuma laiin i tahsa uutna ah, i tahsa leh i lungsim deihjawng supichingin i um va, huleh midangte banga pianken mawnga thangtawmna tate i na hi uhi.
49002004	Hizongleh Pathian khotuahna haupa’n, a lungsiatna nasatah a eite ahung lungsiatna jiahin,
49002005	sual a si i hih lai ngeeiun zong Khrist toh ahung suhing khawmta a (hehpihna a hutdam na hi uhi),
49002006	huleh Amah toh ahung kaithou khawmta a, vaan munte ah Khrist Jesu ah ahung toukhawmsahta hi,
49002007	huchia hun hung tung diingte ah Khrist Jesu jaala i tunga a chitna a a hehpihna hauh nasatdaan ahung etsah theihna diingin.
49002008	Ajiahchu hehpihna jiaha ginna jaala hutdam na hi uh, hu zong nanguh a suaah ahi sih; Pathian silthawnpiaah ahi,
49002009	natoh jiahin ahi sih, huchilou inchu mi’n asuang kha diing uhi.
49002010	Ajiahchu Pathian in malai peha i umna diinga anaguatkholh Khrist Jesu a nna hoih tong diinga siam, Amah khutsuaah i hi uhi.
49002011	Hujiahin nanguh tuma lam a, tahsa a Jentelte, tahsa khut a tan Zehtan achihte un Zehtanlouh ahung chihte uh,
49002012	huchih laia Khrist neiloua Israel khua leh tui toh kimat lou a, khovel a kinepna bei leh Pathian neiloua na um va, chiamna thuhunte laha mikhual a ana-um na hi uh chih hezing un.
49002013	Hizongleh tuin chu Khrist Jesu ah, nanguh ni danga gamlapi a umte, Khrist sisan jaalin suhnaiin na umta uhi.
49002014	Ajiahchu Amah hi i kilemna uh ahi a, i kikaal a kidaaidanna baang chu suchimin, nihte chu pumkhatin asiamta hi.
49002015	Ei mihing pawl nihte apat mihing thah khat Amah ngeei a asiam theihna diingin, kimeelmaatna umsahtu daan, a sung a thupiaahte leh thusehte zousiah a tahsa a sumangin, kilemna abawlta hi,
49002016	huleh huchia Ama’n anih va kros tungtawna sapum khat a Pathian toh akilepsah theih a, humah a kimeelmaatna chu asuhlup theihna diingin.
49002017	Huleh Amah chu hungin, nanguh gamlapi a umte leh naitakhat a umte kawmah zong lemna tanchinpha ahung soi hi.
49002018	Ajiahchu Amah jiahin eihaw in Hagau khat a Pa kawma luut theihna i nei tuaah uhi.
49002019	Hujiahin tuin chu mikhual leh gamdangmi na hi nawn sih va, hizongleh misiangthoute toh khualetui hihna neite leh Pathian innkuante na hijawta uhi,
49002020	huleh Jesu Khrist ngeei chu aning a suang poimohpeen hiin, apostolte leh zawlneite innbul phuh tunga lam na hi uhi.
49002021	Amah ah chu inn pumpi kituaahtaha suhtuaha umin, Lalpa ah biahinn siangthou in akhangtou a,
49002022	Amah ah nanguh zong Hagau a Pathian teenna diinga lepkhawm na hi uhi.
49003001	Hikhu jiahin kei, Paul, nanguh Jentelte diinga Jesu Khrist suangkul taang in,
49003002	nanguh diinga Pathian hehpihna keem diinga mohpuaahna piaah ka hi chih na jaahtaah ngeei uh leh,
49003003	huchu tuma a tomtakhat a ka gelh bangin thukiphual chu ka kawma Ama’n thuphuandoh tungtawna ahung heetsahtaah daan ahi a,

49003005	huchu tulaia apostol siangthoute leh zawlneite kawma Hagau a heetsaha aum bangin, nidanglaiin mihing tate kawmah heetsahin aum ngei sih hi:
49003006	huchia Jentelte chu sapum khat a hiangtanpih gouluahpihte leh tanchinpha jiaha Khrist ah a thuchiam tanpihte ahih diing uh chu;

49003008	Jentelte kawma Khrist hauhsat daan hawldoh seeng guallouh thute soi diinga misiangthoute zousiah laha neupeen saanga neujaw kei kawmah hi hehpihna chu piaah ahi,
49003009	huleh kumtuang apat a Jesu Khrist manga sil zousiah siamtu Pathian a phuala um thukiphual kipawlkhawmna chu mi zousiah musah diingin;

49003012	Amah ginna jiahin eihaw’n Amah ah haansanna leh muangtaha luut theihna i nei uhi.
49003013	Hujiahin nanguh diinga ka gimthuaahte jiaha lungke lou diingin ka hung ngeen hi, huchu na loupina uh ahi.

49003017	huchia Khrist chu ginna tungtawna na lungtang va ateen theihna diingin; huleh huchia nanguh lungsiatna a zungha leh kiptaha um a,

49003019	Khrist lungsiatna heetphaah guallouh na hung heet va, Pathian taangchinna zousiah a suhdima na um theihna diingun ahi.
49003020	Huchiin eimah a tongjeel silbawltheihna dungjuia i nget leh i ngaihtuah saanga loupijaw a bawl theipa kawmah,
49003021	Khrist Jesu jiahin kouhtuam ah kumtuangin akhang akhang in loupina Amah kawmah umta hen. Amen.
49004001	Hujiahin kei, Lalpa a suangkul taang in kouha na umna uh toh kiphuutawha gamta diingin ka hung hasot ahi,
49004002	kingaihngiamna leh thunuaigolhna zousiah toh, thuaahtheihna toh, lungsiatna a khat leh khat kithuaahzoutuah chiat diingin,
49004003	lemna gui a kaan khawma Hagau kipumkhatna chu theihtawpsuaha vom tinten diingin.
49004004	Kouh na hih laiva kinepna khat a kouh na hih bangmahun sapum khat leh Hagau khat aum a;
49004005	Lalpa khat, ginna khat, baptisma khat,
49004006	bangkim tunga um leh bangkim a um, huleh nanguh zousiah a um Pathian khat leh mi zousiah Pa khat aum hi.
49004007	Hizongleh Khrist silthawnpiaah tehna dungjuiin hehpihna chu i kawm chiat ah piaahin aum hi.
49004008	Hujiahin, “Ama’n tunglam a akal touhin matte chu sal in apui a, huleh mihingte kawmah silpiaahte apia hi,” chiin asoi hi.
49004009	(Huchiin, “Amah akaltou,” chih chu lei mun ngiampeente ah amasain akumsuhta chihlouh bang dang chihna adiai?
49004010	A kumsuhpa chu sil zousiah asuhbukim theihna diinga vaan zousiah tungpeh a kaltoupa mah ahi.)
49004011	Huleh Ama’n khenkhatte chu apostol, khenkhatte zawlnei, khenkhatte sawlleh, khenkhatte pastor leh thuhilhtu hihna apia a,

49004013	ginna lama kituaahna leh Pathian Tapa heetna lama pichingna, Khrist taangchinna dungtan i phaah chiat masiah va diinga hung kipia ahi;
49004014	huchia thuhilhna huih chinteng in amuutleeng lehleh, mihingte lepchiahna a doha jeheemna in amuutleeng lehleh naupang i hih nawn louhna diingun.
49004015	Himahleh lungsiatna a thutah soiin, sil zousiah ah Amah a i khantouh theihna diingun Amah chu lutang ahi, Khrist ngeei chu.
49004016	Amah apatin sapum pumpi, guhtuah chinteng in sahiang dangteng natohna hoihtah apiaah daan dungjuia zopkhawm leh khaikhawma umin, sapum chu lungsiatna a kibawlhoihna diingin akhangsah hi.
49004017	Hujiahin hi ka soi a, Lalpa ah ka hung hesah hi, lungsim umjebei pua a Jentelte ahin bangun um nawn sih un;
49004018	a heetsiamna uh suhmiala umin, amahuh a heetlouhna aum jiah leh a lungtang uh angon jiahin Pathian hinna apat khenin aum uhi;
49004019	amah un heettheihna mawngmawng aneih nawn louh jiahun sil sianglou chinteng huaihamtaha bawl diingin huuhna kihdahhuai ah akipumpiaahta uhi.
49004020	Hizongleh nang un chu Khrist thu huchibangin na jil sih uh,
49004021	Jesu a thutah aum banga Amah thu ja a Amah thuhilh a um na hih photmah uh leh,
49004022	na nidanglai umdaan va mihing lui, heemna duhgawlna dungjuia se deuhdeuh chu hawhkhia unla,
49004023	huleh na lungsim hagau uh suthah un;
49004024	huleh hu mihing thah, dihtatna dih leh siangthouna a Pathian batpiha siama um chu silh un.
49004025	Hujiahin juau soi tawpsanin, “Mi chin in a innveengte kawmah thutah soi chiat heh,” ajiahchu eihaw khat leh khat kihiangtuah chiat i hi uhi.
49004026	“Lungthah unla, sual chu sual sih un”: na lungthahna uh ni in tum khum sih heh.
49004027	Diabol zong mun ot sih un.
49004028	Guta in gu nawn sih henla, hizongleh tasam kawma piaah diing aneih theihna diingin a khut a sil hoih bawlin tonggim jaw heh.
49004029	Na kam vapat thusia pawt sih henla, hizongleh a ngaikhetute kawma hehpihna apiaah theihna diingin khantouhna diingin thuhoih pawt jaw heh.
49004030	Huleh Pathian Hagau Siangthou sulungngai sih un, tatna ni a diinga Amah a chiamchih na hi uhi.
49004031	Khaatnate, thangtawmnate, lungthahnate, haannate leh kisoisiatnate chu giitlouhna zousiah toh na lah vapat koihmangin umta heh.

49005001	Hujiahin ta deihtahte bangin Pathian entontute hi un.
49005002	Khrist in ahung lungsiat a eiuh diinga Pathian kawma silpiaah leh kithoihna namtuui diinga akilat bangin lungsiatna ah um un.
49005003	Hizongleh misiangthoute umdaan diinga kilawm him in, kingaihna thaanghuaite leh bolhhohna zousiah, huaihamna toh, na lahvah lohkhaahin um sih heh.
49005004	Zahmohthute, thu ngolhuai a houlimte, chiamnuih thaanghuaite na lahvah um sih henla, hute saangin kipaahthu soi jaw un.
49005005	Ajiahchu nulepa kaal a thaanghuaite, siangthouloute leh mihuaihamte’n (hu mi chu milem bia ahi) Khrist leh Pathian lalgam ah tan mawngmawng anei sih uh chih na he uhi.
49005006	Mi kuamah in thu meimei pouh in hung heem sih uh heh, ajiahchu hi silte jiahin Pathian thangtawmna chu thumanglou tate tungah atung hi.
49005007	Hujiahin amahuh kithuahpih sih un.

49005009	ajiahchu Hagau gah ahihleh hoihna chinteng leh dihtatna leh thutah ah ahi,
49005010	Lalpa deihjawng bang ahiai chih enchian un.
49005011	Huleh gah neilou mial natohte toh kithuah khawmna nei sih unla, hizongleh adihlouh daan uh taahlang jaw un.
49005012	Ajiahchu aguuha a silbawlte uh chu asoi zong azumhuai hi.
49005013	Hizongleh sil zousiah adihlouh daan uh vaah in ataahlat chiangin muhtheihin aum uh, ajiahchu sil sulang photmah chu vaah ahi.
49005014	Hujiahin Ama’n, “Nang ihmu khanglou inla, misi lah apatin thou in, huchiin Khrist in ahung salhvaah diing hi,” achi hi.
49005015	Huchiin na umdaan uh pilvaang un, mingolte banga umlouin hizongleh mipilte bangin um un,
49005016	nite ahoih louh jiahin hun chu aphatuam theipeenin zang un.
49005017	Hujiahin ngol sih unla, hizongleh Lalpa deihjawng bang ahiai chih hesiam jaw un.
49005018	Huleh zukhamin um sih un, hu ah chu kisuumlouhna aum hi; hizongleh Hagau a dimin um jaw un;
49005019	phatna late, Pathian late leh hagaulam late a nanguh leh nanguh kihouin, na lungtang vah Lalpa diingin ging kilawm toh la sa un;
49005020	bangkim tungah i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist min in Pathian leh Pa kawmah kipaahthu soi ngiitngeet un;

54004009	Hichu thu gintaathuai leh pomtaah mahmah ahi.

54004013	Ka hung masiah lehkhasim leh hasot leh thuhilh ngaihsah in.

54005003	Meithaite, meithai tahzette chu zahbawl in.

56001005	Krit tuikulhgam a ka hung nuutsiat jiah chu sil bawlzoh louha umte na siamtuup theihna diing leh ka hung thupiaah banga khopi chin a upate na guat theihna diingin ahi;

57001001	Paul, Jesu Khrist jiaha mitaang leh i unaupa uh Timothi in, ka lawm deihtah uh leh ka natohpih uh Philemon kawmah,
