58004014	Huchiin vaante a paisuaah Siampu Lalpeen loupitah Jesu Pathian Tapa i neih jiahin i thugin lemsahna thuphuan uh i tukip diing uhi.
58004015	Ajiahchu i haatlouhnate uh hung thuaahpih phalou Siampu Lalpeen nei i hi sih va, hizongleh eihaw banga lam chintenga heemna tuaahsa, ahihvaanga suallou, Siampu Lalpeen nei i hijaw uhi.
58004016	Hujiahin khotuahna i tan theihna diing uh leh taahsap hun chianga panpihna diinga hehpihna i muh theihna diingun, muangtahin hehpihna laltouphah chu i naih diing uhi.
58005001	Ajiahchu siampu lalpeen, mite laha kiteeldoh photmah chu sualnate jiaha silpiaahte leh kithoihnate alatkhawm theihna diingin, Pathian lam silte a mite thaheng a guat ahi uhi.
58005002	Ama’n chu bangma heloute leh lamkhialte chu dawmtahin abawl thei hi, ajiahchu amah ngeei zong haatlouhna a tuamveela um ahih jiahin.
58005003	Huleh hikhu jiah tahin mite a diinga sual sillatte alatsah bangin, amah a diing ngeei zong alat akiphamoh hi.
58005004	Huleh hi tawisangna chu, Pathian in Aaron akouh banga akouh louhngaal, mi koimah in amah diingin akilaah ngei sih hi.
58005005	Huchibangmahin Khrist zong Siampu Lalpeen ahihna diingin Amah leh Amah akitawisang sih a, hizongleh a kawma, “Nang chu ka Tapa na hi a, tuni in ka hung hingkhia ahi,” chia soitu in atawisang ahijaw hi.
58005006	Ama’n mun tuam khat ah, “Nang chu Melkizedek hihdaan banga kumtuanga siampu na hi,” chia asoi mahbangin.
58005007	Ama’n chu tahsa a aum lai nite in, sihna laha Amah hundam theipa kawmah naahpiihtaha kap leh mittui luang puma haamteina leh ngetnate laanin, Pathian alauh jiahin ngaihkhiahin aum hi.
58005008	Tapa hijiangzongleh a silthuaahte apatin thumandaan ajilta hi.
58005009	Huleh suhbukima hung umin Amah thumangte zousiah diingin kumtuanga hutdamna naah ahung hita hi,
58005010	“Melkizedek hihna daan banga,” Siampu Lalpeen hia Pathian kouhin aumta hi.
58005011	Amah tungtaang soi diing tampi ka nei va, na ngaihkhiah peihlouh jiahun ahilhchian zong ahahsa hi.
58005012	Ajiahchu a hun lam ngaihtuahin chu houtute na hih uh ahunta a, Pathian thubulte khat in ahung hilh kiit ngai na hung hijeelta va, huleh an gum hiloua nawitui kiphamoh bang na hung hijaw uhi.
58005013	Ajiahchu nawitui ne photmah in chu naungeeh ahih jiahin, dihtatna thu ah heetsiamna anei sih hi.
58005014	Hizongleh an gum chu mipiching, kijilna jiaha a ngaihtuahna uh asia leh apha hekhen thei diinga kijilsiamsaha umte haw a diing ahi.
58006001	Hujiahin Khrist toh kisai thubulte chu nusiain, pichin lam i manoh diing uh, silbawl sisa apat kisiihnate, Pathian lama ginnate,
58006002	baptismate tungtaanga thuhilhnate, khutngah thute, misi thohkiitna thute leh kumtuang vaihawmna lam thuhilhnate chu bulphuh kiit nawnlouin.
58006003	Pathian in pha asah leh, hichu i bawl ngeei diing uhi.
58006004	Ajiahchu khat vei suhvaaha um a, vaan silpiaah chiamta a, Hagau Siangthou tansaha um a,
58006005	Pathian thu hoih leh hun hung um diinga silbawltheihnate chiamta haw chu,
58006006	apuuh va ahihleh, hute chu kisiih diinga siamthah gual ahi sih uhi, ajiahchu amah un Pathian Tapa chu amahuh diinga kilhbeh thah leh langtangtaha sumualphou ahih jiahun.
58006007	Ajiahchu a tunga ju veu guahtui anadawntu leh leilettute diinga phatuam anteh louhing neehtheih hung piangsahtu lei in Pathian apat vangpiaahna amu ahi.
58006008	Hizongleh lingkung leh hampa lingnei suahdoh lei chu deihlouhin aum a, haamsedong phialin aum a, a tawpna chu mei a haal ahi.
58006009	Hizongleh deihtahte, huchibangin soi mahleung, nang un chu huchibang silte saanga hoihjaw leh hutdamna toh kithuahkhawm silte na bawl uh ka hung muang uhi.
58006010	Ajiahchu Amah min a na natoh uh leh na lungsiatna suhlat uh, misiangthoute nna na tohsah uh leh na tohzing uh chu mangngilh diingin Pathian chu dihtatlou ahi sih hi.
58006011	Huleh nanguh koipouh in kinepna heetchianna kim tang diingin, atawp dongin thanop suah chiat ulehchin ka hung deih mahmah uhi,
58006012	huchia na kithahdah louh va, hizongleh ginna leh kuhkalna jiaha thuchiam gouluahtute umdaan juitute na hung hih uh ka hung deih uhi.
58006013	Ajiahchu Pathian in Abraham kawma thu achiam laiin, minloh diing Amah saanga lianjaw aum louh jiahin Amah leh Amah in akihaahsial a,
58006014	“Tahzetin ka hung vangpiaah diing a, tahzetin ka hung supung diing hi,” chiin.
58006015	Huchiin ama’n kuhkaltaha athuaah mualsuaah nungin silchiam chu amuta hi.
58006016	Ajiahchu mihingte chu amahuh saanga lianjaw min louin akihaahsial va; huleh thu namdetna diinga kihaahsialna chu amahuh diingin kinialna zousiah suhtawpna ahi.
58006017	Huchibangin thuchiam gouluahtute kawmah a lunggeel kihenkiittheihlouh daan Pathian in kichianseema etsah tumin, huchu kihaahsialna in asukipta hi,
58006018	huchu Pathian diinga juausoi hitheilou ahihna ah, sil kihengtheilou nihte jaalin, eiuh kihuumbitna diinga i ma va kinepna kikoih tang diinga taaite’n hasotna nasatah i neih theihna diingun ahi.
58006019	Hu kinepna chu hinna long siihka kip bangin i nei a, hu kinepna chiantah leh kiptah chu puanjaah sunga luut chu ahi.
58006020	Hutah ah Jesu ngeei chu eiuh diinga mapuitu hiin analuut masata a, Melkizedek hihdaan banga kumtuanga Siampu Lalpeen ahung hita hi.
58007001	Huchiin hi Melkizedek, Salem kumpipa chu Pathian Tungnungpeen siampu ahi a; kumpipate vathat zoua Abraham ahung paikiit laiin, ama’n anadawn a, huin avangpiaah hi.
58007002	A kawmah Abraham in a gaallaah sil zousiah apat sawm-a-khat apia hi. A min umjia chu amasapeenin, “dihtatna kumpipa,” chihna ahi a, hubaan ah Salem kumpipa, huchu “lemna kumpipa,” chihna ahi a,
58007003	amah chu pa neilou, nu neilou, khanggui neilou, umpatni neilou, hintawpni zong neilou ahi a, hizongleh Pathian Tapa banga siam, tawploua siampu a um zing ahi.
58007004	Tuin nampa Abraham ngeei in gaallaah silte sawm-a-khat apiaahnapa, hi pa loupidaan chu ngaihtuah dihvua.
58007005	Huleh Levi haahte laha siampu natohna mu photmah in daan thu dungjuiin, Abraham khaala pawt himahleh uh, a unaute lah apat sawm-akhat laahna diing thupiaah amu ngeei uhi.
58007006	Hizongleh amah uh lah apat a a khanggui suuitela um loupa’n chu Abraham apat sawma- khat ala a, thuchiamte neipa chu avangpiaahta hi.
58007007	Huleh nial guallouhin aneujaw chu alianjaw in avangpiaahta ahi.
58007008	Huleh hitah ah chu a sithei mihingte’n sawma- khat atang va, hizongleh hutah ah chu amah ahing zing hi chia a tanchin heetsaha umpa in atang hi.
58007009	Huleh Levi, sawm-a-khat tangtu in zong Abraham tungtawnin sawm-a-khat apia hi, achih theih hi.
58007010	Ajiahchu Melkizedek in Abraham avalamtuaah laiin amah chu a pa khaal ah aum nalai hi.
58007011	Hujiahin Levite siampu hihna tungtawna bukimna muhtheih hitaleh (ajiahchu hi nuaiah mite’n daan thu anamu uhi), Aaron hihna daan banga chih hilou a, Melkizedek hihna daan banga siampu dang ahung um angaihna bang ahiai?
58007012	Ajiahchu siampu hihna ahung kihentaah jiahin, daan zong akihen ahung kiphamohta hi.
58007013	Ajiahchu a tungtaanga hi thute kisoinapa chu phung tuama mi ahi a, hu phung laha mi koimah maitaama natong aum ngei sih hi.
58007014	Ajiahchu i Lalpa uh chu Juda phung apat hung piang ahi chih chiantahin alang a, hu phung thu ah chu Mosi in siampu lam thu bangma asoi sih hi.
58007015	Huleh Melkizedek hihna daan banga siampu dang ahung um a ahihleh ka thusoi uh achiang seem hi,
58007016	Amah chu mihing hihna daan banga hung um hilouin, hintawp neilou silbawltheihna banga hung um ahijaw hi.
58007017	Ajiahchu Ama’n, “Nang chu Melkizedek hihdaan banga kumtuanga siampu na hi,” chiin aheetpih hi.
58007018	Ajiahchu alehlam ah thupiaah um masa chu haatlouhna leh phattuamna bei jiahin paihin aumta hi,
58007019	ajiahchu daan thu in bangmah asubukim sih a, alehlam ah chu kinepna hoihjaw chu ahung poluut a, hukhu tungtawnin eihaw in Pathian i naih uh ahi.
58007020	Huleh kihaahsialna umloua Amah chu siampu a siam ahi sih,
58007021	ajiahchu hu siampute chu kihaahsialna umloua siampu a siam ahi va, hizongleh Amah chu a kawma, “LALPA akihaahsialta a, a lungsim aheng sih diing, ‘Nang chu Melkizedek hihdaan banga kumtuanga siampu na hi,’” chia soitu in kihaahsialna in siampu in asiam hi.
58007022	Huchi saanga nasajaw thamin Jesu chu thuhun hoihjaw sukiptu a siam ahung hita hi.
58007023	Huleh amahuh chu sihna jiaha pandensah theihlouh ahih jiahun, siampu chu anatam ngeei uhi.
58007024	Hizongleh Amah chu kumtuanga umzing ahih jiahin siampuhihna hentheihlouh anei hi.
58007025	Huchihjiahin Amah tungtawna Pathian kawma hungte chu amahuh diinga ngetsah diinga ahin zing jiahin, atawpkhawh tanin ahundam thei hi.
58007026	Ajiahchu huchibang Siampu Lalpeen, siangthou, poikhoihlou, buaah baanglou, misualte lah apat kituamkoih, huleh vaante saanga sangjawa tawisanga um chu eihaw a diingin akilawm mawng ahi.
58007027	Ama’n chu hu siampu lalpeente banga, ni chin a Amah sualna jiaha kithoihna laan masa zet a, huzoh chianga mite sualna jiaha alat angai sih hi, ajiahchu Ama’n hichu Amah leh Amah a kilatin setden diingin khatveiin anazouta hi.
58007028	Ajiahchu daan in haatlouhna nei mihingte siampu lal in aguat a, hizongleh kihaahsial thu, daan nunga hung um khu in chu, Tapa, kumtuanga diinga suhbukimsa chu aguat jawta hi.
58008001	Tuin i thusoite laha apoimohpeen chu hikhu ahi: Vaante a Loupipeen laltouphah jiatlam a tou, huchibang Siampu Lalpeen i nei uhi.
58008002	Mihing bawl hilou a, Lalpa bawl, mun siangthou leh biahbuuh dihtah a thunatongtu chu.
58008003	Ajiahchu siampu lalpeen zousiah chu silpiaahte leh kithoihnate laan diinga guat ahi uhi. Huchihjiahin hi Siampu Lalpeen in zong bang ahakhat lat diing aneih akiphamoh hi.
58008004	Amah leitung a um hita leh chu, daan thu bang jeela silpiaahte laantu siampute aumtaah jiahun, siampu in apang hial sih diing hi.
58008005	Mosi’n biahbuuh bawl diinga akisah laia, Pathian in akawhmuh bangin, hute nasepna mun chu vaan silte etsahna leh aliim ahi uhi. Ajiahchu Ama’n, “Taang tunga etton diinga ahung kimuhsah dungjuiin sil zousiah bawl diingin pilvaang in,” achi hi.
58008006	Hizongleh tuin chu thuchiam hoihjawte tunga siam thuhun hoihjaw Palai ahih bangjeelin Ama’n natohna hoihjaw anatangta hi.
58008007	Ajiahchu hu thuhun masapeen demnabei anahita leh, anihnapeen diing mun hawl ngailou diing ahi.
58008008	Ajiahchu Ama’n a tungva dihlouhna amuh jiahin, “Ngai un, Israel innkuante leh Juda innkuante toh thuhun thah ka siam hun diing nite hung tung diing ahita, LALPA’N achi hi.
58008009	“Aigupta gam apat a pulepate uh puidoh diinga a khut va ka tuuh ni a a kawmva ka thuhun peen bang hilouin; ajiahchu amahuh ka thuhun ah aum zing sih va, ke’n amahuh ka ngaihsah sih hi, LALPA’N achi hi.
58008010	“Ajiahchu hu hun nung chianga Israel innkuante kawma ka thuhun diing chu hikhu ahi, LALPA’N achi hi: A lungsim vah ka daan thupiaahte ka koih diing a, a lungtang vah ka gial diing hi; huleh amahuh diingin a Pathian uh ka hi diing a, amahuh chu ka mite ahi diing uhi.
58008011	“Huleh koimah in a innveengte leh a unaute thuhilhin, ‘LALPA he in,’ achi nawn sih diing uh, ajiahchu aneupeen apat alianpeen tanin a bawnun ahung heta diing uhi.
58008012	“Ajiahchu a dihtatlouhnate vah ka zahngai diing a, a sualnate uh leh daan poisaloua a gamtatnate uh zong ka hezing nawn sih diing hi,” chiin.
58008013	Ama’n, “Thuhun Thah,” chia asoi jiahin, amasapeen chu azattaah nawnlouh asuaahsahta hi. Huchiin jattaah nawnlouh leh hung luita chu amang dikuan ahita hi.
58009001	Huchiangleh thuhun masapeen in zong Pathian natohna daante leh hi khovel a mun siangthou chu ananei ngeei hi.
58009002	Ajiahchu biahbuuh bawl ahi a, pindan masapeen sungah chu thaumei tunna, dohkaan leh tanghousiah aum a, huchu mun siangthou kichi chu ahi.
58009003	Huleh puanjaah nihna sungah Mun Siangthoupeen, kichi biahbuuh pindan chu aum hi,
58009004	hutah ah chu gimtuui haalna sana bawm leh thuhun singkuang sana tui a luankhum, hu sungah manna umna sana beel leh Aaron chiang sel leh thuhun suangpeehte chu aum hi.
58009005	Huleh thuhun singkuang tungah chu khotuahna touphah liahin loupina cherubte aum uhi. Hute tungthu chu tuin a kimkeeiin i soi thei sih diing uhi.
58009006	Huleh hi silte hitobanga guatzoh ahih chiangin, siampute’n Pathian nna tongin biahbuuh pindan masapeen ah aluut veu uhi.
58009007	Hizongleh pindan nihna ah chu siampu lalpeen chauh kum khat in khatvei, amah leh mite’n heetlouha a khelhnate uh diinga alat diing sisan tawiin aluut veu hi.
58009008	Hitaha Hagau Siangthou in ahung heetsah chu biahbuuh pindan masapeen aum laisiah Mun Siangthoupeen a luutna lampi akilang nailou ahi, chih khu ahi.
58009009	Huchu tulai hun tehkaahna ahi a, hutah ah chu sialephaheetna lam thu a abetu hoih bukimsah theilou silpiaahte leh kithoihnate alaan uhi.
58009010	Hute chu neehte leh dawnte, kisuhsiangna tuamtuamte leh tahsa lam daante giap ahi a, siamphatkiit hun toh kaala zat diinga bawl ahi.
58009011	Hizongleh Khrist chu biahbuuh loupijaw leh bukimjaw khut a sahlouh toh sil hoih hung um diingte Siampu Lalpeen hi diingin ahungta a, huchu hi silsiam laha ahi sih hi.
58009012	Keeltalte leh bawngnoute sisan a hilouin, hizongleh Amah sisan ngeei a eite diinga kumtuanga tatkhiahna muin Mun Siangthoupeen ah setden diingin khatvei chauh aluutta hi.
58009013	Ajiahchu bawngtalte leh keeltalte sisan leh bawngla vutvaam mi buaah tunga thehin bawn tahsa siang khopa asuhsiangthou inchu,
58009014	kumtuang Hagau jaala soiseelbeia Pathian kawma kilaan Khrist sisan in Pathian hing nna tong diingin, natoh sisate apatin na sialephaheetna uh bangchituhin asusiangthouta diai?
58009015	Huleh hikhu jiahin Amah chu thuhun thah Palai ahi, thuhun masa nuaia tatsualnate lah apat a tatkhiahna diinga a sihna jiahin, kouhte’n kumtuanga gouluah diing thuchiam chu atang thei diing uhi.
58009016	Ajiahchu thusiah umna phot ah asiahtu sihna zong aum ngeeingeei diing ahi.
58009017	Ajiahchu mite asih nungun thusiah in thu anei chauh hi, asiahtu damsung siahin thu mawngmawng anei sih hi.
58009018	Hujiahin thuhun masa zong sisan umlouin zatpat ahi sih hi.
58009019	Ajiahchu Mosi in daan thu dungjuia thupiaah photmah mite kawma asoi zohin, bawngnou leh keeltal sisan, tui toh sawnsan toh hussop toh ala a, lehkhabu leh mipite zousiah chu atheh a,
58009020	“Hichu Pathian in na kawmva ahung piaah thuhun sisan chu ahi,” chiin.
58009021	Huleh huchibangmahin ama’n biahbuuh leh natohna vanzat zousiah chu sisan atheh hi.
58009022	Huleh daan dungjuiin sil zousiah sisan a suhsiangthouin aum veh phial hi, huleh sisan suah louhin ngaihdamna aum sih hi.
58009023	Hujiahin vaan a sil umte batpihte chu hihaw a suhsianga aum akuul hi, hizongleh vaan sil tahzet chu hite ngeei saanga kithoihna hoihjawte a suhsiangthou kuul ahi hi.
58009024	Ajiahchu atahtah etsahna, khut a bawl Mun Siangthoupeen ah Khrist chu aluut sih a, hizongleh tuin Pathian ma ah i luangva ding diingin vaan ngeei ah aluut jawta hi.
58009025	Siampu lalpeen kum chin a amah sisan hilou tawi kawma Mun Siangthoupeen a aluut bangin, Amah chu Amah leh Amah kilaan diingin aluut veu sih hi.
58009026	Huchi hilou hileh, khovel siam chiil apat tampivei athuaahta diing hi; hizongleh tu hun tawp ah Amah chu sualna suhbeina diinga Amah leh Amah a kithoihin khatvei ahung kilangta hi.
58009027	Huleh mihingte diinga khatvei sih diing guatsa, hizongleh huzohchianga vaihawmna um diing ahih bangin,
58009028	huchibangmahin Khrist zong mi tampite sualna pomang diinga khatvei latin aum hi. Huleh anihveina diingin Amah anangaahlahtute kawmah sualna toh kisai hilouin, hundam diingin ahung kilang kiit diing hi.
58010001	Daan thu chu sil hoih hung um diingte liim giap ahi a, a kibatpihtah ahihlouh jiahin, hu kum chin a kithoihna alat veute un avanaihtute abukimsah zou ngeingei sih diing hi.
58010002	Huchilou hileh, alat uh tawpta lou diing ahi viaimah? Ajiahchu a betute chu khatvei suhsiangthoua umin sual kiheetna anei nawn sih diing uhi.
58010003	Hizongleh hu kithoihnate ah chu kum chin in sualnate heetdoh kiitna aum hi.
58010004	Ajiahchu bawngtalte leh keeltalte sisan a sualnate laahmangtheih gual ahi sih hi.
58010005	Hujiahin khovel a ahung laiin, Ama’n, “Kithoihna leh sillat na deih sih a, hizongleh sapum khat na hung bawlsah jaw hi;
58010006	Haalmang sillatte leh sualna kithoihnate ah nangma’n kipaahna na nei sih hi.
58010007	Huin keima’n, ‘Ngai in, lehkhabujial ah keimah thu gelh ahi, Aw ka Pathian, na deihjawng bawl diingin ka hung hi,’ ka chi hi,” achi hi.
58010008	Amalam ah, “Kithoihna leh sillat, haalmang sillatte leh sualna kithoihna na deih sih a, amahuh ah kipaahna zong na nei sih hi,” achih zohin (hute chu daan thu banga lat ahi),
58010009	huin Ama’n, “Ngai in, na deihjawng bawl diingin ka hung hi, Aw Pathian,” achi hi. Anihna atunding theihna diingin Ama’n amasapeen chu alamangta hi.
58010010	Hu deihna jaalin setden diinga Jesu Khrist sapum khatvei chauh akilatna tungtawnin eite chu suhsiangthouin i umta uhi.
58010011	Huleh siampu chinin nitenga nna tongin sualnate lamang theilou kithoihna ngeimah laanin ading zing uhi.
58010012	Hizongleh Amah chu kumtuanga diinga sualnate diinga kithoihna khat alat nungin Pathian jiatlam ah atouta hi.
58010013	Hunung siah chu a meelmate a keengngahna a bawl ahih masiah uh angaah zingta hi.
58010014	Ajiahchu Ama’n sillat khat in suhsiangthoua umsate chu kumtuanga diingin asubukimta hi.
58010015	Huleh Hagau Siangthou in zong i kawmah ahung hesah hi, ajiahchu Ama’n,
58010016	“Huh hun zoh chianga a kawmva ka thuhun diing chu hih ahi, LALPA’N achi hi, a lungtang vah ka thupiaahte ka koih diing a, huleh a lungsim vah ka gial diing hi,” achih zoh nungin,
58010017	“A sualnate uh leh a tatleehnate uh chu ka hezing nawn sih diing hi,” achi tou nalai hi.
58010018	Tuin sual ngaihdamna umna phot ah sualna a diinga sillat aum nawn sih hi.
58010019	Hujiahin unaute, Jesu sisan jiahin Mun Siangthoupeen a luut ngamna i nei va,
58010020	huleh puanjaah, huchu a tahsapum, tungtawnin eiuh diingin Ama’n lampi thah leh hing ahung honsahta a,
58010021	huleh Pathian innkuanpihte tunga Siampu Lalpeen i neih jiahin,
58010022	sialephaheetna hoihlou apat i lungtang uh thehsianga umin, i sapum uh zong tui chiim a sila umin, ginna heetchianna lungtang dihtah toh i naih diing uhi.
58010023	Amah thuchiam hung petu chu aginum jiahin i kinepna thuphuan uh lawnglou keeiin i tudet diing uhi.
58010024	Huleh lungsiatna leh sil hoih bawlna lamah khat leh khat kitohthou diingin i kingaihtuah chiat diing uhi.
58010025	Khenkhatte hih veu banga i kikhopnate uh tawpsan louin, himahleh khat leh khat kihasot tuah jawin, huleh a Ni ahung nai hulhul chih na heetun kihasot tuah seem un.
58010026	Ajiahchu thutah heetna i neih nunga i sual teeiteei un chu, sualnate diinga kithoihna aum nawnta sih hi,
58010027	hizongleh vaihawmna tuaah diing lauhuaitah leh doutute kaangmang diing lungthahna mei aum jawta diing hi.
58010028	Mosi daan thu botsia mi chu heetpihtu nih ahihlouhleh thum thu in zahngaihna beiin asi veu uhi.
58010029	Pathian Tapa tuandeen a, thuhun sisan amah suhsiangthouna chu sil siangloua ngai a, huleh hehpihna Hagau simmohbawltu in chu hu saanga bangchituha gawtna loupijaw thuaah leh kilawmin na ngaihtuah viai?
58010030	Ajiahchu, “Phubalaah chu kei a ahi, keima’n ka thuh diing hi,” Lalpa’n achi, chitu Amah chu i he uhi. Huleh abaan kiit ah, “LALPA’N a mite vai ahawmsah diing hi,” chitu zong.
58010031	Pathian hing khut a puuh chu sil lauhuaitah ahi.
58010032	Hizongleh tuma a, suhvaaha na um nungva, thuaahna hahsatahte na thuaah lai nite uh geeldoh kiit un,
58010033	thu khat ah chu muhsitna leh hahsatnate thuaahin etnop bawlna a siamin na um va, huleh thu khat ah ahihleh huchibanga bawla umte thuaahpihtute na hung hi uhi;
58010034	ajiahchu vaan ah gou hoihjaw leh umzing diing na neih uh kiheetin, nang un ka kolbuhnate ah na hung lainat va, huleh na neihlelam uh ahung laahsahte uh zong kipaahtahin na thuaah jawta uhi.
58010035	Hujiahin na muanna uh chu paaikhe sih un, huh in chu kipaahman loupitah anei hi.
58010036	Ajiahchu Pathian deihjawng na bawlzoh chiangva, thuchiam chu na muh theihna diingun na kuhkal uh angai hi:
58010037	“Ajiahchu tomkhat zohchiangin ahung diingpa chu ahung diing a, sawt ahal nawn sih diing hi.
58010038	Huchiin midihtat chu ginna in ahing diing, hizongleh anungtolh chu ka lungsim in amah ah kipaahna anei sih diing hi.”
58010039	Hizongleh eiuh chu mangthaai diinga nungtolh haw laha mi i hi sih va, hizongleh hinna huumbit diinga gingta haw laha mi i hijaw uhi.
58011001	Huleh ginna chu sil kinepnate heetchetna, sil muhlouhte um ngeeia heetna ahi.
58011002	Ajiahchu hi ah taanglai mite’n paahtaat aloh uhi.
58011003	Khovelte chu Pathian thu a suhtuah khawm ahi chih ginna jaalin i he a, huchiin sil kimute zong sil kilangte apat siam ahi sih hi.
58011004	Ginna in Abel in Pathian kawmah Kaina saangin kithoihna hoihjaw alaan a, hukhu jiahin midihtat ahi chih heetsahna aloh a, Pathian in a silpiaah thu ah aheetpih a, huleh hukhu jiahin sita hinapiin thu asoi nalai hi.
58011005	Ginna in Enok chu sihna mulou diingin laahtouhin aum a, “Pathian in alaahtouh jiahin muhin aumta sih hi”; ajiahchu laahtouha aum main Pathian akipaahsah hi chih heetsahna anei hi.
58011006	Hizongleh ginna louin chu Amah kipaahsah gual ahi sih hi; ajiahchu Pathian kawma hungtu in chu Amah aum chih leh, Amah chu guntuhtaha Amah hawltute kawma kipaahman petu ahi chih agintaat diing ahi.
58011007	Ginna in Noah chu sil muh nailouhte thu a hilha aumin, Pathian launa neiin a innkuanpihte hutkhiahna diingin kuang abawl hi, hukhu in khovel siamlouh atangsahta a, ginna jiaha um dihtatna gouluahtu ahung hita hi.
58011008	Ginna in Abraham chu, anung chianga goua ahung tan diing mun a chiah diinga kouha aum laiin, athumang hi. Huleh achiahna diing mun zong helouin achiahdoh hi.
58011009	Ginna in gam chiam ah mi gam a taam bangin anateeng zing a, thuchiam kibanga agouluahpih diingte Isak leh Jakob toh puaninn a teeng khawmin,
58011010	ajiahchu ama’n innbul kiptah nei, Pathian sah leh bawl khopi chu angaah hi.
58011011	Ginna in Sarah in zong naupaai theihna anei a, achiamtu chu muanhuaia aseh jiahin ateeh nungin ta anei hi.
58011012	Huchiin asisa tobang mi khat apatin vaan a aahsite banga tam leh tuikhanglian geia piauneel banga tam simseenglouh suante ahung piangta hi.
58011013	Hute zousiah chu silchiamte tanglouin ginna in asita va, hizongleh gamlatah apat gaalmuha muangin apomkip va, leitung ah chu mikhual leh khualzin ahi uh chih anaphuangta uhi.
58011014	Ajiahchu hutobang thu soite’n chu gam tuam khat ahawl uh chih chiantahin asulang uhi.
58011015	Huleh amah un ahung pawtna gam uh lunggulh hi uh leh chu, kihkiitna hun lemtaang anamuta tham diing uhi.
58011016	Hizongleh gam hoihjaw deih anahi va, huchu vaangam ahi. Huchihjiahin Pathian chu a Pathian uh chiha kouh azum sih hi, ajiahchu amahuh diingin khopi khat guatsain akoihta hi.
58011017	Ginna in Abraham in, je-eta aumin, Isak alaan a, thuchiamte tangpa in a tapa tangkhat neihsun alaan hi.
58011018	“Isak ah na haahte akichi diing,” kichipa chu amah ahi.
58011019	Misi lah nasan apatin zong Pathian in akaithou thei hi chia geelin, hu apatin etsahna in muh zong amu kiitta ngeei hi.
58011020	Ginna in Isak in sil hung tung diingte thu ah Jakob leh Esau avangpiaah hi.
58011021	Ginna in Jakob in asih kuanin, Joseph ta tegeel avangpiaah a, a chiangphut dawn a kingain Pathian abia hi.
58011022	Ginna in Joseph in asih diing kuanin Israel tate pawtkhiah diing thu asoi a, huleh a guhte tungtaang ah thu apia hi.
58011023	Mosi chu apian laiin, naungeeh meel hoihtah ahi chih amuh jiahun, a nulepate’n ginna in kumpipa thupiaahte zong laulouin ha thum sung aphual uhi.
58011024	Mosi in ahung pichin nungin, ginna in Pharaoh tanunu tapa chiha kouh diing auut sih a,
58011025	tomchakhat sung sual nopna man saangin Pathian mite toh bawlgentheihna thuaah ateel jawta hi,
58011026	akipaahman muh diing chu aet zing jiahin, Khrist kimuhsitna chu Aigupta gam goute saanga hauhsatna loupijawin angai hi.
58011027	Ama’n kumpipa thangtawmna laulouin ginna in Aigupta gam anusia hi; ajiahchu muhtheihlouhpa chu muhtheih banga sepin athuaah mualsuaah hi.
58011028	Ginna in Chiahkaan Kuut leh sisan thehna abawl hi, huchilou inchu tachiil sulumpa in amahuh akhoih kha diing hi.
58011029	Ginna in amah un leigaw a pai bangin Tuipi San akaan va, Aigupta mite’n hubanga bawlve atup un, tui ah atum vehta uhi.
58011030	Ginna in Jeriko kulh baang chu ni sagih avelh nungun achimta hi.
58011031	Ginna in nohchijuaahnu Rahab zong ginglou mite toh amangthaai khawm sih, ama’n enkhetute hamuangtaha anazintun jiahin.
58011032	Huleh bang ahiai ka soi naahlai diing? Gideon thute, Barak thute, Samson thute, Jephtha thute, David thute, Samuel thute leh zawlneite thu soi ning chileng, hun in ahung daih sih diing hi.
58011033	Hute’n chu ginna in lalgamte ala va, dihtatna nna atong va, thuchiamte atang va, huumpibahneite kam achihsah va,
58011034	mei silbawltheihna asudaai va, naamsau mahiam apeel va, haatlouhna apatin haatsahin aum va, kidouna ah ahaat tungtuang va, gamdang sepaihte adelhjaah uhi.
58011035	Numeite’n a misi uh thoukiit amu uhi. Huleh midangte chu gimthuaahsahin aum uh, thohkiitna hoihjaw amuh theihna diingun hutkhiahna apom sih uhi.
58011036	Huleh midangte’n chu nuihjaat bawlna leh vuaahna bang athuaah va, ahi, hulou zong kolbut leh suangkul a khumin aum uhi.
58011037	Amahuh chu suang a sehin aum va, tum nih suaha aattanin aum va, je-etin aum va, naamsau a saatlupin aum uhi. Belaam vun leh keel vun silhin neeh diing neilouin avaahvai va, gentheih thuaahin, gimthuaahin, gawtin aum uh;
58011038	amahuh a diingin khovel chu umnataah ahi sih hi. Amahuh chu gamdaaite leh taangte ah bang, kawl buuh leh leikohawm ah bang avaah lehleh uhi.
58011039	Huleh hite zousiah in a ginna jiahva phatna lohzouin, silchiam atang sih uh,
58011040	ajiahchu eihaw telloua amahuh suhbukima aum louhna diingin Pathian in eihaw diingin sil hoihjaw khat guatsain akoih hi.
58012001	Huchihjiahin eiuh zong heetpihtu meipi nasatah uum kiimveel a i um jiahun ahung gihsah photmah leh baihlamtaha hung awhsahthei sualte i koihkhe diing va, i ma a kitaaidemna um ah kuhkaltahin i taai diing uhi.
58012002	I ginna siamtu leh subukimtu Jesu lam enin, Ama’n chu a ma a um kipaahna jiahin zumnate zong poisa louin, kros a gimna athuaah a, huleh Pathian laltouphah jiatlam ah atouta hi.
58012003	Ajiahchu a tunga misualte nialkalhna thuaahzoupa chu ngaihtuah un, huchilou inchu na lungsim un na tawlun na lungke kha diing uhi.
58012004	Sual douin sisan pawt khopin na pang nai sih uhi.
58012005	Huleh hasotna thu, tate hilh banga na kawmva kisoi chu na mangngilhta uhi, “Ka tapa, LALPA sawina ngaineep sinla, ataaihilha na umin zong lungke sin;
58012006	Ajiahchu LALPA’N alungsiatte asawi a, huleh tapa adeih photmah chu ajeep veu hi.”
58012007	Sawina na thuaah uh leh, Pathian in tate bawla hung bawl ahi; bangjiahin ahiai i chih leh pa sawilouh tapa kua aum ngei ei?
58012008	Hizongleh tapa zousiah tan ngei sawina na thuaah louh un chu, jauta na hi va, tapa tahtahte na hi sih uhi.
58012009	Hubaan ah zong eihaw hung thununtu tahsa a pate i nei va, huleh amahuh chu i zahtaat uhi. Hu saanga hagaute Pa thuthu a i um jawh seem va, i hin diing uh hilou ahiaimah?
58012010	Ajiahchu amah un tomtakhat diinga hoih asah bang jeelva ahung sawi uh ahi a, hizongleh Ama’n chu eite phattuamna diinga a sianthouna i tan theihna diingun ahung sawi hi.
58012011	Sawina zousiah chu akithuaah laiin kipaahhuai abang sih a, hizongleh ana jaw hi. Ahiinlah anungchiangin chu huchia sawihzoia umte diingin dihtatna gah hamuan umtah asuaah hi.
58012012	Huchihjiahin khut kaikhete leh khuup zoite chu phong tang un,
58012013	huleh keengbaite keeng kilawilou a, hizongleh adamjawhna diingun na keengte uh diingin lampite sial tang un.
58012014	Mi zousiah toh kilemna delh unla, huleh sianthouna delh un, hu sianthouna louin chu kuama’n Lalpa amu sih diing hi.
58012015	Pilvaang un, huchilou inchu mi khattou Pathian hehpihna ching zoulouin na um kha diing va, khaatna zung hung seldohin, hukhu in mi tampite suhbuaahin aum kha diing uhi;
58012016	huchilou inchu numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuai mi ahihlouhleh Pathian zahlou mi, Esau banga khatvei an neeh man diinga a tachiil hihna juaahpa tobang khat aum kha diing hi.
58012017	Ajiahchu anunglamin vangpiaahna gou chu luah tumin mit-hi luang pumin phatuamngaitahin hawl mahleh, kisiihna mun amuh louh jiahin nualin aumta chih na he uhi.
58012018	Ajiahchu nanguh chu taang khoihkhaah theih leh mei a kaang, vomna leh mialna leh huihpi nunna mun,
58012019	huleh peengkuul ging leh thusoi gingte umna a hung na hi sih uhi, hu aw ging jatute’n chu a kawmva hu thu akisoi kiit nawn louhna diingin angeen uhi.
58012020	Ajiahchu amah un, “Sa nasan jiang in zong hu taang chu asuhkhaah leh suang a sehlup aha, ahihlouhleh thal a kaplup diing ahi,” chih thupiaah chu athuaahzouta sih uhi.
58012021	Huleh hu silmuh chu alauhuai mahmah jiahin Mosi in, “Ka lau naah mahmah a ka kithing top hi,” achi hi.
58012022	Hizongleh nanguh chu Zion Taang leh Pathian hing khopi, vaan Jerusalem, sim seenglouh angel honpi toh na hung uhi,
58012023	kipaahna khawmpi leh vaan a min kigialta tachiil kouhtuam kawmah, huleh mi zousiah Vaihawmtu Pathian kawmah, huleh midihtat suhbukima umte hagaute kawmah,
58012024	huleh thuhun thah Palai Jesu kawmah, huleh Abel a saanga sil hoihjaw soi sisan thehna kawmah na hung uh ahijaw hi.
58012025	Thusoitu Amah chu na nual khaah diing uh pilvaang un. Ajiahchu leitung a thusoitu adeihlouh va bawn suaahta lou ahih uh leh, vaan apat a thu hung pepa i kiheisan un chu, i suaahta moh seem diing uhi.
58012026	Hu laiin a aw in lei asuliing a, hizongleh tuin chu, “Khatvei chu lei chauh hilouin, vaan zong ka suliing nalai diing,” chiin Ama’n thu achiamta hi.
58012027	Huleh hi thu, “Khatvei ka suliing kiit diing,” chih in, sil kiliingtheiloute aum zing theihna diingin sil kiliingtheite, silsiamte chu suanmangin aum diing chih ahesah hi.
58012028	Huchihjiahin, lalgam suhliing guallouh i tan jiahun, zahtah leh Pathian lau kawma pomtaahtaha Pathian nna i toh theihna diingun kipaahna lungtang i nei diing uhi.
58012029	Ajiahchu i Pathian uh chu kaahtum haat mei ahi.
58013001	Unau kilungsiatna umsah zing un.
58013002	Mikhualte kipaahpihsiam diing mangngilh sih un, ajiahchu huchibang bawlin mi khenkhatte’n heloupiin angelte anazintun kha uhi.
58013003	Suangkul a umte chu amahuh toh kaankhawma um bangin hezing un. Huleh bawlsiatna thuaahte chu nanguh zong sapum a um na hih jiahun hezing un.
58013004	Mi zousiah lahah kiteenna chu zahbawlin um henla, huleh lupna zong suhbuaahlouhin um heh. Himahleh numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaite leh aangkawmte chu Pathian in vai ahawmsah diing hi.
58013005	Na umdaan uh chu eenhaatna tellou hi heh, na sil neih tungvah lungkim un. Ajiahchu Amah ngeeiin, “Bangchihmahin ka hung nuse sih diing a, taai zong ka hung taaisan sih diing hi,” achi hi.
58013006	Huchiin hangsantahin, “LALPA chu ahung panpihtu ahi a, ka lau sih diing hi. Mihing in bang ahung loh thei diai?” i chi ngam uhi.
58013007	Pathian thu na kawmva soi na lamkaite uh chu hezing un. A hinkhua vapat sil hung umdohte ngaihtuah unla, a ginna uh jui un.
58013008	Jesu Khrist chu jaanni, tuni huleh kumtuangin angeimah ahi.
58013009	Thuhilhna tuamtuamte leh limdangtahte puimangin um sih un. Lungtang chu neehletaah a hilouin, hehpihna a suhkip ahoih hi, ajiahchu neehletaah a suhkip diing ngaihtuahte’n phattuamna amu tuan sih uhi.
58013010	Biahbuuh natongtute’n aneeh theihlouhna uh maitaam i nei uhi.
58013011	Siampu lalpeen in sual thoihna diinga Mun Siangthoupeen a a sisan aluutpih ganta luang haw chu giahphual polam ah ahaalmang uhi.
58013012	Huchihjiahin Jesu’n zong, Amah sisan ngeei a mite asuhsiangthou theihna diingin kulh kotkhaah polam ah athuaahta hi.
58013013	Hujiahin Amah a muhsitna uh puain a kawmah, giahphual polam ah i chiahdoh diing uhi.
58013014	Ajiahchu hitah ah khopi det i nei sih va, hizongleh khopi hung um diing chu i hawl uh ahijaw hi.
58013015	Hujiahin Amah tungtawnin paahtawina kithoihna chu Pathian kawmah tawplouin i laan diing uhi, huchu Amah min phatna, i muuh uh gah ahi.
58013016	Hizongleh sil hoih bawl leh silphal chu mangngilh sih un, ajiahchu huchibang kithoihnate ah Pathian akipaah mahmah hi.
58013017	Na tungva lamkaite thu mang unla, huleh a thunuai vah kituluut un, ajiahchu amah un na tungtaang thu uh soi diingte bangin na hagau uh ahung veensah uh ahi. Lunggimna toh hilouin, kipaahna toh bawlsah un, ajiahchu lunggimtaha abawl uh chu nanguh diingin aphatuam sih hi.
58013018	Keiuh diingin hung haamteisah un, ajiahchu sil bangkim ah dihtaha gamtat uutin sialephaheetna hoihtah ka nei uh chih ka kimuang uhi.
58013019	Hizongleh kintaha na kawmva puikiit-a ka um theihna diinga anahaamtei diingin ka hung hasot diaahkhol hi.
58013020	Tuin kumtuang thuhun sisan jaala, misi lah apat i Lalpa uh Jesu, Belaampu loupitah kaithoupa hamuanna Pathian in,
58013021	Jesu Khrist jaala a mitmuh a adeihjawng photmah bawl diingin sil hoih chinteng ah nanguh hung subukim hen; Amah kawmah loupina kumtuang kumtuangin umta hen. Amen.
58013022	Huleh unaute, hasotna thu ngai thei teeiteei diingin ka hung ngeen hi, ajiahchu thu tawmtakhat in na kawmvah ka hung gial hi.
58013023	I unaupa uh Timothi hahdohin aumta chih anaheta un, ahung pai pah leh amah toh nanguh ka hung mu diing hi.
58013024	Na lamkaite zousiah uh leh misiangthoute zousiah chibai hung na buuhsah un. Italy gam a mite’n chibai ahung buuh uhi.
58013025	Na bawnva kawmah hehpihna um hen. Amen.
59001001	Jakob, Pathian leh Lalpa Jesu Khrist suaah in kithehdalh phung sawmlenihte kawmah: Chibai.
59001002	Ka unaute, je-etna chi tuamtuam na tuaah chiangun kipaahna ngenin ngai un,
59001003	ajiahchu na ginna uh etkhiahna in thuaahtheihna asiam chih na he uhi.
59001004	Bangma tasamloua na bukim va, huleh na buching theihna diingun thuaahhaatna chu a bukimna tongdohsah un.
59001005	Na lahva koiaha in pilna ataahsap leh, mi zousiah kawma soiseellou leh phaltaha petu Pathian kawmah ngeen heh, huchiin amah chu piaahin aum diing hi.
59001006	Hizongleh ginglel het louin ginna in ngeen heh, ajiahchu ginglel mi chu tuikhanglian kinawh, huih muut leeng lehleh bang ahi.
59001007	Ajiahchu ginglel mi in chu Lalpa apat bangma muh kineem sih heh,
59001008	ama’n lungsim bulbaal anei sih a, a silbawl zousiah ah akip sih hi.
59001009	Unau kingaingiam chu tawisanga aumna ah kipaah heh.
59001010	Hizongleh mihausa chu suhngiama aumna ah kipaah heh, ajiahchu amah chu hampa paah banga mang diing ahi.
59001011	Ajiahchu ni in asatna toh ahung suaah chiangin hampa chu ahaaivul hi; hu paah chu akia a, huleh a kilawmna chu amangta hi. Huchibangmahin mihausa zong hampa bangin a sumlepaai hawlna ah avuai mang diing hi.
59001012	Je-etna kuhkaltaha thuaah mi chu ahampha hi; ajiahchu etkhiaha aum zoh chiangin Lalpa’n Amah lungsiattute kawma piaah achiam hinna lallukhuh chu amu diing hi.
59001013	Mi koimah in sual bawl diinga heema aum chiangin, “Pathian in kei ahung heem hi,” chi sih heh; ajiahchu Pathian chu giitlouhna a heem gual ahi sih a, huleh Pathian in koima aheem ngei sih hi.
59001014	Hizongleh mi chin chu amahuh uutna chiat in apuimang a, hiipa aum chiangin heemin aum ahijaw hi.
59001015	Huleh uutna hoihlou in nou apaai chiangin, sual ahung hingkhia hi; huleh sual in ahung pichin chiangin sihna ahung hingkhia hi.
59001016	Ka unau deihtahte, heemin um sih un.
59001017	Silpiaah hoih leh silpiaah bukim photmah chu tunglam apat ahi a, vaahte Pa kawm apat hung suh ahi a, Amah kawmah chu kihenlamdangna ahihlouhleh liim banga kiheina mawngmawng aum sih hi.
59001018	A silsiamte laha agah masa lawi khat i hih theihna diingun, Ama’n adeihbang ngeei a thutah a ahung hin i hi uhi.
59001019	Hikhu jiahin ka unau deihtahte, mi chin ngaihkhiah lamah kilawp henla, thusoi lamah kilawp sih henla, lungthah baih sih heh;
59001020	ajiahchu mihing lungthahna in Pathian dihtatna atun sih hi.
59001021	Hujiahin bolhhohna zousiah leh giitlouhna a dimleet chu koihmang unla, na hagau uh hundam thei nanguh a thu kituh chu kingaingiamtahin pom un.
59001022	Thu ngaikhetu chauh hia nanguh leh nanguh kiheemlouin, thu juitute hijaw un.
59001023	Mi koipouh thu ngaikhia chauh ahih a, ajuitu ahihlouhin chu, amah chu apianpih maai liimlang a kien mi bang giap ahi;
59001024	amah akien a, huleh achiahmang a, bangchibang mi ahih akimangngilh pah hi.
59001025	Hizongleh koipouh jaleenna daan bukim en a huh a um jomzing a, huleh mangngilhhaat thungaikhia mi hilou a hizongleh thu juitu hijaw chu, a natoh ah vangpiaahin aum diing hi.
59001026	Na lahva mi koiaha sahkhomi a kingai a, a lei aveen zohlouh leh, amah lungtang ngeei heem ahijaw a, hu mi sahkhua chu athawn ahi.
59001027	Pathian leh Pa mitmuh a sahkho siangthou leh buaahbaanglou chu hih ahi: tagahte leh meithaite a gimthuaah laiva veh, huleh khovel a dembaangloua mahni kikoih chu ahi.
59002001	Ka unaute, loupina Lalpa, i Lalpa Jesu Khrist ginna chu mi deihsahtuamna toh neikhawm sih un.
59002002	Ajiahchu na kikhopna vah sana zungbuh but, puan hoihtah silh khat hung luut henla, huleh mijawng khat zong puan setah silhin hung luutta leh,
59002003	huchiin puan hoih silhpa chu na zahbawl va huleh a kawmah, “Nang hi mun hoih ah tou in,” na chi va, huleh mijawngpa kawmah chu, “Nang hutah ah ding in,” ahihlouhleh, “Hitah ah ka keeng ngahna nuaiah tou in,” na chi uhi.
59002004	Huchiin na lahva lungsim a khentuamna sulang a, huleh ngaihtuahna gilou nei vaihawmtu hung hita hilou na hi viaimah?
59002005	Ngai un, ka unau deihtahte, Pathian in hi khovel a mijawngte chu ginna a hausa diing leh Amah lungsiatte kawma achiam lalgam gou luah diinga ateel hilou ahi viaimah?
59002006	Hizongleh nang un mijawngte na musit uhi. Nanguh hung bawlsia a huleh vaihawmna a hung kailuutte khuh mihausate hilou ahi viaimah?
59002007	Amah un na kikouhna uh hu min zahumtah chu asoise sih viaimah?
59002008	Pathian Lehkhathu a, “Nangmah na kilungsiat banga na innveengte na lungsiat diing ahi,” chia kigelh dungjuia lal daan na zopkim tahtah uh leh, na bawl hoih uhi.
59002009	Hizongleh mi deihsahtuamna na suhlatun chu, sil na hihsual va, huleh daan in botsetu bangin siamlouh ahungtan hi.
59002010	Ajiahchu mi koipouh in daan jui bukim henla, mun khat ah kipalpuuhta leh, a bawna botsia a mohtangin aum hi.
59002011	Ajiahchu, “Aang na kawm louh diing ahi,” chipa Amah in, “Tual na thah louh diing ahi,” zong achi hi. Huchiin aangkawm sih zonglechin, tual na thahin chu, daan bohsetu na hita thou hi.
59002012	Jaleenna daan a vaihawmsaha um diingte bangin thu soi unla gamta un.
59002013	Ajiahchu zahngaihna neilou mi chu zahngaihna beia vaihawmsahin aum diing hi. Zahngaihna in vaihawmna tungah gual azou hi.
59002014	Ka unaute, mi’n ginna ka nei chi henla, natoh nei sih leh, bang aphatuam diai? Huchibang ginna in amah ahundam thei diaimah?

59002016	huleh na lahva khat in, “Hamuangtahin chiah inla, lumtah leh vahtahin um in,” chi henla, sapum diinga sil poimoh pe tuan sih leh, bang aphatuam diai?
59002017	Huchibangmahin, ginna chu natoh beia amah chauh a aum leh, asi ahi.
59002018	Ahi, mi khat in, “Nang ginna na nei a, huleh ke’n natoh ka nei ahi,” achi thei hi. Na ginna chu natoh tellouin hung ensah in, huleh ka ginna chu ka natoh in ka hung ensah diing hi.
59002019	Nang Pathian khat aum chih na gingta hi. Na bawl hoih hi. Dawite’n zong agingta va, huleh lauin akiliing uhi.
59002020	Hizongleh nang mingolpa, ginna chu natoh tellouin asi ahi chih na he uut ei?
59002021	I pu uh Abraham in a tapa Isak maitaam tunga alat laiin silbawl jiaha siamtang hilou ahiaimah?
59002022	Ginna in a silbawlte toh atong khawm a, huleh ginna chu natoh a suhbukim ahi chih na mu hi.
59002023	“Abraham in Pathian agingta a, huchu amah diinga dihtatna a ngaih ahi,” chia Pathian Lehkhathu in asoi ataangtung hi. Huleh amah chu Pathian lawm chih ahita hi.
59002024	Mi chu ginna chauh hilouin, natohte in asiamtan ahi chih na mu uhi.
59002025	Huchibangmahin, kijuaahnu Rahab in zong, thupotute anazintun a, amahuh lamtuam a asawlkhiah laiin, natohte jiaha siamtang hilou ahi maw?
59002026	Ajiahchu hagau bei sapum chu asi ahih bangin, natoh bei ginna chu asi ahi.
59003001	Ka unaute, thuhilhtu in mi tampi hung pang sih un, ajiahchu ei thuhilhtute’n vaihawmna khauhjaw tang diing i hi uh chih i thei uhi.
59003002	Ajiahchu sil tampi ah i bawnun i kipalpuuh uhi. Mi koipouh thusoi lama akipalpuuh louh leh, hu mi chu mipiching ahi a, a sapum veeng thei mi zong ahi.
59003003	Ngai un, i thu ajuihna diingun sakolte kam ah siihbah i bah va, huleh a sapum uh apumin i kaihei thei hi.

59003005	Huchibangmahin lei zong sapum hiang neutakhat ahi a, hijiangzongleh nasatahin akiuangsah hi. En in, mei neutakhat in gammaang lianpi kang sethei hina mei e!
59003006	Huleh lei chu mei ahi a, giitlouhna khovel ahi. Lei chu sapum apumpi a subolhhohtu banga i sapum hiangte laha koiha um ahi a, huleh hi in pianken hinkhua zousiah akaangsah a; huleh hi chu gawtmun in mei a akaah ahi.

59005012	Hizongleh ka unaute, bangteng saangin, kihaahsialin kichiam sih un, vaan ahihlouhleh lei ahihlouhleh sildang bangmah min louin kihaahsial sih un. Hizongleh “Hi” na chih uh chu “Hi” hi heh, huleh “Hilou” na chih uh chu “Hilou” hi heh, huchilou inchu mileptat a seh na hi diing uhi.

59005015	Ginna a haamteina in damlou chu adamsah diing a, Lalpa’n amah chu akaithou diing hi. Ama’n silsual anabawl a ahihleh, amah chu ngaihdam ahi diing hi.
59005016	Hujiahin suhdama na um theihna diingun na sualnate uh khat leh khat kiphuang tuah unla huleh khat leh khat kihaamteisah un. Midihtat guntuhtaha haamteina in sil abawlthei mahmah hi.

60001001	Peter, Jesu Khrist apostol in Ponta, Galatia, Kappadosia, Asia leh Bithunia gamte a kithehdalh mivaithaamte kawm ah,

60001003	Misi lah apat a Jesu Khrist thohkiitna tungtawna, a khotuahna kichingtah dungjuia kinepna hing tang diinga eiuh hung piangthahsah Pathian leh i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist Pa chu phatin um hen,

60001012	Vaan apat a hung kisawl Hagau Siangthou zanga na kawmva tanchinpha soitute tungtawnin hu silte chu na kawmvah heetsah ahita hi. Hu mite’n chu amahuh diing hilouin, eiuh diingin nna atong jaw uhi chih a kawmvah heetsah ahi uhi. Hu silte chu angelte’n zong etveel auut uhi.
60001013	Huchihjiahin na lungsim un kisakhawl unla, pilvaang un, huleh Jesu Khrist hung kilaah chianga nanguh kawma hung kipe diing hehpihna chu kiptahin lamen un.
60001014	Ta thumangte bangin na heetlouh laiva malai a na uutnate uh bangin um sih un.

60001016	“Nanguh siangthou un, ajiahchu kei ka siangthou hi,” chih gelh ahihjiahin.

60001022	Unaute tunga lungsiatna dihtah neihna diinga Hagau tungtawna thutah thumanna a na hagau uh na suhsiangthoutaah jiahun, phatuamngaitahin khat leh khat lungtang siangthou in kilungsiat tuah un.

60003001	Huchibangmahin, nanguh jite haw, na pasalte uh kawm chiat ah kituluut un, huchia koiaha in Pathian thu gingta sih mahleh, Pathian thu tellou a jite gamtat daan a zoha aum theihna diingin,
60003002	huchiin zahtaattaha na gamtat daan uh leh siangthoutah a na umdaan uh amuh chiangun zohin aum diing uhi.
60003003	Na kicheina uh chu polam kicheina sam pheehte leh sana a kicheinate, ahihlouhleh puansilh hoih a kithuamte hilouin,
60003004	hu saangin kilawmna setheilou lungsim nunneem leh chihnuam in sunglam mihing chu kithuam jaw heh, huchu Pathian mitmuhin amanpha hi.
60003005	Ajiahchu hutobangmahin malai a numei siangthou, Pathian muangtute’n zong, amahuh pasalte thuthu va umin anakichei uhi.
60003006	Sarah ngeei in Abraham chu lalpa chia koua a thu aman bangin, suhlauna jiah hiloua sildih na bawl uh leh, Sarah tanute na hi uhi.
60003007	Huchibangmahin, nanguh pasalte haw, na haamteina uh daala aum louhna diingin, na jite uh chu hinna hehpihna na tankhawmpih uh ahihjiahun, beel keehbaihjaw banga ngaiin paahtawina pia unla, heetsiamna toh umkhawm un.
60003008	Atawppeenin, khat leh khat lungsim munkhat pua unla, kilainattuah unla, unau banga kilungsiatin hehpihsiam unla, kingaingiam un;
60003009	giitlouhna chu giitlouhna a thuh louin, housiatna zong housiatna a thuh louin, hizongleh hu saanga vangpiaah jawin, ajiahchu huchi diing him a kouh na hi uhi, huchia vangpiaahna na tan theihna diingun.
60003010	Ajiahchu “Hinna deih leh ni hoihte muh uut in chu gilou apat a lei veeng henla, a muuh zong heemthu soina apat veeng hen.
60003011	Gilou apat kiheemkhia henla, sil hoih bawl heh; lemna hawl henla, delh jeel hen.
60003012	Ajiahchu LALPA mit chu midihtatte tungah atu a, huleh a bil zong a haamteina lamvah akidoh hi; hizongleh LALPA meel chu silgilou bawlte kalhin a tungvah atu hi.”
60003013	Huleh sil hoih juitute na hih uh leh, koi ahiai nanguh poi hung khoih diing?
60003014	Hizongleh dihtatna jiaha na thuaah uh leh, na hampha uhi. “Huleh ahung vauna uh lau sih unla, lung zong lungkham sih un.”
60003015	Hizongleh na lungtang un Lalpa Pathian chu zahtaat unla, huleh nanguh a um kinepna jiah hung dong photmahte chu jaineemna leh zahtaatna toh dawng diingin bangchihlaipouhin kipeih zing un;
60003016	huchia Khrist a na gamtat daan hoih uh dihloutaha hung demte chu ahung soisiatna va azum theihna diingun sialephaheetna hoihtah nei un.
60003017	Ajiahchu Pathian lemsah ahih inchu, silgilou bawl jiaha thuaah saangin sil hoih bawl jiaha thuaah ahoihjaw hi.
60003018	Ajiahchu Pathian kawma ahung pui theihna diingin Khrist in zong sualnate jiahin setden diingin khatvei athuaahta a, midih chu midihlou luangin, tahsa a suhlupin aum a, hizongleh Hagau in asuhhing hi.
60003019	Hu Hagau tungtawnin avachiah a, suangkul a um hagaute kawmah thu avaphuang hi.
60003020	Hute’n nidanglaia Noah damlaia kuang bawl sung teng Pathian thuaahzohna in angaah laiin athumang sih va, hu kuang ah mi tawmtakhat, huchu mi giat tui lahah hutdamin aum uhi.
60003021	Hu baptisma in aetsah chu Jesu Khrist thohkiitna jiaha tua i hutdamna uh ahi, huchu tahsa nitna koihmang hilouin, sialephaheetna siangtah neihna diinga Pathian lama ngetna ahijaw hi.
60003022	Amah chu vaan ah achiahta a, angelte leh thuneihnate leh silbawltheihnate a thu nuaia koihin Pathian jiatlam ah aumta hi.
60004001	Huchiin eiuh diinga Khrist in tahsa a hung thuaahta ahih jiahin nanguh zong huchibang lungsim in kithuam un, ajiahchu koipouh tahsa a thuaahsa in chu sual atawpsanta hi,
60004002	huchia tahsa a hun aneih laiteng a mihing uutna lam banga hingta lou a, hizongleh Pathian deihjawnga ahin jawhna diingin.
60004003	Ajiahchu huuhnate, uutnate, zuhainate, gualnop thaanghuai munte, zu dawnkhawmnate leh milem biahna kihdahhuaite a i umlai a Jentelte deihjawng bawlna ah i tumalai hinkhuate uh i zang huntawhta uhi.
60004004	Hi thu ah chu amahuh nopbawl luatna banga na bawlve louh uh thumah asa va, nanguh ahung soisia uhi.
60004005	Amah un mihing leh misite vaihawm diinga kipeihsa Amah kawmah a tanchin uh asoi diing uhi.
60004006	Hikhu jiahin tanchinpha chu misite kawmah zong soiin ana-um hi, huchia tahsa a um mite dungjuia vaihawmsah ahih theihna diingun, hizongleh Pathian deihlam dungjuia hagau a ahin theihna diingun.
60004007	Hizongleh sil zousiah tawpna diing chu anaita hi; hujiahin silngaikhawh unla, na haamteinate vah pilvaang un.
60004008	Huleh sil bangkim tungah phatuamngaitahin kilungsiat tuah chiat un, ajiahchu “lungsiatna in sualna tampi akhuhkhum hi.”
60004009	Phunchiaah louin khat leh khat kizintun tuah un.
60004010	Mi chin in silpiaah na muh bang jeelun, Pathian hehpihna chi tuamtuam keemtu hoihtahte bangin, hute in khat leh khat nna kitohsah tuah chiat un.
60004011	Mi koipouh in thu asoi leh, Pathian kam a thu pawt bangin soi heh. Mi koipouh in thunatoh nna atoh leh, Pathian in haatna apiaah bangjeelin tong heh, Jesu Khrist jaala Pathian chu sil bangkim a paahtawia aum theihna diingin, Amah kawmah kumtuang kumtuangin paahtawina leh lalna umta hen. Amen.
60004012	Deihtahte, nanguh je-et diinga na tungva je-etna hung tung chu sil limdang bang aha hung tung bangin ngaihtuah sih un.
60004013	Hizongleh Khrist thuaahnate kikoppih na hih jiahun kipaah un, huchia a loupina ahung kilat chiangin nanguh zong naahpiihtaha nuama na kipaah theihna diingun.
60004014	Khrist min jiaha soisiat na hih uh leh, na hampha uhi, ajiahchu loupina Hagau leh Pathian Hagau na tungvah aum hi. Amahuh lam thu ah Amah chu soisiat ahi a, hizongleh nanguh lam thu ah Amah chu paahtawiin aum ahi.
60004015	Hizongleh na lahvah koimah in tualthah jiahin aha, guuhtaat jiahin aha, silgilou bawl jiahin aha, ahihlouhleh midangte tungtaang phatuamloua buaipih ahihjiahin aha thuaah sih heh.
60004016	Ahihvaangin koipouh in Khristian ahihjiaha a thuaah leh zum sih heh, hizongleh hi tungtaang jiahin Pathian paahtawi jaw heh.
60004017	Ajiahchu Pathian innkuante lahah vaihawmna kipat hun ahung tungta hi; huleh eiuh toh kipan masa ahih inchu, Pathian tanchinpha gingtaloute tawpna chu bang ahita diai?
60004018	Huleh “Midihtat bawn hutdam ahih haamhaam inchu, Pathian ngaihsahloute leh misualte bang asuaahta diai?”
60004019	Huchihjiahin koipouh Pathian lemsah dungjuia thuaahte’n sil hoihbawl ah a hagau uh chu Siamtu ginumtah kawmah kolsah uh hen.
60005001	Na lahva upa umte chu kei na upa hihpih uh leh Khrist thuaahna heetpihtu leh loupina hung kilang diing zong tanpihtu in ka hasot hi.
60005002	Na lahva Pathian belaam pawl umte vaah unla, amahuh enkol un, hihlouh theihlouh ahihjiah hilouin, uut thu jawin, punna niin deih jiah hilouin, hizongleh lungsim kipeihsa kawm jawin;
60005003	etkol diinga hung kipete tunga kisulal lou a, himahleh pawlte etton diinga um jawin.
60005004	Huleh Belaampu Lianpeen ahung kilat chiangin loupina lallukhuh mualtheilou na mu diing uhi.
60005005	Huchibangmahin nanguh khanglaite haw, upate nuaiah kituluut un. Ahi, na bawnun khat leh khat kithumang tuah chiat unla, kingaihngiamna in kithuam un, ajiahchu, “Pathian in mikiliansahte adoudaal a, hizongleh mi kingaingiamte kawmah hehpihna apia hi.”
60005006	Hujiahin ahuntaha Ama’n nanguh ahung tawisang theihna diingin Pathian khut haattah nuaiah kingaingiam un.
60005007	Ama’n ahung ngaihsah zing jiahin, na lungkhamna zousiah uh a tungah nga un.
60005008	Sil ngaikhawh unla, kiveeng zingin um un; ajiahchu na khingpa uh diabol chu huumpibahnei hawh bangin aneeh theih diing mi hawlin avaah lehleh hi.
60005009	Na unau uh khovel a umte tungah huchibang thuaahnatnate atungve chih hein, ginna a kiptaha umin diabol chu dou un.
60005010	Hizongleh Khrist Jesu manga kumtuang loupina tang diinga eiuh hung koupa, hehpihna hau Pathian in, tomkhat sung na thuaah nungun, nanguh ahung subukimin, ahung sukipin, ahung suhaatin, ahung umdetsah diing hi.
60005011	Amah kawmah kumtuang kumtuangin paahtawina leh lalna umta hen. Amen.

60005013	Nanguh toh teel khawm Babylon a umnu in chibai ahung buuh hi; huchibangmahin ka tapa Mark in zong ahung buuh hi.
60005014	Lungsiatna kitawp in khat leh khat chibai kibuuh un. Nanguh Khrist Jesu a um zousiah kawmah hamuanna um hen. Amen.
61001001	Simon Peter, Jesu Khrist suaah leh apostol in i Pathian leh Hundampa Jesu Khrist dihtatna jaala ginna i tan bang tangte kawmah:
61001002	Hehpihna leh hamuanna chu na kawmvah Pathian leh i Lalpa Jesu heetna ah suhpungin umta hen.
61001003	Amah loupina leh hoihna a eiuh hung koupa heetna jiahin, a Pathian silbawltheihna in hinna leh Pathian ngaihsahna lam thu ah sil zousiah ahung pia hi.
61001004	Hu tungtawnin thuchiam manpha leh loupi mahmahte chu ahung pia hi, huchia uutna tungtawna khovel a um siatna apat suaahta a Pathian pianken umdaan kikoppihte na hung hih theihna diingun.
61001005	Hujiahmahin thanopna zousiah suahin, na ginna vah hoihna hal unla, na hoihna vah heetna hal unla,
61001006	na heetna vah kideehtheihna hal unla, na kideehtheihna vah kuhkalna hal unla, huleh na kuhkalna vah Pathian ngaihsahna hal unla,
61001007	na Pathian ngaihsahna vah unau kilungsiatna hal unla, huleh na unau kilungsiatna vah lungsiatna hal un.
61001008	Ajiahchu hite nanguh a aum a akhan jeelin chu, i Lalpa Jesu Khrist heetna lamah chiing leh gahlouin na um sih diing uhi.
61001009	Hizongleh hi silte nei lou chu mittaw ahi a, gamla amuthei sih a, huleh a malai sualte apat silsianga aumna zong amangngilhta hi.
61001010	Hujiahin unaute, nanguh hung kikouhna leh kiteelna suchian diingin thanop hung suah un, ajiahchu hite na bawl uh leh chu na kipalpuuh ngei himhim sih diing uhi;
61001011	ajiahchu huchiin Jesu Khrist i Lalpa leh Hundampa kumtuang gam a luutna chu nanguh kawmah kiningchingtahin ahung musah diing hi.
61001012	Hujiahin hi silte hein, na kawmva um thutah ah tundingkip hita mahleh uh chin zong, hu silte chu hung hesahkiit zing diingin ka kithahdah ngei sih diing hi.
61001013	Ahi, hi puaninn a ka um sung teng nanguh hung heetsah kiit jeela hung tohhalh zing hoih ka sa hi,
61001014	i Lalpa Jesu Khrist hung theihsah mahbangin, hi ka puaninn koihmangna ahung tung pah diing chih ka thei ngaala.
61001015	Hubaan ah ka paikhiah nung chianga hi silte na heetzingna diingun ka hahkat diing hi.
61001016	Ajiahchu i Lalpa Jesu Khrist silbawltheihna leh ahung paikiitna thu ka hung theihsah laiun, taangthu bulbaal neilou pillepchiahtaha phuahtawm meimeite juitute ka hi sih va, hizongleh a loupina mutute ka hijaw uhi.
61001017	Ajiahchu Ama’n chu Pa Pathian kawma kipatin paahtawina leh loupina amu a, huchihlaiin loupina tungtuang apatin hichibang aw a kawmah ahung tung hi, “Hichu ka Tapa deihtah, ka kipaahna mahmah ahi,” chiin.
61001018	Huleh taang siangthou a Amah toh ka umlai un, hi aw chu vaan apat hung pawt keiuh ngeei in ka ja uhi.
61001019	Soilawhna thu kipjaw seem zong i nei uhi, khua ahung vaah a, na lungtang va jiingsol aahsi ahung suaah masiah, mun mial a vaah um na ngaihsah bangva na ngaihsah uh leh na bawl hoih uh ahi diing hi.
61001020	Pathian Lehkhathu a thusoilawh himhim chu mi khat mimal lehdohna apat hung um ahi sih chih he masa un.
61001021	Ajiahchu thusoilawh himhim nidanglaiin mihing deihdaan apat hung pawt ahi het sih a, hizongleh Pathian misiangthoute’n Hagau Siangthou phuut ahih bang jeelun anasoi uh ahijaw hi.
61002001	Hizongleh mite laha zawlnei tahloute zong ana-um mah bangin, na lahva zong thuhilhtu tahloute ahung um diing va, amah un chu amahuh leipa Lalpa hiilhial kiheetmohbawlin, mi susethei ginna dihloute aguuhin ahung luutpih diing va, amahuh leh amahuh tungah thakhatin siatna atungsah diing uhi.
61002002	Huchiin mi tampi in a zulhjauna uh ahung chiing diing va, amahuh jiahin thutah lampi chu soisiat ahi diing hi.
61002003	Huleh a huaihamna jiahun sumkawlveina a hung neiin juauthu in nanguh ahung heem diing uhi; nidanglai apat a tungva vaihawmna chu akhawl sih a, a siatgawpna uh zong a-ihmu sih hi.
61002004	Ajiahchu angelte’n sil asuhsual un Pathian in ahawi sih a, tartaras ah apaai a, vaihawmsaha um diinga asiit a kokhuuh mialte ah akhum jaw a,
61002005	huleh Pathian ngaihsahloute khovel ah tuijiin atungsah a, nidanglai khovel chu ahawi sih a, hizongleh dihtatna thusoipa Noah chu midang sagih toh akeembit a,
61002006	huleh Sodom leh Gomorrah khopite chu mohtangsaha susiain vutvai asuaahsah a, Pathian ngaihsahlou hung um diingte etsahna diingin abawl a,
61002007	huleh migiloute umdaan thaanghuaitah jiaha lungsim na mahmah midihtat Lot chu ahutkhiaha ahihleh
61002008	(ajiahchu hu midihtatpa’n a kawmva aum laiin, daanlou banga a silbawlte uh amuh a huleh ajaahin, hute’n a lungsim dihtat chu ani ani in asuna mahmah hi),
61002009	Lalpa’n amah ngaihsah mite chu heemna apat hutkhiah daan leh midihtatloute chu vaihawm ni a gawt diinga siit daan ahe hi,
61002010	huleh adiaahin uutna thaanghuai lama tahsadaan banga umte leh thuneitu simmoh mite chu. Amahuh chu ngolhaan leh chihhah ahi va, amah un loupina neite asoisiatun zong alau sih uhi.
61002011	Huchibang ahihlaiin, angel haat leh silbawltheite’n bawn, Lalpa ma ah a tungthu uh hahsoiin asoise ngam sih uhi.
61002012	Hizongleh hite’n ganhing ngaihtuahna neilou mat a thah diingte bangin, aheetsiam louh uh silte asoisia va, huchiin amahuh siatna ah abeimang veh diing uhi.
61002013	Huleh suun laia ankuang lui buai nuamsa mi ahih jiahun dihtatlouhna man amu diing uhi. Na kawmva ankuang alui laiun, amahuh kiheema ankuang lui ahih jiahun, buaah leh meelhem ahi uhi.
61002014	Aangkawmna mit a dim, sual tawpsan theihlouhte anei va, mi kiploute aheempuuh va, eenhaat lungsim apua va, huleh haamsethuaah tate ahi uhi.
61002015	Lampi dih ataaisan va, avaahmang va, dihtatlouhna loh ngainapa Beor tapa Balaam lampi ajuita uhi.
61002016	Hizongleh amah chu a giitlouhna jiahin taaihilhin aum a, sabiltung haamtheilou mihing haam a hung haam in zawlnei ngolna chu akhapta hi.
61002017	Hute chu tuikhuuh tui umlou, huih muut leeng lehleh meilum ahi va, amahuh diingin vom behbuh a mialna chu kumtuanga siit ahi.
61002018	Ajiahchu thumanlouh chiaahjeena soiin, giitlouhna apat suaahta haamhaamte chu tahsa uutna leh huuhna in aheempuuh uhi.
61002019	Amahuh chu siatna suaah hipumin mite suahtaatna thu achiam uhi; ajiahchu mi zoha aumna humah in amah chu suaahin asiam hi.
61002020	Ajiahchu Lalpa leh Hundampa Jesu Khrist heetna jiaha, khovel thaanghuainate anuutsiatsan nungva, humah a ataan kiit va zoha aum uh leh, a umdaan nunung uh chu achiila saangin asejaw hi.
61002021	Ajiahchu dihtatna lampi atheih nung va, thupiaah siangthou a kawmva kepsaha um chu anungngatsan saangun dihtatna lampi theilou anahi leh uh, amahuh diingin ahoihjaw diing hi.
61002022	Hizongleh “Ui amah luaah mah ah akihkiit,” chih leh, “Vohpi kisilsiangsa buannawi a kibual diingin akiih,” chih thupil dihtah khu bangngeeiin a tungvah atung hi.
61003001	Deihtahte, tua na kawmva ka gelh hi lehkhathot anihna ahi. Hu tegeel hung hesahkiit jeelin na lungsim chiimtahte uh ka tohthou ahi,
61003002	huchu zawlnei siangthoute’n anasoi masat uh thute, huleh keiuh, Lalpa leh Hundampa apostolte thupiaah na heetzingna diingun ahi.

61003004	“Ahung kiitna thuchiam khoiah ahiai? Ajiahchu silsiam chiil apat sil bangkim pulepate ihmut ni apatin aum ngeingei bangin aum zing,” achi diing uhi.

61003009	Mi khenkhat in zekaai asah bangun, Lalpa chu a thuchiam lamah azekaai sih hi, hizongleh koimah beimang deihlouin mi zousiah kisiih diing deihin eimah lamah athuaahzou ahijaw hi.
61003010	Hizongleh Lalpa Ni chu jaan a guta bangin ahung tung diing hi, huleh hu Ni chiangin vaante chu nasataha gingin amang diing va, huleh silbulte chu mei a haaitui ahi diing va, lei zong a sunga natoh umte toh haalmangin aum diing hi.

61003012	Pathian Ni hung tung pah diing enkawmin, hukhu jiaha vaante chu mei a hung kaangmang diing leh silbulte zong mei a haaituia umta diing ahihjiahin.
61003013	Ahihvaangin ei un chu a thuchiam dungjuiin vaan thah leh lei thah, dihtatna umna chu i kineppih uhi.
61003014	Hujiahin deihtahte, hu silte kineppih na hih jiahun, niin baanglou leh dembeia hamuangtaha nana um uh Ama’n ahung muh theihna diingin thanop suah un.
61003015	Huleh i Lalpa thuaahtheihna chu hutdamna hiin ngai un, i unaupa deihtah Paul in Pathian in a kawma apiaah pilna dungjuia na kawmva agelh bangin,
61003016	a lehkhathot zousiah ah hi silte tungtaang asoi hi. Hu lehkhathotte ah thu heetsiam hahsate khenkhat aum a, hute chu mipillou leh mikiploute’n Pathian Lehkhathu dang akaihkawi bangun amahuh mah siatna diingin akaikawi uhi.
61003017	Hujiahin deihtahte, nang un hu thute na theihlawh jiahun pilvaang un, huchilou inchu migiloute khelhna a puimanga umin na kipna vapatin na puuh kha diing uhi.
61003018	Hizongleh i Lalpa leh Hundampa Jesu Khrist hehpihna leh heetna ah hung khanglian un. Amah kawmah tu leh kumtuangin loupina um hen. Amen.
62001001	Achiil apata um, ka jaahsa uh, ka mit va ka muhsa uh, ka etchetsa uh, huleh ka khut un zong athamsa hu hinna Thu chu,
62001002	huleh hu hinna chu suhlat ahita a, hu kumtuang hinna Pa kawma um, ka kawmva suhlat-a um chu ka muta va, ka heetpih va, na kawmvah ka hung hilh uhi;
62001003	huchia nang un zong na hung kipawlkhawmpih theihna diingun hu ka muhsa uh leh ka jaahsa uh chu na kawmvah ka hung hilh uhi. Huleh tahzetin i kipawlkhawmna uh chu Pa toh a Tapa Jesu Khrist toh ahi.
62001004	Huleh na kipaahna uh abukim theihna diingin hi thute na kawmvah ka hung gial uh ahi.
62001005	Amah apat na kawmva hung phuan diinga ka na jaah uh thupuaah chu hikhu ahi, Pathian chu vaah ahi a huleh Amah ah mial mawngmawng aum sih hi.
62001006	Amah toh ka kipawlkhawm chi ngaala, mial a i um zing un chu juau i soi a, huleh thutah i bawl sih uhi.
62001007	Hizongleh Amah vaah a aum banga ei zong vaah a i um zing leh, khat leh khat kipawlkhawmna i nei va, huleh a Tapa Jesu Khrist sisan in sualna zousiah apat ahung silsiang hi.
62001008	Sualna ka nei sih i chih un chu, eimah leh eimah kiheem i hi va, huleh thutah eimah ah aum sih hi.
62001009	I sualnate i phuan un chu, i sualnate ngaidam diing leh dihtatlouhna zousiah apat hung silsiang diingin Amah chu amuanhuai in adihtat ahi.
