65001006	Angel khenkhatte’n a thuneihna dinmun masa uh akeemden sih va, a teenna mun uh anusia uhi. Amahuh chu Pathian in kumtuang gaahna siihkhau a kaanin mial nuaiah koihin vaihawmna ni loupi a diingin asiit hi.
65001007	Huchibangmahin Sodom leh Gomorrah leh a kiimveel a teengte chu kingaihna ngeinadaanlou bangtaha kipawl thaanghuaina ah akipia va, Pathian in hute chu kumtuang mei a agawt diingte etsahna in azang hi.
65001008	Huchibangmahin hi mangmante’n a tahsa uh asubolhhoh va, thuneitute anual va, huleh loupina neite asoisia uhi.
65001009	Hizongleh angel tungnungpeen Mikael ngeei in zong Mosi luang tungtaang thu a diabol toh akituh va akinial laiun, soisiain amohpaih ngam sih a, husaangin, “Lalpa’n hung taai heh,” achi jaw hi.
65001010	Hizongleh hi mite’n chu asil heet louhte uh asoisia uhi; huleh amah un chu ngaihtuahna nei lou gamsate bangin pianken heettheihna in ahe va, hi silte ah amahuh leh amahuh akisusia uhi.
65001011	A tunguh agih hi! Ajiahchu Kaina lampi ah apaita va, huleh lawhna deihgohna jiahin Balaam dihlouhna lampi ah lawptahin ataai va, huleh Korah helna ah amangthaaita uhi.
65001012	Hite chu na lungsiatna gualvaahna va nanguh toh an aneeh chiangva tuitup suang monghiam tobang ahi va, amahuh chauh akingaihtuah uhi. Amahuh chu tui paailou meilum huih muut leeng lehleh tobang ahi uhi; amahuh chu khokhaal hun a sing gah neilou, nihvei si, huleh a zung a kiphungkalh doh tobang ahi uhi.
65001013	Amahuh chu tuipi kifawn haattah tobang ahi va, a zumna uh chu tui phuan tobangin ahung umdoh a; aahsi leeng lehleh tobang ahi va, amahuh diingin mial vombehbuh chu kumtuanga diingin siit ahi.
65001014	Adam apat khang sagihnapa Enok in hi mite tungthu anasoilawh hi, “Ngai un, Lalpa chu a misiangthou saang tampite toh,
65001015	mi zousiah vaihawmsah diing leh Pathian ngaihsahlou tengteng in a Pathian ngaihsahlouhna natoh uh, Pathian ngaihsahlou jawnga abawlte uh leh Pathian ngaihsahlou misualte’n Amah kalha haam khauhtah azat tengteng uh mohpaih diingin Amah ahung hi,” chiin.
65001016	Hite chu phun haatte leh soiseel haatte ahi va, a tahsa uh uutna gilou in apui bangbanga gamtate ahi uh; huleh amahuh chu uangtahin akiphat va, lawhna diing deih manin midangte kamsiam in apaahtawi uhi.
65001017	Hizongleh deihtahte, nang un chu malai a i Lalpa uh Jesu Khrist apostolte thusoite hezing un,
65001018	amah un hun nunung chiangin Pathian ngaihsahlouhna lama amahuh tahsa gilou uutna bangbanga puia um mi simmoh haatte ahung um diing thu asoi uhi.
65001019	Hitobang mite chu khovel mi, kikhenna siamtu leh Hagau neiloute ahi uhi.
65001020	Hizongleh deihtahte, nanguh chu na ginna siangthoupeen uh tunga kilamtouin, Hagau Siangthou a haamteiin,
65001021	kumtuang hinna tuntu i Lalpa Jesu Khrist khotuahna chu ngaah zingin Pathian lungsiatna ah kikoldet un.
65001022	Huleh khenkhat ginglela umte chu khotuah un.
65001023	Huleh lau pumin midangte hunkhia un, mei kuang lah apat kaidohin sual a suhbuaah a puan uh jiangzong kihdah kawmin.
65001024	Amah na puuh louhna diingva nanguh hung veengbit thei leh a loupina ma a nasataha nuamsa leh soiseelbeia nanguh hung koihtheipa,
65001025	i Hundampa uh Pathian pil chauh kawmah, loupinate, thupinate, vaihawmnate leh silbawltheihnate tu leh kumtuangin um zingta hen. Amen.
66001001	Sil hung tung pah ngeei diingte, a suaahte aheetsah diinga Pathian in Amah kawma apiaah, Jesu Khrist thuphuandoh. Huleh Ama’n huchu a suaah Johan kawmah a angel sawlin chiamchihna in ahesahta hi.
66001002	Ama’n chu Pathian thu leh Jesu Khrist heetpihna thu leh asilmuh zousiah ahesahta hi.
66001003	Hi soilawhna thute sim leh ngaikhete leh a sunga thu kigialte jui mi chu ahampha hi; ajiahchu ahun anaita hi.
66001004	Johan in Asia gam a um kouhtuam sagihte kawmah: Amah umzing leh umta leh hung um diingpa apat leh a laltouphah ma a um Hagau sagihte apat,
66001005	huleh heetpihtu ginum, misi lah apat tachiil leh lei a kumpipate vaihawmtu Jesu Khrist akipan hehpihna leh hamuanna na kawmvah um hen. Amah ei hung lungsiat a i sualna apat Amah ngeei sisan a hung silsiangpa leh
66001006	Pathian leh a Pa kawma kumpite leh siampute a hung siamtu kawmah loupina leh thuneihna kumtuang kumtuangin umzingta hen. Amen.
66001007	En in, meipi toh Amah ahung kum diing a, mit chinteng in Amah amu diing hi, Amah suntute ngeei in zong. Huleh lei a nam zousiah Amah jiahin akap diing uhi. Huchi hihen, Amen.
66001008	“Kei Alpha leh Omega, Abul leh Atawp ka hi,” Lalpa, “umzing leh umta leh hung um diing, Bangkimbawltheipa,” in achi hi.
66001009	Kei Johan, na unaupa uh leh Jesu Khrist a gimthuaahna leh lalgam leh kuhkalna a na tan neihpih uh chu Pathian thu jiah leh Jesu Khrist thu heetpihna jiahin Patmos kichi tuikulhgam ah ka um hi.
66001010	Lalpa Ni in Hagau in ka um a, ka nung lamah peengkuul ging bang aw ngaihtah ka ja hi.
66001011	“Kei Alpha leh Omega, Amasapeen leh Anunungpeen ka hi,” huleh, “Na sil muhte lehkhabu ah gial inla, Asia gam a um kouhtuam sagihte kawmah thot in: Ephesi khua ah, Smarna khua ah, Pergamos khua ah, Thiateira khua ah, Sardis khua ah, Philadelphia khua ah leh Laudikia khua ah,” chiin.
66001012	Huleh hu ahung houpih aw chu muh tumin ka kihei hi. Huleh ka kihei a ahihleh sana thaumei tunna sagih ka mu hi.
66001013	Huleh hu thaumei tunna sagihte lai ah Mihing Tapa tobang mi khat, a keengphaang tandong a puan silh, sana gui a a awm kigaah ka mu hi.
66001014	A lutang leh a sam chu belaam mul bangin akaang a, vuuh bangin angou a, a mit chu meikuang bang ahi.
66001015	A keeng chu sum-eng valtah, mei a haalsiang bang ahi a, a aw chu tui tampi luang ging bang ahi.
66001016	Ama’n a khut jiat lam in aahsi sagih atawi a, a kam akipanin naamsau a langniha hiamtah mei apawt a, huleh a meel chu ni asatnaah laitah tobang ahi.
66001017	Amah ka muh tahin a keengbul ah asi bangin ka puuhta hi. Huleh Ama’n a khut jiatlam ka tungah koihin ka kawmah hichiin, “Lau sin, kei Amasapeen leh Anunungpeen ka hi.
66001018	Ahing zingpa chu ka hi, huleh ka sita a, hizongleh ngai in, kumtuangin ka hing ahi. Amen. Huleh Misi Khua leh Sihna chabite ka nei hi.
66001019	Hujiahin na sil muhte leh sil umlaite leh tununga sil hung um diingte chu gial in.
66001020	Ka khut jiatlam a aahsi sagih leh sana thaumei tunna sagih na muhte thukiphual chu: aahsi sagihte chu kouhtuam sagih haw angelte ahi va, huleh thaumei tunna sagih na muhte chu kouhtuam sagihte ahi uhi,” achi hi.
66002001	“Ephesi khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichiin gial in, ‘A khut jiatlam a aahsi sagih tawipa, sana thaumeitunna sagih laia vaah lehleh pa’n hi thute asoi hi:
66002002	“Na natohte, na tohgimnate, na kuhkal daante ka he a, huleh migiloute na thuaah theihlouh daan ka he hi. Huleh hiloupi a apostol ka hi uh kichite na etkhiah a, huleh mijuau ahih uh na matdoh daan zong ka he hi.
66002003	Na thuaahzoh a, na kuhkal a, huleh ka min jiaha na tohgim daan leh na chauh louh daan ka he hi.
66002004	Ahihvaangin demna khat ka hung nei hi, ajiahchu na lungsiatna masapeen na nuseta hi.
66002005	Hujiahin na puuhna hezing inla, kisiih inla huleh na natoh masapeente bawlkiit in. Na kisiih louh inchu, kintahin na kawmah ka hung diing a, na thaumeitunna chu a mun apatin ka suan diing hi.
66002006	Ahiinlah hichu na bawlhoih hi, Nikolaitan pawlte natoh na hua a, huchu ke’n zong ka hua hi.
66002007	Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh. Agualzoupa kawmah Pathian Paradis lailung a um hinna sing apat neeh diing ka pe diing hi,”’ chiin.
66002008	“Huleh Smarna khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichiin gial in, ‘Amasapeen leh Anunungpeen, sita a hing kiitpa’n hi thute asoi hi:
66002009	“Na natohte leh na gimthuaahte leh na jawn daan ka he hi, hizongleh na hausa hi. Huleh Judami hiloupia ka hi uh chi, hizongleh Setan sinagog hi ngaal, hute Pathian soisiatna ka he hi.
66002010	Sil na hung thuaah diingte lau sin. Ngai in, etkhiaha na um theihna diingun diabol in na lahva khenkhat chu suangkul ah ahung khum diing a, ni sawm sung gimthuaahna na nei diing uhi. Sih tanphain ginum in, huchiin hinna lallukhuh ka hung pe diing hi.
66002011	Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh. Agualzoupa chu sih nihna suhnatin aum sih diing hi.”’
66002012	“Huleh Pergamos khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichiin gial in, ‘Amah naamsau alangnih a hiamtah neipa’n hi thute asoi hi:
66002013	“Setan laltouphah mun a na teenna a na natohte ka he hi. Huleh ka min na pom kip a, Setan teenna mun a na lahva ginna jiaha thaha umpa, ka mi ginum, ka heetpihtu Antipa hun laiin zong na ginna na tawpsan sih hi.
66002014	Hizongleh demna sil themkhat ka hung nei hi, ajiahchu Balaam thuhilhna juite na umpih hi. Ama’n Israel tate puuhna siam diing leh milem biahna sa ne diing leh numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaina bawl diingin Balak athuhilh hi.
66002015	Huchibangmahin Nikolaitan pawlte thuhilhna jui mi khenkhat zong na nei a, huchu ka hua hi.
66002016	Hujiahin kisiih in, huchilou inchu kintahin na kawmah ka hung diing a, ka kam a pawt naamsau in amahuh ka dou diing hi.
66002017	Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh. Agualzoupa kawmah manna phualguuh aneeh diing ka pe diing hi. Suang kaang khat, hu suang tunga min thah kigial a tangtu loungaal midang koima’n aheet louh chu ka pe diing hi.”’
66002018	“Huleh Thiateira khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichiin gial in, ‘Pathian Tapa meikuang bangmai mit nei leh sum-eng valtah tobang keeng neipa’n hi thute asoi hi:
66002019	“Na natohte, na lungsiatnate, na ginna leh na kuhkalnate ka he a, huleh na silbawl masapeen saangin anunungpeen atamjaw hi.
66002020	Hizongleh hi thu ah ka hung dem hi, hu numei Jezebel amah leh amah zawlnei kichinu na thuaahtheih jiahin. A thuhilh in ka suaahte chu numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaina bawl diing leh milem biahna sa ne diingin athuhilh a huleh aheemgawp hi.
66002021	Amahnu chu a numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaina apat kisiih diingin hun ka pia a, himahleh auut sih hi.
66002022	Ngai in, amahnu chu gimthuaahna lupna tungah ka paai diing a huleh a silbawl uh akisiih louh uh leh a-aangkawmpih haw chu gimthuaahna nasatah ah ka paailuut diing hi.
66002023	A tate chu sihna in ka that diing a, huchiangin kouhtuam zousiah in kei chu lungsim leh lungtang hawlpa ka hi chih ahe diing uhi. Huleh na bawnun na natohte uh dungjuiun ka hung thuh chiat diing hi.
66002024	Tuin nanguh Thiateira khua a um, hi kihilhna neilou leh asoi uh banga Setan thugilte helou midang zousiah kawmah ka soi ahi, tunggihna dang na tungvah ka koih sih diing hi.
66002025	Hizongleh hu na neihsa uh chu ka hung masiah tukip un.
66002026	Agualzoupa leh a tawpdonga ka deihjawng keempa chu a kawmah namte tunga thuneihna ka pe diing hi.
66002027	Ke’n zong ka Pa apat a thuneihna ka muh bang ngeeiin, ‘Ama’n a tungvah siih chiang in vai ahawm diing a, beel kheengtu beel a hal hal a akeeh bangin amahuh ajeepkeeh diing hi.’
66002028	Huleh amah chu jiingsol aahsi ka pe diing hi.
66002029	Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh.”’
66003001	“Sardis khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichiin gial in, ‘Pathian Hagau sagih leh aahsi sagih neipa’n hi thute asoi hi: “Na natohte ka he hi; hing min na pua a, himahleh asi na hi.
66003002	Kiveeng inla, sil um nalai si dikuante chu suhaat in, ajiahchu na natohte ka Pathian mitmuh ah bukimin ka mu sih hi.
66003003	Hujiahin na muhtaah leh na jaahtaah chu hezing in; tukip inla kisiih in. Hujiahin na kiveen louhin chu, guta bangin na kawmah ka hung diinga huleh bangchih hun a na kawma ka hung diing hun na he sih diing hi.
66003004	Ahiinlah Sardis khua ah a puante uh subuaah lou min tawmtakhat na nei hi; huleh amahuh chu kei toh puanvaam silhin aleeng diing uhi, ajiahchu amah un achin uhi.
66003005	Agualzoupa chu puanvaam silhsahin aum diing a, huleh Hinna Lehkhabu apat a min ka nawtmang sih diing a, himahleh ka Pa ma leh a angelte ma ah a min ka phuang diing hi.
66003006	Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh.”’
66003007	“Philadelphia khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichiin gial in, ‘Amah, siangthou leh dih, “David chabi neipa in, ahon chianga koima’n akhaah theihlouh leh akhaah chianga koima’n ahon theihlouhpa in”, hi thute asoi hi:
66003008	“Na natohte ka he hi. En in, na ma ah koima’n akhaah theihlouh kot kihong ka koih hi; ajiahchu silbawltheihna neutakhat nei himahlehchin ka thu na keem a, huleh ka min na kiheetmohbawl sih hi.
66003009	Ngai in, Setan sinagog a Judami hia kisoi, lah hiloute chu mijuau ahi uh, amahuh chu na kawma hung paisahin na keengbul ah ka khupbohsah diinga huleh ka hung lungsiat ahi chih ka hesah diing hi.
66003010	Kuhkaltaha thuaah diinga ka hung thupiaah na juihzing jiahin leitung a um mite etkhiahna diinga khovel pumpi a hung tung diing jeheemna hun apat ke’n zong ka hung veengbit diing hi.
66003011	Ngai in, kintahin ka hung hi. Koimah in na lallukhuh ahung laahsah louhna diingin na sil neihsa chu tudet in.
66003012	Agualzoupa chu ka Pathian mun siangthou ah khuam in ka pangsah diing a, apawtdoh nawn sih diing hi. Huleh a tungah ka Pathian min leh ka Pathian akipan a vaan apat a hung kumsuh ka Pathian khopi Jerusalem Thah min ka gial diing hi. Huleh a tungah ka min thah ka gial diing hi.
66003013	Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh.”’
66003014	“Huleh Laudikia khua a kouhtuam angel kawmah hichiin gial in, ‘Amen, Heetpihtu Ginum leh Dihtah, Pathian silsiamte Bulpipeen in hi thute asoi hi:
66003015	“Na natohte ka he hi, huchia lum lah lumlou vot lah votloua na um chu; na lum ahihlouhleh na vot ka deih ahi.
66003016	Huchia lumpelhpulh a, lum lah lumlou vot lah votloua na um jiahin ka kam apatin ka hung sekhe diing hi.
66003017	Ajiahchu nangma’n, ‘Ka hausa a, ka neih apungta, bangmah ka tasam sih,’ na chi a, huleh mimuhsithuai, migenthei, mijawng, mittaw leh saguaah na hihlam na he sih hi.
66003018	Na hung hauhsat theihna diingin sana mei a haalchiim leh na saguaah zumhuaina akilat louhna diinga na silh diing puanvaam leh na muh theihna diing na mit na nuh diing mit damdawi ka kawm apat lei diingin ka hung thuhilh ahi.
66003019	Ka lungsiat taphot chu ka taai a, ka thunun hi. Hujiahin phatuamngai inla kisiih in.
66003020	Ngai in, kotkhaahbul a dingin ka kiu ahi. Mi koipouh in ka aw ajaah a kot ahonin chu, a kawmah ka luut diinga amah toh ka ne diing a, huleh ama’n zong kei toh ane diing hi.
66003021	Agualzoupa chu ka kawmah ka laltouphah ah ka tousah diing, kei zong ka gualzoh a ka Pa toh a laltouphah a ka tou mahbangin.
66003022	Bil nei taphot in kouhtuamte kawma Hagau thusoi chu ja heh.”’”
66004001	Hi silte nungin ka en a, ngai in, vaan ah kot khat akihong hi. Huleh aw ka jaah masat chu peengkuul ging abang a, kei chu hichiin ahung houpih hi, “Hilam ah hung tou in, tunung a sil hung um diingte ka hung musah diing hi,” chiin.
66004002	Thakhatin kei chu Hagau in ka umta a, huleh en in, vaan ah laltouphah khat akitung a, laltouphah tungah Mi khat atou hi.
66004003	Huleh hu a toupa chu jaspar leh sardia suang bangmaiin akilang a; huleh hu laltouphah kiimveel ah chu sakhituihuup, et a emerald suang bangmeia kilang aum hi.
66004004	Hu laltouphah kiimveel ah laltouphah sawmnih leh li aum a, huleh hu laltouphahte tungah upa sawmnih leh li puanvaam silha tou ka mu a, huleh amah un sana lukhuh akhuh uhi.
66004005	Huleh hu laltouphah apatin kawlphete, awte, vaangingte ahung suaah uhi. Huleh hu laltouphah ma ah thaumei sagih akuang a, hite chu Pathian Hagau sagihte ahi uhi.
66004006	Huleh hu laltouphah ma ah kristal suang tobang tuikhanglian liimlang aum hi. Huleh hu laltouphah lailung leh laltouphah kiimveel ah a malam leh a nunglam mit a dim silhing li aum hi.
66004007	Silhing khatna chu huumpibahnei tobang ahi a, silhing nihna chu bawngnou tobang ahi a, silhing thumna in chu mihing meel bang apua a, huleh silhing lina chu mupi leenglai bang ahi.
66004008	Huleh hu silhing lite’n chu ha guup chiat anei va, a polam leh a sunglam uh mit in adim chiat hi. Huleh amah un chu suun leh jaan a tawlnga louin, “Siangthou, siangthou, siangthou, Lalpa Pathian Bangkimbawltheipa, umta leh umzing leh hung um diing chu!” achi uhi.
66004009	Huleh hu silhing lite’n laltouphah tunga toupa, kumtuanga hing zingpa kawmah loupina leh zahbawlna apia va, kipaahthu asoi tengun,
66004010	upa sawmnih leh lite chu laltouphah tunga toupa ma ah abohkhup va huleh kumtuang kumtuanga hing zingpa chu abia va, huleh hu laltouphah ma a a lallukhuhte uh koihin,
66004011	“Aw Lalpa, nang chu loupina leh zahbawlna leh silbawltheihna tangtaah na hi; ajiahchu nangma’n sil zousiah na siam a, nangmah deihna tungtawna um leh siam ahi uh,” achi uhi.
66005001	Huin Amah laltouphah tunga toupa jiat lamah a sunglam leh a polam a kigial chiamchihna sagih a kichiamchih lehkhabujial khat ka mu hi.
66005002	Huleh angel haat khat aw ngaihtaha kikou a, “Koi ahiai lehkhabu chu hong a huleh hu a chiamchihna umte pheltaah?” chi ka mu hi.
66005003	Hizongleh vaan ah hiin lei ah hiin, hulouin lei nuaiah hitaleh, hu lehkhabujial hong thei leh a sung en thei mi koima aumta sih hi.
66005004	Huin huh lehkhabujial hong diing leh sim diing ahihlouhleh a sung en taah mi koimah akimuh louh jiahin naahpiin ka kap hi.
66005005	Huin upate laha khat in ka kawmah, “Kap sin. Ngai in, Juda nam Huumpibahnei, David Zungpi in hu lehkhabujial chu hong diing leh hu a chiamchihna sagihte phel diingin agualzouta hi,” achi hi.
66005006	Huleh ka en a, ngai in, laltouphah leh silhing lite lai ah leh upate lai ah thahsa hileh kilawm Belaamnou ka mu hi. Ama’n kii sagih leh mit sagih anei a, hute chu Pathian Hagau sagih, leitung pumpi a sawlkhiahte ahi uhi.
66005007	Amah chu ahung a huleh laltouphah tunga toupa khut jiatlam apatin lehkhabujial chu alata hi.
66005008	Huleh Ama’n lehkhabujial chu alaah tahin, silhing lite leh upa sawmnih leh lite chu Belaamnou ma ah abohkhup va, amah un kaihging leh gimnamtuui a dim sana kuang atawi chiat uhi, huchu misiangthoute haamteina ahi.
66005009	Huleh amah un la thah khat asa va, “Nang chu lehkhabujial la a, huleh a chiamchihnate pheltaah na hi; ajiahchu thahin na umta a, chi chin, haam chin, mi chin leh nam chin apat mite na sisan in Pathian a diingin na hung tanta a,
66005010	huleh i Pathian uh kawmah kumpite leh siampute in na hung siamta a; huleh leitung ah lalin i tou diing uhi,” chiin.
66005011	Huin ka et leh laltouphah leh silhingte leh upate kiimveel ah angel tampi aw ka ja a; huleh atamdaan uh chu asiing asiing leh asaang asaang ahi va, amah un laltouphah leh silhingte leh upate auum kiimveel va,
66005012	“Thaha um Belaamnou chu thuneihnate, hauhsatnate, pilnate, thahaatnate, zahumnate, loupinate leh paahtawinate tangtaah ahi,” chia aw ngaihtaha kikouin la asa uhi.
66005013	Huleh vaan a um leh lei a um leh lei nuaia um leh tuikhanglian a um chinteng in, “Laltouphah tunga toupa leh Belaamnou kawmah, paahtawinate leh zahumnate leh loupinate leh silbawltheihnate kumtuang kumtuangin um zingta heh,” achih uh ka ja hi.
66005014	Huin silhing lite’n, “Amen,” achi uhi. Huleh upa sawmnih leh lite’n bohkhupin kumtuanga hing zingpa chu abeta uhi.
66006001	Huin Belaamnou in chiamchihna sagihte laha amasapeen aphel lai ka mu a, huleh aw khat, vaanging bangmaia silhing lite laha khat in, “Hung inla en in,” achih ka ja hi.
66006002	Huin ka en a, ngai in, sakol kaang khat ka mu hi. A tunga tuangpa’n thalmung atawi a, a kawmah lallukhuh khat akipia a, amah chu gualzou leh gualzou jeel diingin akuankheta hi.
66006003	Belaamnou in chiamchihna nihna aphel zohin silhing nihna in, “Hung inla en in,” achih ka ja hi.
66006004	Huleh sakol dang, asan khat ahung pawtdoh a, a tunga tuangpa kawmah chu leitung apat hamuanna laahsah theihna leh mite khat leh khat akithah tuahna diing uh thuneihna piaah ahi a, huleh a kawmah naamsau thupitah piaah ahi.
66006005	Huleh Ama’n chiamchihna thumna aphel zohin silhing thumna in, “Hung inla en in,” achih ka ja hi. Huin ka et leh, ngai in, sakol vom khat ka mu a, a tunga tuangpa’n a khut in buuhna atawi hi.
66006006	Huleh silhing lite lah apatin aw khat in, “Dinari khat a gehu dan khat, dinari khat a barley buh dan thum; huleh sathau leh uain chu suse sin,” achih ka ja hi.
66006007	Huleh chiamchihna lina aphel zohin silhing lina in, “Hung inla en in,” achih ka ja hi.
66006008	Huin ka et leh, ngai in, sakol daang khat ka mu a, a tunga tuangpa min chu Sihna ahi a, huleh Misi Khua in amah ajui hi. Huleh amah un leitung seh li suah seh khatte chu naamsau toh, kial toh, sihna toh, leitung a gamsate toh athah theihna diingun amahuh kawmah silbawltheihna piaah ahi.
66006009	Chiamchihna ngaana Ama’n aphel zohin maitaam nuaiah Pathian thu jiah leh a heetpihna apom jiahva thaha umte hagau ka mu hi.
66006010	Huleh amah un aw ngaihtah a kikouin, “Aw Lalpa, siangthou leh dih, bangtan ahiai leitung a teengte tunga vaihawm lou leh ka sisan uh phuba la loua na um diing?” achi uhi.
66006011	Huin amahuh chu puanvaam akipe chiat a, huleh a suaah hihpihte uh leh a unaute uh, amahuh bangmah a thaha um diingte ahung thah zoh veh masiah uh tomkhat anakhawl tadih diinga hilh ahi uhi.
66006012	Huleh Ama’n chiamchihna guupna aphel zohin ka en a, huleh ngai in, jiil nasatahin akiliing a; huleh ni chu samul sai-ippuan bangin ahung vomta a, ha chu sisan bangin ahung umta hi.
66006013	Huleh vaan aahsite chu theipi kung huihpi haattah in amuut chianga agah puamte apulh bangin lei ah akia uhi.
66006014	Huleh vaan chu lehkhabujial a jial bangin akitawlkheta a, taang leh tuikulhgam chinteng aumna vapat suanmangin aumta uhi.
66006015	Huin leitung a kumpipate, mi liante, mi hausate, sepaih houtuliante, mi haatte, huleh saltaang leh taanglou mi zousiah chu kohawm leh taang a suangpite ah akibuta va,
66006016	huleh taangte leh suangpite kawmah, “Hung netkhum unla, Amah laltouphah tunga toupa ma apat leh Belaamnou lungthahna apat hung phual un!
66006017	Ajiahchu a lungthahna ni huaisia hung tung ahita, koi ahiai ding zou diing?” achi uhi.
66007001	Hi silte nungin angel li, leitung ah hiin tuikhanglian tungah ahihlouhleh singkung khatmah tunga zong huih anun louhna diinga lei a huih lite tutaang a, leitung ning li a ding chu ka mu hi.
66007002	Huin suahlam apat hung kuan angel dang, Pathian hing chiamchihna nei khat ka mu hi. Amah chu a kawmva leitung leh tuikhanglian suhsiat theihna diing kipia angel lite kawmah aw ngaihtahin akikou a,
66007003	“I Pathian suaahte chu a tal va i chiamchih zoh masiah leitung hiin tuikhanglian ahihlouhleh singkungte hileh suse sih un,” achi hi.
66007004	Huin chiamchiha umte phaahzah chu ka ja a, Israel tate phung zousiah apat nuai khat leh siing li leh saang li chiamchih ahi uhi:
66007005	Juda phung apat siing khat leh saang nih; Reuben phung apat siing khat leh saang nih; Gad phung apat siing khat leh saang nih;
66007006	Asher phung apat siing khat leh saang nih; Naphtali phung apat siing khat leh saang nih; Manasseh phung apat siing khat leh saang nih;
66007007	Simeon phung apat siing khat leh saang nih; Levi phung apat siing khat leh saang nih; Issakar phung apat siing khat leh saang nih;
66007008	Zebulon phung apat siing khat leh saang nih; Joseph phung apat siing khat leh saang nih; huleh Benjamin phung apat siing khat leh saang nih chiamchihin aum uhi.
66007009	Hite zohin ka en a, ngai in, koima sim seenglouh mipi nasatah, nam chin, phung chin, mi chin leh haam chin apat puan ngou silh a, tuum baa tawia laltouphah leh Belaamnou ma a ding chu ka mu a,

66007012	“Amen! Paahtawinate, loupinate, pilnate, kipaahthusoinate, zahumnate, silbawltheihnate leh thahaatnate chu i Pathian kawmah kumtuang kumtuangin um zingta heh. Amen!” chiin Pathian abia uhi.
66007013	Huin upate laha khat in ahung houpih a, ka kawmah, “Hi puan ngou a kithuamte koite ahi viai, huleh khoi apat hung ahi viai?” achi hi.
66007014	Huleh ke’n a kawmah, “Pu, nangmah in na he hi,” ka chi hi. Huin ama’n ka kawmah, “Hite chu gimthuaahna nasatah apat hung pawtdohte ahi va, huleh Belaamnou sisan a sawpin a puan uh angousahta hi.
66007015	Hujiahin amahuh chu Pathian laltouphah ma a umin suun leh jaan in a biahinn ah a nna atong uhi. Huleh Amah laltouphah tunga toupa chu a lahvah ateeng diing hi.
66007016	Amahuh agilkial nawn sih diing va, adangtaah kiit nawn sih diing uh; nisa in amahuh akaang nawn sih diing a, a satna in zong asugim nawn sih diing hi.

66008001	Huleh Ama’n chiamchihna sagihna aphel zohin daah kimkhat veel chu vaan asip kiikeei hi.
66008002	Huleh angel sagih Pathian ma a ding ka mu a, huleh amahuh chu peengkuul sagih piaah ahi uhi.
66008003	Huleh angel dang khat ahung a, gimtuui haalna sana bawm tawiin maitaam bul ah ading hi. Amah kawmah chu laltouphah ma a sana maitaam tunga misiangthoute haamteina toh alat khawm diingin gimtuui tampi piaah ahi.

66008005	Huin angel in gimtuui haalna bawm ala a, maitaam mei in athun dim a, huleh leitung ah apaaikheta hi. Huleh awte, vaangingte, kawlphete leh jiilliingte ahung umta hi.
66008006	Huin hu angel sagih peengkuul sagih neite chu muut diingin akisingsata uhi.
66008007	Angel khatna in peengkuul amuut a, huleh gial leh mei sisan toh kihal ahung umta a, hute chu leitung ah paihkhiahin aum uhi. Huleh singkung mun thum a khen mun khat akaangtum a, huleh hampa hing zousiah akaangtumta hi.
66008008	Huin angel nihna in peengkuul amuut a, huleh taang lianpi mei a kaang hileh kilawm tuikhanglian ah paihluutin aum a, huleh tuikhanglian mun thum a khen mun khat sisan ahung suaahta hi.
66008009	Huleh tuikhanglian a um hinna nei ganhingte chu mun thum a khen mun khat asita va, huleh longpite chu mun thum a khen mun khat suhsiatin aumta hi.
66008010	Huin angel thumna in peengkuul amuut a, huleh aahsi liantah khat meisel banga kuang vaan apatin ahung kesuh a, huleh luuidungte mun thum a khen mun khat leh tuinaahte tung ah atu hi.
66008011	Hu aahsi min chu Gamsai ahi. Huin tui mun thum a khen mun khat chu gamsai ahung suaahta a, huleh suhkhaat ahihtaah jiahin hu tuite apatin mi tampi asita uhi.
66008012	Huin angel lina in peengkuul amuut a, huleh ni mun thum a khen mun khat, ha mun thum a khen mun khat, aahsi mun thum a khen mun khat suhsiatin aumta a, huchiin hute mun thum a khen mun khat chu suhmial ahita hi. Suun mun thum a khen mun khat chu avaah nawn sih a, huleh jaan zong mun thum a khen mun khat huchibangmahin aum hi.
66008013	Huin ka et leh, angel khat vaanlaijawl a leenga aw ngaihtaha hichia kikou ka ja hi, “Angel thumte’n peengkuul amuut naahlai diing jiahun lei a umte tung agih hi, atunggih hi, atunggih hi!” chiin.
66009001	Huin angel ngaana in peengkuul amuut a, huleh aahsi khat vaan apata lei a kesuh ka mu hi. Amah kawmah kokhuuh tobei chabi piaahin aum hi.
66009002	Huleh ama’n kokhuuh tobei chu ahong a, huin hu kokhuuh apatin haaltuina mei nasatah khuu bangin meikhu ahung pawtdoh hi. Hu kokhuuh a meikhu jiahin ni leh vaan ahung mialta hi.
66009003	Huleh hu meikhu lah apatin khauphe leitung ah ahung pawtdoh hi. Huleh lei a momaaite a tobang silbawltheihna a kawmvah piaah ahi.

66009005	Huleh amahuh chu hute thah theihna diing thuneihna piaah ahi sih va, hizongleh ha ngaa sung sugenthei diinga phal ahi uhi. Huleh a suhgentheihna uh chu mom-aai in mi adeh chianga anat daan bang ahi.
66009006	Huleh hu hun chiangin mite’n sihna ahawl diing va, himahleh amu sih diing uh; sih auut diing va, huleh sihna in amahuh ataaimangsan diing hi.
66009007	Huleh hu khauphete meel chu gaal kuan diinga guatsa sakolte bangmai ahi uhi. A lutung vah sana tobang lallukhuh hileh kilawm akhuh va, huleh a maai uh chu mihingte maai bang ahi.
66009008	Amah un numei sam tobang sam anei va, a ha uh chu huumpibahnei ha tobang ahi.
66009009	Huleh amah un siih awmphaw hileh kilawm awmphaw anei va, a hajaap ging uh chu gaal a kuan sakol tampi kaangtalai ging bang ahi.
66009010	Amah un mom-aai bangin mei anei va, a mei vah gu aum hi. A silbawltheihna uh chu mihingte ha ngaa sung suhnatna diing ahi.
66009011	Huleh amah un kokhuuh tobei angel chu a tungvah kumpi in anei uhi. A min chu Hebrai haam in Abaddon ahi a, hizongleh Grik haam in a min chu Apollion ahi.
66009012	Tunggihna khat abeita hi; ngai in, tunggihna nihna ahung tung nalai diing hi.

66009020	Huleh hi gawtnate a si lou midang tengteng a khut natohte vapat akisiih tuan sih va; huchiin dawite leh sana, dangka, sumeng, suang leh sing milem, mu lah mu theilou, ja lah ja theilou, pai lah pai theilou milem abiahte uh atawpsan tuan sih uhi.
66009021	Huleh a tualthah uh ahihlouhleh a dawi aisaan uh ahihlouhleh a numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaina uh ahihlouhleh a guuhtaatna vapatin zong akisiih tuan sih uhi.
66010001	Huleh angel haat dang khat meilum a kithuama vaan apat hung kumsuh ka mu hi. A lutung ah sakhituihuup aum a, a maai chu ni abang a, huleh a keengte chu meikuang khuam bang ahi.
66010002	Huleh a khut ah lehkhabu neutakhat pheetsa atawi hi. Huleh a keeng jiatlam chu tuikhanglian tungah anga a, a keeng veilam chu leitung ah anga a,
66010003	huleh amah chu huumpibahnei humhaam bangin aw ngaihtahin akikou hi. Akikou zohin vaanging sagihte’n a aw uh asuahta uhi.
66010004	Huleh vaanging sagihte’n a aw uh asuah tahun gial diingin ka kisata hi. Huin vaan akipan aw khat in ka kawm ah hichia asoi ka ja hi, “Vaanging sagihte sil soi chu iim bihbeh inla, huleh gial sin,” chiin.

66011002	Hizongleh Pathian biahinn polam a leitual chu nusia inla teh sin, ajiahchu hichu Jentelte kawma piaah ahita hi. Huleh amah un khopi siangthou chu ha sawmli leh ha nih atuandeen diing uhi.

66011004	Hite chu olive sing nihte leh leitung Pathian ma a ding thaumei tunna nihte ahi uhi.
66011005	Mi koipouh in amah uh asuhnat tum leh, a kam vapat a mei hung pawtdoh in a meelmate uh akaangtum hi. Huleh mi koipouh in amahuh asuhnat leh huchibangmahin thahin aum diing uhi.
66011006	Hite’n chu thu asoilawh hun sungva guahjut louhna diingin vaan khaah theihna silbawltheihna anei va; huleh tui sisan suaahsah theihna leh auut daandaan va leitung gawtna chinteng a gawt theihna silbawltheihna anei uhi.
66011007	Huleh a heetpihna uh azoh chiangun kokhuuh tobei apata hung pawtdoh gamsa in amahuh adou diing a, azou diing a, huleh athat diing hi.

66011010	Huleh leitung a teengte chu amahuh tungah anuam diing va, kipaahna abawl diing va, huleh silpiaahte akithot tuah diing uhi, ajiahchu hi zawlnei nihte’n leitung a teengte abawl gim mahmah uhi.
66011011	Huleh ni thum leh akim zouin Pathian akipan hinna hagau a sungvah aluut a, a keeng un adingta va, huleh amahuh mute tungah launa nasatah atungta hi.
66011012	Huin amah un vaan apat aw ngaihtaha, “Hi lam ah hung tou un,” chia a kawmva kikou aja uhi. Huleh amahuh chu meilum lahah vaan ah akaltouta va, a meelmate un amahuh amu uhi.
66011013	Huleh hu daahkaal mahin jiil nasatahin akiliing a, khopi mun sawm a khen mun khat achimta hi. Hu jiilliing ah mi saang sagih thahin aumta a, adang teng in chu alau mahmah va vaan Pathian kawmah loupina apeta uhi.
66011014	Tunggihna nihna abeita a, ngai in, tunggihna thumna chu hung tung pah diing ahi.
66011015	Huleh angel sagihna in peengkuul amuut a, vaan ah aw ngaihtah hichiin aging hi, “Khovel lalgamte chu i Lalpa uh leh a Khrist lalgam ahung hita a, Amah chu kumtuang kumtuangin lalin atou diing hi!” chiin.
66011016	Huin Pathian ma a a laltouphah va tou upa sawmnih leh lite’n khupboha puuhin Pathian abia uhi,
66011017	“Nang ka hung phat uhi, Aw Lalpa Pathian Bangkimbawltheipa, umzing leh umta leh hung um diingpa, ajiahchu nangma’n na silbawltheihna loupitah na lata a, vai na hawmta hi.
66011018	Namte chu athangtawm va, huleh na lungthahna chu ahung tungta hi. Misite vaihawmsahna diing leh na suaah zawlneite leh misiangthoute leh na min lau, aneu leh aliante kawmah kipaahman na piaahna hun leh leitung susetute na suhsiatna hun diing chu ahung tungta hi,” chiin.
66011019	Huin vaan ah Pathian mun siangthou akihong a, a mun siangthou sungah a thuhun bawm akimu hi. Huin kawlphe, aw ging, vaan ging, jiilliing leh gialkia nasatah haw ahung umta hi.
66012001	Huleh vaan ah chiamchihna loupitah ahung kilang hi: numei khat ni a kithuam, a keeng nuaia hapi um, huleh a lutung a aahsi sawmlenih tuang lallukhuh khuh ahung um hi.
66012002	Amahnu chu naupaai ahi a, nausuaah diinga natna thuaahin akap hi.
66012003	Huin chiamchihna dang vaan ah ahung kilang kiit hi: ngai in, dragon san lianpi lutang sagih leh kii sawm nei, a lutungte a lallukhuh sagih khuh ahung um hi.
66012004	A mei in vaan a aahsi mun thum a khen mun khat akai a, lei ah apaaikheta hi. Huleh a Nau asuaah phaatphaat anavalhzou pah diingin dragon chu numei nausuaah diing nu ma ah ading hi.
66012005	Huleh amahnu’n chu Nau pasal nam zousiah tunga siihchiang a vaihawmtu diing khat ahung neikheta a, huleh a Ta chu Pathian leh a laltouphah kawmah laahtouhin aumta hi.
66012006	Huleh numeinu chu ni saang khat leh ni za nih leh ni sawmguup achawm theihna diingun gamdaai ah Pathian in abawlsah mun ah ataaimangta hi.
66012007	Huin vaan ah kidouna aum a, Mikael leh a angelte’n dragon adou va, huleh dragon leh a angelte’n zong adou va,
66012008	himahleh azou sih va, amahuh diingin vaan ah mun muhin aum nawnta sih hi.
66012009	Huleh dragon lian chu paihdohin aumta hi, hu malai a guulpi, Diabol leh Setan kichi khovel pumpi heemtu chu; amah chu leitung ah paihkhiahin aumta a, huleh a angelte zong amah toh paihkhiahin aum uhi.
66012010	Huin vaan ah aw ngaihtah a hichia chi ka ja hi, “Tuin chu i Pathian uh hutdamna, thahaatna, leh lalgam, huleh a Khrist silbawltheihna ahung tungta hi, ajiahchu asuun ajaan a i Pathian ma a i unaute uh heehtu chu paihkhiahin aumta hi.
66012011	Huleh amah un Belaamnou sisan jiah leh a heetpihna thu uh jiahin amah chu azouta va, sih tanphain a hinna uh aiit sih uhi.
66012012	Hujiahin nanguh vaan leh a sunga teengte kipaah un! Leitung leh tuikhanglian a teengte tung agih hi! Ajiahchu hun tomtakhat aneita chih aheet jiahin diabol chu thangtawm mahmahin na kawmvah ahung suhta hi,” chiin.
66012013	Huleh dragon in leitung ah paihkhiah ahita chih akiheet tahin hu numei Ta pasal neinu chu agawtta hi.
66012014	Hu numei chu gamdaai ah hu guul muhphaah louha hun khat leh hunte leh hun kimkhat chawma aumna diing mun a aleen luut theihna diingin mupi liantah ha nih piaah ahi.
66012015	Huleh tuilian haattah a numei chu atohmang theihna diingin guul in hu numei nu nawhin a kam apat tuilian luang bangin tui aphihdoh hi.
66012016	Hizongleh lei in numeinu panpihnain a kam akaah a, hu guul in a kam apat aphihdoh tuilian chu avalh beita hi.
66012017	Huleh dragon chu numeinu tung ah alungthah mahmah a, huin Pathian thupiaah jui leh Jesu Khrist heetpihna pomtu, hu numei nu chihaah tengteng chu dou diingin akuanta hi.
66013001	Huin tuikhanglian piauneel tungah ka ding a, huleh tuikhanglian apat gamsa hung pawt khat, lutang sagih leh kii sawm nei, huleh a kiite tunga lallukhuh sawm nei, huleh a lutangte tunga Pathian soisiatna min nei ka mu hi.

Khutsiammi, banglam pouha khutsiam mawngmawng na sungah akimu nawn sih diing a, huleh suang sumheeh gin mawngmawng zong akija nawn sih diing hi.
66018023	Huleh thaumei vaah zong na sungah ataang nawn het sih diing a, mou leh moupa aw zong akija nawn het sih diing hi. Ajiahchu na sumkawlveitute hi leitung a miliante ahi va, ajiahchu na bupsiamna in nam zousiah heemin aumta uhi.
66018024	Huleh a sungah chu zawlneite leh misiangthoute leh leitung a thaha um zousiah sisan muhin aumta hi,” achi hi.
66019001	Hi silte nungin vaan ah mipi tampi aw ngaihtah ka ja a, “Hallelujah! Hutdamna leh loupina, zahumna leh silbawltheihna chu Lalpa i Pathian uh a ahi!
66019002	Ajiahchu a vaihawmnate chu athutahin adihtat ahi, ajiahchu Ama’n nohchijuaahnu loupitah, numei leh pasal kaala a thaanghuaina jiaha leitung suthaanghuainu chu vai ahawmkhumta a, huleh a suaahte sisan phuba chu a tungah alaahsahta hi,” chiin.
66019003	Huleh amah un, “Hallelujah! Amahnu haalna meikhu chu kumtuang kumtuangin ajaamtouta hi!” achi uhi.
66019004	Huleh upa sawmnih leh lite leh silhing lite chu khupbohin apuuh va, “Amen! Hallelujah!” chiin laltouphah tunga tou Pathian chu abeta uhi.
66019005	Huchiin laltouphah apatin aw khat ahung gingdoh a, “Nanguh a suaahte zousiah leh nanguh Amah lau, aneu leh aliante’n i Pathian uh chu paahtawi un!” achi hi.
66019006	Huleh mipi tamtah aw ging bang, tui tamtah luang ging bang leh vaanpi ging nasatah tobang ka ja a, “Hallelujah! Ajiahchu Lalpa Pathian Bangkimbawltheipa’n vai ahawm hi!
66019007	“Kipaahin i nuam diing va huleh Amah kawmah paahtawina i pe diing uh, ajiahchu Belaamnou ji neih hun ahung tungta a, huleh a ji zong akisa zoudiamta hi,” achi hi.
66019008	Huleh amahnu chu puan malngaat siangthou leh vaam a akijep diing phal ahi a, hu puan malngaat chu misiangthoute dihtatna ahi.
66019009	Huin ama’n ka kawmah, “Gial in, ‘Belaamnou ji neihna ankuang uum diinga kouhte chu ahampha uhi,’” achi hi. Huleh ama’n ka kawmah, “Hite chu Pathian thusoi dihtahte ahi,” achi hi.
66019010	Huleh amah be diingin a keengbul ah ka puuh hi. Himahleh ama’n ka kawmah, “Hung be hial sin! Kei chu na suaah tanpih leh Jesu heetpihna thu nei, na unaute laha ka hi. Pathian bejaw in! Ajiahchu Jesu heetpihna chu thusoitheihna hagau ahi,” achi hi.
66019011	Huin vaan kihong ka mu a, huleh ngai in, sakol kaang khat; huleh a tunga tuangpa a min Ginum leh Thutah kichi ka mu a, Ama’n dihtatna in vai ahawm a huleh gaal abawl hi.
66019012	A mitte chu meikuang tobang ahi a, huleh a lutung ah lallukhuh tampi aum hi. Huleh Amah loungaal koima’n aheet theihlouh min kigial anei hi.
66019013	Huleh Amah chu sisan a kidiah puan in akithuam a, a min chu Pathian Thu akichi hi.
66019014	Huleh vaan a um sepaih hon in, puan malngaat vaam leh siangthou a kithuamin sakol kaangte tunga touin Amah ajui uhi.
66019015	Huleh namte asaatna diingin a kam apatin naamsau hiamtah apawtdoh hi. Huleh Amah ngeeiin amahuh chu siih chiang toh vai ahawmkhum diing hi. Amah ngeei in Bangkimbawltheipa Pathian lauhuaina leh thangtawmna uain suuhna chu atuanchilta hi.
66019016	Ama’n a puan tung leh a malpi tungah, KUMPIPATE KUMPIPA LEH LALPATE LALPA, chia kigial min anei hi.
66019017	Huin angel khat ni a ding ka mu a, amah chu aw ngaihtaha kikouin vaanlaijawl a leeng vate kawmah, “Hung unla Pathian ankuang luina loupitah ah hung kikhawm un,
66019018	kumpipate sa, sepaih houtuliante sa, mi haatte sa, sakolte sa leh a tungva tuangte sa leh mi zousiah, jaleen leh saltaang, aneu leh alian sa na neeh theihna diingun,” achi hi.
66019019	Huleh hu gamsa leh leitung a kumpipate leh a sepaih hon uh chu hu sakol tunga tuangpa leh a sepaihte dou diinga akipunkhawm uh ka mu hi.
66019020	Huleh hu gamsa chu matin aumta a, huleh amah toh zawlnei tahlou, a ma a chiamchihnate bawl a, hu chiamchihna a gamsa chiamtehna neite leh a lim bete heemzoupa chu gamsa toh matkhawmin aumta hi. Hi tegeel chu anih un kaat a kaang mei diil ah ahinga paihluutin aumta uhi.
66019021	Huleh amawh teng chu Amah sakol tunga tuangpa kam apat hung pawtdoh naamsau in thahin aumta uhi. Huleh amahuh sa in tungleeng va zousiah agilvahta uhi.
66020001	Huin angel khat vaan apat a hung kumsuh, a khut a kokhuuh tobei chabi leh khainiang golpi tawi ka mu hi.
66020002	Huleh ama’n dragon, hu malai a guulpi khu, Diabol leh Setan kichi chu aman a, kum saang khat sung diingin akaanta hi;
66020003	huleh kum saang khat achin masiaha namte aheem kiit louhna diingin kokhuuh tobei ah apaailuut a, akhaahkhum a, huleh chiamchihin asiindetta hi. Huleh hite zoh chiangin amah chu tomkhat sung hahkhiah ahi diing hi.
66020004	Huleh laltouphahte leh a tunga toute ka mu a, huleh a kawmvah vaihawmna piaah ahi. Huin Jesu aheetpihna jiah uh leh Pathian thu aheetpihna jiahva a ngawng uh tana umte hagaute leh gamsa ahihlouhleh a lim be ngeilou a, a tal uh ahihlouhleh a khut va zong chiamchihna nei ngeiloute haw chu ka mu hi. Huleh amahuh chu ahung hing va huleh Khrist toh kum saang khat vai ahawmta uhi.
66020005	Hizongleh misi dangte chu kum saang khat achin masiah ahing kiit sih uhi. Hichu thohkiitna masapeen ahi.
66020006	Thohkiitna masapeen a telte chu ahampha un asiangthou uhi. Hute tungah sih nihna in thu anei sih a, hizongleh amahuh chu Pathian leh Khrist siampute ahi diing va, huleh Amah toh kum saang khat vai ahawm diing uhi.
66020007	Hu kum saang khat achin chiangin Setan chu a taanna kul apat hahkhiahin aum diing a,
66020008	huleh leitung ning li a um namte, Gog leh Magog chu heema kidouna a puikhawm diingin achiahdoh diing hi, atam lam uh chu tuikhanglian piauneel bang ahi uhi.
66020009	Huleh amahuh chu lei vaailam daapin achiah tou va misiangthoute giahbuuh leh khopi deihum chu ahualkhumta uhi. Huleh Pathian a kuanin vaan apat mei ahung kesuh a, huleh amahuh akaangtumta hi.
66020010	Huleh amahuh heemtu diabol chu gamsa leh zawlnei tahlou umna mei leh kaat diil ah paihluutin aumta hi. Huleh amahuh chu kumtuang kumtuangin suun leh jaanin suhnatin aum diing uhi.
66020011	Huin laltouphah ngou loupitah leh a tunga toupa, Amah maai apat lei leh vaan ataaimangnapa chu ka mu a, huleh amahuh diingin mun mawngmawng muhin aumta sih hi.
66020012	Huleh misite, aneu leh alian, laltouphah ma a ding ka mu a, lehkhabute akihong a, lehkhabu dang zong akihong hi, huchu Hinna Lehkhabu ahi. Huleh misite chu hu lehkhabute a kigial bangin a natoh dungjui un vaihawmsahin aumta uhi.
66020013	Tuikhanglian in a sunga misi umte ahung pedohta a, huleh Sihna leh Misi Khua in a sunga misi umte ahung pedohta uhi. Huleh mi chin chu a silbawlte uh dungjuia vaihawmsahin aumta uhi.
66020014	Sihna leh Misi Khua chu mei diil ah paihluutin aumta uhi. Hichu sih nihna, mei diil chu ahi.
66020015	Huleh koipouh Hinna Lehkhabu a min kigial kha lou photmah chu mei diil ah paihluutin aumta uhi.
66021001	Huin vaan thah leh lei thah ka mu hi, ajiahchu vaan masa leh lei masa chu apaimangta hi. Huleh tuikhanglian zong aum nawn sih hi.
66021002	Huin kei Johan in khopi siangthou, Jerusalem Thah chu mou a pasal a diinga kichei banga bawl zohsa a Pathian apat vaan a hung kumsuh chu ka mu hi.
66021003	Huleh vaan apat aw ngaihtah khat in, “Ngai in, Pathian teenna chu mihingte lah ahita, huleh Amah chu a lahvah ateeng diing a, huleh amahuh chu a mite ahi diing uhi. Pathian ngeei chu a kawmvah aum diing a, a Pathian uh ahi diing hi.
66021004	Huleh Pathian in a mit vapat mittui zousiah asiaahsiangsah diing hi. Huleh sihna, lusuunna, leh kahna aum nawn sih diing hi. Hu ah natna aum nawn sih diing hi, ajiahchu sil masate teng apaimangta hi,” achih ka ja hi.
66021005	Huleh laltouphah tunga toupa’n, “Ngai in, sil zousiah ka siam thah hi,” achi hi. Huleh Ama’n ka kawmah, “Gial in, ajiahchu hi thute hi adihin aginum ahi,” achi hi.
66021006	Huleh Ama’n ka kawmah, “Bawlzoh ahita! Kei Alpha leh Omega, Abul leh Atawp ka hi. Dangtaah photmah kawmah hinna tuinaah tui athawnin ka pe diing hi.
66021007	Agualzoutu in chu sil zousiah aluah diing a, huleh a Pathian ka hi diing a, amah zong ka tapa ahi diing hi.
66021008	Hizongleh meidawite, gingtaloute, kihdahumte, tualthatte, numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaite, bumhaatte, milembete, juau haatte zousiah tan diing chu mei leh kaat a kaang diil ahi a, huchu sih nihna ahi,” achi hi.
66021009	Huin gawtna sagih nunungpeen a dim kuang sagih tawi angel sagihte laha khat ka kawmah ahung a, ahung houpih a, “Hi lamah hung in, mounu, Belaamnou ji chu ka hung ensah diing hi,” achi hi.
66021010	Huleh ama’n Hagau in taang sang liantah tungah ahung puita a, hu khopi loupitah Jerusalem siangthou, Pathian a kuana vaan apata hung kumsuh chu ahung ensah a,.
66021011	Pathian loupina anei hi. A vaah chu suang mantampeen abang a, jaspar suang bangin, kristal suang tobangin aval ahi.
66021012	Huleh kulhbaang nasatah leh sangtah anei a, kot sawmlenih anei a, hu kotte ah chu angel sawmlenih aum uhi. Huleh hu kotte tungah min kigial aum a, hute chu Israel tate phung sawmlenihte min ahi.
66021013	Suahlam ah kot thum, maallam ah kot thum, simlam ah kot thum leh tumlam ah kot thum aum hi.
66021014	Huleh khopi kulhbaang in innbulphuh suang sawmlenih anei a, hute tungah Belaamnou apostol sawmlenihte min atuang hi.
66021015	Kei hung houpihpa’n hu khopi leh a kotte leh a kulhbaang tehna diingin tehna sana chiang atawi hi.
66021016	Khopi chu ning li kibang neiin aum a, a dunglam saudaan chu a vaailam toh akibang hi. Huleh ama’n hu chiang in khopi chu ateh a, farlong saang sawmlenih ahi a, a dunglam leh a vaailam leh a saanlam akikim uhi.
66021017	Ama’n kulhbaang chu ateh a mihing tehna a tehin fi t za nih veel ahi a, huchu angel tehna in zong ahi.
66021018	Kulhbaang chu jaspar suang a kibawl ahi a, a khopi chu sana siang a kibawl liimlang bang mei ahi.
66021019	Khopi kulhbaang innbulphuh suangte chu suangmantam chi chinteng a zep ahi a, huleh a innbulphuh suang masapeen chu jaspar suang ahi a, anihna chu sapphire suang ahi a, athumna chu kalsidoni suang ahi a, alina chu emerald suang ahi a,
66021020	angaana chu sardonix suang ahi a, aguupna chu sardia suang ahi a, asagihna chu krisolit suang ahi a, agiatna chu beril suang ahi a, akuahna chu topaz suang ahi a, asawmna chu krisopras suang ahi a, asawmlekhatna chu jasinth suang ahi a, asawmlenihna chu amethist suang ahi.
66021021	A kot sawmlenihte chu tuikep suang sawmlenih ahi a, a kot chin chu tuikep suang khat a bawl ahi. Huleh khopi kotzing chu sana siang a bawl, liimlang etpailet theih bang ahi.
66021022	Huleh hu ah chu Pathian biahinn mawngmawng ka mu sih a, ajiahchu Lalpa Pathian Bangkimbawltheipa leh Belaamnou chu a biahinn ahi mei uhi.
66021023	Huleh hu khopi in chu ataanvaah diingin ni angai sih a, ha zong angai sih hi, ajiahchu Pathian loupina in hichu ataanvaah a, huleh Belaamnou chu a thaumei ahi mei hi.
66021024	Hutdama um namte chu hu vaah ah aleeng diing va, leitung a kumpipate’n a loupina uh leh a zahumna uh ahung tawi diing uhi.
66021025	A kotte chu suun in akikhaah ngei het sih diing, ajiahchu hu mun ah jaan aum sih diing hi.
66021026	Huleh amah un hu sungah namte loupina leh zahumna ahung poluut diing uhi.
66021027	Huleh hu sung ah chu bangchihmahin silbolhhoh ahihlouhleh kihdahhuai bawl, ahihlouhleh juau soi himhim aluut sih diing a, hizongleh Belaamnou Hinna Lehkhabu a min tuangte chauh aluut diing uhi.
66022001	Huin ama’n hinna luui tui chiimtah kristal suang banga val Pathian laltouphah leh Belaamnou apat a hung pawtkhia ahung ensah a,
66022002	hu khopi kotzing lailung leh a luuipang tuaah ah gah chi tuamtuam sawmlenih nei leh ha chin a gah hinna singkung aum hi. Huleh hu sing nahte chu namte suhdamna diing ahi.
66022003	Huleh hu ah haamsiatna mawngmawng aum nawn sih diing hi, hizongleh Pathian leh Belaamnou laltouphah aum jawta diing a, huleh a suaahte’n Amah nna atohsah diing uhi.
66022004	Amah un a meel amu diing va, a min chu a tal vah atuang diing hi.
66022005	Hu ah jaan aum nawn sih diing; huleh thaumei vaah leh ni vaah zong angai nawn sih diing uhi, ajiahchu Lalpa Pathian in amahuh ataanvaah diing a, huleh amah un kumtuang kumtuangin vai ahawm diing uhi.
66022006	Huleh ama’n ka kawmah, “Hi thute hi aginumin adih ahi,” achi hi. Huleh zawlneite hagaute Lalpa Pathian in sil kibawl pah diingte chu a suaahte musah diingin a angel asawlta hi.
66022007	“Ngai in, kintahin ka hung ngeei diing hi! Hi lehkhabu thusoilawh thute jui photmah chu ahampha hi,” achi hi.
66022008	Huleh kei Johan in hi silte ka muh a huleh ka jaah ahi. Huleh ka jaaha ka muh tahin hi silte hung musahtu angel keengbul ah be diingin ka puuhta hi.
66022009	Huin ama’n ka kawmah, “Hung be hial sin, ajiahchu kei chu nang leh na unau zawlneite leh hi lehkhabu a thu kisoite jui na suaah tanpih ka hi. Pathian be jaw in,” achi hi.
66022010	Huleh ama’n ka kawmah, “Hi lehkhabu a thusoilawh thute khaahkhum sin, ajiahchu a hun tung diing ahita hi.
66022011	Mi dihlou chu dihlouin um nalai heh, mi bolhhoh chu bolhhohin um nalai heh; huleh midihtat chu dihtatin um nalai heh; mi siangthou chu siangthouin um nalai heh,” achi hi.
66022012	“Ngai in, kintahin ka hung hi, mi chin a silbawl bang jeela piaah diing ka kipaahman ka kawmah aum hi.
66022013	Kei Alpha leh Omega, Abul leh Atawp, Amasapeen leh Anunungpeen ka hi.”
66022014	Hinna singkung a tan aneih theihna diing uh leh kotte a khopi sung aluut theihna diingva a thupiaahte juitute chu ahampha uhi.
66022015	Ajiahchu polam ah uite, bumhaatte, numei leh pasal kaala thaanghuaite, tualthatte, milem bete, juau ngaina leh bawl photmahte aum uhi.
66022016	“Kei, Jesu in kouhtuamte diinga hi thute na kawma hung hesah diingin ka angel ka hung sawl hi. Kei David Zungpi leh a Chihaah, Jiingsol Aahsi Taang chu ka hi,” achi hi.
66022017	Huleh Hagau leh mou in, “Hung in!” achi uhi. Huleh aja taphot in, “Hung in!” chi heh. Huleh koipouh adangtaah chu hung heh. Huleh auut taphot in hinna tui athawnin la heh.
66022018	Ajiahchu koipouh hi lehkhabu thusoilawh thute ja taphot kawmah ka hesah hi: Mi koipouh in hi thute abehlapin chu, Pathian in hi lehkhabu a kigial gawtnate a tungah abehlap diing hi.
66022019	Huleh mi koipouh in hi thusoilawhna lehkhabu thute apat alaahmangin chu, hinna singkung leh khopi siangthou leh hi lehkhabu a kigial silte apat atan diing chu Pathian in alaahmangsah diing hi.
66022020	Hi thute hesahtu in, “Kintahin ka hung ngeei diing hi,” achi hi. Amen. Huchi hi heh, hungta in, Lalpa Jesu!
66022021	I Lalpa Jesu Khrist hehpihna chu na bawnva kawmah umta hen. Amen.
